column2: Politburo yeZanu-PF Yozeya Nyaya yeKuratidzira
column3: Bato reZanu-PF nemusi weChitatu rakaita musangano waro wePolitburo richizeya nyaya dzezvekuratidzira kuri kuitwa munyika uye nyaya yehupfumi uho hwaenda kumawere. Vane ruzivo nezvemusangano uyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato iri riri kuda kusimbaradza mapurisa kuti amise kuratidzira munyika kuri kutungamirwa nevemapato anopikisa. Bato iri range richitarisirwawo kuzeyawo nyaya yekudzingwa kwedzimwe nhengo mubato, gadziriro munyaya dzekurima uye kugadzira sarudzo dzekuNorton ne Chimanimani West kune nhengo dzebato iri dzakadzingwa uye kuBikita West kuna VaMunyaradzi Kereke vari kupika jere mushure mekubata mwana mudiki chibharo. NeChishanu bato iri richaita musangano weCentral komiti kuzeya nyaya idzi zvekare. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu-PF VaIgnatious Chombo vati mutungamiri webato iri VaRobert Mugabe ndivo vanenge vari sachigaro mumisangano miviri iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition VaJoy Mabenge vanoti havaone Zanu-PF ichibuda nemazano anovaka nyika. No media source currently available

column2: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vanoda Kuti Vanhu Vatange Vabaiwe Nhomba Svondo Rino
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti vari kutarisira kuti vanhu vatange kubayiwa vhiki rino nhomba yeCovid-19 yakasvika munyika neMuvhuro mangwanani kubva kuChina. Hurumende inotiwo ine tarisiro yekuti panozopera gore rino vazhinji vanenge vabaiya nhomba senzira yekudzivirira kutapukira kwechirwere ichi. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, VaMnangagwa vakati vari kutarisira kuti vanu vabayiwe nhomba nechimbichimbi kuitira kudzivirira vanhu uye kuti hupfumi hwenyika hutange kusimukira. VaMnangagwa vakatambira zviri pamutemo nhomba iyi kuState House neMuvhuro masikati kubva kumumiriri weChina muZimbabwe VaGuo Shaochun vange vakamirira mutungamiri wenyika yavo VaXi Jinping. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vatsinhirawo mashoko aVaMnangagwa vachiti pamusoro penhomba vakapihwawo majekiseni acho vachiti vari kutarisira kuti kubaiwe kwenhomba iyi kutangwe chero vhiki rino. Dr John Mangwiro vati tarisiro yehurumende ndeyekuti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vange vabaiwa panopera gore rino. Izvi zvatsigirwa nevakasanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano VaRobert Mudyirandima avo vati kunyangwe hazvo hurumende iri kutarisira kubaya huwandu uhwu kuchiri kuitwa hurukuro nemakambani anogadzira nhomba dzeCovid-19. VaMudyirandima vatiwo panenge pachibaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakagadzirwa kuChina iyi, hurumende inenge ichitoita tsvakurudzo yekuti nhomba iyi inoshanda here kumhando dzehutachiona weCovid-19 huri munyika. Vachigamuchira nhomba iyi kuRobert Mugabe International Airport gurukota rezvehutano uyewo vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga varumbidza pamwe nekutenda nyika yeChina. VaChiwenga vatiwo mucherechedzo wehushamwari hwakasimba pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vachitambidzawo nhomba iyi kunaVaChiwenga, mumiririri weChina muZimbabwe VaGuo Shaochun vatiwo Zimbabwe ishamwari yeChina nekudaro havana dambudziko nekubatsira nyika ino pakuiwanisa nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Patricia Muchekeza vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo, hurumende yatambira nhomba yekutanga yekupiwa pachena vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende itenge mishonga iyi nechimbi chimbi. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nevaimbova gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Henry Madzorera avo vati vanga vakatarisira kuti nhomba yekupiwa iyi ichauya pamwechete nenhomba zviuru mazana matanhatu hurumende yaiti vakatenga. VaMadzorera vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kungwarira kuti vasazosundwe kutenga nhomba yekuChina zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nekuda kwekuti vapiwa zviuru mazana maviri pachena. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Professional Nurses Union VaRobert Chiduku vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo vakoti vachiziva nezvekubaya nhomba vanoda rumwe ruzivo nezvenhomba yeCovid-19 zvinosanganisira kuti vaziviswe kuti nhomba iyi ichange ichibaiwa pai huye rutivi rwupi nezviratidzo kana isina kuwirirana nemuviri wemunhu vasati vabaya kana kubayiwa. Vamwe vanga vari kunhandare yendege pasvika nhomba iy vanosanganisira gurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube, vakasanobata chigaro chegurukota rekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika nemamwe makurukota ehurumende. Vanamazvikokota munyaya dzezvemishonga kusanganisira veMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe vari kutarisirwa kuongorora nhomba iyi kuti ndeyechokwadi here kwemazuva maviri isati yatanga kubayiwa vanhu. Vari kutanga kubayiwa vanosanganisira vanachiremba, vakoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara, vanoshanda pamiganhu nenhandare dzendege uye vane zvirwere zvinovaisa panjodzi yakakura yekufa nechirwere ichi. Nhomba iyi yakagadzirwa nekambani inonzi Sinopharm inova yehurumende yekuChina inogadzira mishonga. China yakapa mvumo kuti nhomba iyi itange kubayiwa vanhu mukupera kwaZvita gore rapera. Nyika yakatanga kushandisa nhomba iyi iUnited Arab Emirates ichiteverwa neBahrain. Dzimwe nyika dziri kutenga mushonga uyu dzinosanganisira Singapore, Turkey, Brazil ne Chile. No media source currently available

column2: Vatsigiri vorumbidza Nakamba
column3: Villa vari kurumbidza zvikuru chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe Marvelous Nakamba padandemutande reTwitter zvichitevera kutamba kwaakaita zvinodakadza svondo radarika apo chikwata chake chakaita mangange 2-2 neBurnley kuVilla Park.   Rakange risiri zuva rekufara reAston Villa iyo mwaka uno yarasa zvibodzwa zvisere zvayainge ichifanirwa kuwana muPremier League.   Asi Nakamba ari kurakidza kuti mutambi wepamusoro izvo zvakaona murairidzi wechikwata chake ichi, Deam Smith, achimutenga nemari inosvika 11 miriyoni paunzi.   Mumutambo wavo neBurnley, Nakamba  akatamba zvemhando yepamusoro.   Kubva paakatengwa neAston Villa mwaka uno achibva kuClub Brugge yekuBelgium, Nakamba akwanisa kutamba mitambo mina kuchikwata ichi iyo inoti mitatu yemuEnglish Premier League kozoti mumwechete mumakwishu eCarabao Leagu Cup uyo wakave mutambo wake wekutanga.   Chikwata chake parizvino muEPL chatamba mitambo minomwe asi Nakamba haana kukwanisa kutamba yose sezvo akambenge akakuvara apo aitambira chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors mumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations uyo wakaitirwa kuEgypt nguva yadarika.   Asi kubva apora, Nakamba ari kurakidza kuti arovera hoko muchikwata chaSmith zvichitevera kutamba kwaaita mitambo mitatu yadarika.   Izvi zvamuona zvakare achigarisa pabhenji vamwe vatambi vakaita saDouglas Luiz chizvarwa chekuBrazil uyo aimbotambira Manchester City naHenri Lansbury chizvarwa chemuEngland uyo akambotambira Arsenal.   Ane bhora kunyangwe asina, Nakamba anorakidza kuti mutambi wepamusoro.   Mashoko anotevera ndiwo mamwe ezvakataurwa nevatsigiri veAston Villa padandemutande reTwitter. column2: Mapurisa Anonetsana Zvakare neVanotengesera muMigwagwa muGuta reHarare
column3: Sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga, vanotengesera mumigwagwa yemuguta reHarare nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police vaswera zvakare vachitandanisana, izvo zvinonzi zvaita kuti mapurisa aridze pfuti pamwe nekushandisa hutsi hunokachidza mukuedza kudzikamisa zvinhu. Mumwe wevanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa aona zvichiitika, uyo ati anoda kunzi VaTodzidambura Mhandu, vanoti vashamisika panguva dzemasikati kuona mapurisa achienda pavanoshandira panosangana migwagwa Kwame Nkrumah Avenue naAngwa Street, pedyo nechitoro chinotengesa mishonga cheQV Pharmacy. VaMhandu vanoti mapurisa aya, ayo anga achitungamirwa nemukuru wemapurisa muHarare, azoedza kusunga mumwe mukomana anotengesa mbatya vasina kana kumbotanga vamuudza mhosva yaapara, izvo zvazoita kuti mukomana uyu arambe kusungwa. Vanoti izvi ndizvo zvazoita kuti paite mhirizhonga yaunganidza vanhu, zvazoitawo kuti mapurisa aridze pfuti pamwe nekukanda utsi hunokachidza. Vanotiwo mapurisa aya aenda nembatya dzanga dzichitengeswa nemukomana uyu, dzinosanganisira midhebhe neshangu. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vanoti manyepo kuti mapurisa aridzira vanhu pfuti, vachiti mapurisa anga achitokanganiswa kuita basa ravo mushure mekunge aedza kuferefeta nyaya yekupambwa kwemumwe murume anogadzira pamwe nekutengesa nharembozha nevanhu vana. Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vanoti mushure mekunge vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vaungana, mumwe wevanhu ava abva apwanya fafitera rechitoro cheQV uye kuita ruzha nekutuka mapurisa izvo zvazoita kuti mumwe mupurisa azoburidza pfuti yake yebasa achiedza kuvatyisidzira achimirirawo kusvika kwemamwe mapurisa, ayo azodira utsi hunokachidza. Mutauriri wemapurisa uyu ati mapurisa anga achiri kuferefeta nezvenyaya iyi, sezvo vanhu vapamba murume wemafoni uyu vamumanikidza kuti avabhadhare mari, iyo vanoti yatobva kumba nemudzimai wake. Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasiyane netsika yekuvhiringidza mapurisa paanenge achiita basa rawo. No media source currently available

column2: Chizvarwa chekuChina Hachina Kufa neCoronavirus:Wilkins Hospital
column3: Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Prosper Chonzi varamba mashoko ekuti munyika mune chizvarwa chekuChina chakafa nechirwere checoronavirus. Dr Chonzi vati ongororo yavakaita yakaratidza kuti chainge chisina chirwere ichi. Chizvarwa chekuChina chechidzimai ichi chakatanga kurwara chiri kwaMutare chichibva chaenda kuna chiremba wacho wekuChina uyo akati chiende kuWest End Clinic. Asi vanachiremba pachipatara apa vakabva varamba kumuona vachibva vati aendeswe kuWilkins Hospital uko akafa ari munzira. Dr Chonzi vanoti kune chimwe chizvarwa chekuItaly chakaendeswa kuchipatara ichi chichiti chairwara asi chakazonzi hachinawo chirwere ichi. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vafa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose uye muAfrica chiri kuSouth Africa, Nigeria, Algeria neEgypt. Vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vanodarika chiuru zana. No media source currently available

column2: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chovhiringa Pfungwa dzeVashandi Vakawanda
column3:
Vamwe vana mukoti nanachiremba vakawanda vanonzi vave kubatwa nedambudziko rekusagadzikana kwepfungwa nekuda kwemashandiro avari kuita munguva ino yekurwisa dambudziko rechirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa nezuro wakapindwa nevagari vemudunhu reMashonaland West. Vachitaira pamusangano uyu, m ukuru anoona nezvehutano hwepfungwa mudunhu reMashonaland West kana kuti Provincial Mental Health Officer, Dr Tichaona Mahachi, vakati vana mukoti navana chiremba vanosvika mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 683 vakarwara nekusagadzikana kwepfungwa uye vamwe vanomwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mudunhu kubva patanga chirwere ichi gore rapera. Dr Mahachi vakatiwo hurumende iri pakati pekuita dzidziso yakanangana
nevashandi vebazi rezvehutano kuvagadzirira kuti vasavhiringwe hutano
hwepfungwa pavanenge vachiita basa ravo nerutsigiro kubva kubazi
reUnicef.

Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti dambudziko
rekusagadzikana kwepfungwa riri kuitikawo mune mwamwe matunhu. Vati hurumende iri kuita dzidziso kunana mukoti navana chiremba mumatunhu aya. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa huwandu hwevana chiremba nevakoti vari kusangana nedambudziko iri munyika yose. Asi mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland Central, Dr
Cremance Tshuma, vati dambudziko iri harisi mudunhu mavo.

Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vanomwe
vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu
hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvina nemazana
mashanu ane makumi mashanu, 4,550. Vamwe vanhu mazana mana ane gumi nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare izvo zvasvitsa vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19
kubva zvachatanga pavanhu zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nazvitanhatu
nemazana masere ane gumi nevanomwe, 126 817.

Kusvika pakupera kwezuva nezuro, vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga
yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamiriyoni maviri ane
zviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, 2 873 893. Vabayiwa nhomba dzose dziri mbiri sezvinokurudzirwa vave miriyoni
imwechete ine zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu nemazana maviri ane makumi mana nevanomwe, 1 926 247. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu
mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana
kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kushanda neIMF Apo Makambani Otadza Kubhadara Mitero kuZIMRA
column3: Nyaya yekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika inenge yoramba ichinetsa zvichitevera mashoko eZimbabwe Revenue Authority, ZIMRA, ekuti iri kutadza kuunganidza mari yemitero yavange vachitarisira kubva kuvanhu nemakambani. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vari muridzi wekambani yeManagement Solutions, VaLuxon Zembe, avo vaimbova mutungamiri weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, vanoti vanhu vose vanofanira kutsigira zviri kuitwa negurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, zvekuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi vachishanda neIMF. Zimbabwe pari zvino haisi kupihwa zvikwereti nenyika uye mabhanga ekunze nepamusana pekutadza kubhadhara mitero. Mamwe makurukota ehurumende kusanganisira rezvekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema, VaPatrick Zhuwawo, pamwe rezvevakarwa hondo, VaChris Mutsvangwa, vange vachishora VaChinamasa zvikuru vachiti vari kurasika nekuda kuumba hukama neIMF neWorld Bank. Mari dzemitero inobatwa nehurumende dzinoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende, kugadzira migwagwa, zvikoro, magwenya emagetsi, madhamu nezvimwe zvivakwa. Mukati memwedzi mitanhatu yekutanga kwegore rino, ZIMRA yakawana mari inosvika US$1,66 billion asi iyo yaitarisira mari inosvika US$1,76 billion. Sachigaro webhodhi reZIMRA, Amai Willia Bonyongwe, mumashoko avo mugwaro rezvemamiriro emari yemitero, vanobvuma kuti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi kwapa kuti makambani akawanda atadze kubhadhara mitero. Vanotiwo vakayedza kupa makambani nguva yakareba yekubhadhara zvikwereti vachiyambira kuomesera vari kuramba kubhadhara mari dzemitero vachiviga mari kuti ZIMRA isaone zviri kuitika, asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida . Makambani ane zvikwereti kuZIMRA zvemari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weZIMRA, VaGershom Pasi, sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available

column2: Mishonga yeNhomba yeCovid-19 Yosvika neMuvhuro Ichibva kuChina
column3: Zimbabwe ichatanga kugamushira mishonga yenhomba yekudzivirira denda reCovid-19 kubva kuChina nemusi weMuvhuro unouya uye vamwe vashandi vezvehutano vanoti mushonga uyu unofanira kutanga waongororwa usati hwapihwa kwavari pamwe neveruzhinji. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota wekutanga gore rino, gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Seneta Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati mishonga yava kapihwa pachena neChina pamwe nemimwe yakatengwa nehurumende ichatanga kusvika munyika svondo rinouya nemusi weMuvhuro. Vakatiwo mumwe mushonga unotarisirwa kusvika munyika musi wa1 Kurume uye hurumende ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuvadzirira kuCovid-19 ichitanga nemachiremba, vakoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara. Nyanzvi nevashandi vehutano vanoti hurumende iri kutora matanho akanaka pakuunza mishonga iyi asi panofanira kuitwa ongororo yekuti inoshanda zvakanaka here muZimbabwe. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kufara kuti hurumende iri kuvatungamidza pamberi pakutanga kubaiyiwa nhomba yeCovid-19, panofanira kutangwa paitwa ongororo yekuti mushonga uyu unoshanda muZimbabwe here vasati vabaiwa veruzhinji. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, zvakare vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanotsigirana naVaDongo vachiti zvakosha kuti hurumende iite ongororo yekuti mushonga uyu unoshanda zvakadii muZimbabwe. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vanachiremba, reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners Association, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuongorora mushonga uyu usati watanga kushandiswa kunodzivirira. Asi Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti hurumende ichatevedza hunyanzvi hwesainzi panyaya dzemishonga yekudzivirira Covid-19. VaDongo vanoti kunyange hazvo vasati vave neruzivo hwekuti hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 huchafamba sei kana kutanga rini, havawoni sekuti zvinganetse kubaya vanhu sezvo vagara vachibaya vanhu nhomba dzezvimwe zvirwere. Kunze kwemishonga iri kubva kuChina, Amai Mutsvangwa, vakazivisawo kuti hurumende ine hurongwa kwekutenga mishonga yeCovid-19 kubva kuIndia neRusssia. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti Zimbabwe ichatumira ndege kuChina kunotora mishonga yenhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuti ipinde munyika musi waKukadzi 15, 2021. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti nhomba dziri kubva kuChina hadzisati dzaitwa ongororo muZimbabwe yekuona kuti inoshanda zvakadii sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika mishonga iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji munyika. Ongororo idzi dzinotora mwedzi yakati kuti dzichiitwa pachikwata chevanhu mishonga iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti zvinhu zvose zviri mugwara. No media source currently available

column2: Loga marara: Grobbelaar
column3: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu ichitambira maWarriors nezvikwata zvinosanganisira Highlanders neLiverpool — Bruce “Jungleman” Grobbelaar — inoti Zdravko “Loga” Logarusic, uyo ari kutungamirira chikwata chenyika, murairidzi nhando pane vose vakamborairidza maWarriors.   Achitaura pachirongwa chaAlois Bunjira cheZim Soccernet, icho anoita hurukuro neshasha dzaakambotamba nadzo nhabvu, Jungleman anoti anoda chaizvo kudzoka kuzoshanda nemaWarriors sezvo pari zvino ari kutambisirwa nguva yawo naLoga.   Kusvika pari zvino, Loga arairidza maWarriors mumitambo 14 apo akangokwanisa kuhwina mumwechete, ndokuita mangange mimwe mishanu uye ndokukundwa misere. Nemusi weChipiri chino, maWarriors akakundwa 2-1 neEthiopia mumutambo wekurwira kuenda ku2022 World Cup.   Jungleman anoti matambiro ari kuita maWarriors anoratidza kuti Loga hapana zvaanoziva. “Ndinoda chaizvo kudzoka kuzoshanda nemaWarriors izvozvi, asi pane mumwe munhu aripo ari kuita basa iri. Asi mumaziso angu, muchinda uyu hapana zviri kuzivikanwa, arairidza mitambo inopfuura 12 akahwina mumwechete akaita mangange mishanu uye mimwe yese kurohwa chete, zvoratidza kuti ndiye murairidzi nhando pane vose vakambotungamira chikwata chenyika yedu.   “Nhoroondo yemitambo yaarairidza inotaura zvakawanda,” anodaro Jungleman.   Anoti chikwata chemaWarriors chiripo pari zvino chizere netarenda rinonwisa mvura zvekuti vanogona kusvika padanho rechikwata chakamboita mukurumbira che“The Dream Team” icho chaakatambirawo nevamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Peter Ndlovu apo vairairidzwa naReinhard Fabisch.   “Chikwata chatinacho iye zvino chine tarenda rinodadisa rinonwisa mvura uye vanogona kusvika padanho ratakasvika isu seDream Team. Vanofanirwa kungobikwa chete vorakidzwa gwara chairo rekufamba naro.   “Tine vatambi vakawanda vari kutambira kunyika dzeEurope, saka murairidzi wedu anofanirwa kuvabata vose ovakurudzira kuti vauye kuzotambira maWarriors uye ovazivisa zvakanakira kutambira nyika yavo.   “Ini ndikapihwa basa iri nhasi, chekutanga kubata vatambi vose ndovakurudzira kuti huyai kumusha mutambire nyika yenyu,” anodaro Jungleman.   Jungleman anoti matambiro ari kuita maWarriors anoratidza kuti Loga hapana zvaanoziva.

column2: Handiende: Chiyangwa. . . ‘Ini ndini ndine yese’
column3: MUTUNGAMIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu munyika muno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) – Phillip Chiyangwa – anoti kunyangwe zviite sei ndiye ari kutonga uye haasi kuzobva pachigaro chinopisa ichi.   Captain Fiasco kana kuti Phidza, semazita emadunhurirwa aChiyangwa, ndiye ega achamira pasarudzo dzichaitwa dzekusarudza mutungamiri mutsva weZifa musi waZvita 1 sezvo vamwe vaida kukwikwidza kupinda pachigaro ichi vakakundikana nekuda kwekuti vaive vasina magwaro akakwana anotarisirwa kuti vange vachikwikwidza.   “Kunyangwe ndikarwara zvekundisunda mubhara chaimo, ndini ndiri kutonga uye ndicharamba ndichitonga.   “Vanoda kundirwisa, asi hapana zvavanoita kana kwavanosvika. Isu ndisu tine yese, musi wa1 kungonzi panyanga ka, tatopinda panyanga,” anodaro Chiyangwa.   Anoenderera mberi achiti kunyangwe vanhu vakataura zvakawanda-wanda, hapana zvazvinoshandura nekuti mutungamiri wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvau pasi rose reFederation International de Football Association (Fifa) – Gianni Infantino – anoteerera zvinenge zvataurwa naiye (Chiyangwa) chete kana dziri nyaya dzine chekuita nezvenhabvu yemuno.   “Vanhu kunyangwe vakataura zvavanotaura, hapana zvazvinoshandura, Gianni Infantino anongoteerera zvandinenge ndataura ini chete kwete vamwe vese.   “Munenge muchipedza nguva yenyu kana muchinyora matsamba enyu muchitaura kudii kudii, zvavamunenge muchiita. Ini ndini waanoterera chete nekuti ndini ndiri panyanga,” anodaro.   Chiyangwa anoti kuti nhabvu yemuno inyatsosimba, Hurumende inofanirwa kupindira yotsigira mutambo uyu nemari sezvinoitwa kune dzimwe nyika kuti basa ravo rinyatsofamba zvakanaka uye nekuita zvirongwa zvakasiyana.   Anoti kusapindira kweHurumende kunovadzosera kumashure zvikuru izvo zvinozovaona dzimwe dzenguva vachisvika pakuburitsa mari dzavo dzemuhomwe kuti vakwanise kufambisa basa reZifa rinosanganisira kubhadhara vatambi kana kuvatumira kunze kwenyika kumitambo yakasiyana.   “Zvatinoona kune dzimwe nyika, Hurumende inofanirwa kupindira yodira mari mumutambo uyu kuti zvitibatsire kufambisa basa redu. Dzimwe dzenguva tinosvika pakuburitsa mari dzedu dzemuhomwe kuti tiwane kubatanidza zviendeke titumire vakomana kumitambo yavo izvo zvinove zvisingafanirwe kuitika.   “Tikawana rutsigiro rwemari kubva kuHurumende, zvinhu zvedu zvoshanduka zvotifambira zvakanaka,” anodaro Chiyangwa.

column2: ‘Tave kuda Afcon’
column3: . Chiyangwa otaura nezvekuhwinha kuCosaf   MUTUNGAMIRIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu munyika reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa), Phillip Chiyangwa, anoti hapana chinotadzisa maWarriors kuhwina mukombe weAfcon zvichitevera kutora kwakaita chikwata ichi mukombe weCosafa svondo rapera.   Zimbabwe yakasimudza mukombe weCosafa apo yakakunda Zambia 4-2 mufainari yemutambo uyu kuPolokwane, kuSouth Africa. Chiyangwa anoti maWarriors munguva pfupi inotevera achange ave kuita gadziriro dzemutambo weAfcon apo achasangana neCongo kuStade Municipal deKintele kuBrazzaville muna Gunyana.   “Zvikwata zvizhinji zvemuAfrica takazvikunda saka hapana chinotitadzisa kuti tirwire mukombe weAfcon, tinozviita uye tichazviita, Afcon ndiyo yatave kuda.   “Asi chikuru ndechekuti titange tabudirira kuenda kumutambo uyu muna Gunyana,” anodaro.   Anoti maWarriors ave kukodzerawo kukwikwidza muWorld Cup.

column2: America Yobatsira Zimbabwe Kuti VanaChiremba naVanaMukoti Vasatapurirwe Zvirwere
column3: Hurumende dzeAmerica neZimbabwe nemusi wenhasi dzakaparura chirongwa chemakore mashanu icho chakanangana nekudzivirira vanachiremba navanamukoti kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa nebazi rezvehutano nekuchegetedzwa zvakanaka kweavana nemamwe masangano akaita seveThe Union, Biomedical Research and Training Institute chiri kutsigirwa neveCenters for Disease Control vekuAmerica zvichiburikitsa nemari inopihwa nemutungamiriri wenyika yeAmerica pachirongwa chake chekurwisana neHIV chePresident’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief kana kuti PEPFAR. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weCDC muZimbabwe Amai Laurie Fuller vati vari kutsigira chirongwa ichi nekuti vashandi vezvehutano vakakosha uye zvakawonekwa kuti hapana change chiri kuitwa kuvadzviriri kubva kuchirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Amai Fuller vanoti vachashandisa miriyoni yemadhora nechidimbu pachirongwa ichi mugore rekutanga. Vange vakamirira munyori mubazi rezvehutano pachiitiko chanhasi, Dr Angela Mushavi vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha chose kuvashandi vezvehutano munyika. Vanoti vashandi vehutano vari padambudziko rekutapurirwa zvirwere vari pababsa uye chirongwa ichi chichaita kuti vagare vachiongororwa nguva nenguva. Mukuru wesangano reThe Union iro rine hunyanzvi mukurwisana nechirwere cherurindi, Dr Christopher Zishiri vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo richabatsira nehunyanzi hwaro mukuronga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanachiremba navanamukoti kuti vakangazvidzivirire sei kubva kuTB. Vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha chose nekuti hapana ange ari kutarisa vanachiremba navanamukoti pamwe nekuona kuti vazvidzivirira here kubva kuTB. Chirongwa ichi chinotarisirwa kuitwa muzvipatara nemumakirinika munyika yose. Zimbabwe ndeimwe yenyika gumi neina dzinevanhu vakawanda vanotapurirwa chirwere cherurindi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zvevanhu vane chirwere cherurindi vanenge vaine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS kozotiwo vanhu vazhinji vane HIV/AIDS vanofa neTB. No media source currently available

column2: Dare Rinoudza Muzvare Mamombe, Muzvare Chimbiri naMuzvare Marova Kuti Vaise Mapasipoti Avo Mumaoko eDare
column3: Dare ramejasitiriti ratura mutongo wekuti mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, nevamwe vavo vaviri, vasvitse magwaro avo ekufambisa kudare. Vatatu ava, avo vanoti vakatochwa vari muhusungwa, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo yakadzikwa nemutungamiri wenyika yeCovid-19 Regulations. Vachitura mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chakasvitswa nehurumende chekuti zvakaturwa nedare pachikumbiro chevatatu ava zvivandudzwe, mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti Guriro, vati Muzvare Mamombe nevamwe vavo vanoti Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri naMuzvare Netsai Murova, vasvitse mapasipoti avo panokwana nguva dza 4 neChitatu masikati. Vanziwo vadzoke kudare musi wa13 Nyamavhuvhu apo pakatarisirwa kuenderera mberi kwenyaya yavari kupomerwa. Vatatu ava vakange vabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso uye kuti vazvipire kumapurisa kamwe chete mukati memasvondo maviri, asi vachuchisi vehurumende vakadzoka kudare kuti izvi zvivandudzwe vachiti vakawana runyerekupe rwekuti vatatu ava vanga vachida kutiza munyika. Amai Guriro vati zvakakosha kuti vatatu ava vamirire kutongwa kwavo nokudaro vati vaona zvakakodzera kuti vabvume chikumbiro chehurumende. Gweta revatatu ava, VaJeremiah Bhamu, vati vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro kuitira kuti vadzoserwe mapasipoti avo vachiti hapana mhosva yavanganzi vangatize kutongwa kwayo. Zvichakadai, baba vaMuzvare Marova, VaRunesu George Marova, vati vari kushungurudzika zvikuru nekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa mwana wavo pamwe chete nevamwe vaakasungwa ainavo. Baba vaMuzvare Chimbiri, VaHenry Chimbiri, vati vari kushushikana zvikuru nemapurisa ari kuramba achishanyira mwana wavo nevamwe vari kuchipatara kwavari kunyange hazvo vatatu ava vakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nematare pamhosva yavari kupomerwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Muzvare Mamombe nevamwe vavo vanoti vakasungwa mwedzi wapera pa roadblock mushure mekuratidzira kunonzi kwakaitwa nevechidiki veMDC Alliance mumusha weWarren Park. Kunyange hazvo bepanhau reHerald nemamwe masangano enhau akaburitsa kuti vatatu ava vaive mumaoko emapurisa, mapurisa akazobuda achiramba mashoko aya mushure mekunge vatatu ava vazowanikwa kuBindura vachiti vakatochwa vari mumaoko ehurumende. Parizvino, vatatu ava vari kugara muchipatara vachirapwa zvichitevera kutochwa kwavanoti vakaitwa uku. Asi hurumende kuburikidza negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, inoti ichiri kuferefeta nyaya iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Tuchel otsiura Mbappe
column3: Saint-Germain, Thomas Tuchel, akaramba kutaura pamusoro penhau yekuti chikwata chake chinogona kutenga mutambi weChelsea, N’Golo Kante.   Kante – uyo akapembera kuhwina mukombe weWorld Cup neFrance gore rino – ari kunzi ari kudiwa kuzotengwa nechikwata ichi chekuFrance chinove shasha dzeLigue 1 mwaka uno.   Mutambi wePSG, Kylian Mbappe, akabuda pachena kuti akasiya katsamba muhomwe dzaKante achiedza kumukurudzira kuti auye kuzotambira nhabvu yake kuchikwata ichi chekuFrance apo vaive kuWorld Cup kuRussia.   Asi, Tuchel anoti hazvina kunaka kutaura pamusoro pezvevatambi vekune zvimwe zvikwata panyaya yekuda kuvatenga. “Hazvina kunaka uye handizvifarire zvachose, uye handizvifarire kana vamwe varairidzi vachitaura pamusoro pevatambi vari kutambira zvimwe zvikwata,” anodaro Tuchel. Saka hapana nyaya panhau yaKante uye hatisi kufunga nezvazvo mwaka uno.”   Apo Tuchel ari kuramba kutaura nezvevamwe vatambi vari kuuya kuchikwata chake, murairidzi wePSG uyu anoti ane chivimbo chikuru chekuti Edinson Cavani haasi kuzobva achienda kuReal Madrid.   Mutambi uyu – uyo anove chizvarwa chekuUruguay – ari kunzi anodiwa kuti azotsive Cristiano Ronaldo uyo akabva achienda kuJuventus nemari inosvika 100 miriyoni paunzi.   Asi achitaura chikwata chake chichangobva kukunda Atletico Madrid 3-2 mumutambo weInternational Champions Cup, Tuchel anoti, “Ndinofunga kuti acharamba ari kuno, hapana ambotaura chinhu kwandiri nezvenyaya yake saka ndinoziva kuti acharamba aripo.   “Hazvina kumbouya mupfungwa dzedu kuti angangoenda, ndakataura naye uye haana kurakidza kuti anoda kubva.” — SportsMail Football

column2: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kurawara neCovid-19 muNyika Hwowedzera Zvakanyanya
column3: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika uho hwainge hwamboderera kusvika pazana nemakumi matanhatu nemana kana kuti 164 musi wa12 Gumiguru hwatanga kuwedzerazve zvakanyanya. NeMugovera bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika uye vose havana nhoroondo yekushanya kunze kwenyika. Izvi zviri kureva kuti vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vave mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevatatu kana kuti 433. MuBulawayo ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara vanosvika zana negumi nevatanhatu, Harare ine makumi manomwe nemumwe, Matabeleland South ine makumi matanhatu nemumwe, Matabeleland North makumi mashanu nevatanhatu uye dunhu rine vanhu vashoma shoma vari kurwara iMashonaland West ine vanhu vasere. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuru zvisere nemazana manomwe nemakumi masere nematanhatu kana kuti 8, 786. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino vave zviuru zvisere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 8, 096 mushure mekupora kwevanhu vasere neMugovera. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizino vave mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 257. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mana nemasere ane zana nemana kana kuti 47, 104. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1, 6 million. South Africa ine vanhu vave kusvika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 750 000 vabatwa nechirwere icgi ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemana kana kuti 54 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica chete vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 245, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave kuda kusvika mamiriyoni gumi nechimwe kana kuti 11 miillion. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9. Asi vapora vachida kusvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti 35 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambova mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vati vanhu vanofanira kugara vakangwarira nekuti vakarivara chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine hukasha zvochoiita muAmerica, Britain nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

column2: VaTomana Voridzirwa Pito Vachinzi Vatadza Basa
column3: Judiciary Service Commission, JSC, inoti gweta guru renyika, VaJohannes Tomana, vanofanira kusiya basa nenyaya yekusatevedzera mitongo yematare epamusoro sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. Judiciary Service Commission, JSC, inoti gweta guru renyika, VaJohannes Tomana, vanofanira kusiya basa nenyaya yekusatevedzera mitongo yematare epamusoro sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. JSC ina sachigaro uye ari mutongi mukuru wematare, VaGodfrey Chidyausiku, pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzinosanganisira mutongo mutungamiri wedare repamusoro pamwe nevamwe vatongi vedare iri. JSC inoti VaTomana havachakodzere zvachose kuti vave gweta guru rehurumende uye nyaya yekuti vakatopotsa vaendeswa kujeri panyaya yavairamba kuchuchisa nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Kereke, vari kupomwera mhosva yekubata chibharo, munongedzo wekuti munhu asisafanire kuva muhofisi. Studio7 yange yatoudzwa neMuvhuro nevamwe vakuru muhurumende kuti VaMugabe vave mubishi kuumba komiti yekutanga kuferefeta VaTomana uye vakabatwa nemhosva, vanodzingwa basa. Asi VaTomana vatokwira kudare repamusoro vachiti zviri kuitwa neJSC hazvisi pamutemo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaTomana kanawo gweta ravo, VaThabani Mpofu. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo, uye vachidzidzisa mitemo paKent University kuBritain, Doctor Alex Magaisa, vanoti havaoni VaTomana vachipona munyaya yasimudzwa neJSC. No media source currently available

column2: VaCharumbira Vanoti Democratic Party Iri Kuita Rusarura Pana VaButtigieg naVaSanders
column3: Panguva iyo sarudzo dzekutsvaga munhu achamirira bato reDemocratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica dzava kutsiriridza, mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika uye vari sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reNorth America Province, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoti sarudzo dzebato iri hadzisi kufamba zvakanaka sezvinotarisirwa nguva dzose nevakawanda. VaCharumbira, avo vanagara kuAberta kuCanada, vanoti zviri kubuda pachena musarudzo idzi ndezvekuti vamwe vakuru vakuru muDemocratic Party havasi kuda vamwe vanhu vari kudiwa neveruzhinji vari kuratidza kuti vari kukwikwidza zvine mutsindo. VaCharumbira vanoti zvakaitika kuIowa zvinoburitsa pachena kuti pane makakatanwa mubato iri sezvo veruzhinji vari kuratidza kuti vanotsigira VaPete Buttigieg naVaBernie Sanders, avo vavanoti vanenge vasiri kufarirwa nevakuru vakuru muDemocratic Party. Zvisineyi nezviri kuitika mubato iri, VaCharumbira vanoti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe ane zvakawanda zvaanogona kudzidza kubva kurunyararo rwunoitika musarudzo dzemuAmerica. Mashoko aVaCharumbira anouya panguva iyo Democratic Party yatarisana nezuva guru rinozovikanwa nekuti Super Tuesday, apo matunhu gumi nemana achange achisarudza munhu anofanirwa kumirira bato iri musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Sarudzo idzi dziri kuitwa nemusi weChipiri svondo rinouya, Kurume 3. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Yotora Matanho Kudzivirira Kupinda kweCoronavirus Munyika
column3: Hurumende inoti iri kutora matanho ese ainokwanisa kudzivirira kuti vanhu vasabatwe nehutachiwana hweCoronavirus uye vanhu vese vanobva kunyika dzine hutachiwana uhwu, vave kusungugirwa kuuya nemagwaro anoratidza kuti havana hutachiwana uhwu. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, vati vanouya vasina magwaro aya vacharambidzwa kupinda munyika. Kusvika musi wa1 Kurume, Zimbabwe yange yaongorora vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitanhatu vakawonekwa vasina hutachiwana hweCoronavirus uye ongororo iyi iri kuramba ichitwa panhandare dzese dzendenge munyika pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dzekupinda nadzo munyika. VaMoyo vazivisawo kuti pane chizvarwa chekuZimbabwe chaibva kuBahrain nechimwe chekuChina vakaongororwa pachipatara cheWilkins vakawanikwa vasina hutachiwana uhwu. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato guru runopikisa munyika, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vane hutachiwana uhwu vasapinde munyika, hurumende inofanira kusimudzira mabasa ehutano munyika kuitira kuti ikwanise kuongorora zvirwere zvese. Mune imwe nyaya, gurukota rinoona nezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vati majeri emunyika akazarisa uye hurumende iri kuronga kuburitsa vamwe vasungwa mumajeri. Vati pari zvino vave kurongwa kuti vasungwa voburitswa ndevapi. Majeri emuZimbabwe ane vasungwa zviuru makumu maviri nezviviri asi iwo akagadzirirwa kuchengeta vasungwa zviuru gumi nezvinomwe chete. VaZiyambi vati vanoda kuti majeri asare aine vasungwa zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu. Muneimwewo nyaya vakasanobatachinzvimbo chegurukota remutambo, VaKazembe Kazembe, vatiwo hurumende iri kuedza pese painogona napo kugadzirisa nhandare dzeNational Sports Stadium neBarbourfields kuitira kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kutamba mutambo wayo CAF neAlgeria munyika. Nhandare idzi dzakanzi neCAF hadzikodzeri kutambira mitambo yeCAF sezvo dzisina zvimwe zvinhu zvinodiwa mazuvano. VaKazembe vati kana vakapedza kugadzirisa National Sports Stadium neBarbourfields, vachakumbira CAF kuti mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria musi wa29 Kurume utambirwe munyika. No media source currently available

column2: Zvimwe Zvikoro Zvorambidza Vabereki Kushanyira Vana Vavo Pachityirwa Korera
column3: Zvimwe zvikoro zvakaita seChinhoyi High mudunhu reMashonaland West zvave kurambidza vabereki vane vana vanodzidza vachigara muzvikoro izvi kushanyira vana vavo kana kuvaigira chikafu senzira yekudziviri kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mumwe wevanochengeta vana vanodzidza vachigara pachikoro cheChinhoyi High asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau ati hapana mubereki ari kubvumidzwa kuuya pachikoro apa, uye hapana chikafu chekunze chiri kubvumidzwa pachikoro apa. Muchengeti wevana uyu ati pachikoro apa pane dambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura zvekuti vehutano vakavabvakachira vachiona kuti zvakamira sei pachikoro. Mumwe mubereki, VaSimon Moyo, avo vanga vauya kuzoona mwana wavo vaine zvekudya, vati varambidzwa. Vatiwo vakuru vechikoro vanofanirwa kupatsanura zvekudya zvingangoita korera kwete kurambidza zvekudya zvese zvese nezvinenge zvatengwa muzvitoro. Zvichakadaro, vamwe vanotengesa zvinhu muChinhoyi vashoropodza hurongwa hwekanzuru hwekubhadharisa zvimbuzi uye kuti vatengesere pedyo nezvimbuzi. VaKillian Mashoko vati kanzuru inofanirwa kumbomisa kubhadhariswa kwezvimbuzi zviri munzvimbo dzekutandarira mudhorobha. VaMashoko vati kanzuru haifanirwe kupa vanhu pekutengesera pedyo nezvimbuzi izvo vanoti hazvina hutano. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rekanzuru yeChinhoyi panyaya iyi. Hurumende yakambomisa kuungana kwevanhu vakawanda panzvimbo imwechete nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chekorera icho chauraya vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri munyika pari zvino. Chirongwa cheZimbabwe International Book Fair changa chichifanirwa kutanga muHarare neMuvhuro, chakambomiswa nekuda kwechirwere chekorera icho chatekeshera muHarare, zvikuru munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji dzeGlen View neBudiriro. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Vana Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChishanu kuti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,496. Vanhu makumi mana nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu zvine mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 36,424. Vanhu makumi maviri nevana kana kuti 24 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvichireva kuti vapora kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nematatu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 33, 996. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 931. Zvichakadaro, huwandu hwevashandi vemuzvipatara nevamwe vanoita mabasa anopa kuti vasangane neveruzhinji vabayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina vasvika zviuru makumi matatatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 36, 283. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere ichi huri kuramba huchidzikira munyika nepasi rose, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Edgar Munatsi vanoti vanhu havafanire kurivara. African Union Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana kana kuti 4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zana nemanomwe rezvuiru kana kuti 107, 000. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3, 5 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika zana remamiriyoni rine gumi nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 119 million. Pasi Rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti kuti 532, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 29 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe zvine zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 67,5 million. No media source currently available

column2: Dare Rinombosendeka Mutongo Waro paChikumbiro chaVaHlalo Vakadzingwa muMDC-T
column3: Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, uye vari gweta riri kumirira bato iri munyaya yaVaHlalo, VaDouglas Mwonzora, varamba mashoko aVaHlalo vachiti bato reMDC-T rine mitemo yakajeka inotevedzerwa nenhengo dzose dzinenge dzine zvichemo. Mumwe mutongi wedare reHigh Court muBulawayo anoti achazivisa munguva inotevera mutongo wake pachikumbiro chakasvitswa kudare iri naVaMatson Hlalo, avo vakadzingwa mubato reMDC-T pamwe nekubviswa pachigaro chekuve seneta weMzilikazi anomirira bato iri. Mushure mekunzwa neChishanu kubva kumagweta aVaHlalo pamwe neMDC-T, mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Nokhuthula Moyo, vati vachazozivisa mutongo wavo munguva pfupi iri kutevera. VaHlalo vakakwidza chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi kana kuti Urgent Application kudare reHigh Court munguva pfupi yapfuura vachida kuti dare iri rimbosendeka parutivi nyaya yekudzingwa kwavo kuve nhengo yedare reseneti uyewo kudzingwa kwavo kuve nhengo yeMDC-T. Muchikumbiro chavo VaHlalo vakatiwo vanoda kuti dare rimbomisa bato reMDC-T kudoma mumwe munhu achavatsiva pahuseneta kusvika nyaya yavo yapera kunzwikwa nedare. VaHlalo, avo vari kumiririrwa naVaGodfrey Nyoni, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotarisira kuti dare richatambira chikumbiro chavo. Pavabvunzwa kuti havafunge here kuti hazvina zvazvinonyanyobatsira kuti vaendese nyaya iri pakati pavo nebato ravo kumatare, VaHlalo vati zvakakosha kuti bato rakaita seMDC-T iro rinoti rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, riremekedzee mutemo. VaHlalo vati bato reMDC-T harina kutevedzera gwara rebumbiro remitemo yaro pakuvadzinga kwavakaita. Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, uye vari gweta riri kumirira bato iri munyaya yaVaHlalo, VaDouglas Mwonzora, varamba mashoko aVaHlalo vachiti bato reMDC-T rine mitemo yakajeka inotevedzerwa nenhengo dzose dzinenge dzine zvichemo. VaMwonzora vati VaHlalo vakapiwa mikana yose yange iripo yekuti vagadzirise nhunha dzavo vachitevedzera gwara rebato reMDC-T asi vakaramba kuita izvi, vachitiwo bato reMDC-T rinotarisra kuti nhengo dzaro dzitevedzere gwara remusangano. VaMwonzora vati kunyange zvavo vasingakwanise kutaurira dare zvekuita, nyaya yaVaHlalo haifanirwe kutemesa dare musoro nekuti kune nyaya dzakawanda dzakaitika dzakafanana naidzodzo vachipa muenzaniso wekudzingwa muparamende kwevaimbove munyoro mukuru webato reMDC-T, VaTendai Biti, nevamwe vane chitsama mushure mekunge vadzingwa mubato reMDC-T. Kusawirirana pakati paVaHlalo nebato reMDC-T kwakatanga mushure mekunge VaHlalo vaenda kumatare vachitsvaga kuti VaGift Banda vabviswe pakuve sachigaro weMDC-T weBulawayo Province, vachiti sarudzo dzehusachigaro idzi dzaive dzisina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Asi bato reMDC-T rakatsigira kusarudzwa kwaVaBanda rikati VaHlalo vaifanirwa kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo vachishandisa gwara rebato reMDC-T kwete kuenda kumatare edzimhosva. VaHlalo vachiri kupikisa kusarudzwa kwaVaBanda mumatare. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti kunetsana kuri kuitika pakati paVaHlalo neMDC-T kuri kukonzerwa nekurwira masimba kuri kuitika mubato iri mudunhu reBulawayo. VaHlalo vanonzi havadiwi nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri we MDC-T, Muzvare Thokozane Khupe, avo vanonzi vari kutsigira Va Banda. VaHlalo vanonzi vari kutsigirwa nevamwe vakuru vebato muBulawayo, avo vanonzi hvasi kutsigira zviri kuitwa naMuzvare Khupe. No media source currently available

column2: VaMthuli Ncube Voendeswa kuMatare neNyaya yeKukwidza Mutero
column3: Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi wemuHarare, VaArnold Mutsondi, vaendesa gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Muthuli Ncube, kumatare vachiti mutemo wavo wavakadzika wekuwedzera mutero hausi pamutemo uye hautarisirwe munyika ine hutongo hwejekerere. VaNcube vakati vanhu vatange kubhadhara masendi maviri padhora roga roga pavanoshandisa makadhi avo ekubhengi kubva pamasendi mashanu pachero mari yavanenge vachitumira kana kushandisa. VaMutsondi vanoti zviri pachena kuti hurumende iri kuda kuomesera vanhu vasina mhaka nekuti yakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko remari. Gweta raVaMutsondi, VaAlex Majachani, vanoti zviri kuitwa naVaNcube kutyora bumbiro remutemo wenyika. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaNcube kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Highlanders Yopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Mapfumbamwe
column3: Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. Vatsigiri venhabvu vatarisana nemabiko anofadza mukupera kwesvondo. Kubva kumitambo yemuAfrica kusvika kumakwikwi eZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge, kuchave nemachikichori enhabvu ayo anga achingotaurwa nezvawo svondo rese. Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. No media source currently available Asi mutambo uri pamuromo pevazhinji ndeuyo uri kuSouth Africa apo chikwata cheChicken Inn chiri kutarisira kudimbura muswe chikwata chemaBrazilains icho chiri kuparadza zvimwe zvikwata. Mutambi ane mukurmbira muZimbabwe, asi achitambira Memelodi Sundowns, Khama Billiart, achenge ari mumutambo uyu kunyange hazvo asina kupinda mune wekutanga nekukuvara. Chicken Inn yakakuanda 1-0 mumutambo iwoyu asi muteveri wenhabvu, VaLesvison Ndudzi, vanoti ikozvino maGamecocks anofanira kungwarira Billiart Vachitarisa matambiro akaita maGamecocks mumutambo wekutanga, muongorori wezvemitambo ane mukurumbira, VaAndrew Rwodzi, vanoti havasi kunyanyotyira Chicken Inn. Vatsigiri vechikwata cheHighlanders vanogara muSouth Africa vanosvika zviuru zviviri vavimbisa kuti vachange vari munhandare vachikuzirira Chicken Inn. Chimwe chikwata chemuZimbabwe cheHarare City chiri kuMadagascar uko chiri kusangana neAS Adema kwete muCaf Champions League, asi muCaf Confederation Cup. Harare City iri kutingamira 3-2 kubva mumutambo wekutanga zvekuti murairidzi wechikwata ichi, Taurai Mangwiro, anoti haasi kuona vachinetseka kukunda mumutambo wechipiri uyu. Mutambo wekugumisira uchange uri muRufaro Stadium umo Dynamos iri kusangana neZPC Kariba mumutambo wekota fainari yeZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge. Kunyange hazvo mune manyukunyuku muchikwata ichi, chikwata ichi change chichingotamba mumutambo wehushamwari zvekuti uyu ndiwo mutambo ucharatudza kusimba kwacho. Mutambo uyu wauya mumusha macho musina kumira zvakanaka mushure mekunge murairdzi wacho, Jorge Silva wekuBrazil, nezuro akarova mutori wemifananidzo yepaterevhizheni yeZimbabwe Braodcasting Corporation. Svondo rapera, Silva zvekare akakandirana makobvu nematete nemurairdzi wevabati vepagedhe wechikwata ichi, Gif Muzadzi, izvo zvave kuitisa mibvunzo mumabatiro ebasa rake. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vari kutarisira kuti chikwata cheChicken Inn pamwe necheHarare City zvichavasiya vachipemberera pachapera mitambo yavo.

column2: Sangano reBill and Melinda Gates Rowanisa Vanhu Dzimba muHarare
column3: Rimwe sangano rekuAmerica, reBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, irapedza chirongwa charo chekuvakira vanotambura dzimba muHarare apo ratambidza dzimba zviri pamutemo kumhuri mazana mana nemakumi masere mumusha weDzivaresekwa Extenstion muHarare. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru anoona bezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano iri, Amai Melanie Walker, vati chirongwa ichi, icho chine mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora, chabudirira chose. Vati ishuviro yavo kuti kanzuro yeHarar,e ichashanda nemamwe masangano anopa rubatsiro,ichaenderera mberi ichivakira vanoshaya dzimba kuti vagare zvakanaka sezvo sangano ravo rapedza chirongwa charo. Meya veguta reHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, vatenda sangano iri uye vati chirongwa ichi chakabudirira chose zvekuti kanzuru yavo yave kutoronga kushandisa chirongwa ichimukugadzirisa dambudziko revanhu vari kugara munzvimbo dzisingakodzeri muguta. Pasi pechirongwa cheBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, kanzuru yakapihwa mari yekugadzira migwagwa, kugadzira pombi dzemvura nesiweji uyewo vanhu vakazopihwa mari dzekuvaka dzimba dzine mipanda miviri miviri. Vazhinji vakawana rubatsiro nedzimba pasi pechirongwa ichi ndevaya vakabviswa munzvimbo dzavaigara apo hurumende yaigadzirira kushanya muZimbabwe kwaMambokadzi wekuEnglanda, Queen Elizabeth, muna 1992 pamwe nevamwe vakaputsirwa dzimba dzavo paOperation Murambatsvina muna 2005. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Grace Tagarisa, vanoti vanofara chose kuti vavewo nepekugara zvichitevera rubatsiro rwakabva kuBill and Melinda Gates Foundations. Vanoti kunze kwemba vakadzidziswa kuita mabasa ekuzvibatsira akaita sekusona. Mumwe wevanhu vakawana rubatsiro kubva kusangano iri, Ambuya Netty Mahachi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara chose kuti vave nepekugara mushure mekutambura kwenguva yakareba. VaManyenyeni vati zvichitevera kufamba zvakanaka kwechirongwa ichi, kanzura ichabvisa mumhuri zana nemakumi maviri neimwe dziri kugara zviri kunze kwemutemo mumusha weGunhill vodzivakira dzimba kuMabvuku. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kanzuru yavo iri kuedza napose painogona napo kuti munhu wese awane pekugara muHarare zvisinei nekuti murombo here kana kuti kwete Vati kanzuro yavo ine chinangwa chekuvaka dzimba dzinodarika zana rezviuru kusvika mugore ra2018.

column2: Vashandi , Vashandirwi Vopesana paBhiri Richavandudza Mutemo weMabasa neVashandi
column3: Gweta riri kumirira vashandi veZuva Petroleum vakadzingwa basa, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vanoti vanotambira nemaoko maviri bhiri rehurumende iro riri kuda kuvandudza mutemo wevashandi nemabasa. Bhiri iri riri kutarisirwa kununura vashandi vanodarika makumi maviri ezviuru avo vanonzi varasikirwa nemabasa kusvika pari nhasi zvichitevera mutongo wakapiwa nedare reSupreme Court mwedzi wapera. Bhiri iri riri kutarisirwa kupinda mudare reparamende nemusi we Chipiri, rozonzwikwazve mudare reseneti nemusi weChina. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanozotarisirwa kuisa runyoro rwavo pabhiri iri chero nguva kubva nemusi weChishanu kuti uve mutemo. Kana rave mutemo, bhiri iri rinotarisirwa kubatsira vashandi vakadzingwa mabasa vakaenda vasina chekupukutisa dikita, kuti vakwanise kupiwa mihoro yemasvondo maviri pamagore roga-roga ravakagara pabasa. Muzvinafundo Madhuku, avo vanotungamirawo bato reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, vanoti chakangoipa chete pabhiri iri ndechekuti riri kuda kuti vashandi vakamiswa mabasa vapiwe mari shoma kana pachitariswa zvavakaitira makambani akavamisa mabasa aya. “Mutemo wakanaka chose,” Muzvinafundo Madhuku vanodaro. “Ndizvo zvatagara tichifunga kuti mutemo wedu unofanirwa kuita.” No media source currently available Asi mukuru wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vanoti bhiri iri ramhanyiswa zvakanyanya pasina kutarisiswawo huipi hwaro, izvo zvichaita kuti vanoda kusima mari dzavo munyika vasauye. “Handizvo zvakataurwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaMugabe pazuva rekucherechedza magamba,” vanodaro VaMufukare. “Tinofunga kuti pane zvizhinji zvaifanirwa kutanga zvatariswa kuitira kukwezva vanoda kupinda munyika.” No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Yokundikana Kubatsira Vakaremara kuMasvingo
column3: Apo hurumende yakawedzerazve mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba kana kuti lockdown, kuitira kurwisa kupararira kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus kana kuti Covid-19, vamwe vakaremara mudunhu reMasvingo vave kuchema chema kuti nzara yapfunya chisero mudzimba dzavo. Vemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevakarema vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kunonga svosve nemuromo munguva ino yelockdown sezvo dzisisina kana nzira dzekutsvaga raramo dziri mudzimba. Vakawanda vakaremara ava vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa uye nekupemha asi nenyaya yekunzi vagare mudzimba havachakwanisi kuita izvi nekudaro mari yekutenga chikafu yakapera kare. VaHenry Chivhanga, veSangano reDisability Amalgamated Community Trust(DACT) vanoti nenyaya yekushaikwa kwechikafu kune vakaremara, kodzero dzavo dziri kumbunyikidzwa. Vamwe vakaremara ava vanoti vari kusanganawo nemamwe matambudziko akaita sekushaiwa mvura munguva ino, iyo inouya kwenguva pfupi pfupi mudzimba dzavo. Muzvare Nyaradzo Mutande, vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reInstitute of Community Development Trust, vanoti vakaremara nevanovabatsira vari kushaya zvipfeko zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwee checoronavirus. Vamwe vemasangano aya vanoti rubatsiro ruri kupuwa vamwe nehurumende harusati rwasvika mudunhu reMasvingo nekudaro vari panguva yakaoma. Hurumende yakavimbisa kupa vanhu rubatsiro rwemari inosvika mazana matatu emadhora emabond pamwedzi asi haisati yauya. Gurukota rinoona nezvemagariro akanaka evanhu Muzvinafundo, Paul Mavhima, avo vanga vari mumusangano pavabatwa ne Studio 7 vati vari kubatsira vakaremara munguva ino uye hurongwa uhu hwagara huripo. Mutauriri we Covid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRogers Irimayi, vatsigira Muzvinafundo Mavhima, vachiti komiti yavo iri kushanda nebazi iri kubatsira vakaremara munguva ino. Asi, Pastor Cover Mugwadi, vesangano, reZimbabwe Disability Advocacy, Empowerment, Rehabilitation and Technology, vanoti hurumende haisi kutaura chokwadi nekuti hapana chavarikuwana mudunhu reMasvingo. Vamwe vazhinji vevakaremara vanoti vari kushushikana kuwana matsamba ekuti vakwanise kufamba kuti vaitewo mabasa vawane chekudya sezvo hurumende yave kutendera vanhu kuti vaitewo mamwe mabasa. No media source currently available

column2: Vatyairi veMagonyeti vekuZimbabwe Votambura Vari kuRwanda Mushure meKutadza Kubhadharwa Mari Dzavo kweMwedzi Inodarika Miviri
column3: Vamwe vatyairi vemagonyeti makumi mana vanobva kuZimbabwe vanoti vari kunonga svosve nemuromo vari kuRwanda nepamuganhu weTanzania neZambia mushure mekupererwa namari vari pamabasa uye kambani yakavapa basa isiri kuda kuvapa mihoro yavo. Vatyairi ava vanoti vakaenda kuRwanda mushure mekunge vawana basa rekutakura zvinhu kubva ku Mt. Hampden muHarare vachienda nazvo kuKigali, guta guru reRwanda. Vanoti vakapinzwa basa nekambani yeSimba Logistics yekuTanzania ichishanda pamwechete neimwe kambani yemuZimbabwe inonzi Ceva Logistics.uko rekuti vatakure michina kubva pakavakirwa paramende itsva yeZimbabwe. Pamotokari dzakapiwa basa idzi panonzi paive nesere dzekuTanzania asi vatyairi ava vanofunga kuti vamwe vavo vekuTanzania ava vanogona kunge vakatopiwa mari dzavo kare. Vamwe vatyairi vataura neStudio 7 vanoti zvibvumirano zvavakanga vanyorerana nekambani yeSimba Logistics chaguma kushanda musi wa 17 Gumiguru uye vazhinji vavo vakangopiwa zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zvemari yezvibvumirano zvavo, vachinzi zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvakasara vaizopiwa wasvitsa zvinhu zvavakatakura. Asi mari yavakapihwa yakatopera sezvo vave nemwedzi yakawanda vabva kumba uye vachizvitengera chikafu pamwe nemvura yekushandisa zuva nezuva. .Vamwe vachiri pamuganhu weTanzani neZambia vanoti vari kusangana nedambudziko rekutadza kuwana mvumo yekuti vapfuurire mberi nerwendo rwavo kunyange hazvo vachiti kambani yakavapa basa yakanga yakavavimbisa kuti havaizosangana nedambudziko. Vatyairi ava vanoti havasi kukwanisa kushandisa mazita avo sezvo vari kutyira kuzodzingwa mabasa pamwe nekunyimwa mari dzavo dzasara pabasa ravari kuita. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuma kambani maviri aya sezvo ange asinga kudaira nhare dzawo. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata muzinda weZimbabwe muRwanda kuti tinzwewo kana uine matanho auro kutora ekuedza kubatsira vatyairi ava. No media source currently available No media source currently available

column2: MDC-T Inoti Zimbabwe Inoda Mari Yakawandisa Kuti Ivandudze Hupfumi
column3: MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai inoti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutoda kuti Zimbabwe iwane mari ine chitsama yainopihwa kamwe chete kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimudzirwe zvine mutsindo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare neChishanu, munyori anowona nezvehupfumi mu MDC-T, Va Webber Chinyadza, vati hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere nepamusana pekutadza kutonga kuri kuita hurumende ye Zanu PF vachiti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutadza kukura kusvika pahwakambosvika muna 1972 nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. No media source currently available Kuti zvinhu zvinakire veruzhinji munyika, Va Chinyadza vati pave kutoda mari ine chitsama inopihwa nyika kuti isimudzire kumutsiridzwa kwemaindaisitiri, nyaya dzekurima, kucherwa kwezvicherwa pamwe nezvimwe zvese zvakabata hupfumi hwenyika. Va Chinyadza vati hurumende haisi kukoshesawo nyaya dzekurima dzinove dzakabata hupfumi vachiti hurumende haisi kuisa mari yakawanda munyaya dzekudiridzira sezvo mamiriro ekunze ari kushanduka. Vati panofanirwa kuiswa mari inoita bhiriyoni rimwe nemazana manomwe ezviuru zvemadhora munyaya dzekurima asi chiri kuvashamisa ndechekuti hurumende yakaisa miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu zvemadhora munyaya dzekudiridzira zvirimwa mumwaka wegore rino. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri we Zanu PF, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri wenyika vari zvakare mutungamiri we Zanu PF, Va Robert Mugabe, vakaudza nyika neChipiri kuti vari kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchasimuka kubudikidza nekusimbaradza nyaya dzekurima. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda vakazvimiria, Va Masimba Manyanya, avo vaimbova mukuru aiwona nezvehupfumi mubazi rezvemari, vaudza Studio7 kuti pane zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Nekune rumwe rutivi, gurukota rezvemari, Va Patrick Chinamasa, neChina vakakumbira masangano anokweretesa mari akaita se International Monetary Fund ne World Bank kuti abatsire Zimbabwe nekuikweretesa mari kuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa muhupfumi hwenyika. Va Chinamasa vanoti Zimbabwe yave nemakore anodarika makore gumi isati yambowana kana kobiri kubva ku World Bank vachiti hurumende iri kushushikana zvikuru nekusapihwa mari kwairi kuitwa nebhanga repasi rose iri. Asi mumiriri we World Bank mu Zimbabwe, Va Guang Zhen Chen, vakaudza Va Chinamasa kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa mitemo yose nezvimwe zvese zviri kutadzisa kuti vekunze vanoda kuzosima mari munyika vauye. Mumiriri weIMF muZimbabwe, VaChristian Beddies, vakaudza Studio7 kutanga kwesvondo rino Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutanga yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvose kuitira kuti ipihwe chikwereti chitsva. Va Manyanya vati chimwe chinoda kugadziriswa inyaya dzematongerwo enyika kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana mari yairi kuda iyi. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti kunze chemari inoita mabhiriyoni masere nezviuru mazana mana emadhora. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kutadza kuri kuita Zimbabwe kubhadhara chikwereti ichi kumasangano anokweretesa mari kuri kuita kuti hurumende isakwanise kupihwa zvimwe zvikwereti zvemiri yairi kuda kusimudzirisa hupfumi hwenyika.

column2: VaMugabe Voparura Hurongwa hweGwaro Idzva reVavhoti kuState House
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChina vari kutarisirwa kuparura chirongwa chekutanga kwekunyorwa kwegwaro revavhoti kuState House. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Rita Makarau vaudza Studio 7 kuti pavachabva kuState House vachaenda kuHarare International Conference Centre. Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa naVaMugabe mashoko akaburitswa naVaMugabe ekuti hurongwa uhu hutange zviri pamutemo kubva musi wa14 Gunyana kusvika musi wa 1 Ndira gore rinouya. VaMugabe vakaburitsa hurongwa uhu mugwaro rehurumende regovernment gazette. Amai Makarau vati vamwe vanhu vachazotanga kunyoreswa zviri pamutemo kana michina yose yekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota yebiometric voter registration. Parizvino michina yakauya inosvika mazana mana uye iri kushandiswa mukudzidzisa vanhu avo vachanodzidzisa vamwe mumatunhu nezvenyaya yekuvhota. No media source currently available

column2: Matare eDzimhosva Ovhiringwa neChirwere cheCovid-19
column3: Judicial Service Commission (JSC) yavhara matare mumadhorobha matanhatu mushure mekunge vashandi vemumatare aya vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19. JSC yavhara matare amajisitireti, kuBindura, Chinhoyi, Kariba, Karoi, Mt Darwin neMutare uko kwavharwawo dare repamusoro. Munyori weJSC, VaWalter Chikwanha, vati vatora danho iri kuti matare aya ambofiritwa nemishonga inodzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19, kuvheneka vashandi pamwe nekuita ongororo yekutsvaga chakapa kuti denda iri ripinde mumatare aya. Vati vanoda kukwidza nyaya dzavo kumatere, magweta nevamwe vanoda rubatsiro kumatare aya vanofanira kubata vatongi vakuru munzvimbo dzavo, Registrar Additional Sheriff kana Assistant Master uye mafoni evanhu ava achaiswa pamatare avharwa aya. VaChikwanha havana kutaura kuti vanhu vangani vakabatwa neCovid 19 kumatare avharwa aya asi vati vari kushanda nebazi rezvehutano kugadzirisa kuti avhurwe uye veruzhinji vachaziviswa kuti matare aya achavhurwa rini. VaChikwanha vati JSC iri kutora matanho ese anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organisation nebazi rezvehutano kudzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19 kumatare ose ari kushanda. Vatiwo vave kusimbaradza kupfekwa kwemamasiki, kugeza maoko nekushandisa maSanitizer kuti munhu apinde mumatare. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakati mapazi ayo anofanira kuderedza huwandu hwevashandi vanoenda kubasa kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, VaChikwanha vati havagoni kuita izvi nekuti matare anoita basa rakakosha. Gweta rinoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kwaMutare, Amai Peggy Tavagadza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hongu danho ratorwa neJSC rakanaka chose asi rinofanirawo kuitirwa kuvasungwa, mapurisa navose vanoshandisa matare. Vatiwo JSC ngaifambirane nenguva kuti vanhu vatongwe pachishandisa muchina yechizvino zvino vasingasangane nevamwe mumatare. Mutungamiri wesangano reMedical and Dental Priivate Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marrisa, vati hurumende inofanira kuvheneka vanhu vakawanda kuti izive huwandu hwevanhu vane denda iri. Vaive gurukota rehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuwanda kuri kuita Covid-19 kunokonzerwa nekuti matanho ekudzivirira denda iri haasi kutevedzwa vakatiwo hurumende inofanira kuwanisa vanhu zvekufambisa vachiti vanhu vari kutapuriranawo denda iri vari mimitsetse yemabhazi. Nezuro vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu vakabatwa neCovid -19 izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika yose pazviuru makumi mana nezvitauru nemazana mana nemakumi masere (43, 480 cases). Munhu mumwe chete akafa neCovid-19 nezuro,izvo zvaskavitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa neCovid-19 munyika yosepachiuru nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbabwe nevaviri, 1 692. Kusvika nezuro vanhu vainge vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vave zviuru mazana manomwe nemagumi zvishanu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 715 056 uye vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nechimwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, 451 793. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichaburitsa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. No media source currently available

column2: VaBhasikiti Voruma Nzeve VaMugabe Zviri Kuitwa naAmai Mahofa kuNuanetsi Ranch
column3: Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reMasvingo, VaKudakwashe Bhasikiti, vanoti vanyora tsamba kumutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachinyuyuta kuti vakatora chigaro chavo, Amai Shuvai Mahofa, vari kushanda nemumwe muzvinabhizimisi, VaBilly Rautenbach, kuti vabvise vanhu kuNuanetsi Ranch kuitira kuti VaRautenbach vatange bhizimisi rekugadzira mafuta enzimbe panzvimbo iyi. No media source currently available Amai Mahofa vakaudza Studio7 svondo rapera kuti mhuri zviuru makumi maviri dzichabviswa kuNuanetsi Ranch dzichiendeswa kumapurazi manomwe akatsvagwa nehurumende. Asi nzvimbo yakagariswa vanhu patsva iyi yagara iine mutauro nekuti kambani yeDevelopment Trust of Zimbabwe yakavambwa nevaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, mushakabvu Joshua Nkomo, avo vakatenga purazi iri. VaRautenbach vanonzi vakanyorerana pasi chibvumnirano chekushanda nekambani iyi mukuumba kambani ye Zimbabwe Bio Energy. Asi pange pachikandiranwa makobvu nematete pakati pekambani iyi nehurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaRautenbach sezvo munhu adaira nharembozha yavo ati vachazofona. Asi havana kuita izvi pataenda kumhepo. Amai Mahofa vati vange vari mumusangano. Asi mukuru we Development Trust of Zimbabwe, VaCharles Madonko, vanoti hurumende haineyi neminda iri pasi pekambani yavo, sezvo minda iyi yakatengwa kare. No media source currently available

column2: “Huyai Titaurirane”  - Hurumende Youdza Vashandi Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
column3: Hurumende iri kukurudzira vashandi vayo kuti vambomira zvekuramwa Mabasa zvisinei nemari shoma yavanotambira. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro ranyorwa nemamwe masangano anomiririra vashandi vehurumende vachizivisa kuti kana hurumende ikasagadzirisa nyaya yemihoro yavo mumazuva gumi nemana vachange vachizoramwa mabasa. Masangano anyora tsamba iyi anoti, Public Service Association, the Federation of Educators Unions of Zimbabwe neNurses Federation of Zimbabwe. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7, gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi VaPaul Mavhima vatiwo vashandi nevashandirwi vari kuzoita hurukuro nemusi weMuvhuro . VaMavhima vati hurumende inokoshesa hurukuro Asi mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanogara vachiti hurumende haidi zvenhaurirano pachine nguva vati vari kutambiriswa mutero wembwa. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaRaymond Majongwe vanotiwo sevashandi vanodawo mari inokwanisa kuti vararame sezvo vakatodzidzira mabasa avo. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Teachers Association VaGoodswill Taderera vatiwo vashandi vehurumende vave kuita mushandirapmwe kuti vawedzerwe mari. Asi VaMavhima vatiwo kuramwa mabasa kunokanganisa mabasa akakosha ehurumende. Pave nenguva hurumende nevashandi vayo vasiri kuwirirana panyaya yemihoro. Vashandi vanotiwo vanoda kupiwa mihoro nemari yekunze vachiti zvinhu zvese zvave kungoda kubhadharwa nemari yekuAmerica panguva iyo vashandi vari kutambiriswa madhora emunyika.

column2: Vanamukoti Vanoramba Mari Yanga Yauya neHurumende Vachiti Ishoma, Vanovimbisa Kuramba Vari paMabasa
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakanga vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakanga kwasvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu ane vatatu, kana kuti 7 453. Asi huwandu hwevanhu vanga vafa kusvika pazuva iri hwakaramba huri pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 222, sezvo pakanga pasina akafa. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi munyika yose vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana matanhatu ane makumi matatu nevashanu, kana kuti 5 635. Vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu vakapora kuchirwere ichi izvo zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vakanga vachine chirwere ichi hwaderera kuenda pachiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 596. Vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 969 ndivo vakavhenekwa kana vaine chirwere ichi, vanhu makumi maviri nevana vakawanikwa vainacho. Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuAmerica, iyo iri kutevera kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemasere, kana kuti 28 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, icho chasiya vamwe vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nezvishanu, kana kuti 905 000 vafa pasi rose. MuAmerica vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nemazana matatu ezviuru, kana kuti 6.300 million vabatwa neCovid-19, vamwe vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe kana, kuti 191 000 vafa. Zvichakadaro, vanamukoti, avo vakadzokera kubasa kutanga kwesvondo rino mushure mekuramwa mabasa kwenguva ingada kusvika kumwedzi mitatu, vanonzi varamba kutambira zvanga zvaiswa patafura nehurumende mukuedza kwayo kugadzirisa nyaya yemihoro yavo. Hurumende inonzi yanga ichida kuvapa zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zvemihoro yavo, asi vashandi vanonzi varamba kutambira mari iyi vachiti haigadzirise matambudziko avo Vashandi vanonzi vazivisawo hurumende kuti vari kudawo kuti vapiwe imwe yemari yemihoro yavo iri mumadhora ekuAmerica. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri wesangano ravanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti kuramba kutambira kwaita vanamukoti mari iyi hakurevi kuti vave kudzokera zvakare mukuramwa mabasa. VaDongo vanoti vanamukoti vakadzokera kumabasa mushure mechikumbiro chakaitwa negurukota rezvehutano idzva uye vari mutewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakati vari kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vemuzvipatara. VaDongo vanoti vamiriri vehurumende munhaurirano vakavavimbisa kuti zvipatara zvichawaniswa zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanoti vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dziende kumabasa, asi dzisazvipinza munjodzi kuburikidza nekushanda zvisina mhatya dzinodzivirira kutapurira chirwere, kana kuti PPEs. No media source currently available

column2: MDC-T Yoshora Mashoko aVaMudarikwa veZanu PF
column3: Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemashoko anonzi akataurwa nemumiriri weUzumba muparamende, VaSimbaneuta Mudarikwa vebato reZanu PF, ekuti dunhu ravo harina nzvimbo yemapato anopikisa. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti mashoko aVaMudarikwa aya anokonzeresa mhirizhonga sezvo dunhu ravo reUzumba, kusanganisira Mashonaland East yose, ragara richizivikanwa nenyaya dzemhirizhonga. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamabiko ekupemberera kuparurwa kwehurongwa hwemadiridziro kuMudzi, VaMudarikwa vanonzi vakati bato ravo richawana mavhoti zviuru makumi masere mudunhu mavo, vakawedzera vachiti mapato anopikisa achangowana mavhoti ari pasi pemapepa ekuvhotesa akakanganiswa kana kuti ma spoilt ballot papers. Asi VaMudarikwa varamba mashoko avari kupomerwa ekukurudzira mhirizhonga, vachiti bato reMDC-T ndiro rinotori pamberi panyaya dzemhirizhonga. Vanotiwo pahuwandu hwemavhoti achawanikwa neZanu PF, vari kureva kuti vanhu mudunhu ravo vari kuberekana vachiwanda. No media source currently available

column2: AFCON: ‘Tichine mukana’
column3: AIMBOVE murairidzi wemaWarriors – Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas – okurudzira chikwata chenyika ichi kuti chisawore mwoyo asi kuti chigobata basa sebasa nemusi weChishanu apo chichasangana neMalawi mumutambo wechipiri muboka racho reGroup B.   MaWarriors ari kuCameroon uko ari kukwikwidza kumutambo we2021 Total Energy Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON).   Mumutambo wekutanga, maWarriors akakundwa 1-0 neSenegal izvo zvakarwadza vatsigiri vose venhabvu sezvo akakundirwa mumiti rekupedzisira apo maLions of Teranga akazopihwa pena iyo akanwisa mutambo ukazopera uri 1-0.   Mumutambo wese uyu, maWarriors aitamba zvinonwisa mvura izvo zvakaona mubati wepagedhi – Petros Mhari – achirwa semvumba achishungurudza vatambi veSenegal vanosanganisira Sadio Mane avo vakatadza kuzunza mambure kusvikira vazoita zvekupihwa pena.   Mafero anoti matambiro akaita chikwata chaNorman Mapeza chemaWarriors nemusi weMugovera anodasisa saka vanofanirwa kuramba vaine matambiro mamwe chete musi weChishanu apo vachasangana neMalawi.   “MaWarriors akadadisa kunyangwe hazvo takazobvutirwa mutambo uyu pekupedzisira, asi takange takaibata Senegal mutambo wese uye chikwata chenyika ichi chaitamba zvinonwisa mvura.   “Ngatichitarire zviri mberi musi weChishanu apo tiri kusangana neThe Flames of Malawi. Tiri kufanira kuhwina mutambo uyu neunozotevera weGuinea kuti tifambire mberi mumutambo weAFCON. Mitambo miviri yasara iyi yakatikoshera saka tinofanirwa kuihwina,” anodaro.   MaWarriors achatamba neThe Flames musi weChishanu nenguva dza6 manheru uye achazobandana neGuinea neChipiri svondo rinotevera.   Musi weChishanu uyu, zvimwe zvikwata zviri kuboka reGroup B izvo zvatotungamira – Senegal neGuinea sezvo zvave nezvibodzwa zvitatu – ndizvo zvichavhurisa mutambo apo zvichatamba na3 masikati. Izvi zvinoreva kuti uyu mutambo wekuti maWarriors achange achiongorora kuti uchafamba sei sezvo vazhinji vave kutarisira kuti Senegal ikunde Guinea apo chikwata chenyika ichi chozokundawo Malawi neGuniea mumitambo miviri yasara.   Mafero anoti anoshuvira kuti kudai Senegal yakunda Guinea.   “Tingade hedu kutarisa kune zvimwe zvikwata kuti zviri kutamba sei, asi chikuru ndechekuti isu mitambo yedu miviri yasara ngatiihwine zvine mutsindo tigobudirira kuenda kuround of 16 uko tisati tamboenda kubva zvatakatanga kukwikwidza kuAFCON,” anodaro Mafero.   MaWarriors paakatanga kurwira kuenda kumutambo weAFCON, aitungamirwa naMafero uyo akarairidza mitambo miviri yekutanga iyo yakaona achiita mangange – 0-0 neBotswana mutambo wekutanga uyo wakatambirwa muno kozoti wechipiri maWarriors akahwina 2-1 kuZambia.

column2: Hurumende Yononoka Kubhadhara Vashandi Vanobatwa neCovid-19 Vachiita Basa Ravo
column3: Vashandi vezvehutano vanoti vazhinji vavo havasati vawana mari dzavanofanirwa kupiwa kana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid. Vashandi ava vanotiwo havasi kufara nekuvatyityidzirwa kwavari kuitwa nehurumende iyo iri kuti vasina kubaiwa nhomba vachanyimwa mari dzeCovid Allowance. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, Va Enoch Dongo, vati vashandi vezvehutano vakawanda vacho havasati vawana mari dzekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vari pabasa kunyange hazvo vave nenguva yakareba vanyorera kuti vawane mari idzi. VaDongo vati nhengo dzavo dzinenge dzichida mari iyi padzinenge dzichirwara kuitira kuti vdzikwanise kutenga zvikwanisiro. VaDongo vatiwo mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora (75 million) anonzi akasendekwa parutivi kuitira kuti mari iyi ibhadhare vashandi vezvehutano vanobatwa neCovid-19, haikwani sezvo vakabatwa neCovid-19 vadarika zviuru zvina. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Hospital Association, VaPrince Butau,avo vakabatwa neCovid-19 gore rapera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakazowana mari muna Kurume gore rino kunyange vakange vanyorera mari iyi gore rapera. Asi VaButau vati hurumende inofanirwa kunge ichipa mari kwehupenyu hwese munhu anobatwa neCovid-19 ari pabasa. Mumwe mukoti asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo akabatwa nechirwere ichi kutanga kwegore rino, haasati awana mari kunyange hazvo akanyora mapepa anodiwa. Panyaya yekutyityidzirwa nehurumende kuti vasina kubaiwa nhomba vachanyimwa mari dziri kupiwa vashandi vese vezvehutano dzeCovid-19 allowance, VaDongo vati zvakaipa zvikuru kumanikidza vanhu kubayiwa nhomba. VaButau vati mari inoita zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana maviri emaRTGS iri kupihwa seCovid-19 allowances ishoma zvakanyanya. Vatiwo hurumende inofanira kugara pasi nevashandi vezvehutano yotaurirana navo pamusoro pekubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuHealth Services Board asi gurukota rezvekubudiritswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakaudza vatori venhau nemusi weChipiri kuti hurumende iri kubhadhara mushandi anenge abatwa neCovid-19 ari pabasa mari inotangira pamazana matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica kusvika pachiuru chimwe chete chemadhora ekuAmerica. Pamusoro pezvo mushandi wezvehutano anopihwa zviuru zvitanhatu nemazanamaviri emaRTGS semari yekubatsirikana munguva yeCivid-19. Vakatiwo Health Services Board yainge yabhadhara vashandi mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevaviri pavashandi vezvehutano zviuru zvina nemazna mana ane makumi mana nevana vakanyorera kuwana mari iyi. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati mari yakaiswa parutivi nehurumemde haikwani kubhadhara vashandi vese vakabatwa neCovid-19 vakati zvinoda kuti hurumende iwedzere mari iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Vatori veNhau Vocherechedza Zuva reKuremekedzwa kweKodzero Dzavo Vachiti muZimbabwe Vari Kushungurudzwa
column3: Vatori venhau neMuvhuro vakacherechedza zuva rekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzavo kana kuti World Press Freedom Day vachichema chema kuti makore makumi matatu mushure mechibvumirano chekuWindoek Declaration vachiri kushanda vakamanikidzika munyika. Mumwe mutori wenhau, VaEliah Ntali vaudza Studio 7 kuti chibvumirano chakaitwa kunyika yeNamibia muWindhoek, chinozivikanwa nekuti Windhoek Declaration chinokurudzira kufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka hachisati chazadzikiswa munyika vachipa muenzaniso wekusungwa nekumbunyikidzwa kwevatori venhau. Mumwe mutori wenhau John Cassim atsinhirawo mashoko aya vachiti pakapidigurwa hurumende yamushakabvu Robert Mugabe nemauto muna 2017, zvinhu zvakamboita nani pakapinda VaEmmerson Mnangagwa panyanga asi iko zvino hazvichisina kumira zvakanaka. Mukuru we Media Institute of Southern Africa- Zimbabwe kana kuti Misa-Zimbabwe VaTabani Moyo vatiwo basa rekutapwa kwenhau harisi kufamba zvakanaka vachitiwo vatapi venhau vari kushungurudzwa, kusungwa uye kune dzimwe nyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica vari kuurayiwa. VaMoyo vatiwo panguva ino yedenda reCovid-19 vatapi venhau vanofanirwa kupiwa zvinovadzivirira pavanenge varikubasa vakarumbidza hurumende yeZimbabwe nekutenda kuisa vatori venhau pavanhu vakatanga kubaiwa nhomba. VaMoyo vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuisa mitemo inokurudzira kufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka vakatiwo mitemo irikuda kuiswa yakadai seCybersecurity and data protection Bill inodzorera shure kufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka Mukuru weZimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations (ZACRAS), Muzvare Vivenne Marara vakurudzirawo hurumende nevatori venhau kuti vawanise veruzhinji ruzivo rwakakwana kuti vatore matanho akakosha muhupenyu vaine ruzivo rwakakwana. Vatori venhau vemuZimbabwe vanotiwo chirwere cheCovid-19 chasiya vazhinji vavo vave parumananzombe sezvo mamwe makambani enhau onetsekana kubhadhara vashandi. Mugwaro ravo rekucherechedza WPFD, Amnesty International yatiwo kumabudazuva nekuchamhembe kweAfrica vatori venhau vari kumbunyikidzwa izvo zvosanganawo nedenda reCovid-19 . Amnesty International yati Zimbabwe irikushungurudzawo vatori venhau kuburikidza nekusungwa pamwe nekukanganiswa pakushanda. Mumwe mutori wenhau wekuManicaland, Sydney Saize akasungwa mugovera achiita basa rake. Asi hurumende iri kuramba mashoko ekuti iri kushungurudza vatori venhau ichiti iri kutoisa mitemo yekurerutsira vatori venhau. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane mitemo yakawanda yadzikwa kurerutsira vatori venhau.
