Asi mumashoko kuvatori venhau, rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti hurumende inofanira kumisa tsika yekumbunyikidza kodzero dzevatori venhau sezvo zvichikanganisa nyaya yehutongo hwejekerere. Zuva reWorld Press Freedom Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa 3 Chivabvu gore rega rega uye gore rino ririkucherechedzwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekukosha kwekuburitswa kwemashoko kuruzhinji kana kuti “information as a public good." No media source currently available

column2: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Mauto Vachiti Kune Vavengi Vari Kurwisa Zimbabwe
column3: Zimbabwe yacherechedza zuva remauto, kana kuti Defence Forces Day, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti Zimbabwe iri kurwiswa nevavengi pachishandiswa zvirango zvehupfumi pamwe nemadandemutande eSocial Media. Mumashoko avo ekupemberera Defence Forces Day, VaMnangagwa varumbidza mauto vachiti ari kuita basa guru mukudzivirira nyika kubva kuvavangi. VaMnangagwa vatenda mauto nekuramba akabatana pamwe nekumisa kuratidzira zvine mhirizhonga kwainge kwarongwa nemapato anopikisa nemasangano akazvimirira achishanda nevavati vavengi vemuno nekunze. VaMnangagwa vatiwo mauto anobatsira zvikuru mumatambudziko vakapa semuenzaniso rubatsiro rwakapihwa nemauto apo pakaita dutumupengo reCylone Idai apo mauto akabatsira kupa vanhu chikafu, kuvaka migwagwa nemabhiriji zvainge dzaparadzwa nedutumupengo iri. VaMnangagwa vati vari muchiuto vari kubatwawo neCovid-19 vakati vakambove mukuru wemauto emuchadenga kwenguva yakareba, VaPerence Shiri, pamwe nevaive mutauriri wemauto, Colonel Overson Mugwisi, nevamwe, vakashaya nedenda iri. Bato guru rinopikisa munyika, reMDC Alliance, ratiwo rinoyemura basa guru range riri kuitwa nemauto mukati memakore makumi mana apfuura, munyika, muSADC neAfrica. Mutauriri webato iri, Advocate Fadzayi Mahare, varumbidza basa guru rakaitwa nemauto paCyclone Idai. Mutevedzeri waAdvocate Mahere, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo mauto achiita basa guru rekuchengetedza runyararo, pane pamwe paanoshandiswa kurova vanhu izvo zviri kunze kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti mauto agare zvakanaka achitambirawo mari dzinofadza. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJohnstone Chirwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanobvumirana kuti mauto anoita basa guru asi vakati havafari kuti mauto emuZimbabwe ave kushanda akarerekera kune rimwe bato. Asi muhurukuro yavakaita nenhepfenyuro yeZBC TV pamusoro peDefence Forces Day neMuvhuro manheru, mukuru weZimbabwe Defence Force, General Philip Valerio Sibanda, vakati mauto ndeevanhu uye aripo pakudzvirira nyika nevanhu vese. Vakati hazvifadzi kuti pane vamwe vanoshora nekutuka mauto vachiti izvi zvinokonzerwa nevanhu vanonyora manyepo nezvimwe zvisina kunaka pamamusoro pemauto paSocial Media. Mhemberero dzanhasi dzaitwa vanhu vari mudzimba nekuda kweCovid-19 pasi pedingindira rekuti: “The ZDF: Celeberating 40 Years of Excellent Service to the People.” No media source currently available

column2: Vogadzirira kudzoka kwenetball
column3: SANGANO reRainbow Amateur Netball League (RANL) rinoti ragadzirira kudzoka kwemutambo uyu zvichitevera kuronga kwavakaita mutambo weDry Run svondo radarika uyo wakaona chikwata cheZRP Mambas chichikunda cheGlow Petroleum Queens 27-24 mufainari.   Munyori mukuru weRANL — Moses Gukumure — anoti kugara nguva ndefu vatambi vasingatambe mutambo uyu, zvichikonzereswa nedenda reCovid-19, kwakadzosera kumashure kusimukira kwavo asi vave nemufaro zvichitevera kudzoka kwawakaita.   “Mushure mekunge tapedza nguva ndefu mutambo uyu usiri kutambwa, zvinofadza zvikuru kuti tave kukwanisa kudzokera kuhupenyu hwedu hwekare vasikana vachitamba mutambo uyu unovararamisa. “Mutambo weDry Run wange uri wekuona kuti zvikwata zvave papi mugadziriro yekudzoka kwemutambo uyu. Tazvionera tega kuti zvagadzirira saka isu tagadzirirawo kuti mitambo ichitanga,” anodaro Gukumure.   Zvisinei, anoti vachiri kumbomirira kupihwa mvumo kubva kuZimbabwe Netball Association (ZINA) neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) kuti vachitanga mutambo uyu.   Anoti kusvika pari zvino vanyorera kuZINA kanokwana katanhatu asi havasati vapihwa mhinduro. “Chiri kungotimisa kuti mitambo yedu ichitange kupihwa mvumo uye tinyoreswe neZINA.   Takavanyorera asi havasati vatipindura kusvika pari zvino. Saka tiri kuramba tichigogodza kwavari, tichivanyorera kuti vatipe mvumo titange mitambo yedu,” anodaro.   Zvichitevera kuvambwa kwakaitwawo ligi rePremier Netball League (PNL) nguva yadarika izvo zvakaona zvimwe zvikwata zvichibuda muRANL zvichienda kuPNL, Gukumure anoti maligi akawanda zvinobatsira kukura kwemutambo uyu uye zvichipa vatambi mikana yakasiyana yekukwikwidza. “Tichiri nezvikwata zvedu zvakawanda zvikuru uye isu tinovimba kuti zvapave nemaligi maviri zvichabatsira kukura kwemutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, chikwata cheZRP icho chakahwina mutambo uyu chakaenda kumba neUS$1 350 kuchiti zvimwe zvakakwikwidza zvinosanganisira Lusumbami, Tenax, Ruwa, Correctional Queens neKhami Prisons.

column2: Hurumende yoKurudzirwa Kurapa Zvirwere zveGomarara Pachena
column3: Veruzhinji vari kuchema-chema kuti dai hurumende yaita kuti chirwere chegomarara chirapwe pasina muripo, uye kuti kuzvipatara zvese kusanganisira zvekumaruwa kuiswe michina inoongorora magomarara akasiyana-siyana. Apo nyika iri pakati pekuchema vaive mutungamiriri webato reMovement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vakafawo nechirwere chegomarara, veruzhinji vanoti hurumende ikasakoshesa chirwere ichi sezvakaitwa chirwere cheHIV/ AIDS, vanhu vakawanda vacharasikirwa nehupenyu. Amai Thandaza Mhlanga vaudza Studio 7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende ione kuti zvipatara nemakirinika zvarapa chirwere chegomarara pachena sezvo chopedza vanhu vakawanda. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Fortune Moyo avo vawedzerawo vakati pamusoro pekurapwa pachena hurumende inofanirwa kuita dzidziso dzakasimba zvakanyanya kuti veruzhinji vazive nezvechirwere chegomarara. Muzvare Moyo vati zvinosuwisa kuti nguva zhinji vanhu vanobatwa chirwere ichi chakomba. Muzvare Petronella Furusa vakurudzirawo kuti hurumende itsvage mari yakangonangana nekurwisa chirwere chegomarara. Vati kuchengetedza hutano hweveruzhinji hurumende inofanirwa kutora matanho yowona kuti kuzvipatara zvese kusanganisira kumamisha zvawaniswa michina nemishonga inoongorora gomarara kuti veruzhinji vapote vachitariswa. Munguva shoma yapfuura, sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezveutano mudare reparamende, Amai Ruth Labode vakaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite dzidziso nezvechirwere chegomarara sezvakaitwa kuneHIV/AIDS. Amai Labode vakati zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vazive kuti chirwere chegomarara chikakurumidza kubatwa chinorapika. Cancer Registry inoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa negomarara huri kuramba huchikwira. Chirwere chegomarara ichi chinoda mari yakawanda kuti munhu arapwe, uye veruzhinji vanoti havaikwanisi kuwana mari dzinodiwa idzi. No media source currently available

column2: Vanachiremba Vakuru Vanozivisa Kuramwa Mabasa Kana Zvichemo Zvavo Zvisina Kugadziriswa
column3: Vanachiremba vakuru vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association, neChitatu vakapa hurumende mazuva gumi nemana ekuti igadzirise matambudziko ari muzvipatara pamwe nenyaya yemihoro yavo, kukundikana kwayo voramwa mabasa. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa zuva rimwero kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pachiuru nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1 089, zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana matanhatu negumi nevaviri kana kuti 2 612 vakavhenekwa. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika nezuro vaive mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 395, uye vashaya vachiri makumi maviri. Tsamba yakanyorwa nesangano ravanachiremba vakuru iyi, iyo yakanyorerwa kuboka reHealth Services Board, kumunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano pamwe nekuvakuru vezvipatara, kana kuti hospital clinical directors, iri kuda kuti hurumende iise mishonga nezvikwanisiro muzvipatara, iwanise vanachiremba zvekuzvidzivirira kubva ku Covid-19, uye kuti mihoro yavo ive iri mumadhora ekuAmerica ichienzaniswa nemari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Vanachiremba ava vari kudawo kuti zvichemo zvevamwe vashandi vemuboka rezvehutano vari pakuramwa mabasa pari zvino zvigadziriswe kuitira kuti vabatsirane mabasa, uyewo kuti nhengo dzavo dzinoshanda kuUniversity of Zimbabwe asi iye zvino dziri kushanda muzvipatara munguva ino, dzinge dzichibhadharwa mari dzekushanda uku. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Pasi rose vanhu vabatwa ne Covid-19 vadarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 15.5 million, uye vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nezvina kana kuti 584 000. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa zvehutano pa Nottingham Trent University, ku Britain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igare pasi navanachiremba ava vakurukure zvichemo zvavo kuti zvinhu zvisaipa kudarika zvazviri pari nhasi muzvipatara. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti chinonyanyorwadza ndechekuti vanachiremba ava vari kuda kuramwa mabasa munguva iyo nyika iri mudambudziko re Covids-19, izvo zvinozoisa varwere vagara vaine zvimwe zvirwere zvinovanetsa munyodzi huru kana vakazobatwa neCovid-19. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu muzvipatara nekukasika, umo munonzi hamuna mishonga nezvimwe zvikwanisiro. Doctor Nyashanu vanotiwo kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubata chirwere cheCovid-19 chinhu chinityisa nekuti kana vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vanenge vachida kubatwa zvakanaka, uye kuti vabatwe zvakanaka vanofanirwa kunge vachienda kuzvipatara, uko kunofanirwa kunge kuine vanamukoti navanachiremba. No media source currently available

column2: Tiri mumadhaka: Mutasa
column3: FC – “Lloyd Samaita” Mutasa – anoti pavamire parizvino semaGlamour Boys palog table hapafadze, handipo pavo chaipo uye zvakafanana nekuve mu “madhaka” nekudaro vari mushishi yekugadzirisa mamiriro ezvinhu aya.   Mwaka uno zvinhu hazvisi kunyatsofamba zvakanaka kuchikwata ichi icho chinove chikuru munyaya dzenhabvu muZimbabwe uye parizvino chiri panhamba 10 palog table.   Mamiriro ezvinhu kuDeMbare nguva yadarika akambenge aita manyama amire nerongo izvo zvakamboona Samaita achibviswa pachigaro chekurairidza ndokutsiviwa naBiggie Zuze aive mutevedzeri wake asi ndokuzodzorwa zvakare pasina chinguva zvichitevera kudzingwa kwakaitwa Zuze basa.   Paakadzoka kuzorairidza chikwata ichi zvakare, Samaita akatsidza kuti anoda kushandura zvinhu.   “Sekuziva kwemunhu wese kubva kuvatsigiri kusvika kuvatungamiri vechikwata chino, patiri handipo patinofanirwa kuve tiri, ichi ndicho chokwadi.   “Dynamos inozivikanwa iri chikwata chekumusoro chichirwira mukombe kwete zviri kuitika gore rino.   “Tiri kufanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti tidzorere chikwata pachinofanirwa kuve chiri, pachakakodzera kugara,” anodaro Mutasa.   Apo mwaka wenhabvu wave kumboenda pamid-season break, Mutasa anoti chikwata chake chichagara pasi choongorora kuti chingazvisimbisa sei.   “Tichagara pasi toongorora mafambiro atange tichiita uye toronga kuti togadzirisa sei kuti mwaka wedu utinakire tibve mumadhaka atange tiri kuende kumusoro.   “Chikwata chinoda kusimbiswa asi zvinoda kutanga tagara pasi nevakuru toronga kuti tochisimbisa sei,” anodaro.   Kudzoka kwaMutasa kwakaita mutauro kuvatsigiri vazhinji avo vaida kuziva kuti akambenge abvisirwei pekutanga uye kuti kudzoka kwake kuchashandura zvinhu here kuchikwata ichi?   Zvisinei, Mutasa anoti, “Hatifanirwe kutarira zvakawanda, chikuru kuti tiri kufambisa basa here nemazvo. Chatiri kuda kuhwinisa chikwata chedu kuti chidzokere pachinofanirwa kugara chete, kwete kufunga zvakawanda.”   Zvichitevera kukunda kwakaita chikwata chake Nichrut 2-1 svondo radarika, Mutasa anoti ari kutarisira kuti mumitambo 17 inotevera kuti mwaka wegore rino uchipera, DeMbare inge yahwina mitambo 14 yosimukira kuenda pakanaka.   “Tichitarisa matambiro atakaita mimwe mitambo yedu yadarika, zvaisafadza chose icho ndicho chokwadi.   “Takarasa zvibodzwa zvakawanda saka tiri kutarisira kuti mumitambo inotevera tikahwina 13 kana 14 tinosimuka chaizvo kuenda kumusoro. Saka zvave kuda kuti tishande nesimba sechikwata,” anodaro.

column2: Mitambo yeCastle Premier Soccer League Yopfungaira Hutsi Zvekare
column3: Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League adzoka zvine mutsindo mushure mesvondo rimwe chete rezororo. Nemusu weMugovera masikati nhandare yeRufaro Stadium ichange isingadanwe anonzwa apo pachatambwa mitambo miviri apo Yadah neBlack Rhinos dziri kushandisa nhandare imwechete, zuva rimwe chete, mumitambo yavo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League yevhiki remakumi maviri nemaviri. Yadah iyo iri kuti nhasi yabaka moto, mangwana wodzima, ndiyo iri kutanga kupinda munhandare yeRufaro Stadium iyi kusangana neChapungu iyo iri kukwikwira zvishoma nezvishoma muhurongwa hwemakundano aya. Yadah, iyo yaimbotungamira makundano aya yave pazvikwata zvina zvakatarisana nekubuda mumakwikwi aya zvekuti inofanira kukunda kuitira kuti isaverengwe pazvikwata zvaingopinda muPremier Soccer League nekubuda gore rimwe chetero. Mutambo uyu ukapera, uri kuteverwa nemutambo mukuru pakati peBlack Rhinos neChicken Inn iyo iri pachidanho chechipiri mumakundano ezvikwata gumi nezvisere aya. Chipembere chadonha zvinotyisa mumakundano aya zvekuti chikwata cheZimbabwe National Army ichi chave pachidanho chechisere mushure mekumbotungamira makundano aya, kwemasvondo akati wandei. Kunyange hazvo varohwa mitambo mina yakataverana murairidzi weChipembere Stanford Stix Mtizwa anoti iyi yave nhoroondo achiti iye varikuda mapoinzi ese matatu vakatarisana nechinangwa chavo chekuramba vari muPremier Soccer League mwaka unotevera. Asi machikichori muRufaro Stadium haasi kutanga nekugumira pamitambo miviri iyi, sezvo nesvondo maGreen Machine eCaps United achange achiedza kupunzira pasi Ngezi Platinum Stars iyo iri pamusoro petafura yeligi. Mushure mekutora poindi imwechete kubva mumitambo mina vabuda mumakundano eCaf Champions League, Makepekepe irikubhebha moto mushure mekutora mapoinzi manomwe kubva mumitambo yavo mitatu ichangopera kusanganisira wemusi weChitatu uyo yakarova FC Platinum 2-1. Mapoinzi manomwe aya asiya Makepekepe ave pachinhanho chegumi neina mumakundano aya asi vaine mitambo mishanu yavasati vatamba nemhaka yekukwikwidza kwavo muCaf Champions League. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda varikuti maGreen Machine haasisimo mukurwira kutora mukombe weligi uyu, mumwe mutsigiri wechikwata ichi VaTakunda Mupereki vanoti Makepekepe anokwanisa kudzivirira mukombe uyu, uyo vakatora mwaka wapera. Asi sachigaro weNgezi Platinum Stars VaJeremiah Getiseni vanoti vanonokerwa nemutambo neCaps United uyu vachiti ivo maGreen Machine haasi kumira. Mimwe mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi…  Bulawayo City v Harare City Hwange v Bantu Highlanders v Tsholotsho Pirates Shabanie Mine v ZPC Kariba Triangle v Platinum Dynamos neHighlanders hadzina mitambo svondo rino, sezvo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvaifanira kuve zviri kuBotswana kumakundano ezvikwata zvina aifanira kusanganisirawo Taffic Stars neMochudi Centre Chiefs. Makwikwi eSupa Power Cup aya haasi kuzoenderera mberi mushure mekunge vange vakaronga makundano aya vakundikana kuzadzikisa zvange zvichidiwa nezvikwata izvi. Asi zvikwata izvi hazvichaenda kuFrancistown asi vePremier Soccer League vazivisa kuti hapana nguva yekuti mitambo yavo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ienderere mberi. Dynamos yanga ichifanira kusangana neHow Mine, Highlanders ichibandana neTsholotsho Pirates. Zvakamira zvakadai, makundano eEnglish Premier League arikupinda mumitambo yechipiri apo chikwata chirikutungamira makwikwi aya cheManchester United chiri munzira kuenda kuWales kunosangana neSwansea. Vanoziva zvemutambo wenhabvu vanoti Swansea haisi kumira zvekuti varikutarisira zvekare kunaya kwezvibodzwa sezvakaitika svondo rapera apo maRed Devills akabvarura West Ham 4-0. Asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mukamba yeChelsea iyo yatarisana nemutambo mukukutu apo varimuguta ravo reLondon as kuWembley uko varikunobandana neTottenham Hotspur iyo isingaroveke roveke pamusha.  Mimwe mitambo mugungano iri ndeiyi… Liverpool v Crystal Palace Southampton v West Ham Burnemouth v Watford Stoke v Arsenal Burnley v West Brom Huddersfield v Newcastle Manchester City v Everton KuSpain, makundano emwaka uno ari kutanga svondo rino apo chikwata chine mukombe weLa Liga che Real Madrid chir ikutanga chiri kunze kwemusha kuDeportivo La Coruna panguva iyo Barcelona iri Nou Camp neReal Betis. Madrid neBarcelona, zvakasangana pakati pesvondo pamutambo wemukomba apo Barceloma yakadamburwa 2-0.

column2: VaBiti Vanoti VaChinamasa naVaMangudya Havana Chavanobura kuMisangano yeIMF neWorld Bank kuAmerica
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa nagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya vapinda muWashington DC nhasi kumisangano yeWorld Bank ne International Monetary Fund inonzi “Spring meetings.” Misangano iyi inotanga nhasi kusvika musi weSvondo. Vachitaura neStudio 7 VaMangudya vati vachatanga kupinda mumisangano mangwana sezvo vari kusvika muWashington manheru anhasi kubva kuNew York. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi VaTendai Biti vanova nhengo yeMDC Alliance vati havaone paine chinobuda pamisangano iri kupindwa naVaChinamasa naVaMangudya sezvo vari kutatarika kuvandudza hupfumi. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Inonzi Inogona Kuendeswa kuMatare neKuroverera VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere Mhosva Yavasina Kupara
column3: Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu Amai Beatrice Mtetwa avo rakamirirawo nhengo dzeMDC dzakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri VaLast Maingehama naVaTungamirai Madzokere vanoti neMuvhuro vachataura nevatori venhau kuti votora matanho api kuhurumende nekuvakanda mujeri kwemakore vasina mhosva. Amai Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yekuti vaende kumatare iri kuna VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere asi vanoti pane mukana mukuru wekuti vachada kuripwa. Vaviri ava vange chipomerwa mhosva yekuponda mupurisa VaPetros Mutedza paGlen View 3 Shopping Centre muna 2011. VaMaingehama, VaMadzokere naMuzvare Yvonne Musarurwa vakazobatwa nemhosva yekuponda nemutongi wedare repamusoro VaChinembiri Bhunu muna 2016 ndokuendeswa kujeri reChikurubi. Asi mutongi wedare repamusoro soro Amai Rita Makarau vakati vaviri ava havana mhosva zvakapa kuti vabve vaburitswa muhusungwa. Muzvare Musarurwa vakaburitswa muhusungwa muna 2018 mushure mekupihwa ruregerero nemutungamiri wenyika pakaburitswa vamwe vasungwa. Asi mumwe ainge anziwo ane mhosva Muzvare Rebecca Mafukeni akashaya ari mutirongo akamirira kutongwa. Vana ava vaive pachikwata chevechidiki veMDC makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe vakasungwa muna 2011 vachipomerwa mhosva yekutema nematombo inspector Mutedza vachibva vashaya. Vazhinji vainge vasungwa ava vakabva vasungunurwa vachinzi Havana mhosva. Gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe vari kugara vachiendeswa kumatare nemhosva dzekutyorwa kunenge kwaitwa mutemo nemapurisa. Mwedzi wapera VaKazembe vakapotsa vakandwa mujeri mushure mekunonoka kubhadhara mari inodarika zviuru zana gumi nemakumi pfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe nemazana mashanu kana kuti RTGS 199, 500 kuna VaSimon Mandoza mumwe mudzidzi wekuGweru vainge varohwa nemapurisa muHarare vakangozvimirira havo. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna VaKazembe negurukota rezvemitemo vaZiyambi Ziyambi sezvo vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira tisati taenda pamhepo. Asi VaKumbirai Mafunda mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights sangano rakashanda naAmai Mtetwa naVaCharles Kwaramba panyaya yenhengo dzeMDC idzi vanotiwo pane mangwana vanotarisira kuti VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere vajekesere vatori venhau matanho avari kuronga kutora. No media source currently available

column2: Dunhu reGauteng Roronga Kudzika Mitemo Inosarura Vabvakure
column3: Mukuru wedunhu reGauteng muJohannesburg, VaDavid Makhura, vakazivisa neChipiri kuti nekufamba kwenguva, dunhu ravo richadzika mutemo unorambidza vekune dzimwe nyika kutanga mabhizimisi mudunhu ravo, sezvo izvi zviri kutadzisa zvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa, kuti zviwanewo chekubata. VaMakhura vakataura mashoko aya mudare ravo redunhu, apo vakange vachipindura mibvunzo yaibva kune dzimwe nhengo dzedare ravo. Vanoona nezvekodzero dzavanhu vanoti mashoko akataurwa naVaMakhura anokonzeresa kuti pave neruvengo pakati pevanobva kunze kwenyika nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa. Mumwe muzvinabhizimusi muSouth Africa neZimbabwe, VaBrighton Sangore, vanoti mashoko akadai anobata zvizvarwa zvisiri zvemuSouth Africa, agara achitaurwa kwenguva yakareba muSouth Africa. Sachigaro weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti mashoko akadai haafanirwe kunge achibva pamuromo pemunhu anonyarikana saVaMakhura. VaMavhinga vanoti mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora kodzero dzevanhu uye handicho chaive chido chevaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, mushakabvu Nelson Mandela. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vanotiwo mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora mitemo yenyika, iyo isina rusarura pakuvambwa kwemabhizinesi. VaShumba vanoti kana vekunze vachivhura mabhizimusi muSouth Africa, vanenge vachibatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika iyi. VaShumba vanoti VaMakhura vanofanirwa kukumbira ruregerero kuzvizvarwa zvose zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa. VaShumba vanoti sangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum riri kuita hurukuro nemamwe masangano akasiyanasiyana, senzira yekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa. Mashoko aVaMakhura anouya mushure mokunge zvitoro zvezvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvapazwa nekupiswa, ukuwo vatyairi vemagonyeti vachimbunyikidzwa kodzero dzavo, vamwe vachimanikidzwa kusiya basa nesangano rinozviti All Truck Drivers Foundation. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch rinoti vanhu mazana maviri vafa mumhirizhonga yemuSouth Africa kubva muna Kurume gore rapera, vazhinji vavo vari vatyairi vanobva kune dzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

column2: Vasungwa Vodzidziswa Kurima Fodya kuBanket
column3: Vasungwa nevakange vari muhusungwa vanosvika gumi nevatanhatu vepajeri rekuBanket, Mashonaland West vakaita zvidzidzo zvekurima fodya vakapiwa zvitupa. Mumwe wevakapiwa chitupa chekurima fodya pamhemberero yakaitwa svondo rino ndiVaMathias Mushambe vanogara kuMutorashanga. VaMushangwe avo vakagara mujeri kwemakore matanhatu mushure mekuwanikwa vaine mhosva yekutsika munhu nemotokari vanoti zvidzidzo zvekurima fodya zvakavayamura sezvo vave murimi wefodya anemukurumbira. VaMushangwe vanoti vave kutopinza vamwe vanhu basa mumunda wavo wefodya. Mumwe musungwa akapiwa chitupa chekurima fodya ndiVaWebster Tafadzwa Mubayiwa vekuDomboshava avo vakaburitswa mujeri mushure mekuregererwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe mwedzi wapera vanoti varikutarisira kupiwa chidimbu chemunda kuti vagoratidza hunyanzvi hwavo hwekurima fodya. VaMubayiwa vanoti vanofara nekuburitswa mujeri vasati vapedza makore avakakatarirwa pamwe nekudzidziswa kurima fodya izvo vanoti zvichavayamura mukurarama. VaMushambe vanoti parizvino vave kutodzidzisawo vamwe vari munharaunda mavagere kurima fodya. Mutevedzeri wemukuru weZimbabwe Prison and Correctional Services (ZPCS) VaMoses Chihobvu vanoti kuti musungwa akwanise kupinda muchirongwa chekudzidziswa kurima fodya anofanirwa kunge aine chido nekudzidzira kurima fodya. VaChihobvu vanoti vanodzidzisa vasungwa vanenge vasarirwa negore rimwe chete kuti vabude muhusungwa. VaChihobvu vanoti dai hurumende yakwanisa kupa vasungwa ava mabasa kana vabuda sezvo vaveneruzivo. Asi mukuru mubazi rePublic Service Commission Amai Muchada vanoti izvi hazvikwanisike sezvo hurumende yakamira kupinza vanhu mabasa. Vasungwa vakapihwa zvitupa zvekurima fodya kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi muna 2008 vanosvika zana namakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe.

column2: ‘NHABVU HAIDI MAKAKATANWA’
column3: AIMBOVE mubati wepagedhi weDynamos FC nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors — Gift ‘Umbro’ Muzadzi — anoti kuti nhabvu yemuno isimukire ibve mumadhaka mairi pari zvino, vanhu vanofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete kwete kuita “zvekudhonzerana”.   Kubvira makore adarika, nhabvu yemuno haina kumbosimuka sezvaitarisirwa nevazhinji nekuda kwezvikonzero zvinosanganisira kusabatana kuripo mumasangano anotungamira pamwe chete nevatsigiri vemutambo uyu.   Izvi ndizvo Umbro anoti zviri kukonzera kuti nhabvu yemuno isaririre kumashure. Anoti munhu wese ane chekuita nenhabvu anofanirwa kupihwa mukana wekushanda mumutambo uyu uye pfungwa dzake dzokosheswa.   “Chakuvadza nhabvu yedu inhau yekudhonzerana kuri kuitika chete, hakuna chimwe chinhu.   “Ngatibatanei tishande pamwe chete nekuti chinhu chinofanira kuhwina pakupera kwezuva inhabvu yedu. Hazvina basa kuti uyu mutsigiri wenhabvu here, uyu ane mari here kana kuti kwete, asi tikakoshesana tese sezvatiri tinokunda chete uye nhabvu yedu inosimukira.   “Kana tiri kurwisana hapana zvatinenge tichiita nekuti mhedzisiro tese tichangochema sezvatiri kuita iye zvino. Nhabvu yedu yakamira izvo zviri kukanganisa vechidiki,” anodaro.   Umbro anoenderera mberi achiti: “Tikatarisa iye zvino patave nhabvu yedu tiri kusarira kumashure zvakanyanya izvo zvakazokonzerwa nezvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA neCAF, zvave kuita kuti nyika dzatainge tasiya panyaya yebudiriro panhabvu dzave kutotibata uye dzimwe dzatotidarika.   “Saka ngatibatane tishande kuti zvirango izvi zvibve nekuti ndezvimwe zvauraya nhabvu yedu. Vana vedu vaomerwa havachazive kuti remangwana ravo richazovei munhabvu.”    Gift ‘Umbro’ Muzadzi   Mwedzi watiri uno ndeweWorld Cup iyo iri kutambirwa kunyika yeQatar uye Africa iri kumirirwa nenyika shanu kumutambo uyu dzinoti Ghana, Cameroon, Senegal, Tunisia neMorroco.   Umbro anoti nyika shanu idzi dziri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kumutambo uyu uye ari kudzitsigira.   Asi anoti shuviro yake rimwe remazuva kuzoona maWarriors achinokwikwidza kumutambo uyu.   “Ini sechizvarwa chese chemuno chinofarira nhabvu, ndinoda kuonawo nyika yangu ichienda kuWorld Cup, nyika dzese dzinotoda kuenda kumutambo uyu.   “Ukaona wakwanisa kuenda kunotamba kuWorld Cup unenge watamba nhabvu yepamusoro. Saka ngatirongekei muno tigokwanisawo kuenda kumakwishu aya,” anodaro.   Mwaka wenhabvu wemuno uchangodarika, Umbro ange achishanda kuchikwata cheDynamos FC ari mumwe wevatevedzeri vaTonderayi Ndiraya.   Anoti vatsigiri venhabvu havachanyatsouya kuzotsigira zvikwata zvavo sezvavaiita kare uye zviri kukonzerwawo nekudhura kuri kuita kupinda munhandare.   “Nhabvu kuti inakidze, inofanirwa kunge ine vatsigiri, asi manje mazuva ano nhandare hadzichanyatsozare sezvaiitika kare. Nhau yandiri kuona hombe ndeyekuti kupinda munhandare kuri kudhuriswa zvakanyanya saka vatsigiri vari kutadza kuwana mari yacho.   “Saka zviri nani kunzi mari yekupindisa munhandare iendeswe paUS$1 chairo zvekuti kana nhandare ikazara nevanhu 50 000, imari yakawanda inoenda kuzvikwata zvemuno pane kunzi bhora ronzi US$3 kana US$5 mopinda vanhu vashoma munhandare.   “Nhabvu mazuva ano yave bhizimisi, ende zvakakosha kugona kuziva bhizimisi racho muite mari,” anodaro.   Umbro anobva kuMalawi asi akazvarirwa muZimbabwe ndokukurira muno. Kana vari muno, ndivanaHungwe asi kuMalawi ndivanaMbewe.   Kumusha kwavo muno kwakabva baba vake ndekwaLandas, kwaChihota.   Zita rekuti Umbro akaripihwa neshamwari dzake dzaakakura nadzo dzinoti Norman Mapeza, Lloyd Chitembwe naAlois Bunjira panguva iyo vese vaitambira Darryn T.   Anoti panguva iyo vaitambira chikwata cheUnder 14 cheDarryn T, akasonerwa juzi naambuya vake avo aigara navo.   Juzi iri ndiro raaiuya achitambisa nhabvu saka rimwe zuva akazosonerera zita rekuti Umbro pajuzi iri izvo zvakanakidza shamwari dzake ndokubva vamupa zita remadunhurirwa iri.   “Tichikura kuDarryn T, ndaiita gadziriro dzangu ndakapfeka juzi randakasonerwa naambuya vangu. Saka chikwata chevakuru chaive nemayunifomu eUmbro aibva kuUK, rimwe zuva ndakauya ndakasonera zita rekuti Umbro pajuzi rangu iri shamwari dzangu dzikanakidzwa nazvo ndokutanga kundishevedza kuti Umbro. Kubva ipapo, zita rakabva ratongogara kusvika nhasi.   “Umbro iyoyo yaive yakanaka uye iniwo ndaiida chaizvo,” anodaro Umbro.

column2: Kanzuru yeHarare Yobhadharisa Mitero Ichishandisa Madhora ekuAmerica
column3: Kanzuru yeHarare yatanga kubhadharisa vagari mari yemvura nemimwe mitero nemadhora ekuAmerica zvichitevera kupihwa kwayakaitwa mvumo yekuita izvi nehurumende. Sangano rinomirira maguta nemadhorobha munyka reUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, kana kuti UCAZ, ranyorerawo kuhurumende richtsvaga mvumo yekuti maguta nemadhorobha ese munyika abhadharise vagari mari nemadhora ekuAmerica. Hurumende yakapa kanzuru yeHarare mvumo yekubhadharisa vagari nemakambani vachishandia madhora ekuAmerica kutanga mwedzi uno. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichaeil Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vasingakwanise mari yekunze vacharamba vachishandisa mari yemuno, asi inenge yakatarwa ichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica. Mamwe maguta akaita seMasvingo, Kwekwe neRedcliff akaitawo zvisungo zvekuti vanokwanisa vabhadhare mitero vachishandisa madhora ekuAmerica. Mutungamiriri weUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, zvakare mari meya weGweru, VaJosiah Makombe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatonyorera kugurukota rinoona nezvemadhorobha nematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vachikumbira mvumo yekuti maguta nemadhorabha ese munyika makumi matatu nemaviri abvimidzwe kubhadharisa mitero nemvura nemadhorobha ekuAmerica. VaMakombe vati maguta nemadhorobha ange ave kutatarika kuita basa ravo sezvo vese vanovatengesera zvinhu zvekushandisa zvakaita semishonga yekuchenesa mvura vave kutengesa nemari yekunze. Vati kubhadharisa mari yekunze kunoita kuti makanzuru akwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka asingapedzi nguva ari mumitsetse yekutsvaga mari yekunze kubva kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Association, VaPrecious Shumba, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotambira danho rekubhadharisa mitero nemari yekunze vachiti zvinoita kuti makunzuru aya asagare achishandura mitero nekuda kwekushaya simba kunogara kuchiita mari yemuno. VaShumba vaenderera mberi vachiti danho iri rinoita kuti maguta nemadhorobha asagare achikumbira mari kuReserve Banj nehurumende. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano rreCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vaudza Studio 7 kunyange hazvo iri riri danho rakanaka uye richikwanisa kuvandudza mabasa emakanzuru, dambudziko guru nderekuti vagari nevashandi vakawanda munyika vari kutambira mari yemuno, izvo zvichanetsa kuti vawane mari yekunze iyi. Mukuru wesangano reMasvingo United Residents and Ratepayers Association, VaAnoziva Muguti, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho rekushandisa mari yekunze rakanaka chose uye chinofadza ndechekuti vasingawane marii iyi havasi kumanikidzwa kubhadhara nemari yekunze, sezvo vachibhadhariswa mari yemunyika asi yakatarwa nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaJuly Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Mumwe mushandi mukuru mubazi ravo uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita, audza Studio 7 kuti VaMoyo vachapindurachikumbiro cheUCAZ, nguva ipi zvayo kubva pari zvino. Hurumende yadzika mutemo unobvumidza vemabhizimisi bhadharisa vatengi nemari yekunze neyemuno, kana kuti Dual Pricing System, asi haina kunge yapa makanzuru mvumo yekuita izvi. No media source currently available

column2: Vanopikisa Vanoti VaMliswa Ndivo Vanofanirwa Kumirira Hurungwe West Kwete VaGuzah
column3: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iri kushorwa zvakanyanya nemabatiro ayakaita sarudzo yemuHurungwe West, uko inoti VaKeith Guzah veZanu-PF vakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo kunyange hazvo vange vasiri mugwaro revavhoti. ZEC inoti VaGuzah vakakumbira kuti vabviswe kuMagunje vachienda kuHurungwe West asi pakaita matambudziko pakuita izvi zvakapa kuti izvi zvisaitwe. Asi ZEC inoti kubvumidza kwayakaita VaGuzah kuti vavhoterwe musarudzo yeHurumengwe West zviri pamutemo. ZEC yatendawo kuti VaGuzah havana kukwanisa kuvhota nekuda kwekuti zita ravo rainge risiri mugwaro revavhoti mudunhu iri. VaGuzah vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chavangataure panyaya iyi pari zvino. Asi vakakwikwidza musarudzo iyi vakazvimirira, VaTemba Mliswa, vanoti VaGuzah havafanire kunge vachimirira Hurungwe West nekuti mapepa avo avakashandisa pasrudzo iyi akange asina kumira zvakanaka. No media source currently available Mutungamiri webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, uye vari muzvinafundo panyaya yemitemo, VaLovemore Madhuku, vanoti mashoko eZEC anoshoresa zvikuru. VaMadhuku vanoti kana VaGuzah zita ravorakanga risiri mugwaro revavhoti zvinoreva kuti havana kodzero dzekuvhoterwa mudunhu iri izvo zvinopa kuti VaMliswa vagadzwe semumiriri wedunhu iri muparamende. No media source currently available

column2: ZCTU Inotambira Kuvepo kweTNF iri paMutemo
column3: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti rinotambira nemufaro kuvepo kwemutemo unotara mashandiro eTripartite Negotiating Forum kana kuti TNF. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti sevashandi vanofara kuti pave nehwaro hwekuti nhaurirano pakati pevashandi, vashandirwi nehurumende dzive pamutemo, sezvo kwemakore makumi maviri adarika TNF yanga ichishanda zvisiri pamutemo. Musangano wekutanga weTNF pave nemutemo uyu uri kutarisirwa kuitwa nemusi weChitatu svondo rino, apo panotarisirwawo kukurukurwa zvakati wandeyi zvinobata TNF zvakaunganidzwa masvondo maviri adarika pamusangano wakaitwa kuKadoma. VaMoyo vanoti zvimwe zvichakurukurwa zvichabva kukomiti yakaiswa kuti itarise matambudziko akatarisana nenyika mune zveupfumi uye zvinosanganisira matambudziko akatarisana nenyika anosanganisira kushaikwa kwemagetsi nemvura munyika. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata divi revashandirwi pamwe nehurumende. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Yomisa Basa Vashandi Vayo Vose Vasina Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
column3: Hurumende inoti kutanga neMuvhuro uno vashandi vose vehurumende vasina kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 havasi kuzobvumidzwa kushanda uye havatembire mari. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashandi vakapihwa nguva yakakwana yekubayiwa nhomba uye vasina vari kuzomiswa basa nekuti vanenge votyora mutemo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti uku kuyedza kuda kumanikidza vari kuzengurira kuti vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo huwandu hwevari kubayiwa huri kuramba huchidzikira. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kusvika muna Zvita asi nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubayiwa pazuva zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Hurumende yakaburitsa mugwaro rayo kana kuti Government Gazette kuti mushandi wose wehurumende anenge asina kubayiwa nhomba kusvika musi wa15 Gumiguru acharangwa. Asi zvinonzi vamwe vanogona kuregererwa ndokunge vapa zvikonzero zvakati tsvikiti zvekuti sei vasina kubayiwa nhomba. Vashandi vehurumende vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 300 000. Masangano evaraitidzi akaita seARTUZ nePTUZ anoti hurumende haifanire kumanikidza vashandi kubayiwa nhomba asi kungovakurudzira nekuvapa dzidziso yakakwana. No media source currently available

column2: Dare kuBulawayo Rokurudzirwa Kurasa Nyaya yeMutori weNhau Vachuchusi Vachinzi Vakundikana Basa
column3:
Magweta ari kumirira mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira ega Jeffrey Moyo azivisa dare ramejastiriti muBulawayo nhasi kuti achaita chikumbiro chekuti nyaya yaakatarisana nayo iraswe nekuti muchuchisi haana kubudisa humbowo hwekuti Moyo ane mhosva yaakapara.

Kunzwikwa kwenyaya yaMoyo kwapetwa nhasi, mushure mekunge dare ranzwa humbowo kubva kuna VaAcademy Chinhamora vanove mushandi weZimbabwe. Media Commission, avo vange vari mufakazi wechishanu vakasarudzwa nemuchuchisi kuti vape huchapupu hwavo munyaya iyi.

Mukuvhunzurudzwa kwavaitwa naAmai Beatrice Mtetwa, VaChinhamora vabvuma kuti zvinhu zvisiri pamutemo kuti bazi rekufambiswa kwemashoko rive nechekuita nekunyoreswa kwevatapi venhau vanobva kunze kwenyika, sezvo boka reZMC riri boka rakazvimirira rega pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi vati izvi zvinhu zvinogara zvichiitwa nekuti ndiwo mashandiro agara aripo pakati peboka ravo nebazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko.

VaChinhamora vabvumawo kuti munhu anenge achida kunyoresa kuboka iri semutapi wenhau kana kubatsira vamwe vanenge vachida kunyoresa, haana zvaangaziva zvakawanda zvine chekuita nemashandiro anoita veboka iri. Kune vafakazi vana vakatopa huchapupu hwavo kudare. Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vakatarisira kuti muchuchisi VaAcumen Khupe vachadeedza vamwe vafakazi asi izvi hazvina kuitika. Vati, “Tauya takatarisira kuti pane vamwe vafakazi vatatu vachapa huchapupu vanosanganisira akaferefeta nyaya iyi, nemumwe anoshanda kubazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, pamwe naivo VaChinhamora.” Amai Mtetwa vaenderta mberi vachiti, “Asi VaChinhamora ndivo chete vazopa huchapupu, mushure mezvo muchuchisi achibva ati anga apeta nyaya yake.” Amai Mtetwa vati maonero avo ndeekuti muchuchisi haana kukwanisa kubudisa pachena kuti Moyo akapara mhosva izvo zvavapa kuti vazivise dare kuti vanoda kukwidza chikumbiro chekuti rirase nyaya iyi."


Mutongi wedare VaMark Nzira vati vachapa mutongo wavo musi wa7 Kurume. Moyo akasungwa muna Kubvumbi gore rapera akazobvumidzwa kubhadhara mari yechibatsio mushure mekugara muchitokisi kwemavhiki anopfuura matatu, achinzi akabatsira vatapi venhau vekuAmerica vaviri Christina Goldbaum naJoao Silva, avo vanoshandira bepanhau reNew York Times kuti
vapinde munyika zvisiri pamutemo.

Vaviri ava vakadzingwa munyika vasina kuwana mukana wekumiswa pamberi pedare pamusoro penyaya iyi.  Moyo anonzi akabatsira vaviri ava achishanda pamwe nemumwe mushandi
weZMC, Thabang Manhika uyo ari kupomerwa mhosva imwe chete, asi ari
kutongwa pachake ega.

Kusungwa kwaMoyo kwakashorwa nemasangano akawanda kusanganisira reCommittee to Protect Journalists iro rakati uyu waive muenzaniso wakaipa wekushungurudzwa kuri kuramba kuchiitwa vatapi venhau munyika.

column2: Tinogona kutora ‘coach’ wekunze: ZIFA
column3: SANGANO rinotungamirira nhabvu yemuno reZimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) rinoti rinogona kugadza mumwezve murairidzi wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors wekunze kana wemuno kuti agotsiva Zdrvako “Loga” Logarusic uyo akadzingwa basa kutanga kwesvondo rino.   Zvichitevera kudzinga kwavakaita Loga basa, ZIFA iri pakati pekutsvaga murairidzi wekutsiva chizvarwa chekunyika yeCroatia ichi, icho chakakwanisa kurairidza mitambo 14 chete yemaWarriors ndokuhwinha mumwe chete.   Pari zvino ZIFA ichambogadza murairidzi anongofanobata chigaro ichi kwekanguva kadiki uyo vachapa basa rekutungamira maWarriors mumitambo yemwedzi unotevera apo achange achirwirira tikiti rekuenda kuQatar World Cup. Mutungamiriri weZifa – Felton Kamambo – anoti ZIFA yatanga basa rekutsvaga murairidzi anotsiva Loga.   “Zvichitevera kupesana kwatakaita naLoga, veruzhinji vangade kuziva kuti tinogona kugadza mumwe murairidzi wemaWarriors anove chizvarwa chekunze kwenyika asi hunge kana ane magwaro akakwana uye akatifadza patinoita hurukuro naye.   “Iye zvino tave kushambadza basa iri tichitsvaga murairidzi mutsva anouya kuzotungamira chikwata chedu. “Saka basa iri tinogona kungopa chero murairidzi, angave wemuno kana wekunze anenge atifadza ane zvatiri kutsvaga ndiye achapinda panyanga,” anodaro Kamambo.   ZIFA yainge yambovimbisa kuzivisa murairidzi achafanobata chigaro ichi musi weChipiri svondo rino usati wadarika asi haina kuzoita saizvozvo.   Mumitambo 14 iyo Loga akarairidza maWarriors, akangokwanisa kuhwina mumwe chete, ndokuita mangange mishanu uye ndokukundwa misere.   Zvisinei, asiya maWarriors abudirira kuenda kumitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations iyo ichatambwa gore rinotevera kuCameroon. Asi, asiyawo chikwata chenyika ichi chiri pasi muGroup G murwendo rwekurwira kuenda ku2022 Qatar World Cup apo chiine chibodzwa chimwe chete kubva mumitambo miviri yachatamba kusvika pari zvino.   Mwedzi unotevera, maWarriors achasangana neGhana mumitambo miviri yakatevedzena yekurwira kuenda kuQatar iyo vanofanirwa kuhwina kuti varambe vaine mukana.

column2: Vamwe Vanhukadzi Votenda Kuwana Kuzvitonga
column3: Vanhukadzi vakawanda vanoti kubva mugore ra1980 apo Zimbabwe yakawana kuzvitonga, hupenyu hwavo huri kuenda huchishanduka nguva nenguva nekuda kwematanho ari kutorwa nehurumende ekuona kuti madzimai nevanhurume vanofanirwa kupihwa mikana yakaenzana. No media source currently available Mugari wemuManicaland, Amai Moreblessing Shinya, murairidzi pachikoro chiri kwaMarange. Amai Shinya vanoti vanonzwa kufara nematanho ari kutorwa nehurumende pari zvinho ekuti madzimai ange anewo zvigaro zvepamusoro mune zvematongerwo enyika. Vanoti mikana yaveko mazuvano yakanaka uye yasiyana neemakore apfuura. Amai Shinya vanoti panguva ino zvinofadza kuona kuti madzimai awandawo muparamende uye nemuzvigaro zvepamusoro muhurumende - kunyange hazvo pachine zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa. Muzvare Pamela Chitima vanoshanda nerimwe sangano rakazvimirira, rePeace Building and Development Foundation maMutare. Muzvare Chitima vanoti nguva yegochanhembe ndiyo yakarashwa nehurumende apo zvaingonzi nzvimbo yemudzimai mumba yokubikira, pamwe neyemusikarudzi. Muzvare Chitima vanoti vanofara zvikuru nematanho akaiswa ekuti vanasikana vawane dzidzo zvakaenderana nevanakomana izvo zviri kupa kuti pave nevanhukadzi vakawanda vanodzidza muzvikoro zvepamusoro soro. Muzvare Mandy Kanyemba mugari wemaMutare vachidzidza paZimbabwe Open University. Muzvare Kanyemba vanoti pane zvichakasarira zvinofanirwa kuitwa nehurumende sezvo kuwanira vanasikana, uye madzimai mikana muzvikoro nemumabasa zvisiri izvo zvega zvinokwaniswa kuitwa mukusimbaradza mudzimai wanhasi, kana mwanasikana wanhasi. Muzvare Kanyemba vanoti chinodiwa kuti madzimai akwanda ange ari pazvigaro zvepamusoro zvinobuda nesungawirirano, uye zvigaro izvi vanofanirwa kuzviwana nehunyanzvi, kwete zvekuitirwa tsvete. Muzvare Perpetual Guwila vanoshanda nesangano re-Zimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce maMutare. Muzvare Guwila vanoti mikana inonzi iripo yacho yekuti madzimai anowana haisi kunyatsobuda nemazvo. Vanoti madzimai akawanda ari kunyanya kuwanikwa mumabasa anoita basa repasi pasi. Vanoti izvi zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuitira kuti mabasa akawanda epamusoro, ange achitorwawo nevanhukadzi. Mumwe mugari wemuChikanga maMutare, Amai Tarisai Machipanda, vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuedza kusimudzira madzimai, mamwe maitiro uye matauriro anoitwa nevamwe vakuru vari muhurumende, kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, anozvidza vanhukadzi izvo zvinovagumburisa. Amai Machipanda vanoti hurongwa hwekusumudzira madzimai hunofanirwa kuoneka mukuita zvese nemukutaura kwevakuru vemuhurumende kuitira kuti vanhukadzi, avo vakashanda zvakasimba munguva yehondo, vave neramangwana rakanaka munyaya dzose dzehupenyu. Kudzamara izvi zvaitika, vanhukadzi vakawanda vacharamba vachichema muhondo yavo yekuti varemekedzwewo munyaya dzose dzinobata nyika nehupenyu, sezviri kuitika kuvanhurume.

column2: Russia Yoburitsa Spain Mumakwikwi eWorld Cup
column3: Russia yakashura mare mumakwikwi eWorld Cup apo yakarova Spain 4-3 mumapenalties mushure mekuita mangange-1-1. Russia yapinda mumaquarter finals emakwikwi aya. Spain yakabatana nedzimwe nyika dzakapinda mumaquarter finals nezuro dzinoti France neUruguay. Nemusi weMuvhuro nenguva dza 4 masikati, Brazil iri kutamba neMexico kochizoti manheru nenguva dza 8, Belgium iri kutamba neJapan.

column2: Hurumende Inoti Iri Kugutsikana neChirongwa Chayo Chakangana neKubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Vanhu Mamiriyoni Gumi
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 huri kufamba zvakanaka chose munyika asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzichiti pane zvimwe zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio7 kuti chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba chiri kufamba mugwara rakanaka, uye vanotarissira kuti hurumende ichagona kuzadzikisa shuviro yekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu munyika yose. VaMujiri vatiwo mangwana hurumende iri kutambira nhomba dzeCovid-19 mamiriyoni maviri dzakatengwa kuChina. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira machiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, Dr Johannes Marisa, vatsigirawo kuti chirongwa chekubaya nhomba chiri kufamba zvakanaka kana zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica. VaMarisa varumbidzawo danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuti zvipatara, nemakirinika akazvimirira zvitange kubayawo nhomba yeCovid-19. Asi VaMarisa vatiwo vana chiremba vakazvimiririra ava vanoda kubatsirwawo nemabhokisi anochengeta chando sezvo nhomba idzi dzine matemperature adzinofanirwa kugara dziri. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati chirongwa ichi hachisati chanyatsopinda mugwara. VaMadzorera vati hurumende inofanirwa kusimba mukupinza nhomba munyika kuitirakuti ikwanise kubaya nhomba vanhu zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. VaMadzorera vatiwo kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzichiri kuita mitsetse mirefu yevanhu vanenge vachida kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kutivanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, izvo zvakasvitsahuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 pazviuru zana negumi nezvina nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe,kana kuti 114,489. Vanhu makumi mana nevatatu vakafa nechirwere ichi nezuro izvo zvakasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana 3,754 Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mmasere nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nemumwe chete 1, 780, 541vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira Covid-19. Vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave maza mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri ezviuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nevana,kana kuti 920,554. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi. kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe hichpararira. No media source currently available

column2: Musona asiya kutambira maWarriors
column3: MUTAMBI wenhabvu Knowledge Musona nhasi asendeka shangu dzake dzekutambira chikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors.   Pachinyorwa chaatumira, Musona uyo ange ari mutungamiri wevatambi vemaWarriors ati ave kusiya kuti ape nguva kuchikwata chake cheAl-Tai pamwe nekupa vamwe vatambi mukana wekutambirawo maWarriors.   “Mhuri yeZimbabwe, nhasi ndokuzivisai kuti ndamira kutambira chikwata chedu chenyika chemaWarriors. Danho iri handina kuritora nyore sezvo ndange ndave nemakore 12 ndichimirira nyika yangu, iyo ndakatanga kutambira musi wa3 Kurume 2010, mumutambo uyo takasangana neSouth Africa.   “Ndave kusiya kuti ndipe nguva kuchikwata changu pamwe nekupa vamwe vatambi mukana wekumirira maWarriors.   “Ndichagara ndine ndangariro yekutambira nyika yangu ndichienda kumitambo yakaita seyeAFCON neCOSAFA Cup, nekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup.   “Chimwe chikuru kupihwa chiremerera chekuve kaputeni kwemakore mashanu adarika,” adaro Musona.   Mutambo wekupedzisira waMusona achitambira maWarriors waive wekuAFCON musi wa18 Ndira wekuCameroon apo maWarriors akakunda Guinea 2-1 mumutambo uyo akanwisa chibodzwa chekutanga.

column2: VaBiden Vanokunda VaTrump Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weAmerica
column3: Vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica zvichitevera kukunda kwavaita mudunhu rePennsylvania.  VaBiden, avo vane makore makumi manomwe nemasere ekuberekwa, vatora zvigaro zvose makumi maviri zve electoral college zvemudunhu rePennsylvania ndokuita zvigaro zvinodarika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe vachidarika zvigaro zvinodiwa kuti munhu adomwe semunhu akakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaBiden vakunda mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, VaDonald Trump, avo vakabuda pachena kuti vari kupikisa mumatare maverengerwo akaitwa mavhoti mumamwe matunhu emuAmerica.  VaBiden vachaitwa mutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu apo vachagadzwa zviri pamutemo muna Ndira gore rinouya. Kukunda kwaVaBiden kunoreva kuti mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Kamala Harris, vari kupinda munhoroondo yekuva mudzimai wekutanga, uye ari mutema, kuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika munhoroondo yeAmerica yemakore mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemana.  VaBiden vakashanda vari mutevedzeri waVaBarack Obama kubva muna 2009 kusvika muna Ndira 2017, apo pakatoreswa VaTrump mhiko yekuva mutungamiri wenyika mushure mekukunda Amai Hilary Clinton musarudzo yakaitwa muna Mbudzi 2016. VaBiden vakashandawo senhengo yedare Senate kwemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika uye vari mudzidzisi paDeVry University kuOhio, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvanga zviri pachena kuti VaBiden vachakunda musarudzo iyi. Asi VaMasocha vanoti VaBiden vane mutoro mukuru wekugadzirisa zvinhu munyika pamwe nekunze kwenyika zvavati zvakavhiringwa naVaTrump. No media source currently available

column2: South Africa Yopa Magwaro Vakanga Vanyimwa Zviuru Gumi neZviviri
column3: Sangano re Global Zimbabwe Forum rinoti riri kufara zvikuru nedanho ratorwa nehurumende yemu South Africa rekuwedzera mazuva ekuti vanhu vaende kunotora magwaro anovapa mvumo yekugara nekushanda vari munyika iyi. Magwaro aya ari kupihwa pasi pechirongwa che Zimbabwe Special Permit (ZSP) kusvika musi wa 31 Ndira gore rinouya. Hurumende yeSouth Africa inoti vanhu zviuru gumi nezviviri vakambenge vanyimwa magwaro vava kupihwa magwaro aya kunze kwevanhu makumi maviri nevashanu. Sachigaro wesangano re Global Zimbabwe Forum, Va Solomon Chikowero, vanoti kuwedzerwa kwenguva yaphiwa vanhu kuchabatsira zvikuru sezvo vakambenge vanyimwa pakutanga vava kupihwa magwaro aya mushure meongororo itsva yakaitwa. "Tiri kufadzwa nedanho iri sezvo takaita misangano nebazi rehurumende rinoita nezvemapepa aya kutanga kwemwedzi uno tichivazivisa kuti zvange zvakakosha kuti vawedzere mazuva ekuti vanhu vapihwe mapepa aya uye kuti vawongorore zvakare avo vavange vanyima kuti vawaniswe mukana mutsva saka," Va Chikowero vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Yokundikana Kuzadzikisa Zvayakazvitarira neZvaitarisirwa neWHO paNyaya yeNhomba yeCovid-19
column3: Zimbabwe iyo yave nenhomba dzinodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu kana kuti 16 million ichiri kutatarika kubaya vanhu nhomba sezviri kuitikawo munyika dzakawanda dzemuAfrica. Vanhu zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana ndivo vabayiwa nhomba mbiri munyika kusvika parizvino kunyangwe chinangwa chehurumende chaive chekuti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana vange vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 mukupera kwegore rapera. Asi kunyangwe Zimbabwe isati yasvitsa huwandu uhu, yatangawo kubaya vamwe nhomba kechitatu. Nhomba yeCovid-19 yakatanga kubayiwa muZimbabwe musi wa 17 Mbudzi gore rapera. Nhomba dziri kubayiwa munyika dzinoti Sputnik V yekuRusssia pamwe nedzekuChina dzinoti Sinopharm neSinovac, Covaxin yekuIndia uye Janssen yeJohnson and Johnson dziri kushandiswa muZimbabwe. Kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vakawanda vachiri kuzengurira kubayiwa nhomba, mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti, nhomba inobatsira nekuti. Zimbabwe haina kungokundikana pane zvayainge yazvitarira chete pakubaya nhomba yeCovud-19 asi pane zvimwe zvainge zvatarwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization kana kuti WHO. WHO yainge yatiwo yainge iine chivimbo chekuti panopera gore ra2021, nyika dzemuAfrica dzinenge dzabaya vanhu vadzo zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana nhomba. A si nyika shoma shoma dzisingadarike gumi kusanganisira, Seychelles, Mauritius, Morrocco, Rwanda neBotswana chete kuchamhembe kweAfrica ndidzo dzakwanisa kuita izvi. MuAfrica yose, vanhu zvikamu zviviri nechidimbu kubva muzana kana kuti 2, 5% ndivo vabayiwa nhomba zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 60% kubva kunyika dzakabudirira. Kunyangwe hazvo nyanzvi munyika nekunze dziri kuti zvave pachena kuti vanenge vabayiwa nhomba kaviri kana katatu vane mukana wakakura wekuti vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vasafe, vanhu vashoma zvikuru vemuAfrica havana kubayiwa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Vamwe vachiri kutya kutivanogona kutadza kuita mbereko vamwe vachiti chitendero hachivabvumidze zvose izvi zviri kutenderedzwa pamadandemutande akasiyana siyana pasi rose. Vamwe vanhu vari kushaya chivimbo nenhomba vachiti vamwe vakabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri kana nhatu vari kungorwara. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa, Muzvinafundo Davison Sangweme vatiwo kushanduka kwechirwere kana kuti virus ndiko kunopa kuti chiiuye nedzimwe mhando chobata vakabayiwa nhomba ava. Ko huurumende yeZimbabwe ingaite sei kuti vanhu vakawanda vabayiwe nhomba? Tabvunza mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike vanoti hurumende inofanira kunyengetedza vanhu kuti vabayiwe nhomba. Nhomba muAfrica dziri kuuyawo kuburikidza nesangano reAfrican Union pasi pechirongwa chinonzi Vaccine Acquisition Trust kana kuti AVAT nechimwe cheWorld Health Organization chinonzi COVAX. Asi munyika dzakaita seNigeria, Malawi neSouth Sudan, dzimwe nhomba dzakapiswa sezvo mazuva akatarwa kuti dzinge dzashandiswa ainge adarika dzichiri mumatura. African Union iri kuchema chema kuti dzimwe nhomba dziri kuita zvekuraswa kuAfrica. Sangano iri rinotiwo chimwe chiri kupa kuti zvinetse kubaya vanhu nhomba inyaya yekuti dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica hadzina zvimwe zvinodiwa mukushandiswa mukubaya nhomba zvakaita semafacemask, donje nemotokari dzekutakurisa nhomba kuendesa kune mamwe matunhu kanawo mafiriji ekuchengetera dzimwe nhomba. Sangano reTony Blair Institute for Global Change rinoti nhomba dzinosvika zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana dziri muAfrica hadzina kushandiswa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Mukuru weAfrica Centres for Disease Control VaJohn Nkengasonga vanoti dzimwe nyika hadzisiwo kana kutouya kuzotora mishonga kumatura avo. Asiwo vakawanda vanoti nyika dzakabudirira ndidzo dzakonzera dambudziko kunyanya nekusada kubatsira dzevarombo nenhomba. No media source currently available

column2: Vabereki Vane Vana Vane "Autism" Votarisana neMatambudziko Makukutu
column3: Vabereki vevana vanoita matambudziko pakutamba nevamwe kana kuita zvinhu zvinotarisirwa pazera ravo kana kuti vane "autism" vanoti vatarisana nedambudziko guru pakuriritira vana ava. Vanoti hupenyu hwavo hwakaomarara nepamusana pekuti vana vane autism havakwanisi kuita zvinhu zvinoitwa nevamwe vechidiki kana kushamwaridzana navo. Baba Luke Pencil veku Malbereign muHarare vane mwana wavo ane makore gumi ane autism. Baba Pencil, avo vane makore makumi mana nematanhatu ekuberekwa vanoti dambudziko guru rinosangana nevabereki ava nderekushaya ruzivo pamusoro pe autism. “Izvi hazvina kunge zvabatwa nana chiremba kunyange mwana akarwara kwenguva refu ndichienda kunana chiremba vakasiyana siyana nekunana mukoti vakasiyana siyana.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Pakashayikwa kana mumwechete akatibatsira chaizvo kuti mwana wenyu condition yake inonzi autism. Aiti akachema zvainzi ah, baba hamuzivi mwana anongochema, zvinoreva kuti haasi kunzwa zvakanaka kana kuti muri kumuitira zvaasingadi. Asi uchiedza kutsanangura kuti aiwa, mwana uyu pane zvaanoita zvandisinganzwisise zvakafanana nekuti dzimwe nguva anoramba kupfeka bhutsu, dzimwe nguva anoramba kugerwa musoro.” Baba Pencil vanoti vabereki vakawanda vanokatyamadzwa nekugumbuka zvikuru pavanoona kuti mwana wavo ari kukura zvakasiyana nevamwe vana. Vanoti ivo vakaita mhanza yekukurumidza kuziva zvaiitika kumwana wavo. “Vana ava vanenge vane ma censory issues anenge akavhiringika, haana kuita seevamwe vana. Saka kana achigerwa ane zvaanonzwa zvisinganzwiwi nevamwe vana vose saka achiita muitiro waanoita iwowo.” Vatiwo, “ Saka izvozvo ndizvo zvakaita kuti tinzwisise kuti ho mwana wedu condition yaaninayo inonzi autism. Izvozvo ndinoda kuti nditsinhire kuti izvi handina kuzviwana kunana chiremba kana kunana mukoti. Ndakatozvinzwawo kune mumwe mubereki akanga ari affected, akatoenda pa radio akanotaura. Ndopatazowana information yakadaro.” Baba Pencil vanoti murume nemudzimai vanofanira kubatana kwete kunongedzerana kana mwana asangana nedambudziko. “Saka izvozvo zvakatipa simba rekuti kuti mwana wedu aite zviri nani, tikwanise kumumaneja, regai tinorisecha.” Vatizve, “ Tikabva taenda pa internet. Iripo information pa internet. Ukaiwana zvinoita kuti umaneje mwana wako zviri nani. Zvinoita kuti kuwadzana kwako naye kuve kuri nani, kuwadzana kwake nenharaunda yakamukomberedza kuve nani.” Amai Emma Muchefa avo vane mwana ane autism, vanoshandira hurumende vari pa Domboshava training centre. Vanoti madzimai mazhinji ane vana vane autism anoshungurudzika zvikuru. “Vazhinji vana baba vanotiza, uye hama hadzizvitambiri. Kazhinji burden inosiyirwa amai, seni as a mother of three, two vari disabled murume akabva aenda ndikasara ndiri a single mother.” Amai Muchefa vatizve, “ Saka dambudziko rinenge rave rekuti unenge uchida kuenda kubasa, uri kuda ku physio nemwana iyeye, uri kuda zvekudya uri kuda zvekupfeka zvevana ivavo, uri kuda medication. Saka kazhinji kacho uri kuda zvekufambisa, hauna kana motor kana wheel-chair.” Amai Tendai Kamutero veku Domboshava vane mwana wavo ane autism. Vakatozozviziva mwana uyu ave nemakore matatu kuti ndizvo zvaari. Amai Kamutero vanoti kuriritira mwana uyu zvinovanetsa semunhu ari pamushando. “Pandinoenda kubasa, munhu anosara naye haanzwisisi zvaanoda nekuti haatauri.” Vatizve, “Sign language haaizivi, haakwanisi ku communicator naye. Asi iye takatozomudzidza kuti kana ave nenzara kana chikafu chiri paanosvikira anotora ega. Kana kuti ukaona akukudhonza, isaini yekuti ane nzara.” Amai Constance Mandishona vane vana vana, uye vaviri vavo vakaremara. Amai Mandishona, avo vanoshanda muhurumende vakapihwa imba yekugara kuMufakose mushure mekunge vakuru vavo vaona kutambura kwavaiita. Vanoti vakaremara vanofanira kusimudzirana. “Ipapo ndisati ndapihwa imba ndakanga ndisina pfungwa dzekuti I can advocate kana kumiririrawo kana kutsigira munhu akaremara.” Amai Mandishona vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Ndakazogara pasi ndikazvibvunza kuti, hongu ndamiririrwa, ko vari kunze uko vasina anovamiririrawo tochiita sei? Nekuti inini pandakabatsirwa nemba, Permanent secretary mai Nhekairo vakandiudza kuti, Cony, dai vana vako wanga wakavachengetesa kumaraini, vachiita kunge musara pavana, I wasn’t going to assist you. But pese patinotaura unotungamidza vana vako kumberi kuti ma’am vangu vazodai nekuti hauna kunyara navo saka tazokudai. Ndakakwanisa kubatsira vamwe vabereki vairi. Mumwe wacho anonzi mai Boora anoshanda ku President’s department. Ane mwana wakewo ane autism. Ndikamuti akoma nyaya yangu yakamira yakadai, inini ndakawanawo imba. Imimi can you not write a letter mukwanisewo kuti mubatsirwe? Vakapihwa flat ku Ardbennie.” Dr Cotilda Mangoma mugari wemuHarare uye vanofamba vachipa dzidziso pamusoro pe autism. Vanoti vabereki vevana vakadai vanofanira kushingaira kutsvaga ruzivo kuitira kuti vana vavo vave nepundutso. “Inini ndiri kuona kuti zvakakosha kuve neruzivo mukati memhuri nemhaka yekuti chinhu chawave kuziva unoziva kuti unochibata sei, unochibata nemutoo upi.” Dr Mangoma vanotizve, “Saka ini ndinoti vana baba nana mai vane vana vavasinganzwisisi kuti ingave autism here kana kwete zviri nani vatsvake rubatsiro kubva ku clinic level. Kana vabva ikoko voudzwa kuti enda ku rehabilitation. Rehabilitation yoferefeta kuti itype ipi ye autism, pamusana pekuti akasiyana siyana, akawanda. Nekuonekwa kunoita mwana, nemaitiro ake unobva waudzwa kuti aiwa ichi ndechakati, then rubatsiro rwobva rwauya. Angave anogona nezvemaoko, angave munhu ari bright kuchikoro, zvese zvinobatsirika along those lines.” VaPardon Gonorashe mushandi wehurumende ane hunyanzvi hwekubatsira veruzhinji, kunyanya vanotambura kuti vave neraramo iri nani. Vanoti vabereki vevana vane autism vanofanira kuve padyo nepavanowana ruzivo pamusoro pe autism.“Saka paida kuti patange pawanikwa centre yekuti vanhu vari kumaruwa, vangadai vari kuBinga, Muzarabani kana kuti kuMberengwa vakaona kuti vane vana vane autism they can refer vana ivavo kuno.” Vatizve,“Tikashevedza ma parents vari kumaruwa vanogona kuuya kuma campaign akaita seaya.” VaGonorashe vanoti hurumende inofanira kuisa mari yakawanda gore rega rega kuzvirongwa zvakanangana ne autism. “Hakuna zviri kunyanya kuitwa about disability as a whole.” Vatizve, “Then mukazopinda mudisability sector imomo munozoona kuti autism is relegated kuzasizasi kune other forms of disability. Saka ngatitorei disability sector se ine mari shoma mu budget. Then yapihwa mari shoma already, autism iri kuzasizasi zvekuti ikoko kunosvika one cent. Ndosaka kune vanhu vashomanana vari kutari nezve autism as a right.” Sangano guru rezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation rinoti pavanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu ega ega mumwechete wavo anenge aine autism. Vamwe vanhu vane autism vanokwanisa kuzviriritira asi vakawanda vavo vanotozoda kuchengetwa hupenyu hwavo hwese. No media source currently available  .

column2: ‘GEMS TAVE KUMBERI’
column3: uyo ange ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHarare SHASHA yemutambo wenetball inotambira chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaGems — Adelaide Thandeka Muskwe — uyo aive kuLiverpool uko aimirira nyika kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup, anoti ave kumberi kwehanzvadzi yake, Admiral, uyo anotambira nhabvu maWarriors.   MaGems akanyora nhoroondo yekuve chikwata chekutanga chenetball chakanokwikwidza kuWorld Cup uye ndokutamba zvinonwisa mvura apo akakunda zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Sri Lanka, Barbados neNorthern Ireland.   Adelaide naAdmiral mapatya uye vose vakaberekerwa muno ndokuzoenda kunogara kuEngland uko kwavakakurira.   Mukukura kwavo, Adelaide aitamba netball kozoti Admiral ari mutambi wenhabvu. Admiral iye zvino anotambira Leicester City inove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu muEngland.   Muchinda uyu haana kuenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt asi akambotamba mumakwikwi eCosafa Castle Cup kuSouth Africa nguva yadarika.   Adelaide anotambirawo chikwata cheSeven Stars kuEngland uye anoti ari kunzwa manyuku-nyuku nekuwaniswa kwaakaita mukana wekumirira nyika kumutambo weVitality World Cup.   Adelaide anoti anogara achitsigira hanzvadzi yake kumitambo yake yenhabvu uye akafara zvikuru kuona Admiral achiuyawo kuzomutsigira apo maGems aikweshana neNew Zealand.   Admiral pamwe nevabereki vavo vaive muchaunga nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rapera pamberi vachitsigira Adelaide pamwe nemaGems apo aitamba neNew Zealand mumutambo uyo akakundwa 36-79.   “Hanzvadzi yangu ndiyo ine mukurumbira asi ndinonzwa mufaro chaizvo kumuona achiuya kuzonditsigira mumitambo yangu.   “Ini kubva kare ndogara ndiri kunhandare dzakasiyana ndichimuona achitamba nhabvu saka tinotsigirana tese mitambo yedu uye vabereki vedu havashaikwe kumitambo yedu, saka ndinonzwa kufara ndichiona kuti rutsigiro tinarwo. Isu maGems tave kumberi nekuti takakwanisa kukwikwidza kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup,” anodaro Adelaide.   Zvakadai, chikwata chemaGems chakapedza makwishu aya chiri pechisere zvichitevera kukundwa kwachakazoitwa mitambo yacho miviri yekupedzisira apo wekutanga chakakundwa 43-59 neMalawi kozoti 58-47 neUganda.

column2: Masoja Opomerwa Mhosva Yekuda Kuita Kafiramberi Vagari Vari Pamamwe Mapurazi ekuChegutu
column3: Vamwe vevanhu vakagariswa patsva vanosanganisira vaimbove varwi vehondo yerusununguko vanoti vari kushungurudzwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti masoja mumapurazi ari pedyo neChegutu. Vakagariswa patsva ava vanoti masoja ainge akapfeka mbatya dzechiuto uye vaine motokari dzainge dzisina manhamba vakavashungurudza vachiti vabve pamapurazi eDorith neStanley pedyo neChegutu kana kuti vanoitwa kafiramberi. VaLivingstone Nyamadzawo avo vakanga vari muchiuto vanoti masoja mashanu akasvika pamba pavo akavataurira kuti vabve pamunda nekuti vakasabva vaizodzoka kuzovauraya. VaNyamadzawo avo vane tsamba kana kuti Offer Letter yepamunda pavari vanoti masoja aya akati havana basa nevezvematongerwo enyika sezvo vakabvisa vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Mumwe mugari VaMathew Paul vanoti masoja akauya kumba kwavo akafanana nevakauraya vanhu vatanhatu muHarare sezvo vainge vasingade kuzivikanwa kuti ndivanaani. VaPaul vanoti mumwe musoja akazvivisa saMuswere Moyo uye vakanomhan’ara kumapurisa emuChegutu. Amai Mairesi Nyirenda vanoti masoja akati pane vanhu vashanu vavari kuda kuuraya nekuda kwenzvimbo yavakagara. Amai Nyirenda vanoti vave kutya kusiya vana vavo vari vega nekuda kwekuita kwemasoja aya. VaNyamadzawo vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo sezvo vakambobviswa papurazi ravo gore rapera asi vakadzoserwa nematare. Sachigaro wekomiti yezveminda mudunhu reChegutu VaTariro Tom, vanoti havazive nezvehurongwa hwekubvisa vanhu pavagere sezvo pari kuitwa wongororo yekuti ndiani ane munda uye wakakura sei nedonzvo rekudimura mimwe minda ichipihwa vasina. VaTom vanoti parizvino komiti iyi iri mudunhu reHurungwe vachiti masoja aya ari kuita zvisiri pamutemo. Mumiriri weChegutu muparamende VaDexter Nduna avo vanonzi vaishoropodzwa nemasoja aya vanoti vanhu ava havasi masoja chaiwo sezvo vari kupesana nezviri kukurudzirwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti zvinhu zvese zviitwe pamutemo. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West Inspector Clemence Mabgweazara vati titaure naAmai Charity Charamba avo vanga vasingadavire mbozhanhare yavo sezvo ivo vasingabvumirwe kutaura nyaya dzinechekuita nemasoja kune vatori venhau. Mutauriri wemauto VaEverson Mugwisi vati tivanyorere tsambambozha kuti vaferefete nyaya iyi. Asi pataenda kumhepo vange vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo iyi.

column2: Nyanzvi Dzoshushikana Zvichitevera Kufa kweVanhu Vane Covid-19 Zvisingazivikanwe Kuti Vane Chirwere Ichi
column3: Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzinoti hadzikurudzire kuti vanhu vazivikanwe kuti vanga vaine chirwere cheCOVID-19 mushure mekunge munhu afa sezviri kuitika munyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti izvi zvinodziviririka chete kana hurumende ikaongorora vanhu vakawanda kusanganisira vese vanenge varwara. Magwaro anobudiswa nebazi rezvehutano pamusoro pechirwere cheCOVID-19 anoratidza kuti kune vanhu vanozozivikanwa kuti vanga vaine hutachiona hwechirwere ichi ivo vanhu vacho vatoshaya. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vati kufa kwevanhu vasati vazivikanwa kuti vari kunetsekana neyi zvinhu zvinoisa vashandi vezvehutano panjodzi. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomiririra vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vaudza Studio7 kuti sesangano vanogarokurudzira hurumende kuti iise zvikwanisiro muzvipatara zvayo zvinoita kuti vezvehutano vaongorore munhu wese zvake anotsvaka rubatsiro munyaya yezvehutano zvisinei nekuti anoratidza kuti ane chirwere cheCOVID-19 here kana kwete. VaDongo vanoti sevashandi vezvehutano vanonetsekanawo nevanhu vanozobatwa chirwere ichi ivo vatoshaya. VaDongo vanoti kusavapo kwezvinoshandiswa kuti vana mukoti vazvidzivirire kuri kuisa nhengo dzavo dzakawanda panjodzi. Vatiwo sangano ravo riri kushushikana kuti vakoti vari kubatwa nehutachiona vari pabasa vari kuwanda. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo kuongorora vanhu vakawanda kuti vane chirwere here kana kuti kwete ndiyo chete yekuti hurumende idzivirire kufa kwevanhu vakawanda pamwe nekupararira kwehutachiona hweCoronavirusm uhwo hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu ava vanenge vaongororwa vachiri vapenyu asi vanofa vasati vaziva zvinenge zvabuda muongororo dzinenge dzaitwa. VaMangwiro vati izvi zvinoitika sezvo nyika isina michina inobudisa ongororo idzi chiripocho. Vachibvunzwa kuti izvi hazviisi here hutano hwevashandi vehutano panjodzi, VaMangwiro vati vashandi ava vari kutora varwere vese vanouya kuzvipatara sevanhu vane COVID-19 kusvika zvinenge zvabuda muongororo zvazivikanwa nekudaro vanenge vakapfeka zvekudzivirira. Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti vashandi vanenge vakapfeka zvekuzvidzivirira, vashandi vezvehutano, kusanganisira VaDongo, vanoti izvi hazvisi izvo zviri kuitika muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa izvi zviri zvishoma zvakanyanya. VaDongo vanoti kushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro imwe yenyaya dziri kupa kuti vashandi vezvehutano varambe kuenda kubasa. Sangano ravana chiremba vakuru reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association rakazivisa hurumende svondo rino kuti inofanirwa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muzvipatara, kutadza kwayo vanenge voramwa mabasa. No media source currently available

column2: Vatambi baiwai nhomba: SRC
column3: SANGANO reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) riri kukurudzira vatambi vemitambo yakasiyana kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti zvigobatsira mukuderedza kupararira kwechirwere ichi pamwe nekudzoswa kwemitambo nekuchimbidza.   Mitambo yose pari zvino yakambomiswa nekuda kweCovid-19 kunze kweyezvikwata zvenyika chete inosanganisira yeZimbabwe Cricket apo maChevrons ari kubandana neBangladesh mumitambo yeOne Day International, Twenty20 Series neTest match series.   Muchinyorwa, akafanobata chigaro chadirector-general weSRC – Sebastain Garikai – anoti zvakakosha kuti vatambi vose vaibaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19.   “Kunyanzvi dzemitambo zvakakosha kuti tikoshese chirongwa chekubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 sezviri kuitwa neveruzhinji nekuti zvinobatsira mukuderedza kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Kana chirwere ichi chikarwiswa, zvinobatsira zvakare pane zvatiri kuedza kuita mukudzosa mitambo yose, ichidzoka iine vatsigiri asi vari vashoma,” anodaro Garikai.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Tichitarisana nekumiswa kwemitambo yeChibuku Super Cup, zvakaratidza kukosha kwekubaiwa majekiseni eCovid-19 nekuti zvikwata zvaive nevanhu vakawanda vakabatwa neCovid-19 ndizvo zvaive nevashomawo vakabaiwa.”   Garikai anoti pari zvino SRC pamwe nemasangano akasiyana vari kuongorora mafambiro ari kuita zvinhu munyika maringe nedenda iri.   “Tiri kuongorora zvose zvinenge zvichiitika kuti todzosa sei mitambo, naizvozvo tichange tichiongorora svondo rega-rega tichiita hurukuro negurukota revechidiki nerezveutano nekurerwa kwevana,” anodaro.   Garikai anoti pari zvino mitambo yenhabvu haikwanisike kuti idzoke asi hunge kana zvikwata zvemuPSL zvikatevedzera chirongwa chebio-secure bubble izvo zvinoreva kuti vatambi venhabvu, hutungamiri hwemutambo uyu nevaridzi vepembe vanenge vachigara pavo voga kusina veruzhinji.   “Nhabvu pari zvino inogona kudzoka chete kana chirongwa chebio-secure bubble chiri kutevedzerwa izvo zvinoona vatambi venhabvu, vatungamiri vezvikwata nevaridzi vepembe vose vachigara pamwe chete vasingasange neruzhinji. Izvi ndizvo zviri kuitwa nevecricket nerugby, ndiko kusaka mitambo yavo iri kutenderwa kutambwa.   “Tose tinoda kuona kukasika kudzoka kwemitambo. Asi kudzoka kwayo kunofanirwa kunge kuchienderana nesainzi, mitemo yeWorld Health Organization (WHO) nemitemo yeHurumende,” anodaro.

column2: PTUZ Inoti Hurumende Yasarirwa neMazuva Matatu Chete Kuti Varairidzi Varamwe Mabasa
column3: Rimwe sangano rinomiririra vadzidzisi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rayambira hurumende kuti yasarirwa nemazuva matatu chete kuti igadzirise zvichemo zvevarairidzi. Izvi zvinotevera mazuva gumi nemana akapiwa hurumende nevashandi vayo ekuti igadzirise zvinhu, kukundikana kwayo voramwa mabasa. Vashandi vehurumende vari kuda kuti vawedzerwe mari dzemihoro, uye kuti vatambiriswe mihoro yavo nemari dzekuAmerica. Mutungamiriri wesangano iri, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti hurumende haidi kuteerera zvichemo zvevarairirdzi asi inoda kusvitsa vashandi pakuramwa mabasa, zvinove izvo zvichaitika kutanga musi weMuvhuro svondo rinouya kana vakasawirirana pakupera kwezuva neChishanu svondo chino. Doctor Zhou vanoti varairidzi vakawanda havana kuenda kumabasa kubva svondo rapera sezvo vakasanganawo nekuratidzira kwemazuva matatu kwakashevedzerwa nesangano reZCTU. Vanoti nhengo dzavo dzakanga dzagara dzisingaende kumabasa mazuva ose sezvo dzakasunga kuti dzichange dzichishanda zuva rimwe chete pasvondo kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. No media source currently available

column2: Tino Kadewere anyora nhoroondo
column3: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neReal Club Deportivo Mallorca yekuSpain — Tinotenda Philana Kadewere — akapemberera kunyora kwaakaita nhoroondo yekuve wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kutamba nhabvu muligi reSpanish LaLiga.   Kadewere akatamba mutambo wake wekutanga wemuLaLiga svondo radarika apo chikwata chake chakasangana neGetafe mumutambo uyo Mallorca yakakundwa 2-0.   Mumutambo uyu, Kadewere akatanga ari pabhenji ndokuzopinda kwapera maminitsi 84 achitsiva Lee Kang-In, chizvarwa chekuSouth Korea.   Izvi zvakaona Kadewere achinyora nhoroondo yekuve mutambi wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kutambira muLaLiga Santander.   Svondo rino, Kadewere – uyo ari kuMallorca nechikwereti kubva kuOlympique Lyon yekuFrance – akanyora papeji rake repaFacebook kuti: “Nhoroondo yanyorwa, record yekutamba mutambo wekutanga weLaLiga, ndinokutendai RCD Mallorca.”   Paakaenda kuMallorca munaNyamavhuvhu 2020, Kadewere akasvika akakuvara izvo zvakaona achipedza nguva refu achimborapwa zvakamutadzisa kutambira chikwata chake chitsva ichi.   Paakazopora, mutambo waKadewere wekut anga achitambira Mallorca waive weCopa del Rey wakatambwa munaMbudzi uyo Mallorca yakakunda CD Autol 6-0.    Tino Kadewere   Mumutambo uyu, Kadewere akatanga ari pabhenji ndokupinda kwapera maminitsi 46 uye ndokunwisawo.   Akazotambazve mumwe mutambo weCopa del Rey munaZvita 2020 apo Mallorca yakakunda Real Union 1-0. Mumutambo uyu, akatanga ari pabhenji zvekare ndokuzopinda kwapera maminitsi 77 achitsiva Lee Kang-In.   Zvichitevera kunyora kwaakaita nhoroondo svondo radarika, vatsigiri venhabvu vakawanda vakamhanya kukorokotedza Kadewere vachimutumira mashoko papeji rake.   Muimbi Romeo Gasa akanyora achiti: “Makorokoto, ramba uchishanda nesimba uye uchitamba nesimba zvaunokwanisa.”   Panashe Garande anoti: “Tinodada newe! Tinokushuvira zvakanaka chete Tino.”   Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu anonzi Tinaye Gumbati anoti ari kuisa Kadewere muminamato yake kuti akwanise kutamba mitambo yakawanda.   “Makorokoto Tino ndakakuona. Tiri kukunamatira utambe mitambo yakawanda wena,” anodaro Gumbati.   Vamwe vatambi vakanyora nhoroondo vanosanganisira Peter Ndlovu uyo akaita wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe nemuAfrica kutamba nhabvu muEnglish Premier League mugore ra1992 apo aitambira Coventry kuchiti Benjani Mwaruwari akaita wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kutamba nhabvu muFrench Ligue 1 achitambira AJ Auxerre.   Murairidzi weFC Platinum, Norman Mapeza, akaita mutambi wekutanga wemuno kutamba kuTurkey uko akatambira Galatasaray kuchiti Knowledge Musona ndiye akaita wekutanga kutambira muGermany Bundesliga apo aitambira TSG Hoffinheim.   Mushakabvu Freddy Mukwesha ndiye akaita wekutanga kubva muno kutambira kuPortugal uko akatambira Sporting de Braga.

column2: Makambani Akawanda Okundikana Kuvhura Gore Rino Mamwe Achivharwa?
column3: Gore rino rinonzi harina kutanga zvakanaka mumakambani akawanda munyika sezvo mamwe akakundikana kuvhura kana kuti akaderedza huwandu hwevashandi kubva pakatanga gore rino ra2015. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi vemumabhanga reZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti mabhanga gore rapera chete akarasikirwa nevashandi chiuru chimwe chete kubva muvashandi zviuru zvitanhatu zvaive zviri pamabasa. VaMutasa vanoti gore rino chete vashandi vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu vatorasikirwa nemabasa zvichitevera kuvhara kwebhanga reAllied Bank. Sangano iri rinotiwo kana nhaurirano dzekuedza kuponesa rimwe bhanga dziri kuitwa dzikakundikana mukati memazuva gumi ari kutevera, zvinenge zvoreva kuti vamwe vashandi zana nemakumi matatu vanenge vorasikirwa nemabasa avo zvakare. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanotiwo dambudziko rekurasikirwa kwevanhu nemabasa harina kubata mabhanga chete asi kuti rakabata makambani ose ari kutatarika. VaChitambara vanoti dambudziko guru ndere kushaikwa kwemari iri kutenderera munyika, uye kusajeka kwemitemo yezvemabhizimusi. Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rinotiwo hurongwa hwekuvandudza mitemo yemabasa huri kuda kuitwa nehurumende huchatoita kuti vashandi vakawanda varasikirwe nebasa sezvo huchipa vashandirwi masimba ekupinza kana kuburitsa munhu basa paanodira. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende, Vana Chiremba Vanotadza Zvakare Kuwirirana
column3: Vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vasangano nevamiriri vehurumende kuti vaedze kugadzirisa dambudziko rekuramwa mabasa iro rave nemazuvagumi nemashanu. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vanachiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association, Dr. Edgar Munatsi vanoti musangano uyu, semimwe misangano yanga ichiitwa mumasvondo adarika ose aya, hauna chawaburitsa zvakare. Vanoti hurumende yazivisa kuti haikwanise kuvabhadhara mari yavari kuda pavanoshanda usiku, kana kuti on-call allowances, sezvo isina mari, asi inokwanisa kuvapa iri pasi pane yavari kuda, danho ravanoti varamba kutambira Dr. Munatsi vamboshevedzwawo nevakuru vemapurisa, avo vanoti vanga vachida kunzwisisa nezvekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba navanamukoti uku. Dr. Munatsi vanoti musangano wavo nevakuru vemapurisa uyu wafamba zvakanaka, uye panga pasina kutyisidzirana. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano revagari vekuChitungwiza, reChitungwiza Residents' Trust, rinoti richatora matanho ekuenda kumatare edzimhosva kana hurumende pamwechete neHealth Services Board vakasagadzirisa matambudziko ari muzvipatara nekukasika. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaMarvelous Kumalo vanoti kusagadziriswa kwematambudziko aya kutyora kodzero dzevanhu mukuwaniswa kwavo hutano, sezviri mubumbiro remitemo. No media source currently available

column2: Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVakapondwa muNguva yeGukurahundi Vosungwa paZuva reKubatana kweZanu PF nePF Zapu
column3: Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoto vanhu vatatu vesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevane hama dzakafa kana kukuvadzwa munguva yeGukurahundi reIbhetshu Likazulu vacharara mujeri nhasi. ZLHR yanyora padandemutande rayo reTwitter kuti vatatu ava vasungwa pedyo nechiumbwa chamushakabvu Joshua Nkomo vakanzi vatyora weCrimina; Code vachinzi vainge vachida kuratidzira zvisiri pamutemo. Vange vakatakura chinyorwa chakanzu, “The power of the memory & seeking justice & healing enf Genocide off Gukurahundi” Mapurisa ange afumobata jongwe muromo achirambidza vanhu kuungana pedyo nechiumbwa ichi. VaMbuso Fuzwayo, munyori mukuru wesangano reIbhetshu Likazulu vatenda kuti vanhu vatatu vasungwa pachirongwa chavo chanhasi ichi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike. Asi mumwe mukuru wemapurisa ange achitungamira chiwakata chemapurisa chamisa chiitiko ichi uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Inspector Dube ati ange asingadi kuti vanhu vaungane nekuti hurongwa hwange huchida kuitwa uhu hwange husina kubvumidzwa nemapurisa. Studio 7 yaona gwaro rinoratidza kuti veIbhetshu Likazulu vakanyorera mapurisa sezvinodiwa pamutemo asi vakarambidzwa kuti vasaite gungano iri. Vanhuwo zvavo nevamwe vange vachida kutorwa mifananidzo pachiumbwa chamushakabvu Nkomo pamwe nevatori venhau vange vachiita basa ravo vanosanganisira veStudio 7, vaudzwa nemapurisa aya kuti vabve panzvimbo iyi zvisinei kuti vange vaine magwaro avo ekuita basa, zvinove zvashorwa nemumwe mutori wenhau Lulu Brenda Harris uyo anoshandira bepanhau repadandemutande reCITE. Mutungamiri wesangano reZINASU VaBenoni Ncube avo vati vange vauya kuzopa rutsigiro rwavo pachiitiko ichi vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvaitwa nemapurisa zvinoratidza kuti hurumende haizi kuzadzikisa zvainoreva panyaya yeGukurahundi.
