Munyori webato reZAPU mudunhu reBulawayo avo vakarwawo hondo yerusununguko vari pasi pemauto eZIPRA VaVivian Siziba vatiwo zvaitwa nemapurisa zvinoratidza kuti hapana kubatana kwechokwadi munyika. Asi vachitaura munguva pfupi yapfuura mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vati ivo nehurumende yavo vaive vazvipira kugadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi. Nyaya yekurambidza vanhu murunyararo iri kushorwa neAfrican Commission On Human and People’s Rights negungano reUnited Nations. Masangano aya anoti kuratidzira murunyararo ikodzero iri mubumbiro remutemo wenyika uye Zimbabwe yakanyorerana nenyika dzepasi rino zvibvumirano zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

column2: Vatungamiri muZimbabwe neAfrica Voyambirwa Kuti Vatonge Zvakanaka Kuti Mauto Asarambe Achipidigure Hurumende
column3: Nemusi weSvondo mauto emuGuinea achitungamirwa naColonel Mamady Doumbouya akapidigura hurumende yaVaAlpha Conde. VaConde avo vakavandudza bumbiro remutemo kuti varambe vachitungamira nyika iyi vakasarudzwa gore rapera musarudzo dzainge dziine mutauro wakanyanya. Izvi zvave kureva kuti muAfrica mauto apindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muAfrica achiyedza kana kutopidigura hurumende kanodarika mazana maviri. Burkina Faso ndiyo ine mauto akapindira zvakanyanya kanosvika gumi ichiteverwa neNigeria kasere. Mauto akapidigurawo hurumende muZimbabwe muna 2017 kanova kekutanga zvichiitika munyika. Panyika dzemuAfrica makumi mashanu nenhatu, nyika makumi mana dzine mauto akapindira mukupidigura hurumende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zviri kuitika izvi zviri kudzosera Africa kumashure munyaya dzehutongo hwejekerere kunyangwe yange yambopemberera zvakaitika kuZambia uko kwakatambidzanwa masimba murunyararo. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti vatungamiri venyika yeZimbabwe neAfrica vanofanira kukoshesa zvido zvevanhu kuti mauto asapindire munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF uye vaimbotungamira bato rinopikisa reDare vaGilbert Dzikiti vanoti chakakonzera kupindira kwemauto kuGuinea inyaya yekupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muAfrica kunoita France. No media source currently available

column2: VaChamisa Vanotaura Zvakadzama Pamusoro peChirwere cheCovid-19
column3: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vaita musangano padandemudande vachitenda vanhu vose vari kushanda panguva ino nyika yakatarisana nedenda reCovid-19. VaChamisa vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kupanga mazano nenyanzvi kuitira kuti ipedze denda reCovid-19. VaChamisa vati chirwere cheCovid-19 chinoda kuti vana veZimbabwe vaite muonerapamwe kuitira kuti vakwanise kukunda chirwere ichi. VaChamisa vati bato ravo rinotenda zvikuru zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika izvo zviri kubatsira kusimudzira zvipatara zvemunyika apo nyika yakatarisana nechirwere chedzihwa mupengo ichi. VaChamisa vatiwo havaoni zvine huchenjeri kuvhara nyika yese vakati vanoona sekuti zvingabatsire zvakanyanya kana kukaitwa tsvakurudzo kwoonekwa kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chakawandira nzvimbo dzipi, kovharwa idzodzo. VaChamisa vati hurumende inofanirwa kutanga zvirongwa zvekuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vari mumajere pamwe nekuona kuti vanhu vanopara mhosva diki vapihwa mitongo isingavaise mumajeri senzira yekudzivirira kuapararira kwechirwere ichi mumajeri umo vanhu vari kugara vakamanikidzana. VaChamisa vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti ibatsire vanhu vari kutambura panguva ino vachiti vana veZimbabwe vakawanda vanorarama nekuzvishandira nekudaro kuvharwa kwenyika kuri kuvasiya vari parumananzombe. VaChamisa vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iite tsvakurudzo dzakazara vanhu vasati vatanga kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe muongoroi wezvematongerwo enyika, uye vachishanda nesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vati mashoko ataurwa naVaChamisa ekubatana nekuitwa kwetsvakurudzo pasati patorwa matanho ekudzivirira chirwere ichi akakosha. VaDhliwayo vatsigirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti panguva ino nyika iri panguva ye National Lockdown, vanhu vawaniswe rubatsiro. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende nemashoko aVaChamisa aya sezvo nharembozha dzemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, yanga ichinetsa kubata. Asi vachitaura kunyika neMugovera, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo vanhu vashande pamwe chete kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. VaMnangagwa vakavimbisawo rubatsiro rwavakati rwuchange rwuchipihwa veruzhinji, asi havana kutaura kuti rubatsiro urwu rwuchapiwa vanhu rinhi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano pamwe nedzematongerwo enyika dzarumbidza zvaitwa naVaChamisa zvekushandisa dandemutande reFacebook kutaura neveruzhinji dzichiti izvi zvinoita kuti vanhu vasaungane munguva ino yechirwere cheCovid-19. Mashoko aVaChamisa ndeekutanga gore rino vachitura mashoko kunyika yose. No media source currently available

column2: VaMnangagwa Vanosangana neVechidiki veBato Ravo reZanu-PF
column3: Mutungamiri weZanu PF VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neChitatu vakasangana nevatungamiri vevechidiki vebato ravo muHarare vakati boka revechidiki iri harisi kunyatsoonekwa mashandiro aro panyaya dzekukwezva vechidiki kuti vave nechekuita mune mamiriro ezveupfumi hwenyika. VaMnangagwa, avo vapinda musangano veNational Assembly yevechidiki ava, vatiwo vechidiki ava ndivo vanofanirwa kudzivirira pamwe nekusimudzira gwara remusangano weZanu PF. Vatiwo vakatambira chikumbiro chevechidiki chekuti bazi roga roga rive neboka rinoona nezvezvido zvevechidiki, vachiti vachagara pasi kuti vazeye nezvechikumbiro ichi. Munyori anoona nezvevechidiki kuZanu PF, VaPupurai Togarepi vanoti musangano uyu wanga wakakoshera vechidiki zvakanyanya sezvo uchivapa mukana wekusangana nemutungamiri wenyika. VaTogarepi vanotiwo zvabuda mumusangano uyu zvichatakurwa nevechidiki vodzokera nazvo kumatunhu kwavo uko vachanozvishandisa mukusimudzira musangano wavo pamwe nenyika. No media source currently available

column2: Vatsigiri veZanu PF Vofadzwa neKugadzwa kwaVaMnangagwa
column3: Vamwe vatsigiri vebato reZanu-PF vanogara kuTynawald North, musha uri pedyo neMt. Hampden muHarare vanoti vari kufara zvikuru nekutoreswa mhiko kwakaitwa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neSvondo kuti vatungamire nyika kwemakore mashanu anotevera. Muhurukuro yakaitwa nevagari vemunzvimbo iyi neStudio 7, vakawanda vakaratidza kufara kukuru nenyaya yekugadzwa zviri pamutemo kwaVaMnangagwa. Amai Grace Mukonori mutsigiri webato iri vakaita zvokusvetuka vachitamba nemufaro vachipembedza chiitiko ichi. Vanoti vane chokwadi chokuti vechidiki vave kuzowana mabasa kubudikidza nehutungamiri hwaVaMnangagwa. Amai Mukonori vakaendera mberi vachiti vanhu ngavagamuchire zviripo nekuti Vatungamiri vanobva kuna Mwari. Amai Auxillia Mudhonga vanobva kuChirumhanzu vanoti vakawanda vainge vari kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium vakaratidza kufara zvikuru naVaMnangagwa . Baba Abel Mukonor, murwiri wehondo yerusununguko vanotiwo i kugadzwa kwakaitwa VaMnangagwa kwakapedza gakava raivapo mushure mokunge mutungamiri weMDC Alliance vakwira kumatare vachiti sarudzo dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusoro. Vamwe vanhu vainge vachiimba vachiridza mumhanzi mudzimba dzavo kufarira chiitiko. Asi kune vamwewo vange vachiratidza kusuwa kwakanyanyisa sezvo vachitsigira VaChamisa avo vakakwikwidza vakamirira MDC Alliance. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Yotsika Madziro PaNyaya yeKumisa Zvimwe Zvinogadzirwa Kunze Kuti Zvisapinde muNyika
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvemaindustry VaMike Bimha vanoti kutanga muna Chikunguru, ZIMRA inenge yotevedzera mutemo wakadzikwa hwekumiswa kwekupinda kwezvimwe zvinhu munyika nevanhu vasina marezinesi. Hurumende yakaparura mutemo unonzi Statutory Instrument Number 64 uyo uchapa kuti zvinhu zvakatarwa mumutemo uyu zvisabvumidzwe kupinda munyika. Zvinhu izvi zvinosanganisa masalad creams, mukaka, mafuta ekubikisa, zvekuvakiusa, mafotereza, matayi edzimotokari, cheese nezvimwe. VaBimha vanoti masangano akaita saana Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries neZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce ndiwo akakumbira kuti vambomisa kupinda kwezvinhu izvi munyika. Vanotiwo hurumende inokwanika kuwana mari yemitero yakawanda kana vemunyika vakwanisa kugadzira zvinhu zvakawanda. Vatiwo izvi zvinopa kuti vanhu vakwanise kuwana mabasa. Hurumende mavhiki apera yakamboyedza kurambidza zvinhu munyika asi pakaita mhirizhonga pabhodha reBeitbridge vangu vachiramba kutambira hurongwa uhu. Asi rwendo rwuno hurumende inonzi ichaendesa mapurisa akawanda mumabhazi nekusunga vemabhazi vanenge vabatsira kupinza zvinhu munyika. No media source currently available

column2: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa Pamwe neKufa neCovid-19 Hworamba Hwuchikura
column3: Kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 huri kuramba huchikwira, vanhu vakawanda havasi kutora matanho ekuzvidzivirira sezviri kukurudzirwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization, akaita sekupfeka mamasiki kumeso kwavo. Kunyange hazvo zviri pachena kuti veruzhinji vari kutapurirana chirwere ichi munyika, kumisika yemabhazi pamwe nekumabhanga vanhu vanenge vakaungana, kana kumanikidzana, izvo zvinoita kuti kutapurirana kweCovid-19 kuve nyore. Studio7 yaona vanhu vazhinji vange vasina kupfeka mamasiki apo vanga vachisangana neveruzhinji muguta reHarare. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaPaul Majaira, avo vanga vasina kuzvidzivirira vati dzimwe nguva vanombokanganwa kuzvidzivirira. Mumwe murume uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita anga akamirira kutora mari pane rimwe bhanga muguta apo vanhu vanga vakatsokodzerana abvuma kuStudio7 kuti ane ruzivo rwekuti huwandu hwevari kubatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 munyika huri kukwira. Asi ati kunyange hazvo achiziva kuti kumira vakapatsanurana kunobatsira, nyaya yekutya kupindirwa ndiyo inoita kuti vanhu vabatane vari mumitsetse. VaSimon Zhou, avo vanga vakamirira bhazi kuti vaende kuMt Pleasant Heights, vati vanga vava nemaawa mana vari panzvimbo imwe chete, izvo zvinogona kuti vabate chirwere ichi. Vatiwo vanhu havasi kutariswa temperature kana kupihwa zvekuzora maoko ava pavanenge vachipinda mumabhazi eZupco sezvaiitika pakatanga kuvhurwa nyika. Munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vati vanhu vanofanirwa kuchengetedza hutano hwavo kuburikidza nekutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa nevehutano. Dr. Madzorera vakurudzirawo kuti munguva ino yechando dai veruzhinji vagara kudzimba. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Va John Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vari kuwedzera kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvechirwere ichi pamwe nekuwedzera vanhu vanoongororwa kuitira kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Vachitaura kumusangano wePolitburo yebato ravo, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatiwo kukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevari kubatwa neCOVID-19 kuchaitawo kuti vatarise zvakare nyaya yekuvharwa kwenyika. Huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hausi kukwira muZimbabwe chete, sezvo izvi zviri kuitikawo munyika dzakawanda pasi rose, iro rave nevanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi, vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi masere nezvisere nemazana maviri ane gumi nevaviri, vari vemuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

column2: Murume Akambotiza kuWilkins Anowanikwa Asina Coronavirus
column3: Chizvarwa chekuThailand chekumbokatiza muchipatara cheWilkins muHarare neSvondo kwachaifanirwa kuongororwa kana chiine coronavirus chinonzi chazoongororwa neChipiri chawanikwa chisina hutachiwana uhwu. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeguta reHarare, Doctor Prosper Chonzi, zvabuda muongororo yaitwa iyi zvinoratidza kuti murume uyu haana chirwere ichi, izvo zvaita kuti abva aregwa achienda kumba kwake. Murume uyu anonzi adzoka ega kuchipatara ichi mushure mekutsvagwa nemapurisa achishaikwa. Murume uyu anonzi akabva kuThailand mazuva makumi maviri adarika akaitwa ongororo ye coronavirus pakupinda kwaakaita munyika, izvo zvakaratidza kuti muviri wake waidziya zvakanyanya. Izvi zvinonzi zvakazoita kuti aendeswe kuWilkins Hospital, uko akazongotsakatika. Hapana ati awanikwa aine chirwere ichi muZimbabwe kunyange hazvo paine vanhu vanoVanhu vana muSouth Africa vanonzi vakawanikwa vaine hutachiwana hwecoronavirus neMuvhuro, izvo zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vave nechirwere ichi pavanomwe munyika iyi. Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari ivo munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti panofanirwa kutorwa matanho akasimba ekuchengetedza vanenge vafungidzirwa kuti vangave nehutachiwana hwechirwere ichi, vachiti zvakaitika paWilkins Hospital hazvifanirwe kodzokororwa nekuti zvinoisa ruzhinji rwevanhu munjodzi. Doctor Madzorera vanoti bazi rezvehutano rinofanirwawo kushambadza zvakasimba nezvechirwere ichi, uyewo kuisa nhare mumatunhu ose emunyika ekuti vanhu vanokwanisa kufona chero nguva vachitaura pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Vari kukurudzirawo kuti pave navanautsanana vanofamba vachiongorora vanhu kuti vane hutachiwana here kana kuti kwete, pane kumirira kuti munhu anofungidzira kuti ane chirwere ichi aende iye kuchipatara. No media source currently available

column2: Tino Kadewere ava kutambira kuSpain
column3: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors, Tinotenda Philana Kadewere, aendeswa kuchikwata cheReal Club Deportivo Mallorca chekuSpain nechikwereti uko achatambira nhabvu yake mwaka uno achibva kuOlympic Lyon.   Chibvumirano chiri kuona Kadewere achienda kuMallorca chinosanganisira kuti chikwata ichi chinogona kuzomutenga kuita mutambi wavo zvachose kana akatamba zvinogutsa mwaka uno.   Kadewere abva aita mutambi wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe achinotambira nhabvu yake muligi reSpanish LaLiga.   Kuendeswa kwaaita kuMallorca neLyon kunotevera kushaiswa mukana wekutamba kwaange achiita zvichitevera kudzoka kwaAlexandre Lacazette kuchikwata chekuFrance ichi.   Pamusoro pezvo, kuArsenal kune vamwe vatambi vanoti Karl Toko Ekambi anobva kuCameroon, Mathis Cherki wekuFrance naMoussa Dembele wekuFrance zvakare avo vange vachitambiswa pamberi pake.

column2: Madzishe neMasabhuku Voomesera Vanoda Kunyoresa kuMasvingo
column3: Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai pamwe nevemasangano akazvimiririra vanoti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nemadzishe nemasabhuku eku Chiredzi, Mwenezi pamwe ne Chivi South, avo vanoti vari kuramba kubatsira vagari munzvimbo idzi kuitira kuti vakwanise kunyoresa. Mashoko ari kubuda anoti madzishe aya ari kunyima vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri vemapato anopikisa matsamba anoratidza pavanogara kuitira kuti vanyorese. Madzishe aya anonziwo ari kumakidza vanhu ava kubvisa chioko muhomwe, vamwe vachibvisiswa zvipfuwo zvakaita sehuku, mbudzi pamwe nekutengeswa doro rendari kuti vazonyorera vagari tsamba dzeuchapupu. Sachigaro we MDC-T muMasvingo, VaJames Gumbi, vanoti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nemasabhuku nemadzishe. VaGumbi vanoti madzishe aya ari kunyanya kushungurudza vatsigiri vavo nekudaro zvinogona kuita kuti vazhinji vasazovhote gore rinouya. Masangano akazvimirira anotiwo ari kutsutsumwa zvikuru nehuori huri kuitwa nemadzishe nemasabhuku hwekubhadharisa vanhu zvipfuwo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano revechidiki, re Community Tolerance, Reconciliation and Development Trust, kana kuti COTRAD, VaZivanai Muzorodzi, vanoti madzishe achatadzisa kuti vechidiki vazhinji vanyorese kuvhota nekuti havana zvipfuwo. Asi VaGumbi vati kunyange masabhuku ari kuda zvipfuwo ivo vakaendesa vatsigiri vebato mumawadhi enzvimbo idzi kuti vape vanenge vanyimwa tsamba mafomu eVR9 akasainwa nenhengo dzvavo dzeparamende pamwe nemagweta avo kuti vakwanise kunyoresa. Mamwe masangano akaita seMasvingo Human Rights Trust anoti zviri kuitwa nemadzishe kutyora kodzero dzevanhu dzekuvhota dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Studio 7 yakundikana kutaura nemukuru wemadzishe nemasabhuku munyika, Mambo Fortune Charumbira, kuti vatipe pfungwa dzavo, vachinzi vari kuSouth Africa nemunhu adaira nhare yavo. Kunyange hazvo kwakabuda mashoko ekuti Masvingo ine vanhu vakawanda vanyoresa kuvhota kupfuura mamwe matunhu munyika, vazhinji vari kunetseka nekunyoresa nezvikonzero zvakawanda. Zvimwe zvacho ndezvekuti chirongwa ichi hachina kushambadzwa zvakakwana zvekuti vanhu vazhinji havana ruzivo rwekuti vanonyoresera panzvimbo dzipi. Kunyoresa munzvimbo dzeMwenezi, Chivi South neChiredzi kuri kupera musi wa Gumiguru 25, 2017. Mushure mezvo chirongwa ichi chinenge chopinda mumamwe matunhu ari muMasvingo.

column2: Madhokotera neVakoti Votanga Kuramwa Mabasa neKushaya Zvekuzvidzivirira kuCoronavirus
column3: Vanachiremba navana mukoti munyika vatanga kuramwa mabasa kunyangwe nyika yatarisana nechirwere chouraya vanhu vakawanda pasi rose cheCoronavirus. Vanachiremba navanamukoti ava vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kuvapa zvekushandisa kuti vazvidzivire kutapurirwa zvirwere zvakaita seCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano, iri mumaoko eStudio 7, vanamukoti kuburikidza nesangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association vati vakasuma bazi rezvehutano mazuva maviri apfuura kut vanoda zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCoronavirus, mvura muzvipatara uye mari yekushanda kwavachaita nguva yakareba vachirapa vane chirwere cheCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano nevakuru vezvipatara zvehurumende munyika, mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Tawanda Zvakada, vatiwo nhengo dzavo hadzichakwanise kuramba dzichishanda kutanga nhasi sezvo dzisina zvekuzvidzivirira. Vati vakaita musangano nehurumende neMuvhuro nezvenyaya iyi asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chabuda. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, kana munyori mubazi ravo, Dr Agnes Mahomva, sezvo vose vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Kusvika pari zvino hurumende inoti vanhu vatatu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus munyika uye mumwe chete, mutori wenhau, Zororo Makamba, akashaya vakavigwa neChipiri. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vatenda kuti vanoda zvikwanisiro muzvipatara nechimbi chimbi uye vakanda mapadza pasi.. No media source currently available

column2: Muzongondi iNo. 1 . . . Zvibodzwa 41 mumwaka . . . ‘Ndinoda kuita saChunga’
column3: FELISTAS “Figo” Muzongondi (33) – uyo akaita mukurumbira wekunwisa zvibodzwa 41 gore rakapera munhabvu yevasikana achitambira chikwata cheBlack Rhinos Queens – anoti kutamba kwake nhabvu ruremekedzo rukuru rwaanopa kuvabereki vake.   Vabereki vemutambi uyu vakashaika.  Munhoroondo yomuno, Figo akapotsa nezvibodzwa zvishanu bedzi kuti asvike pa46 izvo zvakanwiswa naMoses “Bambo” Chunga mugore ra1986.   Pose paanonwisa, Muzongondi anotambanudza maoko ake akatarira kumakore achitambirira.   Anoti izvi anozviitira kuremekedza vabereki vake avo vaanoti vanenge vachimuona vari kumatenga.   “Pose pandinopinda munhandare ndichinotamba nhabvu, ndinozviita ndiine chisimbiso chokuti ndiri kutambira vabereki vangu avo vakashaika kare kare,” anodaro Figo.   Amai vake vakashaika muna2003, baba vake ndokuzotevera 2007 vachisiya Muzongondi – uyo ava kushandira Zimbabwe Defence Forces – nemadzikoma ake maviri nevanin’ina vaviri zvakare.   Kunyangwe akatora mukombe wekunwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda munhabvu yevanhukadzi munyika yose, Figo anoti anobatikana mumwoyo nokurangarira vabereki vake.   “Pavakashaika, vakatisiya tichingova vana toga. Vamwe vangu vanouya kuzonditsigira kazhinji pandinotamba, asi ndinongoshuvira kuti kudai nevabereki vangu varipowo,” anodaro Muzongondi.   Mutambi uyu akatanga kutamba nhabvu mugore ra2001 paNdarama High School, kuMasvingo, uko kunova ndiko kwaakapihwa zita remadunhurirwa rokuti Figo – zvichibva pazita reshasha yenhabvu yekunyika yePortugal, Luis Figo uyo akaita mukurumbira achitambira nyika yake nechikwata chekuSpain cheBarcelona.   Anoti zita iri akaripihwa pamusana pekugona nhabvu kuita sekunge mukomana.   Mugore ra2008, akatanga kutambira chikwata cheCyclone Queens, kuMbare, ndokuzobvako oenda kuMwenzana Queens muna2014.   Muna2016, akasiya ndokunotambira Black Rhinos Queens apo akazodaidzwa kuchikwata chenyika chemaMighty Warriors uko kwaakanoita mukurumbira nezvidobi zvake munhabvu.   “Kazhinji pose pandinotamba kumaMighty Warriors, ndinombodonhedza misodzi ndichirangarira kuti dai Mwari akapawo vabereki vangu mazuva panyika ekundiona ndichitambira Zimbabwe.   “Vazhinji vakazotanga kuziva nezvangu pandakatanga kutamba muchikwata chemaMighty Warriors asi nhabvu ndakatanga kuitamba ndichiri kuchikoro,” anodaro Figo.   Muzongondi – uyo ava nemukurumbira wakanyanya pakuzunguza mambure – anokurudzira vatambi venhabvu vechisikana kuti vazvibate kana vachida kubudirira.   “Kunyangwe ukava mutambi ane mukurumbira, ukasangozvibata uye ukashaya hunhu, hauna kure kwaunosvika.   “Ukava nehunhu, zvoreva zvakare kuti unogona kutamba nevamwe zvakanaka, iya yatinoti ‘team work’. Iyi ndiyo yakakosha munhabvu.”   Figo anoti pakubudirira kwake, anotenda chikwata chaanotamba nacho chinova ndicho chinoita kuti kugona kwake kuonekere.   “Mibairo yose yandinowana ndinopa kutenda kuchikwata chandinotamba nacho nokuti ndivo vanoita kuti kugona kwangu kuonekwe. Kunyangwe zvichiratidza kushingaira kwangu, asi mutambo uyu ndewechikwata,” anodaro Figo.   Kugadzirira ramangwana rake, Muzongondi anoti ava kuita zvidzidzo zvekuti awane magwaro ekurairidza vatambi nhabvu.   Anoti kunyangwe achiri kutarisira kutamba kwemakore anotevera, munhabvu munosanganikwa netsaona dzinosanganisira kukuvara naizvozvo anofanira kugara akagadzirira. Nerudo rwaainarwo nemutambo wenhabvu, Figo anoti kana azosvika panguva yokuti haachatambi munhandare, achaita zvokurairidza mutambo uyu.   “Nhabvu ndiyo upenyu hwangu, naizvozvo kana nguva yokutamba yadarika, ndichaita zvokurairidza,” anodaro.   “Ndinorangarira gore ra2010 apo takatamba fainari yeCosafa tichikwikwidzana nechikwata cheSouth Africa munhandare yeRufaro, muHarare, ndakademba kuti dai upenyu hwaitengwa, ndainotenga hwevabereki vangu kuti vaone kudadisa kwandakaita zuva iroro.   “Taisirakashwa neSouth Africa nguva dzose asi musi uyu takaita sungano sechikwata kuti taida kuvaratidza kuti hatikundwi munyika medu.   “Tichipinda munhandare, taiva tizere neuturu hwekuda kugohwesa, naizvozvo vasikana veSouth Africa takavapa nguva yakaoma tikavakwapaidza 3-0.   “Kunyangwe musi uyu ndisina kunwisa, asi ndakatamba nemwoyo wose uye tiine donzvo rimwe chete sechikwata tikabudirira,” anodaro Muzongondi.   Figo anoti gore rino anoda kutamba nekugohwesa kudarika gore rakapera.   Shuviro yake ndeyekudarika zvibodzwa zvaChunga zvemugore ra1986 iro rinova ndiro raakaberekwa.   Kubva 1986 kudzimara zvino, hakuna mutambi wenhabvu muno ati anwisa zvibodzwa sezvakaitwa naBambo mumwaka mumwe chete. Muzongondi ndiye bedzi ari pedyo nezvibodzwa 41 zvegore rapera.   Figo anoona kuberekwa kwake mugore ra1986 sokunge zvine chirevo muupenyu hwake zvinova ndizvo zvaanofunga kuti zvakaita kuti atambe nhabvu.   “Kusangana kwemakore aya – ekubarwa kwake nekunwisa kwaChunga – kwandiri haisi tsaona, zvinoreva kuti gore irori rakakosha zvikuru kwandiri.   “Naizvozvo ndoda kugohwesa kudarika zvakaitwa naBambo mugore irori,” anodaro.

column2: Nhabvu yadzoka . . . DeMbare, Bosso zvobandana
column3: Ndooka   KUNOTSVA demo kugo­sara mupinyi nemusi weSvondo kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muguta reHarare uko makara asionane – Dyna­mos neHighlanders FC – zvi­chatatsurana mumutambo wePresident’s Independence Day Trophy (Uhuru Cup).   Uyu ndiwo mutambo wekutanga wekutambwa nezvikwata zvemuno kub­vira apo mitambo yose yakamiswa munaKurume gore radarika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mutambo wekupedzisira pakati peDeMbare neBosso mugore ra2019, Bosso yakahwinha 2-0.   Nemusi weSvondo apo pachatambwa mutambo uyu kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium, kuchange kusina vatsigiri sezvo pachatevedzwa mitemo yose yeWorld Health Organisa­tion (WHO) neyemunyika muno yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Vachitaura nguva pfupi yadarika, gurukota rez­vekuburitswa kwemashoko nenyaya dzenhepfenyuro, Senator Monica Mutsvan­gwa vanoti zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichatamba pachiteved­zwa mitemo yose yekurwisa denda iri.   “Zvikwata zviviri zvine mukurumbira, Dynamos neHighlanders, zvicharwira mukombe apo zvichasan­gana mumutambo wePres­ident’s Independence Day Trophy uyo uchatambwa pachitevedzwa matanho akatarwa eWHO neenyika ekudzivirira kupararira kwe­denda reCovid-19,” vanodaro Sen Mutsvangwa.   Munhoroondo yenhabvu yemutambo uyu, DeMbare neBosso zvakasangana ka16 uye zvose zvichik­wanisa kuhwina kanonwe mukombe uyu.   Mutambi weDeMbare – Kudzanai Dhemere – anoti ari kufara chaizvo nekudzoka kwenhabvu uye sechikwata vari kushanda nesimba kuti vagohwina mutambo uyu.   “Mutambo uyu tange tausuwisisa zvikuru, tange tane ngura yekugara nguva ndefu tisingatambe bhora,” anodaro Dhemere.   Murairidzi weBosso, Mandla Mpofu, nguva pfupi yadarika akati anofara chaizvo nekudzoka kwaPeter Muduhwa uyo akange aenda kunotamba kuTanzania nechikwereti kwemwedzi mitanhatu.   “Semurairidzi, ndino­fara chaizvo kuti mutambi wedu Muduhwa adzoka uyo ari kuunza hunyanzvi nehutungamiri muchikwata chedu.   Nd i n o z iva an e zvaakadzidza paange ari kuTanzania uye achapawo ruzivo urwu kune vamwe vake vaanotamba navo,” anodaro. Nhabvu yePre­mier Soccer League (PSL) yakapedzisira kutambwa mugore ra2019.   Mutambo wemusi weSvondo uyu uri kuonekwa nevazhinji segadziriro yekudzoka kwenhabvu yePSL apo mitambo iri kutarisirwa kutanga munaChivabvu.

column2: Mhirizhonga Inotyisa Yoitika kuChitungwiza
column3: Vechidiki muMDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai vanoti havasi kuzopeta mavoko avo vachirwiswa nevechidiki ve Zanu-PF. Vechidiki ava vanoti yasvika nguva yekuti vadzoserewo zvakasimba pose pavanorwiswa sezvo mapurisa ari kutsigira Zanu-PF pose panoitika zvemhirizhonga, vatsigiri veMDC vari ivo vanosungwa chete. Mashoko aya anotevera kurwiswa kwakaitwa munyori anoona nezvemisangano mu MDC kuChitungwiza, VaDelma Amos Kaliyati, mukupera kwesvondo. VaKaliyati, avo vari muchipatara zvichitevera kukuvara zvakaipisisa kwavakaita, vanonzi vakachengetedzwa nemapurisa sezvo vari muhusungwa zvichitevera mhirizhonga yakaitika neSvondo. Zvichitevera kurwiswa kwakaitwa VaKaliyati nevamwe vavo, vechidiki ve MDC vanonzi vakapindirawo munyaya iyi vachiedza kudzoserawo kurwiswa kwakange kuchiitwa vamwe vavo, izvo zvakaita kuti pakuvare vanhu vakati wandeyi, vamwe vakaendeswa kuchipatara. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva huwandu hwevanhu vakakuvara muchiitiko ichi. VaKaliati vakarwiswa zvakare svondo rapera apo vaibatsira vanhu vanoda kunyoresa kuvhota. Vamwe vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu PF vakakanda chombo chinoputika pamba paVaKaliyati, mukadzi wavo akakuvara zvakaipisisa muchiitiko icho. Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaJim Kunaka, vanoramba zvese zvataurwa neveMDC vachiti vanhu vebato ravo havana nguva yokufamba vachirova vanhu sezvo vari mubishi rekukuridzira vanhu kunonyoresa kuitira kuti vagokwanisa kuzovhota musarudzo dzichaitwa gore rinouya. No media source currently available No media source currently available

column2: Vatambi veZim kuEurope
column3: MUMASVONDO anotevera, nhabvu yekuEurope – iyo inoteverwa zvikuru muno – ichange yave kutanga uye vatambi vemaWarriors vari kutarisirwa kutambira zvikwata zvavo zvakasiyana.   Iye zvino vatambi vakaita saMarvelous Nakamba weAston Villa, Tino Kadewere weLyon yekuFrance naMarshall Munetsi weStade de Reims yekuFrance vange vachitamba mitambo yegadziriro kuzvikwata zvavo apo vakatarisana nekutanga kwemwaka mutsva wenhabvu.   Mwaka wekuEngland nekuFrance zvose zvichatanga musi wa5 Nyamavhuvhu.   Chikwata chaKadewere ndicho chichavhurira mwaka mutsva wekuLigue 1 apo chichasangana necheAjaccio musi wa5 Nyamavhuvhu.   Kuchiti zuva rinotevera, chikwata chaNakamba chekuEnglish Premier League chichazotamba apo chichasangana nechaJordan Zemura cheAFC Bournemouth.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita ongororo yevatambi vemaWarriors vanotambira kuEurope pamusoro pekuti gadziriro dzavo dziri kufamba sei panguva ino yepre-season.    Marvelous Nakamba   Nakamba: Mutambi weAston Villa uyu angokwanisa kutamba mutambo mumwe chete wegadziriro dzemwaka mutsva wechikwata chake kubva pamitambo mina yachatamba chiri kuAustralia uko chiri kuita gadziriro dzacho. Akatamba mutambo wechikwata chake neLeeds uyo vakahwina 1-0.   Mumutambo uyu, Nakamba akatanga akagara pabhenji ndokuzopinda muchikamu chechipiri vachibva pahalftime.   Mimwe mitambo yakazotevera, weBrisbane Roar neManchester United, kana pabhenji chaipo aive asipo uye murairidzi wake Steven Gerrard haana kutaura kuti sei asina kumutambisa.   Svondo rino, chikwata chake chichasangana neRennes mumutambo wekupedzisira wegadziriro mwaka wePremier League usati watanga.    Tino Kadewere   Kadewere: Mutambi weLyon uyu mwaka wadarika haana kunyatsotamba sezvaakaita paakatengwa nechikwata ichi paakanwisa ka10 kubva mumitambo 33 yaainge atamba. Mwaka wadarika, akangonwisa kamwe chete kubva mumitambo 15.   Pari zvino chikwata chake chatamba mitambo mishanu yehushamwari uye Kadewere atamba katatu apo vakasangana neBourge en Bresse (France) iyo vakakunda 4-2 uye akazotamba mutambo weAnderlecht (Belgum) apo vakakundwa 3-0.   Akazotamba zvakare mutambo wechikwata chake apo chakazvamburwa 5-0 neWillem II Tilburg (Netherlands).   Lyon iri kutarisirwa kutamba mutambo wekupedzisira wehushamwari apo ichasangana neInter Milan musi weMugovera.   Zvakadaro, Kadewere anonzi ari kudiwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana kusanganisira cheReal Valladolid chekuSpain.    Marshall Munetsi   Marshall Munetsi: Mutambi weStade de Reims uyu mwaka uno watatarisana nawo anonzi ange achidiwa neBrighton & Hove yekuEngland.   Pari zvino atamba mutambo mumwe chete hwehushamwari wechikwata chake asi ndokutadza kutamba yaitevera sezvo ainge akuvara.   Ange achitarisira kudzoka svondo rino kuzosimudzira gadziriro dzake apo chikwata chake chakatarisana nemwaka mutsva wemuLigue 1.    Tendayi Darikwa   Darikwa: Tendayi Darikwa ndiye kaputeni weWigan Athletic uye mugadziriro dzavo ange achitamba zvikuru izvo zvinorakidza kuti ari muhurongwa hwechikwata chake mwaka uno. Chikwata chake chichatambira muligi reEnglish Championship chichirwira kuti chigopinda muEnglish Premier League.   Mitambo yeChampionship iri kutanga svondo rino musi weChishanu apo pachaona Huddersfield ichisangana neBurnely.   Chikwata chaDarikwa mutambo wacho wemwaka mutsva chichisangana nePreston North End musi weMugovera.   Pamitambo yehushamwari mishanu yakatambwa neWigan, Darikwa akatamba yese apo chikwata chake chakasangana necheOldham Athletic chikwahwina 3-1, chichakunda Liverpool XI 6-0, chikaita mangange 0-0 neAccrington Stanley uye ndokuzokunda zvekare Bamber Bridge neSheffield Wednesday 5-1 ne4-1.    Jordan Zemura   Jordan Zemura (AFC Bournemouth): Zvakawanda zviri kutarisirwa kubva kuna Zemura uyo mwaka uno chikwata chake chichange chichitambira muEnglish Premier League.   Mwaka wadarika, Zemura aipisa zvikuru muChampionship izvo zvakamuona achitamba ka33 ndokunwisa katatu apo chikwata chake chakahwina tikiti rekupinda muEnglish Premier League.   Mumitambo mitatu yehushamwari yatambwa nechikwata chake, Zemura akatamba yese izvo zvakaona vachikunda Sheffield Wednesday 2-1, ndokukundwa 2-1 neSporting Braga yekuPortudal uye vakazokundwa zvekare 1-0 neBristol City yekuEngland.   Bournemouth iri kutamba mutambo wayo wekupedzisira hwehushamwari svondo rino musi weMugovera apo ichasangana neReal Sociedad yekuSpain.   Zvakadaro, vamwe vatambi vakaita saAdmiral Muskwe weLuton Town, Macauley Bonne weQueens Park Rangers naBrendon Galloway wePlymouth vose vari pakati pekuita gadziriro nezvikwata zvavo.   Kuchiti David Philani Moyo, uyo aitambira Hamilton Academical yekuScotland, haasati ave kuzivikanwa kuti nhabvu yake achange achiitambira kupi mwaka uno zvichitevera kubva kwaakaita kuchikwata ichi apo kondirakiti yake yakapera.

column2: Zvidzidzo zvesoftball zvoitwa
column3: SANGANO reZimbabwe Softball Association rakapihwa chiremerera chekuitisa zvidzidzo zvekuvandudza ruzivo rwevarairidzi, varidzi vepembe pamwe nevanochetedza zvibodzwa zvemutambo uyu neWorld Baseball Softball Confederation (WBSC).Zvidzidzo izvi zvichange zviri zveLevel One International izvo zvichavabatsira kuti vagokwanisa kuenda kunorairidza nekunoridza pembe kune dzimwe nyika uye zvichaitwa muna Kukadzi.   Varairidzi vanosvika 50 vemutambo uyu, varidzi vepembe 20 uye vanotora zvibodzwa 20 vari kutarisirwa kuzobatsirikana nezvidzidzo izvi.   Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Softball Association, Stonard Mapfumo, anoti sangano reWBSC richatumira nhengo ina idzo dzichauya kuzoitisa zvidzidzo izvi.   “Takatambira nemufaro mukuru danho iri, takarongerwa neWorld Baseball Softball Confederation kuti tiwedzere magwaro ebasa epamusoro kune varairidzi vesoftball, varidzi vepembe nevanonyora zvibodzwa vemuno.   “Izvi zvichatibatsira mune ramangwana apo tiri kurwisa chaizvo kuti mutambo uyu ukure uye usvike kure. Kuchauya nhengo ina muno dziri kutumirwa neWBSC kuzoitisa zvidzidzo izvi mwedzi unotevera,” anodaro Mapfumo.   Zvidzidzo izvi zvaifanirwa kunge zvichiitwa kutanga musi wa7 Kukadzi zvichizopera musi wa9 asi zvave kuitwa  musi wa23 Kukadzi zvichizopera musi wa26 sezvo nhengo idzi dzichatanga dzambotenderera kune dzimwe nyika dzichidzidzisako.   Mapfumo anoti zvidzidzo izvi zvauya panguva yakanaka apo sangano ravo riri kuita gadziriro dzechikwata chemadzimai chichanokwikwidza kumutambo weAfrica/Europe Olympic Qualifier uyo uchaitirwa kuPretoria, kuSouth Africa muna Chivabvu.   “Zvabva zvatinakira nekuti tange tiri kugadzirira chikwata chedu icho tinoda kuzotumira kuPretoria muna Chivabvu kunokwikwidza kumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuTokyo, kuJapan kumutambo we2020 Olympic Games.   “Saka varairidzi vedu vakadzidziswa vopihwa ruzivo rwepamusoro rwesoftball ndinoona tichisvika kure,” anodaro Mapfumo.

column2: Mapato Anopikisa Okurudzira Vanhu Kugara Kumba neMugovera
column3: Mapato mana makuru anopikisa akurudzira neChishanu veruzhinji munyika kuti vacherechedze zuva rakawana nyika kuzvitonga neMugovera vari kudzimba dzavo achiti haazi kuzopinda mumhemberero dzakarongwa nehurmende yeZanu PF sezvo bato iri richishandisa mukana uyu kunyomba vamwe. No media source currently available Mapato aya anoti MDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, Mavambo Kusile Dawn, ZAPU neNational Consitutional Assembly anoti zvinosuwisa kuti vammwe vakarwira hondo yerusununguko vave kushungurudza vamwe vavo vechitema. Vachiverenga mashoko emapato ayo pachiitiko chapindwa naVaTsvangirai nemukuru weMKD VaSimba Makoni, munyori kukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati hapana chekupemberera sesvo vanhu vari kuyaura nenhamo nenzara. Vatiwo mapato avo azvipira kushanda pamwe chete kuti asunungure vanhu kubva kuhutongi hweZanu PF. Vakurudzira vanhu kuti vacherechedza zuva iri mudzvimba dzavo sezvo pasina chikonzero chekuenda kumhemberero dzinorongwa neZanu PF mumatunhu akasisyana siyana munyika. VaTsvangirai vati vaimbosienda kumhemberero idzi apo vaive muhurumende yemubatanidzwa asi vakazowona kuti hazvibatsiri sezvo vainyombwa pamhemberero idzi. Mutauririri weNCA, VaMaddock Chivasa,vati kutambura kuri kuita zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvichenda kunze kwenyika uko zviri kushungurudzwa sezviri kuitika kuSouth Africa pari zvino kunoratidza pachena kuti hurumende haina hanya nezvido zveveruzhinji. Asi bato ReZanu PF rinoti zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka munyika uye richaita mhemberero kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muHarare apo mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanotarisirwa kutaura. Munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato iri, VaIgnatius Chombo, vanoti mhemberero idzi dzichaitwa pasi pedingindira rinosimbaradza kubatana, runyararo pamwe nekuzvida seznyika. Makurukota ematunhu anotarisirwawo kutaura mashoka aVaMugabe mumatunhu ese munyika.

column2: Eboue odzoka munhabvu
column3: weArsenal, Emaanuel Eboue (35), anogona kudzoka munhabvu achitambira LA Galaxy, makore maviri apedzisira kutamba nhabvu.   Chizvarwa chekuIvory Coast ichi anoshuvira zvikuru kudzoka munhabvu zvichitevera kutemerwa zvirango kwaakaitwa neFIFA kuti asatambire Sunderland mugore ra2019 apo akanzi asatambe kwegore atadza kubhadhara mumiriri wake.   Nyaya dzehutano hwake dzakamutadzisa kuti atengwe nechikwata chekuCyprus, Ocagi Limasol gore radarika.   Mutambi uyu akasiiwa asina kana kobiri zvichitevera kurambana kwaakaita nemudzimai wake izvo zvakamudya chaizvo mupfungwa zvekusvika pakuda kuzviuraya.   Asi chikwata chekuMLS – LA Galaxy – chiri kuedza kuda kumudzora munhabvu, sekutaura kwenhau dziri kubva kuThe Sun.   Chikwata ichi chinoziva kuti ruzivo rwaanarwo rwenhabvu rwakakosha zvikuru.   Eboue ange asiri munhabvu kwemakore maviri, asi nguva yadarika akambotambira chikwata chemaArsenal Legends munaChikumi.   Achitaura neCanal gore rino, akati, “Chandinongoda chete kudzoka munhabvu nekuti ndichiri kukwanisa kutamba.   “Ndinogona kuenda kunzvimbo dzakaita seBaghdad kana Pakistan kuti ndingotamba chete. Handina basa nazvo kuti ndekupi.   “Ndinogara nemabhegi angu akarongedzwa nekuti pane mukana wekuti ndinogona kudzingwa mumba mangu.   “Handina munhu parutivi rwangu ari kundimirira mazuva ano. Ndingori ndega. Ndaimbofara chaizvo nevana vangu nemhuri yangu asi iye zvino ndave ndega.” – SportsMail Football

column2: Mari Yotadzisa Vakawanda Kuenda Kuzororo reEaster
column3: Vanhu vakawanda vange vachikwira mabhazi vachienda kunotambira zororo reEaster kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana, kunyange hazvo vanga vachichema nerekushaya mari. Kunyange hazvo munyika vanhu vari kunetsekana kutora mari dzavo kumabhanga, change chiri chipata pata paMbare Musika vanhu vachikwira mabhazi vachienda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vachinoshanyira hama neshamwari. VaSteven Masocha vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vakatarisira kuti zororo reEaster richanakidza zvikuru. Asi izvi zvichakundikana sezvo vasina mari yakawanda. Mumwe mudzimai akwanisa kuenda kumusha kwake kuHurungwe, Amai Dorothy Jack, vati mushure mekutadza kuwana mari kubhanga kwavo, vakatozokwereta mari kuti vakwanise kuenda kuzororo. Muzvare Nomatter Chiwenga vatiwo zvange zvakaoma kuti vakwanise kuwana mari nokuti vaimukira husiki kuti vanomira mumitsetse kubhengi kwemazuva akawanda kusvikira mari yavaida yakwana. VaMambo Mandungu Mandedza varatidza kufara kuenda kumusha kwavo kwavakapedzesira kuenda makore masere apfuura. Vati kana vasvika kumusha kwavo vachauraya mombe kuti vafare nemhuri yavo pazororo reEaster iri. Baba Trymore Muvhunza vanoti vana vavo vatadza kuuya kubva kuBuhera nepamusana pekushaya mari. Asi Baba Gibson Chanakira vati vachazoenda kumusha kana zororo rapera sezvo vari mubishi rekutengesa zvinhu zvavo paMbare Musika. Kunyange hazvo vamwe vanhu vakwanisa kuenda kuzororo reEaster, ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 yaratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda vatadza kufamba nepamusana pekushaya mari iyo iri kunetsa kutora kumabhanga. No media source currently available

column2: Zanu PF Yoyambira Vanoda Kuratidzira
column3: Zanu PF inoti inomira nemashoko akataurwa nemutungamiri wayo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamusangano wakaitwa nemusi weChishanu mudare rePolitburo yebato iri. VaMnangagwa, avo vanove zvakare mutungamiri wenyika, vakayambira masangano evashandi, machechi, nemasangano akazvimirira, kuti anangane nemabasa awo ari pamutemo, kwete kupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaMangagwa vakatiwo vanozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kushanda nemapato anopikisa muda kuvhiringidza mashandiro ehurumende yavo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, avo vanoti ichokwadi kuti masangano akazvimirira aya ava kuita zvematongerwo enyika achisiya basa rekuchengetedza kodzero dzevashandi. VaMugwadi vanoti hurumende inozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kuda kuratidzira zvisiri pamutemo, uye mapurisa achange achiita basa rawo nemazvo mukuona kuti hapana anobvumidzwa kutyora mitemo yenyika munguva ino yeCovid-19. VaMugwadi vatiwo sangano guru reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, riri kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Vati mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vakamboyedza kuyananisa vatungamiri veMDC vari kunetsana, izvo zvinoburitsa pachena kuti sangano iri rinodyidzana nemapato anopikisa hurumende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaMutasa kanawo MDC kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti sevashandi vane kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, vanoshushikana zvikuru nemashoko aVaMnangagwa. VaMasaraure vanoti vashandi havasi kuzofa vakanyarara kana hurumende ichitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yavo, uye vacharamba vachitaura zvinyunyuto zvavo. Asi VaMugwadi vati hurumende inonzwisisa zvikuru zvichemo zvevashandi ndosaka yakawedzera mihoro yevashandi vehurumende nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana, pamusoro pezvo, ikavapa zvakare madhora ekuAmerica makumi manomwe nemashanu semari yekubatsirikana munguva yekurwisa Covid-19. No media source currently available

column2: pe yakahwapura mukombe
column3: CHIKORO chePrince Edward ndicho chakahwapura mukombe wemakwikwi eDairyboard Rugby Schools Festival ayo akaitirwa muHarare svondo rapera.   Prince Edward yakakunda Churchill Boys 16-10 mufainari yainakidza kukunda ngoma kurira.   Tawanda Jimu – uyo anove Dairyboard Rugby Schools Festival Tournament director – anoti makwikwi aya akakosha sezvo vachiashandisa kutsvaga nyanzvi dzemangwana dzichazomirira nyika pamwe nezvikwata zvikuru zvemutambo uyu.   Anoti makwishu egore rino akarakidza kuti mutambo werugby wakura zvikuru uye uri kutambwa muzvikoro, vachitarisa zvikwata zvakawanda zvakauya kuzokwikwidza zvevakomana nevasikana.   “Tichiongorora zvikwata zvese zvakauya, takazviona kuti mutambo uyu uri kuramba uchikura uye uchisimudzira vatambi pamwe nezvikwata zvakawanda.   “Zvimwe zvikwata zvaizviona sezvikuru iye zvino zvave kuzviona zvega kuti hazvingohwine dambe nekuti zvimwe zvekumamisha chaizvo zvaitozvikunda zvichitamba rugby yepamusoro, inonwisa mvura,” anodaro Jimu.   Anoenderera mberi achiti mutambo uyu uripo pakupa mukana kuvatambi verugby kubva kuzvikoro zvakasiyana kuti vagosimukire kusvika padanho rave naTendai “The Beast” Mtawarira uyo anotambira maSpringboks eSouth Africa.   “Chishuvo chedu kuti titsvage mumwe Beast kuburikidza nemutambo uyu ndiko saka uchiitwa gore negore kuti vatambi ava vawane mukana wekusvika kure.   “Tinoziva kuti kuburikidza nemutambo uyu ndipo vamwe vatambi vanoonekwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana izvo zvinozovapa mukana wekuzvitambira,” anodaro.

column2: Vari Kunze kweNyika Votadza Kuziva reMangwana Ravo muSarudzo
column3: Sezvo chirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota cheBiometric Voters’ Registration mop-up chiri kupetwa nemusi weChina munyika yose, vakawanda vari kunze kwenyika vanoti havachazivi remangwana ravo panyaya yekuti vachapinda here kana kuti kwete musarudzo dziri kutarisirwa gore rino vachivhota vari munyika dzavagere. Mumwe wevari kunze ava ndaAmai Chenaimoyo Mutambasere vesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Initiative, avo vari kuLondon kuBritain. Amai Mutambasere vanoti havachaoni hurumende iine chaichavaitira kuti vakwanise kunyoresa kuvhota kuitira kuti vazovhota gore rino, sezvo pachiratidza sekunge pasisina nguva. Asi vanoti zvakangonakawo zvakare kuti vatange vanzwa zvichabuda munyaya yakakwidza kudare reConstitutional Court nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvichimirirwa neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights,yekuti zvibvumidzwe kuvhota zviri munyika dzazvigere. Nyaya iyi yanzi nedare inzwikwe musi wa 14 Kukadzi 2018. Amai Mutambasere vanoti kana dare rakapa mutongo unotsigira kuti vavhote vari nyika dzavari, kana dai vakasakwanisa zvavo kuvhota gore rino, zvinenge zvangovanakira musarudzo dzinouya. Asi dzimwe nyaya mbiri dzakambopinzwawo mumatare dzakafanana naiyoyi hadzina kuunzira vana veZimbabwe vari kunze mufaro, sezvo matare akarasa nyaya idzi, uyewo kupa mutongo usingavafadze. Kunyange hazvo pasati patarwa zuva resarudzo, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatoyambira kare kuti sarudzo dzinogona kuitwa mwedzi waChikunguru usati wasvika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvemutemo dzinoti izvi hazvigoni kuitika sezvo bumbiro remitemo richiti sarudzo dzinofanirwa kuitwa chete pakati pa22 Chikunguru na22 Nyamavhuvhu, kunze kwekunge VaMnangagwa vaparadza dare reparamende. Chirongwa che BVR chiri kudzokororwa ichi kana kuti mop-up, chiri kutarisirwa kupetwa neChina, asi vanhu vanonzi vacharamba vachinyoresa kuvhota mune dzimwe nzvimbo mumatunhu avagere. No media source currently available

column2: MaChevrons omirira Sri Lanka
column3: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) chemaChevrons chichasangana necheSri Lanka mumitambo miviri yeTest Match Series ichatambirwa kuHarare Sports Club mwedzi uno.   Mutambo wekutanga uriko musi wa19 uye uchizopera musi wa23 Ndira kozoti wechipiri uchizotanga musi wa27 uchipera musi wa31 Ndira.   Murairidzi wemaChevrons, Lalchand Rajput, anoti ari kutarisira zvikuru kumutambo uyu.   “Sri Lanka chikwata chikuru mumutambo uyu uye change chichitamba zvepamusoro kwenguva refu. Saka ndiri kutarisira zvikuru mumutambo weTest match uyu. Kwatiri kutanga patsva uye zvakatinakira kutanga nemutambo uyu wakakura sezvo unoburitsa zvipo zviri muvatambi vedu,” anodaro.   Chikwata chemaChevrons chiri kupinda mukembi svondo rino umo chichatanga kuita gadziriro dzacho.   MaChevrons akapedzisira kukwikwidza mumutambo wetest mugore ra2018 apo akasangana neBangladesh, kuBangladesh.   Rajput anoti ane chivimbo chikuru kuti chikwata chake chichatamba zvinonwisa mvura chiri pamusha.   “Tinowanzotamba zvakanaka tiri pamusha saka tine chivimbo chikuru kuti tichatamba zvinogutsa uye zvinofadza. Vatambi vedu vange vachitamba mitambo yakasiyana-siyana saka tinofanirwa kutamba zvepamusoro. Hatina hedu kutamba mitambo yakawanda asi ndinoziva vatambi vari kutarisira zvikuru mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Sri Lanka yakapedzisira kutamba nemaChevrons mumitambo yeTest match mugore ra2016 ndokuhwina mitambo yose iri miviri.   Zvakadaro, ZC yakazivisa svondo rino kuti Sean Williams ndiye achange ari kaputeni wechikwata ichi mumitambo yeTest match kozoti Chamu Chibhabha achambofanobatawo chigaro chehukaputeni mumitambo yeOne Day International neTwenty20 series.   Vaviri ava vakatsiva Hamilton Masakadza uyo akasendeka kutamba mutambo uyu gore radarika.   Masakadza ave director of cricket kuZC uye ndiye akakurudzira bhodhi reZC kuti rikwidziridze vatambi vaviri ava kuvagadza pazvigaro izvi.

column2: ‘NETBALL IRI MUMHURI’
column3: MUTAMBI wenetball wechikwata chenyika chemaGems, Ursula Ndlovu (25), anoti amai vake ndivo vakamumanikidza kuti atambe mutambo uyu sezvo iye aive nerudo rwemujaho wekumhanya.   Vazhinji vanoziva Ursula – uyo anotambira chikwata cheHarare City Queens zvakare, ari mumwe weshasha dzemaGems dzakanetsa kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup akaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland nguva yadarika.   Mutambi uyu ange ave nemakore achinetsa mumutambo uyu izvo zvakambomuona achihwina mibairo inosanganisira Moment of the Match mune mumwe mutambo waakanotamba kuSouth Africa.   Ursula anoti achikura akadzidza kuzvikoro zvinosanganisira Nkulumane Primary neMsiteli High School, kuBulawayo uye aikwikwidza mumujaho wekumhanya.   Anoti mugore ra2013 ndipo paakatanga kutamba netball akurudzirwa namai vake – Norah Ndlovu – avo vakambotambawo mutambo uyu.   “Ini mwoyo wangu waive pamujaho wekumhanya, ndizvo ndaida nekuti ndaive ndiri pfuti pakutiza. Asi, amai vangu ndivo vakati ndisiye zvekumhanya nditange kutamba netball.   “Saka mugore ra2013 ndipo ndakatanga kutamba ndikapinda muchikwata chemupurovhinzi tikanokwikwidza kumakwishu emaYouths Games, kubva ipapo handina kuzobvira ndatarira shure.   “Netball ndiyo yave hupenyu hwangu uye yandiendesa kune dzimwe nyika dzandaisafungira kuti ndichazoenda muhupenyu hwangu,” anodaro Ursula.   Anoti amai vake vakatombonetsa vachitambawo netball muchikwata chenyika kare chisati chave kuzivikanwa semaGems uye vairaidzwa naLedwin Dondo uyo anove ave kurairidzawo Ursula zvakare.   Ursula anoti anopa kutenda kuna amai vake vakaita kuti atambe netball sezvo yave kumupa pundutso muhupenyu hwake.   “Amai vangu iGaffa chairo, vaive shasha panetball uye ndivo vakaita kuti ndive nerudo nemutambo uyu. Asi chinondifadza hangu parizvino ndechekuti amai vangu vakarairidzwa naLedwin Dondo vari kuchikwata chenyika uye nhasi Dondo ndiye ave murairidzi wangu.   “Kashoma kuzviona zvichiitika izvozvo kumitambo yakasiyana,” anodaro.   Anoenderera achiti, “Nhasi netball yandipa hupenyu hwandaisambofungira. Iye zvino ndave kukwanisa kuchengeta mhuri yekwandinobva kusanganisira ambuya vangu vakandichengeta Gogo Matshabalala, handidi navo. Amai pavaienda kunotamba netball, gogo ndivo vaisara neni vachindichengeta saka nhasi yave nguva yanguwo yekuvachengeta.   “Izvezvi pandinoenda kunze kwenyika kunotamba netball mwanasikana wanguwo ndinomuendesa kwagogo vangu kumusha vanosara naye vachimuchengeta sekundichengeta kwavaiita ini,” anodaro Ursula.   Mutambi uyu akwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvakasiyana zvinosanganisira Beta Queens, Connemara neHarare Queens uye akatanga kutambira maGems mugore ra2017.   Ursula anoti shuviro yake anoda kuzonotambira zvikwata zvekunze kwenyika dzakaita seAustralia, England neNew Zealand uko kunotambwa netball yepamusoro.

column2: Vanhukadzi Vozeya Zvipingaidzo Zvavo Munyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika
column3: Apo nyika iri kugadzirira sarudzo dzichaitwa gore rino, vanhukadzi vakawanda vari kuchema nerekuti havasi kuwaniswa mikana inokodzera kuti vakwikwidze musarudzo nepamusana pezvimhinga mupinyi zvakawanda.\n\nMurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu uye vachitungamira sangano re #This Constitution, Our Constitution, Muzvare Abigail Mupambi, vanoti vanhukadzi vave kushaya mikana yekupinda mune zevmatongerwo enyika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyanas-siyana. Muzvare Mupambi vanoti vanhukadzi vari kuodzwa moyo nemabatirwo avanoitwa zvikuru nevanhurume, dzimwe nguva vachishungurudzwa. Munyori mukuru weboka reWomen’s Committee musangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, Amai Barbara Tanyanyiwa, avo vari kuda kumirira Bulawayo metropolitan mubato reMDC T pasi pechikamu cheProportional Representation, vanotiwo kushaya mari nderimwe rematambudziko akatarisana nevanhukadzi vanenge vachida kupinda mune zvematongerwo enyika. Muzvare Natasha Karimakwenda, avo vari kuda kukwikwidza pachinzvimbo chehukanzura vakazvimirira vega, vanotiwo vanhukadzi vanopinda mune zvematongerwo enyika vanosangana nezvimhingamupinyi zvakawanda, vachiti vakaona zvakanaka kuti vakwikwidze vakazvimirira vega nekuti mapato akawanda haanyatsotsigira vanhukadzi vanoda kupinda pazvigaro zvakasiyana siyana. Asi Muzvare Karimakwenda vanoti havawone kuve nemari chiri chinhu chakakosha pakuve mutungamiri mune zvematongerwo enyika. Mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende, Muzvare Jessie Majome, vanoti kunze kwekuvhiringidzwa nenzira dzakasiyana-siyana nevanhurume, rimwe dambudziko revanhukadzi, inyaya yekuvhiringidzana pachavo. Muzvare Majome vanoti sezvo vanhukadzi vakawanda munyika kupfuura vanhurume, vanofanirwa kushandisa mukana uyu vachitsigirana mukupinzana muzvigaro zvematongerwo enyika. Gweta rinoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Women Lawyers Association, Amai Sethule Ncube, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhukadzi vapinde muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri nekuti ndivo vanonyatsonzwisisa matambudziko akasiyana-siyana avanosangana nawo zuva nezuva. Amai Ncube vanoti panofanirwa kuve nemitemo yakajeka inotsigira kupinda kwemadzimai muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri mune zvematongerwo enyika. Asi Amai Tanyanyiwa vanoti mitemo inobatsira kusimudzira vanhukadzi yavepo, asi chinodiwa ndechekuti mitemo iyi iwonekwe kuti yanyatsoshanda. Kune chirevo chekuti ukasimudzira munhukadzi unenge wasimudzira nyika yose. Madzimai anoti zvakakosha kuti pave nematanho akajeka anobatsira kuti vanhukadzi munyika vapinde muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri mune zvematongerwo enyika. Madzimai akawanda anoti kana izvi zvikasaitwa, kuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi munyika kuchangoramba zviri zviroto. No media source currently available

column2: VanaMukoti muZvipatara zveKanzuru Vobatana naVanaChiremba Kuramwa Mabasa
column3: Zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehutano zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo sezvo vanamukoti muzvipatara zvekanzuru vatanga kuramwa mabasa ukuwo hurumende iri kutatarika kugadzirisa dambudziko ravanachiremba muzvipatara zvehurumende vapedza mwedzi miviri vachiratidzira. Studio 7 yashanyira chipatara cheParirenyatwa nhasi ikaona kuine varwere vashoma shoma. Vakuru pachipatara ichi vange vachienderera mberi nekutonga vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. Matare aya akatanga nemusi weChishanu uye vamwe vanachiremba vachatongwa nemusi weChitatu. Sachigaro weHealth Service Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti nemusi weChishanu vanachiremba havana kuuya kumatare avainge vadanwa kuti vapindure kuti sei vari kuramba kudzoka kubasa sezvakaturwa nedare reLabour Court. Pavabvunzwa neStudio 7 kuti pane vati vadzingwa here, VaSikosana vati kupindura mubvunzo uyu kungava kufukura hapwa. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Masimba Dean Ndoro vaudza Studio 7 mushure memusangano wavaita nenhengo dzavo nhasi kuti dai hurumende yatsvaga nzira dzekuita hurukuro navo kwete kuramba vachitora nzira dzisingagadzirisi dambudziko riripo. Asi Doctor Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakagadzirira kuita hurukuro navanachiremba ava chero nguva. Vati svondo rapera vakatomboita hurukuro asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Zvichakadaro, vanamukoti muzvipatara zvekanzuru vatangawo kuramwa mabasa. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare VaMichael Chideme vatenda kuti vanamukoti vatanga kuramwa mabasa uye vati vari kuyedza kutaurirana navo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutungamiri wesangano revashandi vekanzuru reHarare Municipality Workers Union VaCosmas Bungu sezvo vanzi vange vabuda muhofisi vachisiya nharembozha yavo. Makirinika akawanda muguta reHarare ndeekanzuru uye kuramwa mabasa kwavanamukoti kuchapa kuti zvinhu zvitonyanye kuipa muguta rinomboita zvirwere zvakaita setyphoid necholera uye ikozvino mwaka wekunaya. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano uye vari nhengo yeMDC Doctor Henry Madzorera vashora hurumende nekupedza mwedzi miviri isina kugadzirisa dambudziko ravanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. VaMadzorera vatiwo idambudziko rehurumende kuda kunenedzera nekusvora vamwe kunyange vari ivo varikukanganisa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisawo kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezveutano VaObadiah Moyo asi mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa svondo rapera vakaudza vechidiki vebato reZanuPF kuti pane vari kunyengedza vana chiremba kuti vasadzokera kumabasa kuti hurumende yavo igoshorwa izvo vanachiremba vari kuramba. No media source currently available

column2: DeMbare ndokuti bhora: Jaure
column3: MUTAMBI weDynamos FC nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors – Partson Jaure – anoti kudzoka kwenhabvu kunofadza zvikuru sezvo mutambo uyu uriwo unounza raramo kuvatambi vazhinji. Jaure, uyo anove kaputeni weDeMbare, anoti hupenyu hwevatambi vakawanda hwange hwakatokanganiswa nekumbomiswa kwakaitwa nhabvu kubvira gore rapera nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Anoti vatambi vaishushikana zvikuru nekungogara sezvo vange vasisina chekubata asi kudzoka kwemutambo uyu kwave kuvabatsira kuti hupenyu hwavo huchiendeka.   “Isu tinoraramiswa nenhabvu, ndicho chingwa chedu chatinodya mangwanani, masikati uye nemanheru. Saka kana nhabvu isipo tinofa nenzara. “Hupenyu hwange huchirwadza kungogara nekuti hapana mari yatange tichiwana, zvange zvichirema. Asi nhabvu zvayadzoka manje, hupenyu hwedu hwave kuchiendeka,” anodaro Jaure. Kudzoka kwenhabvu kuri kuona zvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League (PSL) zvichikwikwidza mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup.   Jaure anoti mutambo uyu wakaoma zvikuru sezvo zvikwata zvose zviri kurwisana neDeMbare. Anoti DeMbare kubva kare chikwata chihombe zvokuti mitambo yacho inenge isiri nyore sezvo zvikwata zvose zvichitsvaga mbiri pavari.   “Kana uchitambira Dynamos unofanira kunge wakazvipira kuifira nekuti chikwata ichi chihombe uye chikwata chose chinosangana nesu chinenge chichitotsvaga mbiri patiri. Mutambi wese anotoda kunzi akunda Dynamos nekuti kuti DeMbare ndokuti bhora, saka isu totofanira kugara takagadzirira. “Mumitambo yeChibuku yatiri kutamba iye zvino haisi nyore nekuti zvimwe zvikwata zvinenge zvichida kuti tibude kuitira kuti zviwane mukana. Saka isu tiri kutofanira kushanda nesimba tivarakidze kuti tiri shasha panyaya dzenhabvu,” anodaro Jaure.   Jaure abva kure munyaya dzenhabvu izvo zvakambomuona achinotamba kuSouth Africa kuchikwata cheUniversity of Pretoria uye akambonotambira kuZambia zvekare kuchikwata cheBuildcon. MuZimbabwe, akambotambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Ngezi Platinum Stars neManica Diamond ndokuzodzoka kumusha kuDeMbare uko akarerwa akaita mukurumbira.   Achitaura pamusoro pemafambiro aaita munhabvu anoti, “Zvinofadza kumbonotamba kune dzimwe nyika wodzidza zvinoitwa ikoko. Ndakadzidza zvakwanda mukufamba kwandakamboita, asi iye zvino ndadzoka zvandakadzidza kunze kwenyika ndiri kuzvishandisa kubatsira vechidiki vari kusimukira mumutambo uyu vazive kuti zvofambiswa sei uye zvii zvinodiwa kuti mutambi abudirire mumutambo uyu.”   Zvakadaro, svondo rino DeMbare ichange iri pamusha apo ichasangana neHarare City mumutambo wechishanu weChibuku Super Cup.   DeMbare ndiyo iri kutungamira muboka rayo umo mune zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti CAPS United, ZPC Kariba neHerentals.

column2: Tsiva mberi, mari mumashure-Musonda
column3: MURAIRIDZI wetsiva ane mukurumbira arizve nyanzvi yekuronga mitambo uyu, Clyde Musonda, anoti vatambi pakutanga havafanire kutungamidza mari asi kuti vagadzire mazita avo.   Achitaura neKwayedza, Musonda anoti chinodiwa mumutambo wetsiva kuti munhu atange agadzira zita rake, zvemari zvozotevera.   “Tsiva pari zvino haina mari, vatsigirri chaivo hakuna. Asi vatambi tinovakurudzira kuti ngavasatungamidza mari sezvo chikuru kuti vagadzire mazita avo.   “Zita ndiro rakakosha nekuti ukahwina mitambo yakawanda uchirwira nzungu, mitambo ine mari inotanga kuuya uye kana mapuromota ekunze anotanga kukutsvaga voda kushanda newe nekuti vanenge vaona chiedza chakanaka pauri,” anodaro Musonda.   Musonda pari zvino ari kurairidza vatambi vatanhatu muchikwata chake cheDeltaforce Boxing Academy achitsigirwa neGypsite Sports Promotions.   Pavatambi vatanhatu ava, vana ndevemuZimbabwe nevaviri vekuMalawi.   VemuZimbabwe ndiTinashe “Chairman” Madziwana uyo anova shasha ine bhande reZimbabwe National Super Bantamweight, Collin Nyamambisha anorwa muboka reheavyweight, Simon Madanhire naTinashe Mutodza kuchizoti vatambi vekuMalawi ndiAnisha Bashil naIsreal Kamwamba.

column2: VaMnangagwa Vokurudzira Makurukota Avo Kusiyana neHuwori
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakomekedza makurukota ehurumende yavo kuti asiyane nekuita zvehuwori, uye kuti vave vanhu vanokwanisa kumira pachokwadi. VaMnangangwa vataura izvi pamusangano wesvondo yeZAOGA waitirwa muHarare neSvondo. Vachitaura pamusangano wechimakumi mana nepfumbamwe wemafundisi epasi rose echechi yeZAOGA waitirwa muHarare, mutungamiri wesvondo iyi Archbishop Ezekiel Guti vakurudzira mafundisi esvondo yavo kuti vave vanhu vasina huwori uye vanokwanisa kumira muhutsvene kuitira kuti zvavanoparidza zvitambirike kune vavanoparidzira. Mashoko aVaGuti aya atsinhirwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa avo vati hurumende yavo yakazvipira kurwisana nehuwori, uhwo hunonzi hwatekeshera muhurumende. VaMnangagwa vati makurukota ehurumende yavo anofanirawo kusiyana nenyaya dzehuwori. Asi mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa vakaudza vatsigiri vavo muHarare svondo rapera kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa haina kumira pachokwadi panyaya yekurwisa huwori. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo vedzisvondo kuti vanamatire nyika igare iine runyarararo. Mumwe mufundisi wesvondo iyi, Amai Sibongile Mkhize, vati sevedzisvondo havasi kuzoneta kuona kuti nyaya dzekurwisana nehuwori pamwe nehutungamiri hwakanaka zvatevedzerwa nevanenge vari muhurumende. VaNesbert Mhuriyengwe, avo vanga vari mumwe wevafundisi vanga vachipinda musangano uyu, vati zvavadzidza pamusangano uyu zvinhu zvichabatsirawo nyika kubudikidza nekuparidza kwavachange vachiita. Zvichakadai, VaMnangagwa vatenda svondo yeZAOGA nekuvaka zvikoro pamwe nekubatsira kwakaitwa nesvondo iyi nezvekudya nezvekupfeka kune vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu emvura eCyclone Idai gore rapera. Musangano weZAOGA uyu, uyo wapindwa nemafundisi anodarika zviuru zvishanu kubva kunyika dzakasiyana-siyana pasi rose, unoitwa gore rega-rega uye musangano uyu wanga uri wechimakumi mana nepfumbamwe kubva pakavambwa chechi yeZaoga muna 1960. VaMnangagwa vatorawo mukana uyu kukorokotedza chechi iyi nekusvitsa kwayaita makore makumi matanhatu gore rino kubva zvayavambwa. No media source currently available

column2: ‘Tagadzirira’ . . . bhora ngaritambwe.
column3: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa svondo rino kunhandare dzinosanganisira National Sports Stadium muHarare, Mandava Stadium (Zvishavane) neBabourfields (Bulawayo) uko zvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League zvichatatsurana mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup.   Iyi ichave mitambo yekutanga yezvikwata izvi kubva pakamiswa mitambo yose munaKurume gore rapera nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nevarairidzi vezvikwata zvakasiyana avo vakarakidza mufaro mukuru nekudzoka kwenhabvu.   Murairidzi weFC Platimun, shasha dzePSL, Norman Mapeza anoti nguva yanga yareba vatambi vakangogara.    Mapeza   “Isu semakore ese tinotambira kuti tihwine uye iye zvino tiri kushanda nesimba kuti tigohwina. Asi tiri kutanga patsva nekuti takashandura zvakawanda kuchikwata chedu, vamwe vatambi vakaenda kukauya vamwe. Saka tichafamba nebhora nekuti tinoziva kuti zvimwe zvikwata zvinoda kusvika patiri,” anodaro Mapedza. FC Platinum kana kuti Pure Platinum Play iri muboka reGroup 4 rine zvikwata zvinoti Ngezi Platinum, Triangle neWhahwa. Murairidzi weDynamos FC – Tonderai “Stanza” Ndiraya – anoti nhabvu yadzoka panguva yakanaka chose. Anoti DeMbare yagara inozivikanwa sechikwata chikuru saka mwaka uno vanoda kurakidza nyika yose kuburikidza nekuhwina mikombe yakawanda.   “Zita rekungoti Dynamos chete ihombe uye zvakawanda zvinotarisirwa kubva kwatiri. Saka isu sechikwata tinovimbisa kuti tichashanda nesimba kuti mwaka uno vatsigiri vedu vagofara tahwina mikombe yakasiyana.   “Asi sezvo tange tave nenguva ndefu takangogara, tinokumbira kuvatsigiri vedu kuti ngavatipe nguva kana tikakundikana tinenge takundikana sezvo vakomana vachiri nengura. Asi ndinofara hangu nekuti tiri kutangirana zvikwata zvose sezvo tose tange takagara nguva ndefu,” anodaro Ndiraya.   DeMbare yakaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti CAPS United, Henrentals, Harare City neZPC Kariba. Iri ndiro rega boka rine zvikwata zvitanhatu sezvo mamwe ese ane zvikwata zvina.   Kuchiti kuBulawayo, murairidzi weChicken Inn — Joey “Mafero” Antipas — anoti chikwata chake hachisati chambohwina Chibuku Super Cup saka vacharwa semvumba gore rino kuti vatore mukombe uyu. Mafero akatungamira maGamecocks mugore ra2015 kuhwina mukombe wePSL.   “Kudzoka kwenhabvu kunofadza uye tiri kutanga nemukombe weChibuku uyo tisati tambohwina sechikwata saka mwaka uno ticharwa semvumba kuti tiuhwine,” anodaro MaGamecocks ari muboka reGroup 2 rine zvikwata zvinoti Bulawayo City, Bulawayo Chiefs neHighlanders.   KuManicaland, murairidzi wechikwata chichangopinda muPSL cheCranborne Bullets — Nesbert “Yabo” Saruchera — anoti ino ndiyo nguva chikwata chavo yange yakamirira.   “Nguva yatange takamirira yazosvika manje, tange takamirira kwenguva ndefu saka tiri kufara uye takagadzirira kusangana nezvimwe zvikwata tigovarakidza kuti isu tauya tichipisa.   “Mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup, vamwe vari muboka redu ngavazive kuti isu tatobudirira kufambira mberi mumutambo uyu. Hatina kupinda kuzozadzikisa mazita kwete asi tinoda kutaridza nyika kuti nhabvu iyi tinotoiziva,” anodaro Saruchera.   MATCH DAY 1 GROUP 1 Caps United FC v Yadah FC Harare City FC v ZPC Kariba FC Herentals FC v Dynamos FC GROUP 2 Bulawayo City FC v Chicken Inn FC; Bulawayo Chiefs FC v Highlanders FC GROUP 3 Tenax FC v Black Rhinos FC Manica Diamonds FC v Cranborne Bullets FC GROUP 4 Ngezi Platinum Stars FC v Triangle United FC

column2: Vemitambo rongekai: Coventry
column3: GURUKOTA revechidiki, mitambo nekutandara, Kirsty Coventry, vanoti hutungamiri hwemitambo yese hunofanirwa kurongeka uye kugadzira magwaro anoratidza hurongwa hwavo hwemakore gumi anotevera.   Gurukota iri rakataura mashoko aya pamusangano warakaita nevatori venhau dzezvemitambo vanoshanda vari pasi peZimpapers nemusi weChishanu chadarika muguta reHarare.   Musangano uyu wakapindwa zvakare nasachigaro webhodhi reZimpapers, Dr Tommy Sithole, nachamangwiza wekambani iyi VaPikirayi Deketeke.   “Basa randiri kuita kugadzira nzira yemakore 10 anotevera iyo ichabatsira kuti mitambo yedu muno igosimukira zvekuti rimwe gurukota richazonditsiva mune ramangwana rinosvika basa rakagadzirwa kare, ropfuurira mberi.   “Tiri ipapo zvekare, kumitambo yese muno tiri kuvakurudzira kuti ngavagadzire magwaro avo ayo anoratidza kuti mumakore 10 anotevera vachange vachifambisa sei basa ravo,” vanodaro.   Dr Coventry vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Isu tinoda kuona kuti muchafambisa sei basa renyu uye vechidiki muri kuvasimudzira sei nekuti ndivo vatinofanirwa kugadzirira remangwana ravo.”   Vanoti munyika muno mune hutungamiri hwemitambo yakasiyana inosvika 60 uye 12 chete kusvika pari zvino ndiyo isati yave kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo rezvemitambo.   “Kutanga gore rinotevera, vemitambo ipi neipi vachauya vachitsvaga mari kwandiri vasarirwa nemazuva mashoma kuti vaende kumakwikwi akasiyana, havana kana sendi randinovapa, kuratidza kusarongeka ikoko.   Vamwe vanozotanga kumhanya-mhanya kumapepanhau kunotaura kuti ndiri kuvanyima mari.   “Muno munyika mune mitambo inosvika 60 uye 12 chete kutaura kuno ndiyo isiri kutevedza gwaro ratakavapa nekudaro ivavo hatina mari yatinovapa kusvika vagadzirisa zvatinoda.   Sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) riripo kuvabatsira kuti magwaro avo arongeke,” vanodaro.

column2: Vanotengesa Zvinhu Mumigwagwa Voisa Zvipikiri Munzeve Dzavo
column3: Vatengesi vemumigwagwa vari kushoropodza zvikuru kanzuru yeHarare iyo vanoti yakavaudza kuti ichashandisa mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police kuvadzinga mumigwagwa mavanotengesera. Senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheTyphoid, kanzuru yeHarare neChipiri yakapa vanotengesera zvinhu zvavo mumigwagwa mazuva maviri kuti vamire kuita izvi. Kunyange hazvo mazuva aya apfuura, vatengesi ava havasati vabuda mumigwagwa uye vanoti havasi kuzobuda. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri we Sangano re Zimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Association, ZCIEA, iro rinomirira vanobata mabasa emaoko, Amai Olivia Songere, vashora zvikuru kanzuru nekuda kushandisa huturu pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau. Mumwe mutengesi, VaGivus Maririmba, vashoropodzawo kanzuru yeHarare nekupomera vatengesi vemumigwagwa kuti ndivo vari kukonzoresa kuti hutachiona hwetyphoid hwupararire. VaMaririmba vatiwo kutengesa mumigwagwa kuri kukonzerwa nekushaikwa kwemabasa VaMaririmba vashorawo mitemo inoshandiswa nemakanzuru iyo yavati ndeyehudzvanyiriri yaishandiswa nehurumende yavachena. Mukuru wesangano reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanotiwo kupomerana mhosva hakusiko kunopedza dambudziko rezvirwere zvemudumbu. VaShumba vari kukurudzira kanzuru kuti iterese mitero vanotengesa mumigwagwa, mari yainenge yawana, yoshandiswa mukuchenesa nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa. Mutauriri wekanzuru ye Harare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti kanzuru ichazenge ichibatsirwa nemapurisa kubvisa nechisimba vatengesi vari kurambira mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Vobvumidzwa Kupinza Munyika Pachena Zvinhu Zvine Mutengo we$200 Chete
column3: Asi zvinenge zvapfurikidza pamazana maviri emadhora aya zvichizochajwa mutero wezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, kana kuti 40%. Kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika munyaya dzezveupfumi kunonzi kuri kupa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvirambe zvichipinza munyika zvekudya nezvimwe zvekushandisa zuva nezuva kubva kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBotswana. Izvi zvinoitika kunyange hazvo paine mutemo weStatutory Instrument 64, uyo unorambidza kupinzwa kwezvinhu zvine huwandu munyika. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga nekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika, reIntrenational Cross Border Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vanoti kunyange hazvo paine mutemo uyu, vashandi veZimbabwe Revenue Authority, Zimra, vari pamuganhu weBeitbridge vane zvimwe zvavari kubvumidza kupinzwa munyika. VaJuru vanoti zvinhu zvinokosha madhora mazana maviri chete pamunhu, ndizvo zvinobvumidzwa kupinda munyika pasina mutero. Asi zvinenge zvapfurikidza pamazana maviri emadhora aya zvichizochajwa mutero wezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, kana kuti 40 %. Asi VaJuru vanoti zvinhu zvakaita sezvekuvakisa, mabhara nezvimwe zvihombe hazvisi kubvumidzwa munyika pasi pemutemo weSI 64 uyu. Vanotiwo mitsetse yevanhu vanoda kupinda muZimbabwe pabhodha reBeitbridge, zvikuru kudivi reSouth Africa, hapachina sezvo South Africa yakawedzera vashandi. Asi vanoti vari kufamba vari kusangana nematambudziko ekukwidzwa kwemari dzekubhadhara kumabhazi, vachiti semuenzaniso, kubva ku Johannesburg kunosvika kuHarare vanhu vari kubhadhariswa mari inosvika marhandi mazana masere. No media source currently available

column2: VaMushowe Vanokundikana Zvakare Kumira Pamberi peKomiti yeParamende
column3: Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaChristopher Mushowe, neChina vatadza zvekare kuuya kukomiti yeparamende kuti vazotaura matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende mukugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatori venhau pamwe nekusunungura masai sai ematerevhizheni. Nhengo dzeparamende kubva kubato rinopikisa pamwe nemasangano anomirira vatori venhau varatidza kutsamwa kukuru nenamaitiro aVaMushowe avo vakatadza kuuya kudare iri svondo rapera mushure mekunge vakokwa nekomiti yeparamende. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, uye vachimirira Mabvuku, VaJames Maridadi veMDC-T, vati kuita kwaVaMushowe kuri kudzorera shure nyaya dzekugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatapi venhau. Mukuru wesangano rinomiriria nhepfenyuro dzemumatunhu, reZimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations, Muzvare Vivian Marara, vatiwo zvinoratidza kuti VaMushowe havana chido chekusandura mutemo yekutapwa kwenhau munyika. Muzvare Kholiwe Majama Nyoni veMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe vashorawo kuita kwaVaMushowe. Vatiwo komiti yeparamende iyi haifaniri kurega VaMushowe vachiita madiro aJojina uye inofanira kutora matanho akaoma kuti VaMushowe vauye kudare iri. Vanoona nzvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano Media Alliance of Zimbabwe, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vati kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nemaitiro aVaMushowe, vanoonawo sekuti komiti yeparamende iyi haisi kuita basa rayo nemazvo. Pavabvunzwa kuti vachaita sei naVaMushowe, sachigaro wekomiti iyi, VaWilliam Dhewa, vati VaMushowe vabatikana uye vanofanira kupihwa nguva. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMushowe kuti tinzwe kuti sei vari kutadza kuuya kuparamende. Kunyange hazvo mamwe mapazi ehurumende ari kuunza mabhiri kuparamande kuti mitemo iri pasi pawo isaundurwe kuti ifambirane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika, bazi raVaMushowe harina kana bhiri rarakaunza kudare kubva muna 2013 pakagadzwa bumbiro idzva. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwa kuti taura kuti mitemo yakaita seAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act, Broadcasting Services Act nemimwe ichasandurwa riini. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwawo kutsanangura kuti sei marezenezi eCapitalk neNyaminyami ayo akapihwa kukambani yeKingstons ave kushandiswa nekambani yeZimpapers. Masangano anomiriria vatori venhau azivisa kuti achaita musangano wechimbi chimbi kuti aronge kuti angaite sei naVaMushowe. Zvichakadai, komiti iyi svondo rinouya ichashanyira nhepfenyuro dzose ichiona kuti dziri kushanda sei. No media source currently available

column2: VaMnangagwa neVamwe Vakapidugura Hurumende Havana Kukokwa kuMusangano naVaBiden Uri Kutanga neChipiri
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nemusi weChipiri muWashington DC vari kuparura musangano wekudyidzana nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica kana kuti US-Africa leaders’ summit. Kunyangwe hazvo vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakawanda vakakokwa kumusangano uyu, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemutevedzeri wavo VaConstantino Chiwenga havana kukokwa nenyaya dzezvirango zvavakatemerwa vachipomerwa mhosva dzekutonga nedemo. Vamwe vatungamiri vasina kukokwa nekuda kwekupidigura hurumende nechisimba vanosanganisira veSudan, Mali, Burkina Faso neGuinea avo vakambomiswa kuva nhengo dzesangano reAfrican Union. Vatungamiri makumi mana nevashanu ndivo vakakokwa kumusangano uyu. Zimbabwe inenge yakamirirwa negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe VaFrederick Shava.  Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa vainge vakokwa vanonzi havachakwanise kuenda kuAmerica. VaRamaphosa vakatarisana nemhosva huru yavari kupomerwa yekuita zvehuwori vamwe vachiti vanofanira kumanikidzwa kusiya basa. Pane kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati peAmerica neZimbabwe nenyaya yezvirango iyi. Zimbabwe inoti zvapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hugwadame. Asi America inoti huwori nekutadza kutungamira ndiko kwapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hunange kumawere. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira sangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Commerce, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha kuAmerica iyo yave kusaririra munyaya dzezvekudyidzana neAfrica zvapa mukana wakakura kuRussia neChina. Asi hurumende yeAmerica inoramba kuti kuda kukwikwidzana neChina neRussia ndicho chinangwa chikuru chemusangano uyu. No media source currently available

column2: Nhomba yeCovid-19 Iri Kubva kuChina Ichapihwa Vanhu Isina Kuongororwa muZimbabwe
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti mushonga wekudzivirira Covid-19 uyo uri kutanga kusvika nemusi weMuvhuru ichibva China, unofanira kutevedza gwara rinoshandiswa pamishonga yese inopinda munyika rekuti unotanga waongoororwa kuti unoshanda sei muZimbabwe zvichienderana nemhando yehutachiwana huri muno usati wapihwa veruzhinji. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti mushonga usati watengwa, Zimbabwe, kuburikidza nebazi rehutano, inotanga yaongorora kuti mushonga uyu wakagadzirwa sei kunyika kwaunobva, uye kuti zvawakashatira ndezvipi veruzhinji vasati vapihwa mushonga uyu. Vati panopinda mushonga uyu munyika, unofanira kutanga waongororwa sezvo wakagadzirwa kudunhu repasi rino rakasiyana neZimbabwe. VaMadzorera vati ongororo iyi inogona kuitwa mukati meguva pfupi sezvo denda reCovid-19 riri kupararira nekusaika. VaMadzorera vati pari zvino havana ruzivo kuti izvi zvakaitwa here kana kuti kwete sezvo hurumende isiri kubuda pachena nehurongwa hwayo. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano, Dr Peter Mataruse, vatiwo tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe, ichaongorora mishonga yeCovid-19 sezvainoita pamishonga yese inopinda munyika sezvinodiwa nemitemo yakaita kuti bazi iri riumbwe munyika. Vati ongororo idzi dzinogona kuitwa kunyange hazvo mushonga watove munyika. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vatsinhira mashoko emamwe machiremba, vachiti paramende inotarisira kuti bazi rehutano richavapakurira zvizere nemusi weChipiri pavanotanga kugara dare reNational Assembly. Mukuru weMedicine Control Authority of Zimbabwe, VaRichard Rukwata, vatiwo vakapa hurumende mvumo yekuunza mishonga yeCovid-19 munyika mushure mekunge yatevedza zvese zvinodiwa pasi pemitemo yenyika. Pasi pechibvumirano cheZimbabwe Covid-19 National Development and Vacccination Strategy, Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe inopa mvumo yekuunza nekushandisa mishonga iyi mukati memazuva mashanu ichinge yapihwa humbowo hunoratidza kuti mishonga iyi yakanyoreswa munyika dzayakagadzirwa, uye kuti yakanyoreswawo nesangano reWorld Health Organisation here kana kuti kwete. Vati panofanirawo kuitwa ongororo yekuona kuti mishonga iyi haikanganise here vanhu munyika yose. Vati kunyange hazvo ongororo dzakadai dzichikwanisa kutora nguva yakareba, dzinokwanisa kuitwa mukati memazuva manomwe sezvo mishonga iyi iri kushandiswa zvechimbichimbi. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati hurumende yakatevedza zvese zvinodiwa uye vari kutevedza hunyanzvi hwesainzi pamatanho ese avari kutora. Gurukota rezvehutano, uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vati zvinhu zose zviri mugwara uye mushonga uri kusvika munyika, uchabva wapihwa vanhu vari muchikamu chekutanga kuwana nhomba iyi. Vanhu ava vanosanganisira vana chiremba, vakoti, vashandi vemuzvipatara nevose vanoita mabasa anonzi akakosha zvikuru. Izvi zvinoburitsa pachena kuti hurumende haina hurongwa hwekutanga yaongorora nhomba iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji. Mutangamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanotarisira kugamuchira mishonga yeSinopharm inosvika mazana maviri ezviuru nemusi weMuvhuro painosvika munyika ichibva kuChina. No media source currently available

column2: ZIMTA Inoti Nhengo Dzayo Hadzichakwanisa Kuramba Dzichienda Kumabasa
column3: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, re Zimbabwe Teachers Association (ZIMTA), rabatanawo nemamwe masangano evarairidzi pakuzivisa kuti nhengo dzaro hadzichakwanisa kuramba dzichienda kumabasa sezvo dzisisina mari dzekufambisa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaRichard Gundani, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzichange dzichienda kumabasa kaviri chete pasvondo, Muvhuro neChishanu. VaGundani vanoti danho ratorwa nesangano ravo rinotsinhira danho rakaziviswa nesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, re APEX Council, rekuti vashandi vehurumende vakanga vasisakwanise kuramba vachienda kumabasa mazuva ose. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi vakaudza Studio 7 neSvondo kuti hurumende yakasununguka kuramba ichiita hurukuro nevashandi vayo pamusoro pemihoro yavo. Masangano anomiririra varairidzi, e Propgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe neAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ndemamwe masangano evarairidzi akatozivisa kare kuti nhengo dzawo dzakanga dzisisakwanise kuramba dzichienda kumabasa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzave kutangidza kuratidzira vhiki yega yega kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvevarairidzi. Mutungamiriri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo richatangidza kudzidzisa nekubatsira vana vechikoro pa nzvimbo dzavachazivisa asi kwete muzvikoro. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi re zvedzidzo kuti izvi zvichibvumidzwa here nemitemo yenyika. No media source currently available

column2: Varimi vePurazi reWadzanayi kuLalapanzi Vonetsana neKambani yekuChina YeAsia Ferry Yakapinda muPurazi Ravo
column3: Varimi vepapurazi remushandirapamwe reWadzanayi Cooperative kuLalapanzi mudunhu reMidlands vanoti vari kushungurudzwa neimwe kambani yekuChina yeAsia Ferry, iyo vari kuti yakatora chidimbu chepurazi ravo uye vashandi vayo vari kugezera chicherwa che chrome mupurazi ravo. Varimi ava vanotiwo zvizvarwa zvekuChina izvi zvatove kuchengeta makwai mupurazi ravo. Munyori wemushandirapamwe uyu, VaDominic Mngwabi, vanoti kambani iyi inonzi yakapinda muchibvumirano nemuridzi wepurazi iri pedyo neyavo chekuti ishandise, asi yakatobvisa muganhu waivepo kare ichipinda mupurazi ravo. Vanotiwo chiitiko ichi chakanganisa mhuri dzinosvika zana nemakumi manomwe nesere dziri papurazi reWadzanayi iri, kuburikidza nekuisa hutano hwavo pamwe nehwezvipfuwozvavo munjodzi yekukanganiswa nemishonga iri kushandiswa kugeza matombo ari kucherwa nekambani iyi. VaMngwabi vanoti vakamboedza kuti vagare pasi nemukuru wekambani iyi anonzi Tony asi vanoti akaramba kutaura navo, akatovirima achiti vaende kunomhang'ara kwavanoda uye kuganza achiti haana zvavanomuita.
