Vanoti vakazoperekedzwa negweta ravo neChitatu svondo rino vachinosiya gwaro rine nyunyuto dzavo kuhofisi yekambani iyi iri papurazi ravo, asi havasati vawana mhinduro. Vanotiwo vakaedza kugara pasi nemuridzi wepurazi kuti varatidzane miganho yemapurazi avo iye achiedzawo kutaura vekambani iyi kuti vagarisane zvakanaka nevavakidzani vavo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata vakuru vekambani yeAsia Ferry kuti tinzwe divi ravo. VaMngwabi vanoti rimwe dambudziko riri kukonzerwa nekambani yezvizvarwa zvekuChina iyi ndeye kuparadzwa kwemigwagwa yavopamwe neguruva ravanoti rave kutadzisa vagari kana kuwacha mbatya vachiyanika pamisha yavo. No media source currently available

column2: Voruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19
column3: Veruzhinji vari kukurudzirwa kuti vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 uye kuti vasateerere zvinobuda pamadandemutande zvisingabvi kunyanzvi dzehutano pamusoro penhomba dze Covid-19 sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kupedzisira vapinda muna taisireva. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano, Dr Brighton Chireka, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kusaungana kundufu panguva ino yedenda reCovid-19 uye vateerere zvinotaurwa nebazi rezvehutano pamusoro pehuwandu hwevanhu vanofanirwa kunge vari parufu. Dr Chireka vanoti panguva ino yeCovid-19, chakakosha kubaiwa nhomba yechirwere ichi nekutevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organisation yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki, vageze mawoko uye vagare vakataramukana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. "Tinokurudzira zveruzhinji kuti vaende kunobayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuti vawane kuzvidzivirira ivo nemhuri dzavo sezvo denda iri riri kuuraya vazhinji uye dzimwe dzimba dzave kuto vharwa sezvo vanhu vazhinji vemhuri imwe vari kushaika panguva imwe,"vadaro Dr Chireka. "Tiri kuyambira vanenge vafirwa kuti vasaende nehuwandu kurufu sezvo kuri iko kuri kupararira zvakanyanya denda iri reCovid-19," vadaro Dr Chireka. Denda reCovid-19 rauraya vanhu zviuru zvina nemakumi mana nevanomwe, 4,047, uye kubata vanhu zviuru zana negumi nezvisere nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana, 118,754 No media source currently available

column2: FC Platinum Yotatsurana neEsperance muCaf Champions League
column3: Vatsigiri venhabvu munyika vane mukana wekuona chikwata chine mukurumbira muAfrica uye chine mukombe weCAF Champions league cheEsperance icho chiri kutamba neFC Platinum mangwana kuBarbourfields Stadium kuBulawayo. Esperance yakasimudzamukombe weCAF Champions katatu uku FC Platinum yakapinda mumini League kekutanga iri kutatarika zvakasimba ichikwanisa kungoita mapoinzi maviri chete pamitambo mishanu zvichireva kuti ndiyo iri pasi muGroup B. Esperance ndiyo iri pamusoro mugungano iine mapoinzi gumi nerimwe. FC Platinum yakatobuda mumakwikwi aya kare zvekuti changosara kungobudawo nechiremera nekukunda chikwata chine mukurumbira ichi. Pamusoro pemikombe mitatu yeCaf Champions League, Esperance yakambotora zvekare mukombe weAfrica Super Cup pamwe neweCaf Confederation Cup. Payakapedzisira kutamba mumakundano aya kuSouth Africa, FC Platinum yakaita rombo rakaipa apo yakakandwa chibodzwa, mutambo wave kupera vakatungamira 2-1, mutambo uyu ndokupera uri mangange Mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi Muzvare Olivia Mushipe vanoti FC Platinum ikatamba sezvayakaita neOrlando Pirates kuOrlando Stadium masvondo maviri apfuura inokwanisa kudonhedza gomo guru remuAfrica iri. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaObert Masvotore vanoti FC Platinum haifanire kuvhundutsirwa nemazita nekuti zvikwata zvakaita seEsperance zvinoroveka. Mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi vaMaxwell Mufandaedza vanoti vachitarisa matambiro avakaita kuTunisia, negadziriro yavaita ikozvino, varikuona chikwata chavo chichikunda, vachitiurira zvibodzwa. Asi FC Platinum inennge isina vatambi vatatu mumutambo uyu nekuda kwemacards avakapihwa, vatatu ava vanoti Gift Bello, Elvis Moyo naKelvin Madzongwe. Pavakatambira kuTunis, FC Platinum yakarohwa 2-0 mumutambo uyo vakatambisa mikana yakawandisa. UEFA Champions Mune mamwe makwikwi ange akatarisirwa nevakawanda eUEFA Champions league, draw yemaquater finals yemutambo uyu yakamira yakadai Ajax vs Juventus Liverpool vs Porto Tottenham vs Manchester City Manchester United vs Barcelona No media source currently available

column2: Mutemo weBritain Unorambidza Vanobva kuZimbabwe Unonzi Unobata Vashanyi Chete.
column3: Gweta vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF kuBritain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti danho rakatorwa nehurumende yeBritain rekumborambidza vanhu vanobva kuZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica rakangonangana nevanhu vanenge vachida kushanyira nyika iyi, kwete vanenge vaine magwaro ekugara pamwe nekushanda muBritain. Doctor Mavaza vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvagara zviine mabasa azvo kana kudzidza muBritain, uye zvine magwaro ekuzvarwa enyika mbiri idzi zvakabatwa nemutemo uyu zviri kunze kweBritain zvinokwanisa kudzokera zvisina dambudziko kana zvichingokwanisa kuzadzisa zvinodiwa nemiutemo wekudzivirira kuparadzirwa kweCovid-19. Muzinda weBritain muZimbabwe wakazivisa kutanga kwesvondo rino kuti hurumende yawo yakadzika mutemo unomborambidza vashanyi vanobva kuZimbabwe pamwe nedzimwe nyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica kupinda muBritain, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, icho chabata zvakasimba dunhu reSADC, kusanganisirawo neZimbabwe. Doctor Mavaza vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvichiri kunze kweBritain zviri kuda kunzwisisa nekujekeserwa pamusoro pemutemo uyu. Asi vanoti danho ratorwa neBritain iri rakanaka chose sezvo rcihidzivirira kupararira kwedenda ranetsa pasi rose iri. No media source currently available

column2: Danho reHurumende reKumira Kubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Yetatau Parizvino Rotambirwa neImwe Nyanzvi
column3: Vaimbova mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vanoti vanowirira nedanho rehurumende rekuti pari zvino imbosimbaradza hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba dzeCovid-19 mbiri pasati pabayiwa nhomba nhatu sezvave kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seAmerica. Nyika dzakabudirira dziri kubaya nhomba yetatu kune vakwegura nevanoshanda muzvipata sezvo zviri kunzi zvinobatsira masoja emuviri. Dr Mayida vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotenderabna nezvakataurwa panhepfenyuro ino nemukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 Dr Agnes Mahomva kuti vakoshese kubaya vanhu nhomba kaviri parizvino. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri negumi nevana zvine mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemanomwe kana kuti 3 214, 477 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwea vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemaviri zvine mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2, 472, 859. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshande sezvinotarisirwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vaviri vakafa neMugovera nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 4, 657. Vanhu makumi mana nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nemaviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nematatu kana kuti 132,333.

column2: Vanhu Voshaya Chikafu paRujeko Isolation Center kuMasvingo
column3:
Hurumende iri kukandirana nyoka mhenyu nekanzuru yeMasvingo panyaya yekuti ndiyani anofanirwa kupa chikafu varwere veCOVID-19 vakachengetwa paRujeko Isolation Center. Hama dzevanhu vari kugara paRujeko Isolation Center dzinoti varwere vari panzvimbo iyi havasi kuwana chikafu nguva dzose, zvokuti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuipa svondo rino. Nzvimbo iyi inotakura vanhu gumi, uye yakapihwa hurumende nekanzuru yeMasvingo pasi pehirongwa chehurumende chekuchengeta vanhu vanenge varwarisa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mumwe mugari ane hama yake pachipatara apa ada kuzivikanwa nekunzi Baba Gari, nekutyira kuti hama yavo inozopinzwa panguva yakaoma, vati
varwere vari kuchema chema kuti vave nemazuva vasingapuhwi chikafu, uye hama dzevarwere ava dzisingabvumidzwi kuigira hama dzavo chikafu Mukuru webazi rezvehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vati ivo
havasi kuziva kuti sei chikafu chiri kushaikwa nekuti chinofanaira
kubva kukanzuru sezvo iri iyo yakapa hurumende nzvimbo iyi.

Asi meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vati harisi basa rekanzuru yavo kupa varwere chikafu sezvo varwere ava vari mumaoko ehurumende. VaMaboke vati kubva pavakapa nzvimbo iyi kuhurumende, hurumende ndiyo yanga ichipa varwere ava chikafu chichibva kuchipatara chikuru cheMasvingo General Hospital.

Hama dzevarwere ava dzinoti hurumende inofanirwa kugara pasi nekanzuru dambudziko iri rogadziriswa sezvo varwere ava vachida chikafu chinovalka muviri panguva iyo vanenge vari kurwara. Mumwe mugari wemuMasvingo ane hama iri paRujeko Isolation Center, uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake, ati dambudziko iri rinofanirwa kugadziriswa nekukasika nekuti hupenyu hwevarwere huri kuiswa panguva yakaoma. Kushaikwa kwechikafu uku kuri kuitika panguva iyo vanhu mazana maviri nevanomwe vakatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro mudunhu reMasvingo chete. Hurumende inoti vanhu makumi masere nemumwe chete, 81 vakafa munyika ne chirwere che Covid-19, uye vanhu zviuru zviviri nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, 2 089 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvitatu nemazana mana nemakumi maviri nemumwe chete, 3,421, uye vvabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zana nezvishanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 105,656. Vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nechimwe nemazana matatu nemakumi
manomwe nemumwe chete, 31,371 vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga pamirioni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 1,593,656. Vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri nezuro vaive zviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana maviri ane makumi mana nevanomwe, 17,247 izvo zvakasvitsa vabaiya nhomba iyi pazviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu ane mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere, 730,378. Hurumende inoti inoda kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi munyika mese kana
kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda
reCovid-19. No media source currently available

column2: Vakawanda Votadza Kushanyira Botswana Kunyangwe Bhodha Ravhurwa neKushaya Tsamba dzeCovid-19
column3: Kunyange hazvo Botswana yavhura zvizere mabhoda ayo mashanu nhasi kusanganisira muganhu waro uri pedyo neguta rePlumtree weRamokgwebana, kwanga kuine motokari nevanhu vashomanana vanga vachipinda nekubuda munyika iyi. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 pamuganhu uyu nhasi inoratidza kuti ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvanga zvichidzoserwa kumusha nekuti zvanga zvisina chitambi chinoratidza kuti havana chirwere cheCOVID-19. Botswana yakatsidza kuti haina kubvumidza ani zvake anobva kuine imwe nyika kupinda munyika iyi asina gwaro rinoratidza akavhenekerwa COVID-19 akawanikwa asina chirwere ichi chashura mare pasi rose senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Asi hurongwa hwaitwa neBotswana uhu huri kuita kuti vazhinji vatadze kufamba famba nekuti hazvisi nyore kuti munhu avhenekerwe hutachiwana hweCOVID-19 sezvo vanovheneka vari kubhadharisa makumi matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica. Amai Gertrude Maravanzira vaudza Studio7 kuti vakambofunga kujamba bhodha sezvo nyika dzakavharwa murume vavo ari kuGaborone ivo vari kuZimbabwe asi vakatya izvo zvaita kuti vaite nhangemutange. Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chisina kuita rombo rakanaka saAmai Maravanzira ndiVaWalter Mukanga avo vaudza Studio7 kuti vava nemazuva maviri vari gere pabhodha reRamokgwebana sezvo vashandi vebazi rehutano munyika iyi vari kuramba gwaro ravo vachiti ndere kunyeba.  VaMukanga pamwe chete nevamwe vavo vaviri vanoti Agrippa Murimba naRaymond Uchena vane chivimbo chekuti vachakunda kuti vano joina chikwata chebhora cheMorupule Wanderers munyika iyi.  VaMurimba, avo vanoti vaitambira chikwata cheHarare City, vanoti chirwere cheCOVID-19 chaunza kusagadzikana kukuru uko chaita kuti vatambi vebhora vave nedambudziko rekutsvaga mafuro manyoro. Mukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation kana kuti VISET VaSamuel Wadzai vaudza Studio7 kuti mari dziri kudiwa nevanovheneka denda iri dzakawandisa. VaWadzai vakurudzira hurumende kuti ive nehurongwa hwekubatsira nhengo dzesangano ravo nevamwe vanorarama nekutenga midziyo kuBotswana vachinotengesa kumusha kuitira kuti vasashandire dhongi rakaora. Kunyange hazvo ruzhinji rwuri kuchema chema, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano muBotswana VaEdwin Dikoloti vanoti nyika yavo haisi kuzodududza shure panyaya yezvitambi vachiti ndiyo nzira chete ingabatsira kuti hutachiwana uhu husapararire. Botswana ine vanhu zviuru gumi nemazana manomwe ane makumi mana nemaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi kotiwo makumi matatu nevana vafa nokuda kwedenda iri. No media source currently available

column2: ZEC Inoramba Gwaro Riri Kuti Sarudzo dzeBy-Election Dzichaitwa Gore Rinouya Muna Kubvumbi
column3: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yaramba mashoko ari mugwaro riri kutenderera pamadandemutande ekuti yakatara musi wa 23 Kubvumbi 2022 sezuva ringangoitwa sarudzo dzema by-elections dzeparamende pamwe nemakanzuru. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo kana kuti Chief Elections Officer veZEC, Va Utoile Silaigwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aya handi echokwadi vakati tibate mutauriri weZEC, Commissioer Kzembe kuti tinzwe zvizhinji, asi takundikana kuvabata. Gwaro riri kutenderera iri rakanyorwa pabepa reZEC, asi harina kuiswa runyoro kana kuti kusainwa kana kudhindwa neboka rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika iri. Asi mamwe masangano pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vanga vatoratidza mufaro mukuru kwazvo nemashoko ekuti sarudzo idzi dzingangoitwa gore rinouya, vachiti kushaikwa kwevamiriri mumatare eparamende pamwe nemumakanzuru kuri kudzorera shure mabasa ebudiriro mumatunhu asina vamiriri. Mabasa ose ane chekuita nesarudzo akambomiswa muna Kurume 2020 senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Matunhu akawanda akasara asina humiriri zvichitevera kudzingwa kwedzimwe nhengo dzeparamende nekanzuru nebato reMDC-T dzichinzi dzakasiya bato iri dzichienda kuMDC Alliance, uyewo kushaya kwedzimwe nhengo. Zvigaro makumi maviri nezvisere zveparamende hazvina vamiriri kuchitiwo zvimwe zana nezvishanu zvemakanzuru zvisinawo humiriri. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano re Elections Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vanoti dai gwaro iri ranga raburitswa neZEC zviri pamutemo changa chiri chinhu chakanaka chose kuti sarudzo idzi dzichiitwa sezvo kunonoka kwadzo kuri kutotyora kodzero dzevanhu dzavanopiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available

column2: Masangano Akawanda Oshora Hurumende neKudzinga VanaMukoti Mabasa
column3: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti yakanga yadzinga basa vanamukoti vose vari pakuramwa mabasa, sangano rinomirira vanamukoti, re Zimbabwe Nurses Association rakakurudzira nhengo dzaro kuti dzisavhundutsirwe, uye kuti hapana chati chashanduka. Sangano iri rakaburitsa gwaro nezuro richizivisa nhengo dzaro kuti rakaona mashoko akabva kumutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, ekuti vadzingwa mabasa, asi richiti nhengo dzaro dzakapinzwa basa neHealth Services Board pasi pezvibvumirano zvavakanyorerana nevashandi. Zimbabwe Nurses Association inotiwo nhengo dzayo hadzisati dzatambira matsamba ekumiswa mabasa kwadzo, uye mari inonzi navachiwenga yakaiswa parutivi kuti vagobhadharwa inoita mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe emadhora, imari yemisaridzirwa yavaifanirwa kunge vanamukoti vakabhadharwa muna 2010. Sangano iri rinoti rakasununguka kuenderera mberi nenhaurirano, uye razivisa Health Services Board kuti risazadzise zviri mutsamba yavachiwenga iyi nenguva dza 4:00pm masikati anhasi musi wa 19 Kubvumbi 2018, richiti kukundikana kwazvo vanamukoti vanozoenda kudare repamusoro kuti nyaya yekuchengetedza kodzero dzavo inzwikwe nechimbichimbi. Gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa vakaudzawo nhepfenyuro yeZBC nezuro manheru kuti vanamukoti vakadzingwa mabasa ava vakasununguka kunyorera zvakare vachitsvaga mabasa. Asi mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vanoti havaoni hurumende ichienderera mberi nedanho rekudzinga vanamukoti vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvinomwe iyo isina dzimwe nzira dzekuzadzisa nadzo basa ravo. Dr Nyamande vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kunzwisisa zvichemo zvavanamukoti nekukasika kuitira kuti nyika ienderere mberi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mamwe masangano akaita sezimbabwe congress of trade unions, Zimbabwe Yadzoka/Mayibuye IZimbabwe, Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti PTUZ, Federation of Zimbabwe Educators Unions kana kuti FOZEU ari kushorawo zvikuru danho rehurumende rekudzinga vanamukoti basa. ZCTU inoti iri kuronga kuratidzira kwakasimba yakabatana nemamwe masangano. Doctor Takavafira Zhou vePTUZ vanoti hunhu hwakaitwa nehurumende hautarisirwe zvachose munyika ine rusununguko. Doctor Victor Chimhutu ve Zimbabwe Yadzoka /Mayibuye IZimbabwe vatiwo sangano ravo rinotsigirana navana mukoti mukuramwa kwavo mabasa uye vachamira navo pamwechete nemasangano achamira mukurwisana nemaitiro ehurumende aya. No media source currently available

column2: Vagari vekuArda Vakabviswa kwaChiyadzwa Votora Dzimba dzeMarange Resources neChisimba
column3: Mhuri dzinosvika makumi mashanu nenhatu dzakatamiswa kubva kwaChiadzwa mushure mekuwanikwa kwemangoda dzichiendeswa kunogariswa patsva kunzvimbo yeArda Transau kwaOdzi kumawirira kweguta reMutare nemusi weChina dzakarovera moyo kudombo ndokupinda mudzimba dzakavakwa nekambani yemangoda yeMarange Resources zvechisimba. Mhuri idzi dziri kunyunyuta nerekuti dzaneta kurindira guyo sembwa dzakatarisira kupihwa dzimba idzi kuti dzigare zvakanaka nemhuri dzavo. VaAntony Mwashita mumwe wevagari vakatora dzimba kuArda Transau vanoti nguva yareba pasina chirikufamba. “Zvakangoomawo ini sekuti ndiri baba vane mhuri yakura nevana vatatu, vasikana vaviri nemukomana mumwe uye vabva zera." Amai Euna Mwashita vanoti vamhanyirawo kundotora imba yavo nekuda kwekuti pavaigara vange votatsurana navanatete, hanzvadzi dzemurume wavo apo pange ponetsa kugara. Vanoti chimwe chavapa shungu iyi kunyeperwa kwavanoti vange vachiitwa kwatora makore akawandisa. ”Ini handingarambi ndichigara navanatete mu-one house, vakadzi vatatu vachibikira muimba imwe hazviiti, ndange ndiine imba ini, ndaona zvakakodzera kuti ndigare muimba iyi yakavakwa nemakambani aichera madiamonds akatitamisa kuuya kuno, imba idzi ndedzehurumende." VaPeter Munjoma vanoti havangasaririre segotsi. “Ndabata imba iyi nekuti haa nguva yacho yareba zvisati zvaitwa izvi, mhuri yangu yakura property yangu haichina pokugara nekuti dzimba dzacho dziri kungoparara pasina anogara, saka tati regai titore hedu dzimba dzacho apo takanzi sanai kuenda nevabereki tichakupai imba nepamberi apo.” VaReuben Kusena vanotsinhira mashoko aVaMunjoma maringe nekutora dzimba dziri kuArda Transau. “Chaita kuti titore danho irori rekupinda mudzimba idzi inhau yemakore atatora tisina kupihwa dzimba idzi anosvika six, saka tatoona kuti zvitori nane tipinde hedu nekuti dziri kuparara dziri kungotsva saka tati kubva takaputsirwa dzimba dzedu uku tauya kuno hatina kupihwa imba dzacho tatora dziripo.” Amai Mary Sunguro mumwe wemadzimai ari kuArda Transau vapindawo mudzimba kwaOdzi nhasi. “Tave nenguva tichingoovimbiswa pekugara pakanaka asi hapana chiri kubuda mazviri, muimba idzi mava kugara mbudzi, mombe, nehuku vamwe vave kutoitira mabasa akasarurama mudzimba idzodzo isu vanhhu tisina pekugara pacho" Mudzviti wedunhu reManicaland VaFungai Mbetsa vange vasiri kudavira nharembozha yavo apo Studio 7 yaedza kuvabata kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya. Gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reManicaland Muzvare Mandi Mandiitawepi Chimene vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata vakuru vekambani yeMarange Resources vakavakisa dzimba dzapambwa nhasi nevagari vekuArda Transau. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuzivisa Nyika Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kuwanikwa Vaine Omicron Variant
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti dziri kushushikana nekusabuda pachena kwehurumende pahuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa vaine mhando itsva yeCovid-19, yeOmicron Variant. Kushushikana uku kunotevera kuzivisa kwayakaita hurumende svondo rapera kuti vanhu makumi mashanu vaive vabatwa nemando yeOmicron munyika asi haina kuzoramba ichizivisa nezvehuwandu uhu izvo zviri kuita kuti vamwe vati pane zviri kuvanzwa pamusoro penyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vari chiremba anoshandira mudunhu reNorth Carolina muAmerica, Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite tsvakurudzo nekuzivisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nemhando yeOmicron vachiti izvi zvinobatsira zvikuru pakurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Dr Ranga vati kunyange hazvo zvichidhura kuti paitwe ongororo yekuziva kuti mhando yechirwere cheCovid iri kutekeshera munyika ndeipi, vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende iwane mari yekuve nezvikwanisiro zvekuita izvi. Dr Norman Matara, avo vanove munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, vatiwo matanho akatorwa nehurumende mushure mekuveko kwemhando yeOmicron ndeechimbi-chimbi uye haana humboo hwescience hunoratidza kuti anobatsira. Vatiwo hurumende inodzoka yozvivhiringidza pachayo nekuramba ichiita zvimwe zvirongwa zvinoonekwa sezvinowedzera kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru wezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyik, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haisi kukwanisa kugara ichipa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nemhando yeOmicron munyika. Asi vati vari mushishi kuongorora hutachiwana uhu kubva kumatunhu ose enyika vakati vachazivisa zvinenge zvawanikwa munguva pfupi inotevera. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vaviri vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro, uye vamwe vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri, 4 720, uye vabatwa munyika yose nechirwere ichi vavazviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevasere, 150 628. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vakanga vava mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu nezana nemakumi mana nemumwe chete, 2 926 141, uye vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vari mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nezvinomwe nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu, 3 907 860. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

column2: Kushandiswa Zvakanyanya kweZvinodhaka Kunonzi Kwawedzera Zvakanyanyisa Dambudziko reChirwere chePfungwa muHarare
column3: Kushandiswa zvakanyanya kwezvinodhaka nevanhu kunonzi nemukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reHarare kwawedzera zvakanyanyisa dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reHarare VaInnocent Hove vanoti nekuda kwekuwedzera kwedambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa zvakakosha kuti vanhu vapihwe dzidziso. VaHove vakataura mashoko aya paiitwa mhemberero dzekucherechedza dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa nemusi weChitatu. Pasi rose, United Nations inoti zuva iri rinocherechedzwa musi wa10 Gumiguru asi zvakanonoka kuitwa nedunhu reHarare. Amai Betty Zephania vanova mumwe wevakaronga mhemberero idzi vachishanda kubazi rinoona nezvehutano vatsigira vachiti dambudziko rehutano hwepfungwa idambudziko ririkukura. Amai Zephania vati vazhinji vari kutamburawo nezvirwere zvepfungwa izvi varikushandisa zvinodhaka vachiti munhu wese arikufanirwa kushanda kuona kuti dambudziko iri rapedzwa. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaFarai Gutu vati vechidiki vanoda kudzidziswa kuti zvinodhaka zvine njodzi. Mumwe aishandisa zvinodhaka akakwanisa kuzobuda mazviri aona kuti zvinokuvadza, ndiVaJacob Shamuyarira, avo vakazotanga sangano rakazvimiririra rinobatsira avo vanoda kusiya zvinodhaka. Vati kushandisa zvinodhaka kunokanganisa hupenyu hwevanhu vachiti zvakakoshawo kuti vanhu vazive kwekuwana rubatsiro kana vawirwa nedambudziko iri. Kutanga kwegore rino mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazivisa kuti gore rino igore rekurwisa dambudziko rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka. Vechidiki ndivo vanonzi vari kunyanyoshandisa zvinodhaka izvi zvakaita semutoriro, krango, mbanje, mishonga yechikosoro yakaita seHistalix kana bronco nezvimwewo. Mhemberero dzegore rino dzakaitwa paine kurudziro yekuti pasi rese rikoshese hutano hwepfungwa. World Health organization inoti muAfrica, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri kana kuti 792 million vane chirwere chepfungwa. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Yoparura Hurongwa Hwekupa Vana Nhomba yeMhetamakumbo
column3: Zvichitevera kutanga kupararira kwechirwere chemhetamakumbo kune dzimwe nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica, Zimbabwe nhasi yaparura hurongwa hwekupa vana nhomba yePoriyo kana kuti National Polio Vaccination Campaign. Chirongwa ichi chiri kutanga zviri pamutemo mangwana chopera musi wa 30 mwedzi uno. Chinangwa chebazi rezvehutano ndechekupa vana zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 95% pavana mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nematanhatu nemazana masere kana kuti 2, 556, 800 vari pasi pemakore mashanu. Vachiparura chirongwa ichi muHarare nhasi, mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vaudza vatori venhau kuti chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa pachiitwa mushandira pamwe nenyika ddzinoti Zambia, Tanzania, Malawi neMozambique. Chirwere cheporiyo chakatobata vana kuMalawi nekuMozambique. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vati vane chivimbo chekuti vachapa vana vakwanda nhomba iyi sezvo vari kufamba mudzimba. VaMujiri vanoti vachapa mushonga kunyange kune vana vakambopihwa sezvo dzokororo iine simba. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vanoti nyaya yenhomba yekudzivirira mhetamakumbo inofanirwa kushambadzirwa zvakakwana nyika yose kuti pasawanikwe mwana anotadza kupihwa mushonga. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemumwe chiremba uye vari mumiriri weChinhoyi mudare reparamende Dr Peter Matarutse. Sezvo chirongwa chekudzivirira mhetamakumbo chiri kuitwa munyika dzose dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica, mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr George Kambondo vanoti vari kushanda pamwechete nevehutano munyika yeZambia kuti vana vose vanenge vachidarika nepamuganhu wenyika mbiri idzi vadonhedzerwe mushonga. Zviratidzo zvekutimwana abata chirwere ichi zvinosanganisira kupindwa nechando, kuneta, kurutsa, kuoma kana kurwaziwa mutsipa uye kurwadziwa maoko nemakumbo. Nyika yakapedzisira kuita chirwere chemhetamakumbo mugore ra1998 uye ikanzi haina chirwere ichi zvachose mugore ra2005 nebazi guru reWorld Health Organisation. Chirongwa chechipiri chekudzivirira chirwere chemhetamakumbo chichaitwa kubva musiwa 1 kusvika musiwa 4 Zvita. No media source currently available

column2: ARTUZ Inopedza Kongiresi Yayo Ichiti Kushandira Mahara Kwete
column3: Kongiresi yeAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, yapetwa muGweru sangano iri richibuda nezvisungo zvakasiyana siyana kusanganisira kusadzokere kubasa kwevarairidzi panovhurwa zvikoro svondo rinouya. Musangano uyu wasarudza vatungamiri vatsva vana kuti vave vamwe vevatungamiri vatanhatu vanoumba National Executive Council yesangano iri. VaObert Masaraure vanoramba vari mutungamiri wesangano iri, ukuwo VaRobson Chere, vari munyori mukuru mushure mekunge vaviri ava vasarudzwa pasina avakwikwidza. Aitwa mutevedzeri waVaMasaraure, ndiMuzvare Gaudencia Mandiopera; ukuwo vasarudzwa kuva mutevedzeri waVaChere, ndiVaMunyaradzi Masiyiwa. Asarudzwa kuvamutauriri weArtuz ndiVaNation Mudzitirwa, ukuwo Muzvare Brenda Musavengana vaitwa mubati wehomwe. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, avo vange vari munyarikani pamusangano uyu, vakorokotedza ARTUZ nekukwanisa kuita kongiresi yayo zvisinei nekuoma kwakaita zvimhu. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vose munyika vabatane kuti vakwanise kubuda mumatambudziko avari. VaMasaraure vabvuma kuti kubatana kwakakosha vakati sangano ravo richaramba richiedza kushanda nemamwe masangamo kuti kubatana uku kuvepo. VaChere vaudza Studio7 kuti chimwe chezvisungo zvabuda ndechekuti varairidzi havazi kuzodzokera kuzvikoro pazvinivhurwa asi vati izvi hazvirevi kuti vari kuramwa mabasa. Vamwe varairidzi vange vari pamusangano uyu vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotsigira zvizere zvisungo zvabuda izvi. Muzvare Mary Mupatsi, avo vanodzidzisa kuSilobela, vati varairidzi vekumaruwa vari kurarama hupenyu hwakaoma. Sangano reARTUZ rakavambwa mugore ra2014, uye kongiresi inotevera ichaitwa mushure memakore mashanu. No media source currently available

column2: Vadzidzi Gumi neVana Vosungwa Vachiratidzira paUniversity of Zimbabwe
column3: Vadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vanoti vacharamba vachienderera mberi nekuratidzira kunyangwe vamwe vavo gumi nevana vakasungwa nezuro vachinyunyuta nekuwedzerwa kwemari dzedzidzo. Vachitaura neStudio 7, rimwe remagweta arikumiririra vadzidzi ava vaPaidamoyo Saurombe vanoshanda nesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vati vadzidzi gumi nevana vakasungwa nezuro havasati vaudzwa mhosva yavari kupomerwa VaSaurombe vanoti pavadzidzi vakasungwa apa pane vamwe vakakuvara. Studio 7 hainawo kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nhasi muHarare vanomiririra vadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vati mari dzechikoro dzirikudiwa dzinokatyamadza sezvo vazhinji vavo vasiri kukwanisa kuzounganidza mari dzirikudiwa idzi. Mutungamiriri we Student Representative Council yepaUZ vaAllan Chipoyi vanoti mari irikudiwa iyi ichasiya vana vevarombo vasingawani dzidzo University of Zimbabwe yakakwidza mari dzechikoro izvo zvichasiya vaibhadhara mari shoma pachikoro ichi vobhadhara mari inosvika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mana nezvishanu kana kuti 340 000 kubva pazviuru makumi mashanu nezvinomwe 55 000. Avo vanoda kuita zvidzidzo zveMasters varikutarisirwa kubhadhara mari inodarika miriyoni yemadhora emuno. Munyori mukuru muSRC , VaMunashe Cuthbert Masiyiwa vatsigirawo vachiti ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti vadzidzi vazhinji vari pachikoro ichi vanobva kumhuri dzisingawani mari yakawanda. VaMasiyiwa vatiwo vanoda kuti mapurisa asungunure vadzidzi vakasungwa. Vadzidzi ava vanyorawo tsamba yenyunyuto iyo vanoti yasainwa nevadzidzi vanodarika zviuru zvishanu. Vati vachanosiya tsamba yenyunyuto iyi kudare reparamende, kubazi rezvedzidzo yepamusoro pamwe nekuZimbabwe Human Rights Commission. Vadzidzi ava vanotiwo kana mari ikasadzikiswa vachange vachizoendawo kumatare. Muzvare Everjoy Chidindi vebato rinopikisa reLabour Economists and Afrikan Democrats vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zvinokatyamadza kuti mari dzinodiwa nehurumende hadzienderani nemari irikutambiriswa veruzhinji. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira kana vakuru vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe. Asi vachinyora padandemutande reTwitter , munyori mubazi rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko vaNick Mangwana vanoti vasingakwanisi kubhadhara mari dzechikoro kumauniversity kune zvirongwa zvakadai sekubhadhara mari padiki padiki pamwe nekupiwa zvikwereti. Vatiwo pane varikuda kupinza zvematongerwo enyika munyaya dzekukwidza kwemari dzechikoro asi izvi zvarambwa nevamiririri vevadzidzi avo vatiwo hazviiti kuti vanzi vabhadhare mari iyi zvishoma zvishoma nekuti yakawandisa. Zvimwe zvikoro zvedzidzo yepamusoro zvakwidzawo mari zvakanyanya zvinosanganisira Masvingo Polytechnic iyo yakakwidza mari dzeNational Certificate kubva pazviuru makumi maviri nezvina zvemadhora emuno 24 000 kuenda pazviuru zana nezvishanu (105 000). Gweru Polytechnic neLupane State University ndovamwewo zvakare vakakwidza mari dzechikoro.

column2: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri muAmerica, VaNdenda, Vobata Pamwe neMasangano Akawanda muKusimudzira Vechidiki neNharaunda kuZimbabwe
column3: Muchirongwa chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, svondo rino tine hurukuro naVaInnocent Ndenda vari mudunhu reTexas muAmerica asi vachibva kuHwedza mudunhu reMashonaland East. VaNdenda, avo vakaenda kuAmerica muna 2016, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachishanda samaneja pane imwe kambani kwakare kuTexas, vakaramba vachienderera mberi nemabasa avo avaiita vachiri kumusha, ekubatsira vanoshaya pamwe nekusimudzira nharaunda yavanobva. Pari zvino vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano matatu anoti reMubatirapamwe Trust, iro rinobatsira vanenge vachishandisa zvinodhaka, reMakoni North District Association, rakanangana nenyaya dzebudiriro, pamwe nereGlobal Exchange Program, iro rinobatanidza vanhu vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana. VaNdenda vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuona vana veZimbabwe vachiisa misoro pamwe vosiyana nehumbimbindoga, vachiti chose chinezwi rekuti kubatana chinobudirira. Vanoti ivowo vane shuviro yekuti vange vachizorangarirwawo mune remangwana semunhu akabatsira mukushanda nevamwe kubatanidza vanhu kuti vavandudze magariro avo. No media source currently available

column2: VaMugabe Voudza Dzimwe Nyika Zvinoda Kuitwa muNyaya dzeHutano, Asi Vanamukoti muNyika Vachironga Kuramwa Mabasa
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weMuvhuro vakavhura zviri pamutemo musangano webazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvehutano kana kuti World Health Organization kuVictoria Falls wechimakumi matanhatu nesere kana kuti 67th Session of the WHO Regional Committee for Africa Conference. Asi pabva paita mhute munyika apo vanamukoti vakazivisa kuti vapa hurumende mavhiki maviri ekuti vave kuda kukanda mapadza pasi zvekare nenyaya yekusawirirana panyaya dzemihoro. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu VaMugabe vati nyika dzemuAfrica dzinofanira kutsvaga mari kuendesa mari kumabasa ezvehutano uye vatiwo Zimbabwe yakaedza kuita izvi nekuumba homwe yeAids levy yave kubatsirawo munyaya yekurapa chirwere chegomarara. Nyika dzemuAfrica dziri kukundikanawo chibvumirano chadzakaita kuAbuja, Nigeria muna 2001 chekuona kuti mari inosvika zvikamu gumi neshanu zvebhajeti yenyika zvaenda kunyaya dzezvehutano. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnock Dongo vanoti havasi kufara nenya yekuti vamwe vanamukoti vanoita basa rehumaneja nevanodzidzisa vanotambira mari shoma zvichienzaniswa nevari pasi pavo kana vari pasi ava vakashanda maawa akati wandei pane akatarwa kana kuti e"over time". Vanoti vanamukoti vakatoendesa tsamba kuHealth Services Board, bhodhi rinoona nezvemari dzavo vachitaura nezvekuda kuramwa mabasa kwavo. No media source currently available Asi mukuru weHealth Services Board Dr Lovemore Mbengeranwa vanoti vari kuziva dambudziko iri asi pari zvino hurumende haina mari. No media source currently available

column2: Nhabvu yevechidiki yakanganisika‘ . . . tanzwa nekumirira’
column3: AIMBOVE mutambi weMotor Action, Lengthens neShooting Stars, Godfrey Moyo, anoti kusimukira kwenhabvu yevechidiki kuri munjodzi huru zvichitevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo yose nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Moyo vazhinji vanomuziva achitambira maYoung Warriors Under-20 ne23.   Kubva zvaasendeka shangu dzake, Moyo ave kurairidza chikwata chePrime Academy chiri kuRuwa achibika vatambi vemangwana.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Moyo anoti kubvira pakamiswa mitambo mizhinji senzira yekuti vanhu vasaungane nedonzvo rekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 vechidiki vari kurasikirwa zvikuru munyaya dzekusimudzirwa mumutambo wenhabvu.   “Ini ndinotyira zvikuru vechidiki vedu nekuti vakasiiwa vari vega vamwe vanofuririka vakapedzisira vave kutora zvinodhaka muviri zvopedzisira zvavakanganisa remangwana ravo.   “Nhabvu yevechidiki yakakosha nekuti ndivo vatambi vemangwana saka vanofanirwa kukosheswa vogara vachibikwa. Asi manje nekuda kwelockdown hatizive kuti vamwe varipi uye vari kuitei, totovatyira nekuti sevana vakasaongororwa remangwana ravo rinoenda mudondo.   “Ndipo paye mutambi anenge achirakidza kuti tarenda riripo uye remangwana rake rakajeka mozongonzwa kuti nhabvu haachatambe, azvisiya zvose afuririka. Isu patinosangana navo tinovadzidzisa nhabvu uye zvehupenyu asi tikaita nguva tisinawo ndipo vanopedzisira vafuririka,” anodaro Moyo.   Sangano rinotungamira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) nguva yadarika rakazivisa kuti rinoda  kutangisa zvirongwa zvekusimudzira vechidiki mumutambo wenhabvu (junior league) kumapurovhinzi akasiyana enyika asi zvose zvakazoenda mudondo nekuuya kweCovid-19.   Panguva yaakatamba nhabvu, Moyo akakwanisa kuhwina mikombe inosanganisira Banc ABC neLengthens uye neMotor Action izvo zvakazomuona achitamba mumitambo yeConfederations Cup pamwe chete neChampions League neLengthens neMotor Action zvakare.

column2: NSSA Yobatsira Vakuvari, Asi Vari paMudyandigere Votsamwiswa neMari Dzavari Kupihwa
column3: Apo vanhu vari kutambira mari yemudyandigere vari kuramba vachichema-chema kuti mari yacho ishoma, gurukota rezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, vanoti hurumende iri mushishi kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Vachipindura mibvunzo kubva kuvatapi venhau pamusoro pekuti mari inotambirwa nevanhu vari pamudyandigere ichawedzerwa riinhi, Amai Mupfumira vati bazi reNSSA riri mushishi kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Amai Mupfumira, avo vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko cheOpen Day yeNSSA Workers’ Compensation Rehabilitation Centre, vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuti vanhu vanozvishandira pachavo vega vagokwanisa kuvewo vachibhadhara mari kuNSSA kuti vagozokwanisawo kuwana mari yemudyandigere kana vakwegura. Pari zvino vanhu vari pamudyandigere vanotambira madhora makumi mana pamwedzi uye hurumende yaive yati ichawedzera mari iyi kuti isave iri pasi pezana remadhora kubva muna Kurume wegore rino, asi izvi hazvina kuitika. Amai Mupfumira vati kubvira muna Kubvumbi wegore rino NSSA yakatanga hurongwa hwekubatsira nemari pakuviga nhengo dzeNSSA dzinenge dzafa. NSSA Rehabilitation Centre inzvimbo inorapa vanhu vanenge vakuvara vari pamabasa uye nzvimbo iyi ine mimwe michina yechizvino-zvino isingawanikwe kune zvimwe zvipatara. Mukuru weNSSA, Muzvare Liz Chitiga, vabvuma kuti vanhu vakawanda havazive nezvenzvimbo iyi, asi vati kambani yavo ine hurongwa hwekuti veruzhinji vakwanise kurapiwa panzvimbo. Mumwe wevanhu vakarapwa paNSSA Rehabilitation Centre ndiVaZuze Nzerere avo vakakuvara vari mumugodhi mavaishanda. VaNzerere, avo vasisakwanise kufamba vega, vati vakarapwa vakadzidziswawo mabasa ekusona uye vanofara kuti kambani yavaishandira yakavadzorera pabasa. Panguva imwe chete NSSA Rehabilitation Centre inokwanisa kuve nevanhu makumi manomwe vanenge vachirapwa vachigarapo. Nzvimbo iyi, iyo iri pedyo nechipatara chikuru cheMpilo yakavhurwa mugore ra1971. No media source currently available

column2: Muchatiguta: Masomere
column3: MURAIRIDZI weManica Diamond, Luke ‘Vahombe’ Masomere, anoti chikwata chake icho chiri kukwikwidza muCastle Premiership kekutanga gore rino chauya zvachose uye hachina wachinovhunduka.   Mwaka uno, maziso ese achange ari paManica Diamond yekwaMutare iyo yakapinda muCastle Premiership mushure mekunge yatamba nhabvu yainwisa mvura kuDivision One izvo zvakatuma hutungamiri hwechikwata ichi kutaura kuti vanoda kuita mukurumbira muAfrica yese.   Asi achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, Vahombe – uyo ave kudanwa nezita remadunhurirwa nevatsigiri kuti Dr of Football kana kuti His Excellency – anoti chikwata chake chauya zvachose muPSL.   “Isu sechikwata, chekutanga ndechekuti tauya zvachose uye hapana kwatiri kuenda. Handisi kuda hangu kuvimbisa kuti tichapinda torakasha zvimwe zvikwata kana kuhwina mikombe yakawanda mumwaka wedu wekutanga. Asi zivai kuti isu hatisi kuzongorakashwa sezvinoitwa zvimwe zvikwata zvinenge zvapinda muPSL zvobva zvadzokera kwazvinenge zvabva, kwete.   “Isu tauya kuzogara muno zvachose nekuti muno muPSL ndimo medu matinokodzera kuve tiri,” anodaro.   Chero zvazvo Masomere achiti mwaka uno haadi kuvimbisa kuti vachasimudza mukombe, chikwata chake chatenga vatambi vepamusoro vakawanda vanosanganisira Partson Jaure, Marshall Mudehwe, Peace Makaha naPritchard Mpelele.   Anoti vari kuda kuti vazove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru zvemuno zvenhabvu uye vozonomirira nyika kunze kumitambo yeCAF Champions League nemimwe.   “Vatungamiriri vechikwata chedu vanoda kuti isu tigove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu muAfrica,  zvinogoneka kuitika uye ndizvo tiri kushanda kuita saka tiri kuvaka uye munguva pfupi inotevera tichange tave padanho iroro,” anodaro.   Shasha iyi yashandura nhabvu kuManicaland zvekuti vatsigiri venhabvu vemudunhu iri vave kutomushevedza vachimuti ‘His Excellency’ vachimurumbidza nebasa raari kubata kusimudzira nhabvu.   “Handichangonzi Dr of Football chete asi kuno ndave kutoshevedzwa saHis Excellency nekuti vanhu vari kufarira basa randiri kubata rekusimudzira nhabvu.   “Chikwata chedu chaunza mufaro kune vazhinji uye ndiko saka mazita aya erumbidzo ari kungowanda,” anodaro Masomere.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaitwa Mutare City Rovers muCastle Premiership mwaka wadarika, Manica Diamond ndiyo ichange yakamirira guta reMutare muPSL mwaka uno.

column2: Masimba eParamende eKutonga Nhengo Dzayo Ovandudzwa
column3: Hurongwa hwekuwandudza mitemo yenyika kuti ifambirane nebumbiro idzva remitemo hunonzi hwuri kuratidza kufamba negwara zvichitevera kugazetwa kwebhiri reGeneral Laws Amendment Bill svondo rapera. Bhiri iri rinonzi riri kuda kuti mitemo ingangosvika zana nemakumi mashanu, kusanganisira mutemo uchatapudza masimba edare reparamende mukuranga kwaro nhengo dzinenge dzatsautsira, ivandudzwe. Bhiri iri rinonzi riri kuda kuti paramende itorerwe masimba ekuendesa kujeri munhu anenge atsautsira, asi kuti abhadhariswe faindi, kana kuti pane dzimwe mhosva, paramende itsvage rubatsiro rwehofisi yemuchuchisi mukuru wenyika, kwete kuti iyo paramende itonge nhengo iyi. Mukokeri wenhengo dzeMDC T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti kunyange hazvo vasati vaona bhiri iri, vanotsigira pfungwa yekuti matare edzimhosva atore iwo masimba ekuranga nhengo dzinenge dzatsautsira, kwete kuti vadare varangane pachavo. VaGonese vanoti dzimwe nguva vadare muparamende vanotonga mhosva vachitarisa kuti munhu abuda mumba maani kana kuti ane ruvara rwakadii. Nyaya inouya mupfungwa dzevakawanda ndeye vaive mumiriri weChimanimani mudare iri, VaRoy Bennett veMDC-T, avo vakakandwa mujeri mugore ra 2005 vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova vaive gurukota rezvemitemo panguvayo, VaPatrick Chinamasa. Paramende yakakanda VaBennett mujeri kwegore rose, danho rakaonekwa nevakawanda senzira yekupfidzisa vanopikisana nebato reZanu PF. Asi VaGonese vanoti zvanga zvatora nguva yakanyanya kureba pasati pabatanidzwa mitemo iyi, vachiti izvi zvaifanirwa kunge zvakaitika kare pakangotambirwa bumbiro remitemo idzva. Bhiri iri rave kutarisirwa kuverengwa muparamende kekutanga risati razeyiwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitemo. No media source currently available

column2: ARTUZ Inoudza Mapurisa neMasoja Kuti Iri Kuvarwiravo paNyaya dzeMari
column3: angano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ, rinoti masoja nemapurisa vanoshandiravo hurumende naizvozvo riri kuvakurudzira kuti vasarove vanhu kana kuvhiringa varairidzi vanenge vachiratidzira nezvenyaya dzemihoro. Mutungamiriri we ARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vaudza Studio 7 kuti varairidzi vari kurwira mihoro yevanhu vese vanoshandira hurumende, kwete varairidzi chete saka vari kukurudzira kuti masoja nemapurisa kuti vafunge zvakadzama kana vatumwa kunomisa kuratidzira kwavanenge vachiita. VaMasaraure vati sangano ravo riri kuronga zvekuratidzira zvine mutsindo rakabatana nemamwe masangano. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri kana gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaCain Mathema sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Vashandi vehurumende vakawanda kusanganisira varairidzi nemadhokotera vave nenguva yakareba vachiratidzira nenyaya yemihoro. Hurumende inoti vashandi ava vanofanira kusimbisa nhaurirano kwete kuratidzira. No media source currently available

column2: NDINI CHIBABA: KAMAMBO
column3: MUTuNGAMIRIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) — Felton Kamambo — anoti ndiye “Chibaba” chenhabvu yemuno uye Philip Chiyangwa anotonga kuCosafa kwake uko anotungamirawo.   Achitaura svondo radarika muHarare apo Zifa yaizivisa nyika kuti chizvarwa chekuCroatia, Zdravko Logarusic, ndiye ave murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors, Kamambo anoti bhodhi rake ndiro rinotonga zvenhabvu yemuno.   “Tisu tiri panyanga, tisu zvibaba zvenhabvu zvemuno uye Philip Chiyangwa ndiye chibaba chekuCosafa, ipapo panzwisisei. Saka muno zvese zvine chekuita nenhabvu zvinotodarika nepatiri isu uye tisu tinopasisa kuti zviite,” anodaro Kamambo.   Kubva Kamambo akapinda panyanga mugore ra2018 apo akunda Chiyangwa pasarudzo dzemutungamiri weZifa, pagara pachingotenderera mashoko ekuti vaviri ava vakarimirana muganhu. Vamwewo ndivo vaiti Chiyangwa aikonzera nyonga-nyonga yaiitika mubhodhi raKamambo nguva yadarika izvo zvakazoona Zifa ichimutemera zvirango pamwechete naOmega Sibanda uyo aive mutevedzeri wake kuti vasava nechekuita nezvenhabvu yemuno.   Zifa yakasvika padanho rekutombonyorera kuCosafa kuti Chiyangwa abviswe pachigaro chekutungamirira sangano iri.   Kamambo anoti bhodhi rake harichadi kupedza nguva richinetsana nevanhu pamusoro penyaya dzekutungana kwembudzi.   Anoti iye zvino yasvika nguva yekubatanidza vanhu vese kuburikidza nenhabvu nekudaro Zifa yakabviswa zvirango zvavainge vatemera Chiyangwa naSibanda.   “Takagara pasi sebhodhi uye takazviona zvakakodzera kuti tiregerere Chiyangwa naSibanda.   “Tabvisa zvirango zvese zvatainge takavatemera, saka tichienda mberi chikuru kuti nhabvu yedu ibudirire pane kuswera tichinetsana zvisina                            basa.   “Toda kuti bhora redu rinakidze ndizvo chete zvatinoda kwete zvimwe zvese,” anodaro Kamambo.   Zvakadaro, Logarusic — uyo akamborairidza Sudan — akapihwa basa guru rekutungamira maWarriors mumitambo inosanganisira Africa Cup of Nations 2021 ne2022 World Cup.

column2: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuvhenekwa Chirwere cheShuga neKudya Zvine Hutano
column3: Zimbabwe nhasi yatabatana nenyika dzepasi rese kucherechedza zuva rechirwere cheshuga kana kuti World Diabetes Day veruzhinji vachikurudzirwa kuvhenekwa navanachiremba, kudya chikafu chine hutano uye chinoita kuti vasabatwe nedenda iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzashandisa zuva ranhasi kuongorora vanhu pachena pamwe nekuvadzidzisa pamusoro pudenda iri. Mumwe murapi pane chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira muHarare, Amai Fungai Priscillar Gomba vati hirwere cheshuga chiriri kupararira munyika asi munhu anogona kurarama pasina dambudziko kana atavedza dzidziso kubva kunana chiremba. Vanoti zvimwe zvikonzero zvinoita kuti vanhu vabatwe shuga kana kuti diabetes inyaya yekuzvarwa mumhuri ine nhoorondo yechirwere ichi, mararamire anoita munhu nechikafu chaanodya kana kuti kuti Lifestyle pachirungu. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kungorora vanhu kuti vane denda iri here pamwe nekuti vangararame sei vasingapinde munjodzi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzekuongorora zvirwere, VaEdmore Mahureva, vanoti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kuita ongororo dzakaita seHBCa1 yekungoora shuga yemunhu mukati memwedzi mitatu yapfuura uye vaita izvi pachena vachiti zvinobatsira kuti munhu azive pamire nedenda iri. Mutungamiriri wesangano remachiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, re Medical and Dental Private Practitioners Association Dr Johannes Marisa kuti nhasi vange vachibatsirawo vanhu pachena kuti vasafe nedenda iri. Amai Maonei Tiki avo vakabatwa shuga muna Chikumi gore rino uye vakatobviswa gumbo nekuda kwedenda iri vanoti vafara chose neruzivo rwavawana nhasi. Ambuya Agnes Zioni ndevamwe vari kurarama nedenda iri uye vanoti zvakakosha kutevedza dzidziso yanachiremba. Gore rapfuura, shuga yakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe kana kuti 3,400 uye zvinofundidzirwa kuti denda iri rinobata munhu mumwe chete pavanhu gumi pasi rese. Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day iro rinocherechedzwa musi 14 Mbudzi, racherechedzwa pasi pendingindira rine chinangwa chekuti vanhu vawane zivo yakakwana kuti vakwanise kurapwa nekuita kurarama nzira dzinoita kuti denda iri risarambe richipararira kana kuti Education to Protect Tomorrow, Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi kana mashoko ehurumende pazuva iri sezvo mutauriri webazi iri VaDonald Mujiri vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu patataenda pamhepo.

column2: Dare rePamusoro Rorasa Chikumbiro ChaVaSikhala Chekuti Vabhadhare Mari yeChibatiso, Repasi Richimira Kupa Mutongo
column3: Nhasi matare maviri anoti ramejastiriri nedare repamusoro ange achinzwa zvikumbiro zvemumiriri weZengeza West mudare reparamemde VaJob Sikhala zvekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso pamhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Dare reHigh Court raramba kutambira chikumbiro chaVaSikhala chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso panyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vaida kukanganisa mapurisa kuferefeta nyaya yekupondwa kwaMuzvare Moreblessing Ali nhengo yebato ravo reCitizens Coalition for Change. Rimwe gweta raVaSikhala Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vanove nhengo yesangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights ndivo vange vachimiririra VaSikhala. Rimwe gweta riri muchikwata chinomirira VaSikhala vachishanda nesangano reZLHR zvekare VaJeremiah Bamu vati vamirira VaSikhala kudare ramejastiriti uko mutongo wasendekwa parutivi. Masangano emagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose ari kushora kusungwa kwaVaSikhala, mumiriri weChitungwiza West VaGodfrey Sithole nevamwe vasingapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. No media source currently available

column2: Mapurisa Anosunga Hutungamiri hweZCTU muHarare neDzimwe Nzvimbo
column3: Mapurisa asunga nhengo dzesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions muHarare pamberi pekuratidzira kwangu kwarongwa nesangano iri richinyunyuta nekuoma kuri kuramba kuchiita hupenyu kunonzi neZCTU kwakonzerwa nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mitero nehurumende. Kuratidzira kwanga kwakarongwa neZCTU kwatadza kuenderera mberi muHarare sezvo mapurisa akomberedza muzinda wesangano revashandi iri akasunga hutungamiri hwesangano iri. Mutauriri weZCTU, VaLast Tarabuku, vaudza Studio7 kuti vasungwa ava vanomwe avo vanosanganisira mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, munyori mukuru musangano iri VaJaphet Moyo nevamwe. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira vasungwa uye vari vesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaLizwe Jamela, vati vasungwa ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvinhu zvisina maturo. VaJamela vatiwo pane vashandi veZCTU pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzesangano iri vari kutadza kubuda mumahofisi esangano iri sezvo mapurisa akapakatira zvombo akakomberedza muzinda weZCTU kubva mangwanani. Zvichitevera kusungwa kwaitwa hutungamiri hweZCTU uku, hapana kuratidzira kwazoitwa muHarare. Zvichakadai, mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, Amai Lanzini Ncube, vatura mutongo wekurambidza ZCTU kuratidzira vachiti muHarare muchine chirwere chekorera chichakadzika midzi vachiti kuratidzira kwanga kuchida kuitwa uku kwaizokonzera kupararira kwechirwere ichi. ZCTU yanga yakwidza nyaya iyi kumatare mushure mekunge mapurisa arambidza sangano iri kuratidzira nhasi nepamusana pechirwere chekorera icho chauraya vanhu makumi mana nevapfumbamwe kusvika parizvino. Kunyange hazvo dare nemapurisa ari kurambidza ZCTU kuratidzira, mitambo yenhabvu iri kuitwa muHarare, uye Zanu PF yakaita musangano wayo nguva pfupi yapfuura pasina kurambidzwa nemapurisa. MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa yakarambidzwawo kuita musangano wayo zvichinzi munyika mune chirwere chekorera. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Yova Nyika Yekutanga muAfrica Kubaya Vanhu Jekiseni reMushonga weHIV/AIDS
column3: Zimbabwe nemusi weChina yakabatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza World Aids Day vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vachiti pane zvichiri kuda kugadziriswa kuti Zimbabwe izadzise donzvo rekupedza denda iri panozosvika 2030 . Zimbabwe ndiyo nyika yekutanga muAfrica kushandisa mushonga wejekiseni rekudzikisa hukasha hwechirwere cheHIV rinonzi cabotegravir uye nyanzvi dzinoti iri kuita zviri nani kurwisa denda iri kudarika nyika dzakawanda. Dunhu reSADC ndiro rine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere ichi pasi rose zvikuru muSouth Africa. Vachitaura kumhemberero dzaitwa kuMarondera kuRudhaka Stadium nhasi mukuru weNational Aids Council, Doctor Bernard Madzima vatiwo zvakakosha kuti munhu wese akwanise kuwana rubatsiro kana ane chirwere cheHIV/AIDS vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinobatsira nyika kuti ikwanise kuzadzikisa chiga chekuderedza nekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Vachitaura neStudio 7 Amai Martha Tholanah vave nemakore makumi maviri nerimwe vachirarama nehutachiona hweHIV/ AIDS vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko akadai sehurombo nemhirizhonga yekushungurudzwa kwevana vadIko pabonde mukuedza kuzadzikisa tarisiro yekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Amai Tholanah vatiwo mapiritsi anoshandiswa nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS anogona kukonzerawo mamwe matambudziko nekudaro zvakakosha kuti nyika iise zvirongwa zvinoita kuti vanorarama nehutachiona vaongororwe pachena nguva nenguva zvinhu zvakadai sechiropa neitsvo . Mumwezve anorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Pastor Maxwell Kapachawo vati kupedza dambudziko rekupararira kwehutachiona zvakakosha kuti nyika igadzirise matambudziko arimunyaya dzezvehutano. Amai Olive Thabeni mukuru werimwe sangano rinoshanda nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS reLife Empowerment Support Organisation vati zvakakosha kuti vanhu vanorarama nechirwere ichi vabatsirwe kudzivirira zvimwe zvirwere zvakadai segomarara rechibereko pachena . Zuva reWorld Aids Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa1Zvita gore negore richishandiswa sezuva rekurangarira avo vakashaya ne kuda kwechirwere cheAIDS pamwe nekuyeuchidzana nezvechirwere ichi. Zuva iri rakatanga kucherechedzwa muna 1988 zvakurudzirwa nesangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation. Dingindira regore rino ririkukurudzira kuti munhu wese anorarama nehutachiona awane kubatsirika zvisinei nechimiro chake. No media source currently available

column2: ‘Tambai bhora vakomana’
column3: CHIKWATA chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors chiri kupinda muhondo nhasi na3pm masikati apo chichasangana necheSenegal mumutambo wacho wekutanga weTotal Energy Africa Cup of Nations 2021.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri muboka rimwe chete reGroup B umo mune zvimwe zvinoti Malawi neGuinea.   Mutungamiri weFriends of the Warriors – Edward Chimedza – anoti mutambo watsvuka ropa.   “Sevatsigiri venhabvu, tiri kufara zvikuru mutambo watange takamirira wasvika. Tinoti kumaWarriors basa ngaribatwe, musavhundutsirwe nemazita evatambi veSenegal. Isu titoriwo shasha uye kuti tive kumutambo uyu tinotorakidza kuti tiri nyanzviwo.   “Gore rino, kekutanga tinoda kuona chikwata chedu chichibudirira kubuda muboka racho chichifambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Asi tiri ipapo, tiri kukurudzira vatsigiri kuti ngaticherechedze mutemo, ngatisaungane asi tione mutambo uyu tiri kudzimba dzedu,” anodaro Chimedza.   Kuchiti mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu ane mukurumbira – Adomsi Mukwasi – anoti maWarriors anotofanirwa kutokunya dzisimbe mumutambo uyu.   “Isu tiri kuti hatinei nemazita evatambi vari muchikwata cheSenegal, basa ngaribatwe maWarriors. Go Warriors Go, tinemi muhondo, Senegal ngairadzikwe pasi,” anodaro Mukwasi.   Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa, uyo akasimuka nezuro akananga kuCameroon kunotsigira maWarriors kumutambo uyu, anoti chikwata ichi chinoda rutsigiro rwakasimba.   “Vakomana vedu tinavo, ishuviro yedu kuti vabate basa sebasa. Gore rino, tinotarisira kuti ngavabude muboka ravo timbosvika kure kumutambo uyu,” anodaro Musekiwa.   Mutambo uyu uchange uri wechina maWarriors achisangana neSenegal uye pamitambo mitatu yadarika, chikwata chenyika ichi chakakundwa yose.   Kumutambo weAFCON, maWarriors akasangana neSenegal kaviri, ndokukundwa 2-0 mumitambo yose.   Zvakadaro, sangano reCAF rakazivisa kuti Senegal ichange isina vatambi vayo vane chitsama vanosanganisira Edourd Mendy weChelsea, Kalidou Koulibaly weNapoli naNampalys Mendy weLeicester City sezvo vakabatwa nedenda reCovid-19.

column2: VaMzembi Vopinda Misangano muWashington DC yeKukwezva Vashanyi
column3: Gurukota rezve kushanya nekushanyirwa kwenyika, VaWalter Mzembi, vanoti vari pamusangano we US-Africa Business Summit uyo uri kuitirwa muWashington vachiyedza kukwezva vanoita zvemabhizimusi ekushanyira nyika kuti vaende kuZimbabwe. ​VaMzembi vanoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vanoshanyira nyika vachibva kuAmerica hwakawanda kukunda dzimwe nyika, vanoti vanoda kuti hurambe huchikwira. Musangano uyu wakatanga neChipiri uye uchapera neChishanu. VaMzembi vachangobva kukundwa mumakwikwi ekutsvaga munyori mukuru musangano re United Nations World Tourism Organisation akaitwa kuSpain. Asi vanoti izvi hazvisi kuvadzora kumashure sezvo vakadzidza zvikuru kubva kumakwikwi aya. "Tichange tichizeya nedzimwe nyika dzinosanganisira vana muzvina bhisinesi vemu America pamusoro pekuti vangawedzere seyi huwandu hwevanoshanya munyika," VaMzembi vaudza Studio 7. VaMzembi vaenderera mberi vachiti vane zvirongwa zvakawanda zvavari kuda kuti vana muzvinabhisinesi vemuAmerica vaite vakabatana neZimbabwe mukuedza kuvandudza nyaya yekushanya nekushanyirwa. No media source currently available

column2: VaJob Sikhala Votanga Kutongwa Muna Ndira Gore Rinouya
column3: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro veMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJob Sikhala, vaudzwa nedare redzimhosva kuMasvingo kuti nyaya yavari kupomerwa inofanirwa kuenda kunotongwa nedare repamusoro, sezvo vari kupomerwa mhosva huru ine chekuita nekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo. VaSikhala vakasungwa muna Chikunguru vachipomerwa mhosva yekutaura mashoko anonzi nehurumende aive akanangana nekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo. Munyori anoona nezvemitemo muMDC, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti havana kufara nedanho iri sezvo zvose zviri kuitwa zviriine chinangwa chekushungurudza VaSikhala, avo vanove nhengo inomirira Zengeza West mudare reNational Assembly. VaGonese vanoti vachaenda kudare iri panotanga kunzwikwa nyaya yaVaSikhala vachivatsigira sezvo VaSikhala vasina mhosva yavakapara. No media source currently available

column2: Zim shasha yeIKF Africa Champions
column3: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Korfball chakasimudza mureza wenyika kuZambia uko chakahwina mukombe weInternational Korfball Federation (IKF) Africa Champions ndokuwana tikiti rekunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup iyo ichatambirwa kuChinese Taipei gore rinotevera.   Achitaura vachangodzoka kubva kuZambia, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Korfball Association arizve mutungamiri weIKF Africa – Tarirai Chadebah – anoti chikwata chavo chine mufaro mukuru nekukunda kwachakaita.   Kuhwina kwavakaita kuZambia kunoreva kuti Zimbabwe pari zvino ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica yese mumutambo wekorfball. Africa ichange ichamirirwa neZimbabwe neMorocco iyo yakahwina mutambo werimwe boka reNorthern Region.   “Senyika, tiri kufara kuti takakunda kuZambia ndokuhwina tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup ichatambwa gore rinotevera kuChinese Taipei.   “Kuhwina tikiti iri pamwe chete neMorocco kunoreva kuti senyika tiri kufamba mugwara chairo uye tiri kuziva zvatiri kuita. Saka tinofanirwa kuramba tichishanda nesimba kuti tirambe tichisimukira mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Chadebah.   Anoti chikwata chavo hachisi kumbozvipa nguva yekuzorora nekuti vanoda kubva vatotanga gadziriro dzeWorld Cup izvozvi.   “Tinoziva kuti patinoenda kuWorld Cup tinotarisirwa pasi asi isu tinoda kunorwa semvumba kumutambo uyu tigovarakidza kuti tiri shashawo.   “Saka hatina nguva yekuzorora, takangobva kuZambia ndokusvika takutotanga kuronga rwendo rwedu rwekuenda kuChinese Taipei kumutambo uyu,” anodaro Chadebah.

column2: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chovhiringa Zvakanyanya Vadzidzi Vakawanda Munyika
column3:
Huwandu hwevadzidzi vari kuramba vachibatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 horamba huchikwira kuMasvingo nemamwe matunhu. Izvi zvinotevera kubudiswa kwemashoko evana vakabatwa nedenda iri
nezuro mudunhu Masvingo ayo anoti vana makumi matanhatu nevashanu
vakabatwa neCovid-19 nezuro muzvikoro zvitanhatu. Bazi revehutano rinoti mwana mumwe chete akabatwa paMashoko High nevana makumi maviri paChinorumba High kuBikita, vana vatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi paGutu High, vana makumi maviri nemumwe vakabatwa paMushayavanu High uye paDeure High pakabatwa vana gumi nevatanhatu. Mumwe mubereki, Amai Joyce Mhungu, vati vave kutyira hupenyu hwevana vavo uye kukanganisika kwedzidzo muvana nenyaya yedenda iri. Mumwe mubereki, Amai Entrance Takaedza, vati huremende yakamhanyira kuvhura zvikoro isina kugadzirira kudzivirirwa kwedenda iri zvakanaka muzvikoro.

Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati dambudziko iri ratekeshera muzvikoro zvose zviri munyika. Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati hurumende
yakange yakagadzirira asi kuti vadzidzi nevadzidzisi vakauya vane chirwere ichi muzvikoro. Mutauriri weProvincial Covid-19 Task Force muMasvingo, VaRodgers
Irimayi, vati panodiwa zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa vana mirawo
yekudzivirira denda iri muzvikoro kuti ridzikire.

Vamwe vabereki vanoti vava kutyira kuti vana vakawanda vachatadza kugadzirira kunyora bvunzo dzavo, kana kutotadza kunyora bvunzo idzi nepamusana pekurwara nedenda reCovid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vapfumbamwe vakashaya nedenda reCovid-19 nezuro munyika yose, uye vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevashanu 285 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu, uye vabatwa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe nemazana matatu ane makumi matanhatu nevasere, 127, 368. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika vave mamirioni maviri
nezviuru mazana mapufumbamwe nezvisere nemazana mashanu ane gumi nevana, 2 908 514. Vabayiwa nhomba yepiri munyika vave mamiriyoni maviri nechiuru chimwe chete nemazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi masere nevanomwe, 2,001
987. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. Hurumende inoti iri kuda kubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi munyika kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19

column2: Vashandi veChitungwiza Vakamiswa Mabasa Vasina Kupiwa Mihoro Yavo Voronga Kukwira kuMatare
column3: Vashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi matatu vakamiswa basa svondo rapera vaungana pamahofisi ekanzuru iyi vachida kuti vapiwe mari dzemihoro dzavanoti vakanga vasina kupiwa kwemwedzi inonzi ingada kusvika kumakumi matatu. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi veChitungwiza, Reverend Ephraim Katsina vanoti kanzuru yakapotsa pakutanga yamisa vashandi ava mabasa isati yavabhadhara mari dzavo dzayakanga isati yavapa. Reverend Katsina vanoti vaedza kuita musangano nemunyori mukuru wekanzuru yeChitungwiza VaGeorge Makunde asi hapana chinobatika chabuda mumusangano uyu. Vanoti vachasangana zvakare neChipiri, kukundikana kuwirirana votora matanho ekuenda kumatare edzimhosva, uye kusanganawo negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, vaSaviour Kasukuwere. “Tinoda kunzwa kubva kuna minisita kuti vakatendera here kuti kanzuru imise vashandi ava mabasa,” vanodaro Reverend Katsina Nemusi weChina svondo rapera kanzuru yakamisa vashandi ava mabasa ichi shandisa mutongo weSupreme Court wakabuda muna Chikunguru, kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakanga vasaina bhiri rekuvandudza mutemo wezvevashandi kuti uve mutemo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata VaMakunde kanawo meya weChitungwiza VaPhilip Mutoti kuti tinzwe divi rekanzuru panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa muBulawayo Vozeya reMangwana Ravo
column3: Vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa muBulawayo vanoti vanoda kuti kanzuru iwedzere nguva yayakavapa yekuti vabve pane imwe nzvimbo yavari kutengesera kuitira kuti vawane nguva yakakwana yekuenda kunzvimbo itsva dzavanofanirwa kutengesera vari. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa nevamwe vevanotengesa paGodini. Vanhu ava vakapiwa kusvika pakupera kwemwedzi uno kuti vabve panzvimbo iyi apo pari kuda kuvakirwa nzvimbo inenge iine zvitoro nemahofisi ichange ichinzi EGodini Mall. Kambani inofanirwa kuvaka nzvimbo iyi inofanirwa kutanga basa musi wa 1 Kurume, svondo rinouya. Murongi wemabasa muBulawayo Upcoming Traders Association, VaVincent Donga, vanoti vaita musangano nekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo vachiiudza kuti vanoda kuwedzerwa mazuva. Mumwe wevanotengesa paGodini, Amai Sekai Ndlovu, vabvuma kuti kanzuru yaive yavaudza kuti vanofanirwa kubva panzvimbo iyi uye kuti vakaudzwa nzvimbo itsva kwavari kufanirwa kunotengesera vari. Asi vati vane kushushikana nekubva panzvimbo iyi nekuti vave nenguva vachitengesera ipapo uyewo havana chokwadi chekuti kwavanonzi vaende kwacho vachange vachiwana vanhu vanovatenga vakawanda here sevavaichiwana paGodini. Munyori mukuru weBulawayo Upcoming Traders Association, VaDumisani Ncube, vatsigira kuti vanotengesera paGodini vanoda kuwedzerwa nguva yekubva panzvimbo iyi nekuti vakanonoka kuudzwa kuti vanofanirwa kubva. Vati sezvo kutengesa kuri iko kunopa raramo kuvanhu ava, kubviswa kwavo hakufanirwe kuti kuitwe zvechimbi-chimbi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauriri wekanzuru, Amai Nesisa Mpofu, kana kubva kuna meya, VaMartin Moyo, sezvo vange vachinzi vari mumusangano. Asi kanzuru yakazivisa gore rakapera nezvekuvakwa kweGodini Mall uye kuti vanotengesa vari panzvimbo iyi vaizofanirwa kubva. Kana yapera kuvakwa EGodini Mall inonzi ichavewo nenzvimbo itsva yevanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana. Nzvimbo yeEGodini Mall inotarisira kuvakwa nemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora. No media source currently available

column2: Doctor Manyika veBuild Zimbabwe Vokurudzira Kuti Vanhu Vasakanganwa Kwavakabva
column3: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Doctor Noah Manyika vanogara kuCharlotte, kuNorth Carolina muAmerica vari kuita zvakawanda kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe, vangave kumusha kana kunze kwenyika, kuti vavake nyika yechipikirwa. Doctor Manyika vanoshanda nesangano reBuild Zimbabwe, iro vakavamba vaine chinangwa chekuti vabatsire vana nezvipfeko, mabhuku pamwe nevirongwa zvinorodza pfungwa. Asi vanoti vakazorivhurirawo kune vamwe vana veZimbabwe kuti vaite mubata pamwe semajuru mukuumba nyika. "Build Zimbabwe chirongwa chandaiita makore gumi nemashanu adarika nechinangwa chekuti Zimbabwe ibudirire kana munhu wese akawana chaanoita mukuvaka nyika. Asi ndakazoti, kwete, kwete, regai ndidaidzed vamwe vana veZimbabwe tivake tiri pamwechete," vanodaro Doctor Manyika. Vanoti sangano ravo iri rine zvirongwa zvakawanda zvariri kuita mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana enyika, zvinosanganisira kuvaka dzimba dzine mitengo yepasi mumaguta ari munyika senzira yekubatsira vanhu vakawanda kuti vawane pekugara pakakodzera. No media source currently available

column2: Vanamukoti Vairamwa Mabasa Votarisirwa Kudzoka paBasa
column3: Vanamukoti, avo vanga vave nesvondo vachiramwa mabasa, vari kutarisirwa kudzoka pabasa vose nhasi Muvhuro, zvichitevera kuzivisa kwavakaita neMugovera kuti vakanga vave kumisa kuramwa mabasa uku. Gwaro rakaburitswa nesangano rinomirira vanamukoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association nemusi weMugovera, rinoti zvinosuwisa kuti matanho avanamukoti ekuratidza kunyunyuta kwavo nemabatirwo avo pamabasa akanga ave kuiswa kune zvematongerwo enyika. Sangano ravanamukoti iri rinoti kuitira kuti nhaurirano, idzo dzakanga dzambomira, dzienderere mberi, uyewo kudzivirirawo vashandi kuti vasashungurudzwa, vanamukoti vose vakawirirana kumisa kuramwa mabasa uku kuti uye vave kudzokera kubasa. Sangano iri rinoti vose vanamukoti vakanga vari pakuramwa mabasa vari kutarisirwa kudzokera kumabasa kwavo nhasi. Asi hazvisati zvazivikanwa kuti vanamukoti ava vachatambirwa here kana kuti kwete, sezvo hurumende yakanga yazivisa kare kuti vose vakanga vapinda pakuramwa mabasa vakanga vadzingwa mabasa, uye vanoda basa vaifanirwa kutonyorera patsva vachitsvaga basa. Hurumende yakazivisawo zvakare kuti yakanga yatotanga kutambira matsamba kubva kunavanamukoti vaitsvaga mabasa.

column2: Vagari vekuMabvuku-Tafara Vochenesa Misha neKutsvaira Marara
column3: Nekuona dambudziko remarara aita makomo nemakomo, kanzuru yeguta reHarare isiri kukwanisa kuatakura, vagari vekuMabvuku neTafara vari kutarisirwa kuchenesa musha wavo neChitatu kuburikidza nekutsvaira pamwe nekuchengetedza marara. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, uye vari kanzura weWard 21, VaBarnabas Ndira, vanoti vachabatana nekambani inogadzira simende yeLafarge Cement Zimbabwe Limited, iyo yaizivakanwa kare seCirlce Cement, pamwe nekanzuru yeguta reHarare. VaNdira vanoti vagari vachapa simba ravo, kambani yeLafarge Cement Zimbabwe Limited yopawo zvekushandisa zvakaita sembatya dzinodzivirira tsvina pamwe nemabhini ekuisira marara, kanzuru ichizobatsirawo nemotokari dzekutakurisa marara aya. Kanzuru yeHarare iri kutatarika kuti ikwanise kutakura marara munzvimbo dzakawanda, izvo zvave kupa kuti vagari vaite hurongwa hwekuchenesa nzvimbo dzavo voga. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata vekambani yeLafarge Cement Zimbabwe Limited kanawo kanzuru kuti tinzwewo kubva kwavari. Asi Kanzura Ndira vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga kuti vabatane nevamwe mukushambidza musha wavo. “Mwedzi yapera iyi taibatana nevakaita sevedzichechi pamwe nemasangano evagari anoti reCombined Harare Residents Association neHarare Residents Trust. Mwedzi wapera tabatana neAnglican Church, saka aka hakasi kekutanga uye kupedzisira,” vanodaro VaNdira, vanova munin'ina wamuchakabvu Tonderai Ndira, avo vakapondwa munguva yemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika muna 2008. No media source currently available

column2: VaMangudya Vanoti Dhiziri nePeturu Zvizere Munyika
column3: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Dr John Mangudya, vaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto kuti munyika mune mafuta emotokari akawanda uye vanhu vanofanira kuashandisa zvine mwero. Vatiwo mitsetse iri pamagaraji mazhinji inokonzerwa nekuti vanhu vari kutenga vachityira kuti achashaikwa zvakare. Vachipa humbowo pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika panyaya dzepeturu nedhiziri nezvimwe, VaMangudya vati nyika yakatenga mafuta akawanda zvekuti vanhu havafaniri kutenga mafuta zvematyira sezvari kuitwa pari zvino. Vati bhanga ravo rine zvirongwa zvekutenga mafuta kubva kumakambani akawanda uye pari zvino makambani emafuta ari kuendesa mafuta aya kumagaraji mazuva ose. Semuenzaniso, vati kambani yeTrafigura inounza munyika mamiriyoni gumi nemana emarita emafuta ayo inoendesa kumakambani ePUMA, Redan, CMED, Trek ne Genesis pasvondo rega rega, panguva imwe cheteyo Total ichiunza mamiriyoni gumi, Engen ichiunzawo mamiriyoni manomwe kozotiwo IPG ichiunza mamiriyoni manomwe. Vatiwo kune mamwe makambani akawanda anopinzawo mafuta munyika achiwana rubatsiro kubva kuRBZ. VaMangudya vati kunyange hazvo nyika iine dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari yekunze, bhanga ravo riri kupa makambani anounza mafuta munyika mari inokwana kutenga mafuta anokwanira nyika yese. Zimbabwe inoda zana nemakumi maviri emamiriyoni emadhora semari yekutenga mafuta mwedzi wega. Vati mitsetse iri kuonekwa zuva nezuva pamagaraji inokonzerwa nekuti vanhu vari kutenga mafuta vachinochengeta nekutengesa pamukoto sezvo vachitya kuti anogona kuzoshaikwa. Vatiwo huwandu hwemotokari hwakwirawo zvakanyanya zvekuti munyika mave nemotokari dzinosvika miriyoni nemazana masere. Mukuru weZimbabwe Engery Regulatory Authority, VaEddington Mazambani, vaudzawo komiti iyi kuti pave kudiwa kutora matanho anopedza dambudziko remafuta aya. Vati panodiwa kumutsiridza hurongwa kwekuti pashandiswe mabhazi nematireni kuitira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanoshandisa motokari. No media source currently available

column2: Vanoda Kuva Nhengo dzeZACC Vobvunzwa Mibvunzo Veruzhinji Vachinzwa Mhinduro Dzavo
column3: Vamwe vari kupinda musarudzo dzekutsvaga makomishina eZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, (ZACC), vaudza komiti yeparamende iri kuvabvunzurudza kuti mitemo inoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwehuwori inofanira kusimbaradzwa uye komisheni iyi inofanirwa kushanda isina anoiudza zvekuita pamwe nekupihwa mari yakawanda kuti iite basa rayo nemazvo. Vachipindura mibvunzo kubva kukomiti iyi inotungamirirwa nemutauriri, weNational Assembly, Advocate Jacob Mudenda, vakawanda vavo vati komisheni iripo pari zvino haina mazino uye inoshanda nemamwe mapazi ehurumende ane huwori akaita semapurisa, matare nedzimhosva pamwe nemahofisi evachuchusi. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaGabriel Chaibva, vati mitemo yekudzivirira huwori yakaita zinyekenyeke uye inofanirwa kusimbaradzwa. VaChaibva vatiwo panofanira kuve nemutemo unochengetedza vaye vanenge vamhan’ara huwori vachiti pari zvino vanhu ava vanoshungurudzwa mushure mekuita izvi. Vatiwo ZACC haitombozikanwi munyika uye basa rayo rinofanirwa kushambadzwa zvakasimba kuitira kuti vanhu vakwanise kumhan’ara huwori kubva kunzvimbo ipi zvayo munyika. Vamwe vapinda mubvunzo idzi igweta, VaTinomudzishe Chinyoka, vabvumirana naVaChaibva kuti nhengo dzeZACC dzinofanira kubhadharwa mari yepamusoro kuitira kuti dzisaite zvehuwori. Vatiwo nhengo dzeZACC hadzifanirwe kusarudzwa nevezvematongerwo enyika vakaita senhengo dzeparamende sezvo vari ivo vamwe vevanhu vane huwori hunotyisa. Vatiwo ZACC inofanira kumira pachayo yega iine simba rekusunga, kuongorora pamwe nekuchuchisa vanoita zvehuwori uyewo vatiwo kupindira kunoita vezvematongerwo enyika mubasa reZACC, kutadza kuendesa kujeri vanhu vanoonekwa pachena kuti vanoita zvehuwori, kunoita kuti vanhu vasaremekedza komisheni iyi. VaChinyoka vatiwo zvinonyadzisa kuti mumajeri emuno hamuna vanhu vari kupika jeri nenyaya dzehuwori asi imo munyika muine huwori hunosemesa. Mumwe wevabvunzurudzwa, Amai Tsitsi Dhliwayo, vati kana vakadomwa vanoda kuona mabasa eZACC achishambadzwa uye kuti komisheni iyi ivhure mahofisi mumatunhu ese munyika kwete zvekungove muHarare chete. Mumwe ari kudawo kuva nhengo yeZACC, Doctor Mable Hungwe, vatiwo semaonero avo nyaya yekurwisa huwori ibasa remunhu wese munyika kweZACC chete,uye vatiwo kana vakadomwa vacharwisa huwori muhurumende pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akzvimirira. Dr Hungwe vati mari dzese dzinowanikwa nehuwori dzinofanirwa kutorwa nehurumende dzoshandiswa kuvaka mabhiriji kana zvikoro. Gweta, uye vaimbove mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Jessie Majome, avo vari kudawo kuitwa komishina, vatiwo kana hurumende ikabata mari dzose dzinenge dzashandiswa munyaya dzehuori, zvinogona kubatsira kuti veruzhinji vamhan’are huwori kana vanzwa nezvahwo. Vati veruzhinji ndivo vanonyanyo rasikirwa panoitwa huwori uye zvakakosha kuti vaite chido chekumhan’ara huwori. Muzvare Majone vati kuti hondo yekupedza huwori ibudurire, vanhu vanofanirwa kusungwa, kutongwa nekundwa mumajeri pachena zvisinei nekuti ndevebato ripi kana kuti vabva mumba mani. Bunzvo idzi dziri kuenderera mberi uye dzinotarisirwa kupera nhasi. Pane vanhu makumi matatu nevasere vange vachifanira kupinda mubvunzo idzi, asi padzatanga, Advocate Mudenda vazivisa kuti pane vamwe vatatu, VaChritopher Dube-Banda, VaZondi Kumwenda naVaTwanda Matope vabuda mubvunzo idzi. VaBlessing Chebundo veMDC ndemumwewo ange asipo apo pasvika chinhano chekuti vabvunzurudzwe. Paramende ichabuda nemazita evanhu gumi nevaviri ayo ichaendesa kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vadome vanhu vesere vachipinda muZACC. VaMnangagwa vakatodoma mutongi wedare repamusoro, uye vari mudzimai wegurukota rezvekunze kwenyika, Va Sibusiso Moyo, Justice Loice Matanda Moyo, kuve sachigaro weZACC. Pakadomwa Amai Matanda Moyo kuve sachigaro weZACC, masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akashoropodza kudomwa kwavo achiti munhu ane divi raakarerekera zvokuti anogona kutadza kufambisa nyaya dzehuori dzinenge dzichiitwa nebazi remurume wavo. Nhengo dzebhodhi rese reZACC dzakasiya basa zvisina tsarukano mukutanga kwegore rino. No media source currently available

column2: Japan chidzidzo — Makusha
column3: SHANGWITI yemujaho wekumhanya — Ngoni Makusha —inoti yakadzidza zvakawanda kumakwikwi emaOlympics ayo pari zvino ari kuitirwa kuJapan uye yave kushanda nesimba kuti igokwanisa kudzokera zvekare kumitambo iyi mumakore mana anotevera.   Makusha mumwe wevatambi vashanu vange vachimirira nyika kumitambo iyi.   Nemusi weMugovera akakwikwidza mumijaho miviri apo wekutanga wakaita kuti azopinda mumujaho mukuru umo akazopedza ari pechinomwe ndokubva aburitswa mumutambo uyu.   Achitaura ari kuJapan achigadzirira kudzoka kumusha, Makusha anoti zvinhu zvinofadza zvikuru kumirira nyika kumutambo mukuru wakaita semaOlympics uye ave kutotanga kugadzirira kuzoenda kunokwikwidza zvakare kune mimwe inotevera.   “Ndiri kunzwa kufara kuti ndakazadzikisa chishuwo changu chekukwikwidza kumaOlympics. Ndakadzidza zvakawanda zvandichagara nazvo uye iye zvino ndave kutotanga gadziriro dzangu dzekuti ndizodzokera kune mamwe maOlympics anotevera. Gore rinotevera, ndinoda kunokwikwidza kumaWorld Championships,” anodaro Makusha.   Kunyangwe hake ari kudzoka kumusha asina menduru yaakabata, Makusha anoti haasi kutarisira izvozvo nekuti chikuru kwaari kwaive kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu achidzingirirana nedzimwe shasha dzepasi rese.   Anoti rutsigiro rwaange achiwana rwuri kumusimudzira zvekuti acharamba achishanda nesimba. “Rutsigiro rwandange ndichipihwa kubva kuvanhu vakawanda rwunosimudzira naizvozvo ini ndicharamba ndichishanda nesimba kuitira kuti mune remangwana ndigounza menduru. “Chikuru chandaitarisira pandakaenda kumutambo uyu kusvika ndokwikwidzawo zita rangu rozivikanwa izvo ndakakwanisa kuita.   Kukwikwidza kumutambo uyu kwakanakisa chose nekuti unoramba uchidzokera, iye zvino ndave kushanda nesimba kuitira kuti ndigoramba ndichidzokera kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu.”

column2: MDC T Yoronga Musangano Mukuru weKupeta Gore kuZimbabwe Grounds
column3: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai mangwana vari kutarisirwa kutungamira nhengo dzavo pamusangano mukuru wekuvhara gore uchaitirwa munhandare ine nhoroondo yekurwira rusununguko rwevatema yeZimbabwe Grounds iri mumusha weHighfield. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoti chinangwa chikuru chemusangano uyu ndechekutarisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika pari zvino, pasvika hurongwa hwemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa pakatarisanwa nesarudzo dza2018, pamwe nekutendawo vana veZimbabwe nekushinga kunyange vari mukati mematambudziko makukutu. VaGutu vanoti zvimwe zvicha kurukurwawo ndezvakaitwa nebato ravo mukati megore rino, zvinosanganisira kuratidzira mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana enyika. No media source currently available

column2: Breaking...Senegal Yopinda muChikamu Chechipiri Mumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup kuQatar
column3: Senegal yave nyika yekutanga muAfrica kupinda muchikamu chechipiri chemakwikwi eWorld Cup kuQatar. Senegal yakunda Ecuador 2-1 muGroup A. Yabudirira kuenda kuchikamu chenyika gumi nenhatu kana kuti Group of 16 pamwe neNetherlands yakunda Qatar 2-0 muGroup A zvekare. No media source currently available

column2: Vagari vekwaChiyadzwa Vakanetsana neVakuru veKambani yeMangoda yeAnjin Vopihwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
