column3: Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti maMutare VaLangton Mukwengi neChina vakabhadharisa mari yechibatiso inosvika madhora zviuru zvitatu zveRTGS kuvasungwa makumi maviri nevasere avo vakasungwa nemusi weChipiri apo vairatidzira pakambani yemangoda yeAnjin vachinyunyuta nekusabata vagari ava zvakanaka, uye kukanganisirwa nharaunda yavo nemabasa ekucherwa kwemangoda kuri kuitwa nekambani iyi. VaMukwengi vakaudza vasungwa ava kuti vasakanganisa mabasa ari kuitwa pakambani yeAnji vachiti vasasvika chinhambwe chemamita zana pedyo nayo. Vati vasungwa vagare padzimba dzavo dziri mumagwaro edare uye vasavhiringidza vafakazi panyaya iyi. Vasungwa ava vanzi vadzoke zvakare kudare nemusi wa22 Mbudzi gore rino apo mhosva yavari kupomerwa ichatanga kutongwa. Rimwe remagweta riri kumiririra vasungwa ava VaCosmas Chibaya vaudza Studio 7 vanofara nezvabuda mudare. Izvi zvatsigirwa nerimwe remagweta evasungwa ava VaRichard Ncube vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Environmental Law Association. Vachuchusi venyaya iyi vanoti vasungwa makumi maviri nevasere ava vachitungamirirwa naSabhuku Robert Chiadzwa avo vanemakore makumi mapfumbamwe ekuberekwa vakaputsa hari dzedoro range rabikwa pakugadzirira mhemberero dzekuvhurwa patsva kwekambani yemangoda yeAnjin nemusi wa28 Gumiguru. Vasungwa ava vanonzi zvakare vakaparadza matende epagungano iri vachinyunyuta nekusabatwa zvakanaka kwevashandi vepakambani iyi nevaridzi vayo vekuChina. Vagari ava vanotiwo vanoda kuti vave chikamu chinosvika gumi kubva muzana chevashandi vepaAnjin sezvo kambani iyi iri kuchera munharaunda mavo. Vakuru vekambani yeAnjin vanonzi havana havo kumhan’ara chiitiko ichi kumapurisa vachida kugadzirisana pachavo nevagari, vakavimbisa kudzoka nemusi wa2 Mbudzi kuita musangano vose nechinangwa chekunzwisisana. Mushure mekutadza kuuya kwevakuru veAnjin ava kumusangano uyu sezvange zvarongwa vagari vanosvika mazana mana vakaungana pamba paVaNewman Chiadzwa vatsamwa vakaronga kuratidzira pamuzinda weAnjin vachitungamirirwa naVaNewman Chiadzwa, Sabhuku Robert Chiadzwa uye nava Shadreck Chipise. Vairatidzira ava vainge vaine zvinyorwa zvakanzi, Anjin wauraya zvipfuyo zvedu, wauraya mafuro, madhamu, nzizi neminda yedu yekurima nezvimwewo. Kuratidzira uku kunonzi kwakazoita mhirizhonga pakarohwa vawe vashandi nevaridzi vekambani iyi. Tichiri panyaya dzange dziri kumatare maMutare, mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato reMDC Alliance kuManicaland VaItai Masaka neChitatu vakabvisiswa mari yechibatiso inoita madhora zviuru gumi pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekurova mutsigiri weZanu PF mumusha weChikanga, VaMalcom Masarira vanova sachigaro wevechidiki mu14th District kwaMutare. VaMasaka avo vange vakamirirwa mudare negweta VaDavid Tandiri vakanzi vadzoke kudare zvakare musi wa19 Mbudzi.

column2: Nyanzvi dzeHupfumi Dzozeya Kurudziro yeRBZ Yekuti Mari yeMunyika Ishandiswe Zvakanyanya
column3: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kurudziro yagavhuna vebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, yekuti vanhu vashandise mari yemunyika zvakanyanya ipfungwa yakanaka chose, asi izvi zvinoshanda chete kana mari yemunyika iyi iine huremu hunounza chivimbo muvanhu. Vachitaura kumusangano wavakaita nevemabhizimusi svondo rapera, VaMangudya vakati kushandiswa kwemari yekunze munyika kwakaonekwa muna 2008 kuti hakukudze hupfumi hwenyika kunze kwekungodzikamisa chete mitengo yezvinhu. Vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanhu vemunyika vanofanirwa kuve nechivimbo nemari yemunyika kuitira kuti itambirike. Izvi zvinotsigirwa neimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoti chivimbo nemari yemunyika chinofanirwa kutangira kuhurumende, iyo vanoti iri kutara mitengo yezvinhu kusanganisira mari dzinoripirwa pama Toll gate nemari yekunze. Vaimbotungamira sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa vanotiwo mari yemunyika inofanirwa kuzvishambadza yoga, kwete kuti iite zvekushambadzwa naVaNgudya sevanoshambadza mbatya dzekupfeka kana zvekudya. VaMutasa vanotiwo nyaya hombe yaita kuti mari yemunyika ipere simba inyaya yehuwori, zvikuru kumusika wemari yekunze, uko vanoti vamwe vari kutenga mari yekunze nemutengo wepasi vozoitengesa pamusika mutema nemari iri pamusoro. Asi pane chakaipa here kuti nyika ishandise mari yekunze? Doctor Chitambara vanoti kushandiswa kwemari yekunze hakuna kuipa sezvo kuchibatsira kuti hurumende isarambi ichidhinda mari sezvo isingazokwanisi kudhinda mari yekunze iyi. Asi vanoti mari yemunyika inokwanisa kutambirika chete kana nyaya yekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation, yadzikamiswa. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvemabhizimusi, vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanotsinhira pfungwa yekuti vanhu vaite chivimbo nemari yemunyika. VaMuponda vanoti izvi zvinogadziriswa chete kuburikidza nekuti nyika itengese zvigadzirwa zvayo kunze uyewo ichideredza zvainotengawo kunze. VaMangudya vakati nyaya ye inflation vachaigadzirisa kuburikidza nesimbisa kushandiswa kwemari yemunyika, pamwechete nekukasika kuwanisa vanenge vahwinha pamusika wemari yekunze mari dzavo mukati memasvondo maviri senzira yekuti mari yekunze iwande mumabhizimusi. Asi nyanzvi dzezvehupfumi idzi dzinoti kunze kwekunge hurumende yatora matanho amasimba kurwisana nehuwori, hupfumi hwenyika hunogadzirisika chete kuburikidza nekudzorwa kwemari yekunze kuti ishande munyika, kana kuti dollarization. No media source currently available

column2: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa, Vanosaina Mutemo Mutsva weSarudzo
column3: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasaini bhiri reElectoral Amendment Act of 2018 kuti uve mutemo wenyika, izvo zvave kupa mukana wekuti nyika iite sarudzo pachishandiswa mutemo mutsva uyu. Izvi zvaziviswa mugwaro rehurumende reGovernment Gazette, iro raburitswa neChipiri, uye chiziviso ichi chinoti mutemo uyu wakatanga kushanda neMuvhuro. Vachiutaura mushure mekuburitswa kwechiziviso ichi, vanokokera nhengo dzebato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC-T inotungamiririrwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaInnocent Gonese, vati havana kufara nekuti VaMnangagwa vasaina mutemo uyu usina zvizhinji zvaidiwa nevemapato anopikisa kuti zvigadziriswe kana kuwedzerwa. Vati semaonero avo nyika haigona kuve nesarudzo dzisina mutauro kana pasina kuwirirana pazvinhu zvakawanda zvakaita sekudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot paper. MDC-T yaida kuti kudhindwa nekwema ballot paper kuitwe pachena vese vari kupinda musarudzo varipo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo mutemo mutsva uyu uchirambidza zvemhirizhonga, haupi matare mazino ekuranga vanenge vakonzera mhirizhonga panguva yesarudzo. Munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaPaul Mangwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara chose nedanho ratorwa nemutungamiriri wenyika, vachiti vave kugadzirira sarudzo pasi pemutemo mutsva uyu. Panyaya yekunyunyuta kuri kuita vemapato anopikisa, VaMangwana vati mapato aya aifanira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvawo kuparamende uye mutungamiriri wenyika anoshanda nezveanenge apihwa neparamende. VaMnangagwa vanotarisirwa kudoma zuva richaitwa sarudzo nguva ipi zvayo, uye izvi zvinoteverawo kupera kwechirongwa chekuongororwa kwegwaro revavhoti neveruzhinji. No media source currently available

column2: Vatambi VeTeam Zimbabwe 2016 Paralympic Vodzokera Kumusha Vasina Menduru
column3: Vatambi vemuZimbabwe vema2016 Paralympic Games vari kudzoka kumusha vari maoko chete. Mutori wedu wenhau dzemitambo. Vatambi vaviri vanga vasara kukwikwidza mumakundano aya ve Mixed Four, Margaret Bangajena, Michelle Garnet, Jesicca Davies na Previous Wiri nezuro vakapedza vari pachinhanho chekugumisira mugungano ravo. Vatambi ava vakatevera Laina Sithole uyo neMugovera akatadza kusvika mufainari ye 100 metres T35 ayo aive makundano ake ega aaikwikwidza. Sezvakaitawo chikwata cheZimbabwe kubva kumaOlympic Games chisina menduru, chikwata ichi chiri kudzokawo chisina kana menduru imwechete. Mumitambo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League chikwata cheHighlanders chiri mumafaro makuru mushure mekudzokorora kurova Dynamos 2-1mumutambo wanga wakaoma muBarbiurfields Stadium nezuro. Aka kave kechipiri Highlanders ichi kunda Dynamos mwaka uno wenhabvu mumitambo yeligi, kanove kechipiri zvekare mukati memakore gumi Bosso ichikwanisa kukunda Dembare. Kukunda uku kwasiya Bosso yasara nemapoinzi gumi pasi pechikwata chiri kutungamira cheFC Platinum icho chakarova How Mine 1-0 munhandare yeMandava. Mutsigiri weBosso VaDannboy Hamandishe vanoti vangadai vakakunda nezvibodzwa zvakawanda asi zvakangodaro varatidza kuti vanhu vakuru. Mumwe wavo VaTichaona Jecha vanoti murairidzi wawave naye ibanga chairo vachiti zvinhu zvasanduka. Kugona Kunenge Kudada yave nemapoinzi makumi mana nemasere kubva mumitambo makumi maviri nemitatu. Asi Bosso yave nemapoinzi matanhatu pamusoro peDynamos iyo nemamiriro akaita zvinhu yave kuratidza kuti yabuda mumakwikwi emukombe weligi. Asi Makepekepe aramba arimo muhondo yeligi mushure mekurova Chicken Inn 1-0. Kunyange hazvo chikwata ichi chaibaka moto hachina kukwanisa kunwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda kunze kwechimwechete chakabva kuna Leonard Tsipa. Chikwata chemaGreen Machine chakatamba zvine mutsindo zvekuti mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi Charles Muroyiwa anoti vanoisa mari muchikwata ichi vanotsvaga neshungu nematambiro aya. Asi maGreen Machine ari kuramba aiine poindi imwechete pasi peFC Platinum iyo yakarova How Mine. Musi mumwechete iwoyo, Hwange neZPC Kariba dzakaita mangange 1-1. Ngezi yakadambura Bulawayo City 1-0, Tsholotsholo ikakunda Border Strikers 1-0 asi Chapungu yakanwisa zviviri pakukunda Harare City 2-1. No media source currently available

column2: VaMwonzora Vanoti Ndivo Vave paNyanga Sezvo Vachiti Vakakunda Zvine Mutsindo
column3: VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti vakasarudzwa zviri pachena kutsiva mushakabva Morgan Tsvangirai semutungamiri webato reMDCT pakongiresi yechimbichimbi yakaitwa nemusi weSvondo. VaMwonzora vakakunda Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaElias Mudzuri pamwe naVaMorgan Komichi pakongiresi yechimbichimbi yekutsiva mushakabvu Tsvangirai. VaMwonzora vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakakunda zviri pachena kunyange vakakundwa ava vari kugunun’una kuti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka uye Muzvare Khupe vachiti vambomisa VaMwonzora basa. Asi Amai Khupe vakaudza vatori husiku hweSvondo kuti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka vachiti VaMwonzora vakashandisa chikiribidi kuti vakunde musarudzo idzi. Izvi zvatsinhirwa neumwe wevaikwikwidza musarudzo idzi VaElias Mudzuri avo vatiwo mhirizhonga nekusavhota zvakanaka kwevanhu vaifanira kuvhota zvinhu zvisingatarisirwe mubato rakaita seravo. VaMudzuri vati havasi kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo dzanezuro vachiti chavekudikanwa ndechekuti vagare pasi sehutungamiri hwebato kuti vaone kuti votora matanho api. Mibvunzo yatatumira Muzvare Khupe nevamwe vakakwidza musarudzo idzi VaMorgen Komichi yanga isati yapindurwa. Zvichakadaro, VaMwonzora vati vatotanga basa rekuumba musangano wavo kubva zvino zvichienda mberi vakati zviri kutaurwa nevakakundwa musarudzo zvinhu zvisina musoro. Tichiri panyaya iyi, nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro muMDC Alliance, VaLovemore Chinoputsa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kongiresi yakaitwa neMDCT haisi pamutemo sezvo vachiti paive nevanhu vashoma panevanofanira kunge varipo. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika muMDCT vanoti kusafamba zvakanaka kunonzi kwakaita kongiresi yebato iri kunogona kusiya bato iri ratsemuka zvakare. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Vana Vanobata Chirwere cheTyphoid muHarare
column3: Mukuru webazi rezve hutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanoti chirwere chetyphoid chadzoka muHarare zvikuru mumisha yevazhinji yeBudiriro neGlenview. Pari zvino pane vanhu vana vari kunzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vamwewo vachinzi vachiri kuongororwa. VaChonzi vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vafashaidze mvura yekumwa uye kudziyisa chikafu nekuteedzera kurudziro dzose munyaya dzezvehutano kuti vadzivirire kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Dr Chonzi vanoti vanenge vachifungidzira kuti vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanofanirwa kuenda kukiriniki iri pedyo navo kuitira kuti vawane rubatsiro nguva ichiripo. Vanoti kanzuru iri kuyedza kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvenzira dzekuzvidzivirira kuti vasatapurirwe kana kutapuririrana chirwere ichi. No media source currently available Vamwe vanhu vakawanda muguta reHarare vari kubatwawo nemanyoka nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena, kana kuti kushaikwa kwayo zvachose. Meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vanoti vari kuyedza nepavanogona napo pose kugadzirisa dambudziko remvura muguta.

column2: Dare reHigh Court Rinobvuma Chikumbiro chevana vaMushakabvu Mugabe Chekuti Vapikise Kufukunyurwa kweMutumbi Wavo
column3: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court nemusi weChina rakabvuma chikumbiro chevana vevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe chekuti vapikise mutongo wekuti mutumbi wababa vavo ufukunyurwe unovigwa kunovigwa magamba enyika kuHeroes Acre. Vachipa mutongo wavo kuburikidza negwaro, vatongi vedare repamusoro vanoti Justice Fatima Maxwell naJustice Amy Tsanga vakawirirana kuti vana vaVaMugabe vanoti Bona Mutsahuni Mugabe, Tinotenda Robert Mugabe Jnr. naBellarmine Chatunga vane kodzero pamutemo kupikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba wekuti mutumbi wababa vavo ufukunyurwe kwavakavigwa kumusha kwavo kwaZvimba kuti vanovigwa kumarinda anovigwa magamba kuHeroes Acre kuHarare. Vana vaVaMugabe vainge vapikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba kudare ramejasitiriti muChinhoyi asi mutongi Amai Ruth Moyo vainge varasa chikumbiro ichi vachiti vana ava havakwanise kupikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba sezvo vainge vasiri ivo vainge vaendeswa kudare raMambo asi Amai vavo Grace Mugabe. Asi dare repamusoro iri rakati vana ava vane kodzero yakazara. Rimwe remagweta evana vaVaMugabe, VaFungai Chimwamurombe vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutongo uyu unopa vana ava kodzero yekupikisa mutongo waMambo. VaChimwamurombe vati vave kutonyorera Mejasitiri Moyo nezvemutongo wedare repamusoro uyu kuti vavape zuva richanzwikwa nyaya iyi. Mutauriri wemhuri yekwaMugabe ari muzukuru waVaMugabe, VaLeo Mugabe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vapirwa nezvemutongo uyu. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Mambo Zvimba kuti tinzwewo divi ravo pamutongo uyu sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isingadairwi. Nyaya yenzvimbo yekuvigwa kwaVaMugabe yakanetsa kubva pavakafa makore maviri apera kusvika nhasi. Vamwe vanoti dai varega mutumbi wevaive mutungamiri wenyika ava wazorora murugare.

column2: Global Fund Yobatsira Zimbabwe neMari Kuitira Kuti Irwise Coranavirus
column3: Sangano reGlobal Fund ravimbisa kupa Zimbabwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica kuitira kuti igobatisra mukurwisa hutachiwana hweCoronavirus kana kuti Covid-19. Mukuru wesangano reGlobal Fund, VaPeter Sands, vazivisa nezverubatsiro uhwu pamusangano wavaita nevatapi venhau vari pamwe chete negurukota rezvehutano, VaObadiah Moyo. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti mari yavavimbisa kupa nyika mukurwisa Covid-19 ichauya riinhi, VaSands vati vakarerutsa zvinodiwa pakuti nyika inoda rubatsiro kubva kwavari iwane mari nekuda kwekuona kuti covid-19 iri kutekeshera pasi rose. Vati vanotarisira kuti mari iyi inogona kuburitswa mukati memazuva mashanu. Asi vati kupa rubatsiro urwu hakurevi kuti sangano reGlobal Fund rave kuzobvisa maziso aro pachinangwa charo chikuru chekurwisa zvirwere zveHIV/Aids, malaria nerurindi. VaSands vazivisawo kuti pamwaka mutsva wechirongwa cherubatsiro rwavanopa kunyika dzakasiyana siyana kurwisa zvirwerere zveHIV/ Aids, Malaria neTuberculosis, Zimbabwe iri kuzowana mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora yekuAmerica vakatiwo vari kufara nebasa riri kuitwa neZimbabwe mukurwisa zvirwere zvitatu izvi. Pamwaka wakapfuura wechirongwa ichi, Zimbabwe yaive yapiwa mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemanomwe emamiriyoni emadhora yekurwisa zvirwere izvi. VaMoyo vati hurumende inofara zvikuru nerubatsiro rwairi kupiwa neGlobal Fund vachiti kuwedzera kwayaita mari yekurwisa zvirwere zveHIV/Aids malaria nerurindi kunoratidza kuti hurumende iri kushandisa mari inobva kuchirongwa ichi nemazvo. Panyaya yekuti hurumende haina kugadzirira zvakakwana pakurwisa hutachiwana hweCovid-19 kana hukatekeshera munyika uye kuti hurumende haizi kutaura chokwadi pamusoro pekuti pane vanhu vabatwa nehutachiwana uhu here kana kuti kwete, munyori webazi rezvehutano, Dr Agnes Mahomwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu vanofanirwa kuvimba nezviri kutaurwa nehurumende. Dr Mahomva vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaite tsika yekuchengetedza hutano senzira yekudzivirira kuti hutachiwana uhu huve munyika. MuZimbabwe hamusati mave nemunhu ati abatwa nehutachiwana hweCovid-19 kusvika pari zvino kubvira pahwakatanga kuzivikanwa nezvaho kuChina pakupera kwegore rapera. South Africa yave nevanhu gumi nevatatu vakabatwa nehutachiwana uhu uye. Hurumende inoti iri kuita zvose zvainogona pakutarisa vose vanopinda munyika panhandare dzendege pamwe nepamiganhu yenyika uye kuzivisawo veruzhinji nezvehutachiwana uhu nenzira dzakasiyana siyana. Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vafa nechirwere cheCoronavirus. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kugwinyisa Muviri Kuti Vasarwarisa Vakabatwa neCovid-19
column3: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti vanhu vanofanirwa kugara vakagwinyisa miviri yavo nguva dzose kuitira kuti kana vachinge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vave nemukana mukuru wekupora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vagare vachiita zvirongwa zvekugwinyisa miviri yavo nguva dzose kuitira kuti vave nehutano hwakanaka. Kugwinyisa muviri uku kunogona kuitwa nenzira dzakawanda, idzo dzinosanganisira kuita zvemitambo, kumhanya, pamwe nekufamba zvinoitakuti vabude, unova mucherechedzo wekuti huwandu hwemafuta ari mumuviri, hunenge huchideredzwa. Mumwe mudzidzisi wepachikoro chemapusoro soro, Doctor Tendai Charity Nhenga, vanoti pavakarwara nedenda reCovid 19 gore rino, vakapiwa mubhedha kwaMutare uko kwavakaona vanhu vaiva vapihwawo mibhedha vakange vaine miviri yakakurisa zvikuru. Doctor Nhenga vanoti pavakaziva nezvedenda iri gore rakapera, vakatanga kuita zvokufamba vachigwinyisa muviri wavo. Vanoti vane chokwadi kuti kusimbisa kwavaiita nyama dzavo kwakabatsira zvikuru mukupora kwavo. Doctor Nhenga vanoti mudzinza ravo mune vanhu vane mhumhu mukuru, pamwe nehuremu husingawirirane nehurefu hwavo. Vanoti vazhinji vevanhu ava vanorwara nezvirwere zveshuga, High Blood Pressure izvo zvinoita kuti vadhererwe nezvirwere zvakawanda, zvinosanganisira Covid-19. Mukuru weDepartment of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kugara vachigwinyisa miviri yavo kuburikidza nekuita mitambo kana mabasa anoita kuti vabude dikita. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti kubudisa dikita mumuviri kunoita kuti tsinga dzinoendesa mweya kumapapu, dzigare dzakavhurika. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti paongorora yavakaita kuEpworth nemuHarare, zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu ava vaisaziva kuti denda reCovid 19 rinokwanisa kuparadzirwawo nevanhu vasina zvinoratidza kuti vane denda iri, asi vainaro, izvo vanoti zviri kuita kuti denda iri ripararire zvakanyanyisa. Sangano reDiabetic Association of Zimbabwe rinoti nepamusana pekuti vanhu vakawanda havaongororwi chirwere cheshuga, ndizvo zviri kukwidzawo matenda emoyo, hupofu, nekugurwa kwemakumbo zvokuti Covid 19 ikabata vanhu vakadai vasiri kutora mishonga, inokwanisa kuvauraya. Ongororo yakaitwawo zvakare nebazi rezvehutano inoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete kubva muvanhu gumi munyika, ane chirwere cheshuga. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvematenda asingatapuriranwe mubazi rehutano, Dr Justice Mudavanhu, vanoti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekupinda munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana ichichenjedza veruzhinji pamusoro pechirwre cheshuga nokuti zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu vanonyanya kuvhiringwa nedenda reCovid 19, vanhu vane zvirwere zveshuga, High Blood Pressure, uye nguva zhinji, vari vanhu vanenge vasiri pamishonga. Asi Dr Madavanhu vanoti chirongwa ichi chakambomiswa nekuda kwemitemo yakatarwa nebazi rehutano iyo isingabvumidze kuungana kwevanhu munguva ino yekurwisa Covid 19.

column2: Mutengo weRopa Woderedzwa Mushure Mekupindira kweHurumende
column3: Sangano reNational Blood Services kana kuti rinoti mari yavakawana kutanga kwegore rino kubva kuhurumende yakavabatsira kuti vadzikise mutengo weropa pamwe nekuti madzimai akazvitakura vano batsirirwa muzvipatara zvehurumende vawane ropa iri pachena. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko musangano iri, Muzvare Esther Masunda, vati NBS yakawana mari inoita mamiriyoni mana nemazana manomwe emadhora. Muzvare Masunda vati mari iyi ndiyo yakaita kuti vadzikise mutengo weropa kusvika pamadhora makumi mashanu papaindi imwe yeropa kubva pamadhora makumi masere muna Zvita. Amai Masunda vati nekuda kwekudzika kwemitengo iyi vanhu vazhinji vave kukwanisawo kutenga ropa iri huye sesangango vari kutsvaga nzira dzekusimudzira huwandu hweropa ravanotengesa. NBS ine mizinda mishanu inotengeserwa ropa inoti Harare, Bulawayo, Masvingo, Gweru neMutare. Muzvare Masunda vanoti nekuda kwemari yavakawana iyi vave kutsvakawo nzira dzekuti vawedzere mizinda inotengeserwa ropa iyi kuti veruzhinji vawanire ropa iri pedyo navo. Munyori webazi rezvehutano, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vanotiwo vanhu vazhinji vanga vasiri kukwanisa kutenga ropa izvo zvinova zvakasunda hurumende kuti ibatsire nemari. VaGwinji vanoti muono webazi rezvehutano ndewekuti mune remangwana ropa riwaniswe vanhu pachena. Vatiwo vari kutarisira kuti panozopera gore rino mutengo uye wadzika kusvika pamadhora gumi chete papaindi imwechete. Sangano reNBS rinowana ropa pachena kubva kune vanobatsira asi vanoti kucheneswa nekuchengetedzwa kweropa iri kunoda mari zhinji uye havagoni kuderedza mitengo kusvika vawana anenge achivabatsira nemari. No media source currently available

column2: Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai Java Vanoshaya
column3: Mumiriri weGlen View South mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeMDC Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai Java avo vakaita njodzi yemumugwagwa muna Chivabvu vashaya. Amai Tsvangirai Java mwanasikana wevaive mutungamiri weMDC muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai. Njodzi iyi yakaitikira kuKwekwe vachibva kumusangano weMDC. Dzimwe nhengo mbiri dzebato iri VaPaul Rukannda naVaTafadzwa Mhundwa vakashayao munjodzi iyi. Kunyangwe vainge vari muchipatara, Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai Java vakasarudzwa mwedzi wapera kuita munyori mukuru wegungano remadzimai muMDC, reWomen’s Assembly. Mutauriri wemhuri vari munin’ina waVaTsvangirai, VaManase Tsvangirai vaudza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai Java vashaya. Tichakupai zvizere muchirongwa chedu na 7 manheru ano.

column2: NDAKARASA MUKANA: CHARLES MANYUCHI
column3: SHASHA yetsiva – Charles Manyuchi – anoti akarasa mukana mukuru mugore ra2017 apo akakundwa naQudratillo Abduqaxorov wekuUzbekistan, kuSingapore izvo zvakamuona achitorerwa bhande raaive naro reWorld Boxing Council Silver Tittle asi kudzoka kwaaita ane chishuwo chekurwa nedzimwe shangwiti dzepasi rose dzinosanganisira Floyd Mayweather (Jr).   Kukundwa kwakaitwa Manyuchi mumutambo uyu kwakamudzorera kumashure sezvo akange ave pedyo nekukwanisa kurwira mabhande makuru etsiva akadai seWBC Championship uye nekusangana nevatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita saAmir Khan wekuEngland, Manny Pacquiao wekuPhilippines naShawn Porter wekuAmerica. Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Manyuchi anoti iye zvino ave munzira kugadzirisa zvakakanganisika kumashure uye achiri nemukana wekudzokera zvakare pamusoro mumutambo uyu.   “Ndakarasa mukana paye pandakakundwa kuSingapore naAbduqaxorov nekuti dai ndakahwina mutambo uyu ndakange ndatosvika pedyo nekutosangana nanaPacquiao uye nedzimwe shasha dzetsiva dzepasi rose. Zvakaitika hazvo asi ndiri kuzvigadzirisa nekuti chishuvo changu kuti ndirwe naManny Pacquaiao, Amir Khan kana naFloyd Mayweather (Jr) chaiye nekuti ndinoti dai adzoka mutsiva nekuti ndiri kuda kumbosangana nayewo,” anodaro.   Manyuchi mwedzi yadarika akahwina mutambo wake weRestoration Fight naPablo Ezequiel Acosta wekuArgentina ndokuhwina mabhande maviri eUBC neGBU izvo zvakamusimudza. Parizvino ave kutarisira kusangana naNordine Orik wekuFrance mwedzi unotevera uye mutambo uyu anofanirwa kuuhwina kuti akwanise kudzokera padanho raaive kare.   Manyuchi anoti mutambo wake naAcosta kudai asina kuuhwina ndipo paibva paperera kutamba kwake tsiva sezvo wainge wakamukoshera mukudzoka kwake.   “Mutambo wangu naAcosta ndiwo wandisvitsa nhasi pandave iye zvino, dai ndakakundwa zvingadai zvakabva zvaperera ipapo asi ndakahwina saka mukana uchiripo uye ndiri kutarisira mutambo uri kutevera naOrik. Ndozviziva kuti ndikauhwina aihwa ndenge ndadzokera pandaive chaipo uye iye zvino ndiri kuvimbisa kuti zvakaitika kare hazvichadzokorodzeke.   “Ndave kumberi chaiko uye ndiri kubata basa sebasa nekuti ndiri kuhwina, handidi kukundwa zvakare,” anodaro.   Muchinda uyu anoti akavamba boka rake iro ari kudzidzisa vatambi vetsiva vari kusimukira rinonzi Charles Manyuchi Boxing Academy.   Vamwe vatambi vari muboka iri vacharwa mitambo yakasiyana apo shasha iyi ichatatsurana naOrik musi wa28 Gunyana kuHarare International Conference Centre.

column2: Hurumende Inoti Pane Vari Kuronga Kupidigura VaMnangagwa
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika VaCain Mathema vanoti mapurisa ave kugara akadzipakatira sezvo vachiti pane vari kuda kupidigura hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuburikidza nekuratidzira. Vatiwo pane vemasangano ekunze vari kuda kushanda nevemasangano akazvimirira kuronga kuratidzira munyika. VaMathema vaudza vatori venhau muHarare nhasi kuti hurumende haisi kuzopeta maoko ichirega vanhu vachiratidzira vachitungamirwa nevemapato anopikisa nevemasangano akazvimirira oga. No media source currently available Gurukota iri raramba kuti hurumende ndiyo iri kupa kuti zvinhu zvisagadzikana munyika nenyaya yemitemo yayo yapa kuti hupfumi huende kumawere. Vati zvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika ndizvo zvapa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo. Vati zvakakokerwa neMDC uye vakayambira bato iri kuti risaratidzire risina mvumo yehurumende. Asi nyika dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango dzinoti zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru venyika vanotonga nedemo. Mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Yadzokoa/Mayibuye IZimbabwe Doctor Victor Chimhutu vati zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekutadza kugadzirisa hupfumi ndizvo zviri kupa kuti zvinhu zvisagadzikana munyika. No media source currently available

column2: Vamwe Vonyunyuta neMari Dziri kuBhadhariswa Vanoda Marezinesi eKutepfenyura
column3: Vanorwira kodzero dzekufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka nekodzero dzevatori venhau vochema- chema nemari yemarezinesi ekutepfenyura yakatarwa nehurumende. Muzviga zvakabudiswa nehurumende pasi pe Statutory Instrument 27 yegore rino nhepfenyuro dzenharaunda vanotarisirwa kubhadhara mari inosvika zviuru zvisere zvinezana remadhora kuti vakwanise kungonyorera kuti vanoda rezinesi iyo isingazodzoserwi kunyangwe vakashaya rezinesi iri. Pamusoro pemari iyi vanenge vabudirira vanozobhadharawo mari inosvika zviuru gumi nezvinomwe pagore rega rega kwemakore makumi erezinesi. Avowo vachange vachida rezinhesi yekutepfenyura nhepfenyuro yenyika yese vanobhadhara mari yekutsvaka rezinesi iri inoita zviuru makumi mana nezviviri zvine mazana mashanu emadhora iyo isingadzorerwi zvakare. Vanozobhadhara zvakare zviuru zana nemakumi maviri anezviuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu kuti vakwanise kudaniwa kumusangano unouya veruzhinji kuti vatsanangure pamusoro penhepfenyuro yavo iyo isingadzorerwi zvakare vakasapiwa rezinenesi. Vanoshandisawo madandemutande pakutepfenyura vanotarisirwawo kubhadhara kubhadhara mari inoraudzira miriyoni kana yahwerengedzewa zvese zvinodiwa Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa- Zimbabwe VaTabani Moyo vati mari yakatarwa nehurumende iyi inotyisa zvakanyanya. VaMoyo vati mutengo wakatarwa kunevanotepfenyura pamadandemutande we miriyoni imwechete yemadhora emuno vakadai sanaBus Stop TV vanonakidza veruzhinji, 263 Chat nevamwe vakawanda mucherechedzo wekuti hurumende inoda kuti masangano awa avhare. VaMoyo vashoropodzawo mari dzakatarwa kuneavo vachange vachida marezinesi ekutepfenyura nhepfenyuro dzematunhu. VaMoyo vati havaoni veruzhinji vachikwanisa kubhadhara mari idzi vakati zvobva zvapa hurumende mukana wekuva iyo chete inogona kukokwikwidza kuwana marezinesi awa. Izvi zvatsigirwa neimwe nyanzvi munezvekutepfenyura VaKudzai Kwangwari vati mari irikudiwa kunyanya kune avo vanenge vachizoda rezinesi yenhepfenyuro yenharaunda (Community Radio) yakawandisa. VaKwangwari vanotiwo nekunetsa kurikuita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nekudawo kwehurombo munyika havaoni nharaunda dzichizokwanisa kubhadhara marezinesi awa. VaMoyo vatiwo mutemo urikugadzirwa weBroadcasting Services unoti kune avo vachazoda kuita bhizimusi rekutepfenyura munyika vanogona chete kuwana rubatsiro kana rutsigiro kubva kunze kwenyika hwezvikamu zvisingadariki makumi maviri kubva muzana izvo zvinoreva kuti mari zhinji yacho vanofanira kuzvitsvagira. VaMoyo vati izvi zvinosiya veruzhinji vangade kutepfenyura kunze sezv vanenge vasina mari. Kunyangwe zvazvo mumutemo uyu hurumende yakaisa mari yerezinhesi dzenharaunda, parizvino munyika hakuna vakambopihwa rezinesi dzemhando iyi izvo zvopawo vamwe kuti vafungidzire kuti hurumende ingangodaro yoda kuvhura masaisai. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuhurumende panyaya iyi asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuudiswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanogaroti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inechido chekuvhura masai sai pamwe nekuona kuti kodzero yenhau munyika yazadzikiswa. No media source currently available

column2: Dambudziko Rekushaya Mari muMabhanga Roenderera Mberi muNyika
column3: Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vanhuwo zvavo munyika vari kushora zvikuru vemabhanga uye vemuzvitoro nekuvabhadharisa mari dzemitero kwavari kuita kuti vatore mari dzavo mumabhanga kana kuwana mari muzvitoro. Vanhu vanoti kunze kwekupedza nguva yakareba vari mumitsetse, vave kubhadhara mari inosvika madhora makumi maviri pakutora mari inosvika chiuru chemadhora yavanofanirwa kunge vachitora nemadhora matatu chete. Vanhu ava vanoti vave kumanikidzwa kutora mari inosvika chiuru chemadhora mukati memazuva gumi sezvo vari kukwanisa kutora zana remadhora chete pazuva kubva mumabhanga uye pose pavanotora mari iyi vanobhadhariswa mari. Vezvitoro vanonziwo vari kumanikidza vanhu kuti vatenge zvavanenge vasiri kuda kuti vakwanisewo kuwana mari. Mukuru weBankers Association of Zimbabwe Dr. Charity Jinya vanoti vemabhanga havana zvavangaite pamitero iyi nekuti vashandi vawo vanenge vawandirwawo nebasa. Asi vanhu vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vave kupedza nguva yakareba yavanofanirwa kunge vachishanda vakaforera mari. Kunyangwe zvazvo mukuru webhanga renyika VaJohn Mangudya vakati mabhanga ape vanhu mari inosvika chiuru chemadhora pazuva, Amai Esther Samson vati chino nyanyovashungurudza kutadza kupiwa mari yakatemerwa iyi. “Kubvira last week tichingotora mari tichipiwa ma$200. Ndasvika na 7am kuzopiwa $200 iyoyo kuma past 3 pm kuno apa unenge wanzwa nenzara. Izvozvi ndatozotenga nartjie apo ndiro randadya pano. Tiri kuswera pano nenzara. Mari iri kunetsa” Amai Samson vanodaro. Mumwe zvakare ange akaforera mari pabhanga reCABS ndaVaMagodo Bangwayo, avo vati vari kurasikirwa nenguva yekunge vachibata mabasa panguva iyo vanhu vazhinji vari kurarama nekubata mabasa emaoko nekuda kwekusawanikwa kwemabasa. “Cash iri kunetsa, unogona kumira panapa 3 hours uchinzi mari hapana. Ndasvika kuma 11am asi ndiri kutobva kuwana mari ikozvino. Queue yanga yakasvika ukoko, vachimbopinza six six, kusvika vaapa 15 kusvika tazonzi tese kuma past 3 pm,” VaBangwayo vadaro. VaJack Kavero vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti kumichina kana kuti maATM vanhu havasi kukwanisa kutora mari sezvo musina mari. Vatiwo mumabhanga vari kungoudzwa kuti hakuna mari. Vati zvinovashungurudza zvikuru kuti vanobuda ziya kushanda vobudazve ziya kutora mari yavo kubhanga. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano rinomirira varairidzi reZimbabwe Teachers Association, Zimta, rati dambudziko remari kumabhanga riri kukanganisawo zvikuru mashandiro evarairidzi, sezvo vari kuzomanikidzwa kupedza nguva vari mumitsetse vachiedza kutora mari. Mukuru weZimta, VaSifiso Ndlovu vati nemhaka yekuti mabhanga haasi kukwanisa kupa vanhu mari dzavanoda pazuva, varairidzi vazhinji vari kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti pamwe nemitero yepavanogara. “Varairidzi vari kutarisira kutambira mari dzavo dzemihoro mangwana, ndinoona vazhinji vavo vachi kundikana kudzokera kumabasa kwavo vatadza kuwana mari dzavo.” VaNdlovu vati vane hurongwa hwekumbogara pasi nevatungamiri vezvemari kuti vanzwe kuti dambudziko iri richapera riini. Vanoti nyika inofanirwawo kusimbisa kurudziro yekuti vanhu vashandise makadhi ekumabhanga sezviri kuitwa mune dzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza. “Tinofanirwa kusiyana netsika yekungoshandisa mari chete, toshandisawo zvimwe zvakaita sema credit card kana digital money,” VaNdlovu vadaro. No media source currently available

column2: ZEC Inoudzwa Kuti Chinowandiswa Ivhoti Kwete Mifananidzo
column3: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemataongerwo enyika Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya avo vari kushanda neUniversity of Johannesburg vanoti ZEC inofanira kuburitsa gwaro remazita evavhoti rine mifananidzo yevanhu sezvinodiwa nechirongwa chitsva cheBVR. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti chiso chemunhu hachifanire kuwandiswa asi chinofanira kuwandiswa ivhoti. Mashoko aya anotevera kutsika madziro kuri kuita sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vachiti havasi kuzoburitsa gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo. Zvichakadaro, sangano rinoona nezvemitemo nemashandiro eparamende reVeritas raramba mashoko ari kubuda mubepanhau reHerald kunyanya kuti riri kuda kukanganisa mashandiro esangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC nekuriendesa kumatare edzimhosva richipomera mhosva yekutyora mitemo yesarudzo. Bepanhau iri rinotiwo veVeritas vanoda kusvibisa zita remutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Sangano iri ratiwo rakatanga basa rekuti mutemo wesarudzo ugadziriswe muna 2013 pakatambirwa bumbiro remutemo idzva. Asi veVeritas vanoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro sezvo nyaya zhinji vakadzikwidza kumatare VaMnangagwa vasati vatora masimba vachishandisa mauto kubva kune vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Veritas yati haina bato rematongerwo enyika rainotsigira asi yakurudzira kuti bumbir remutemo richengetedzwe uye kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Sangano iri ratiwo rinoda kuti kana sarudzo dzaitwa mapato asazoenda kumatare achidzipikisa nekuti bumbiro remutemo rinenge risina kuteverwa. Veritas yatiwo pamutemo ZEC inofanira kungotevera mutemo kwete kuda kutara iyo mitemo nekupikisa nyaya dzose dzinenge dzaendeswa kumatare kunyangwe iri risiri basa rayo. No media source currently available

column2: Hazard asendeka shangu
column3: asendeka shangu dzekutambira nyika yake yeBelgium.   Mutambi uyu (31) akasarudza kusatambira nyika yake apo ichange ichirwira kuenda kumutambo we2024 European Championships uye ne2026 World Cup.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita chikwata chake kuWorld Cup kuQatar, Hazard asiya mushure mekutambira nyika yake kwemakore 14 apo ave kutarisira kumutsiridza hupenyu hwake hwenhabvu kuReal Madrid.   “Nhasi ndavhura chimwe chikamu. Ndokutendai nerudo,” Hazard anonyora paInstagram.   “Ndokutendai nerutsigiro rwenyu. Ndinokutendai nenguva yemafaro atakave navo kubva gore ra2008.   “Nhasi ndasarudza kusiya kutambira nyika yangu. Chikwata chitsva chevechidiki chagadzirira. Ndichakusuwai zvikuru.”   Bepanhau rekuBelgium Het Laastest Nieuws rakanyora kuti Hazard akange akurukura nevamwe vaanotamba navo nhabvu kuti anoda kusiya kutambira nyika yake kubva pavakaburitswa kuWorld Cup neCroatia.   Mazuva matanhatu akatevera, Hazard haana kushandura pfungwa dzake sezvo akabva azivisa vanhu 27.2 miriyoni vanomutevera paInstagram.   Matambiro ake muchikwata cheBelgium ange adzikira izvo zvakaona mutambo waakapedzisira kutambira nyika yake kuWorld Cup achipinzwa kwatambwa maminitsi anodarika 87 wave kunopera.   Akatanga kutambira Belgium aine makore 17 okuberekwa mugore ra2008 apo vakatamba neLuxembourg nemusi wa19 Mbudzi, 2008.   Mutambi uyu, uyo aimbove kuChelsea, akakwanisa kutambira nyika yake ka126, ndokunwisa ka33 uye achibatsira vamwe vatambi kunwisa ka36.   Hazard akatungamira Belgium ari kaputeni mumitambo 56. – SportsMail Football

column2: Vanhu Vabatwa neCovid-19 Vapfuura Mazana Mashanu Hurumende Ichiti Ichawedzera Dzidziso muVanhu
column3: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakakwira neMuvhuro kusvika pamazana mashanu negumi nevaviri (512) mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu (23) vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevashanu (535) vakaongororwa nezuro. Huwandu hwevanhu vapona kubva kudenda iri huchiri pamakumi matanhatu nevana (64), kuchitiwo vashaya vachiri vatanhatu kana kuti 6. Kuwanda kwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 uku kwaita kuti bazi rezvehutano riburitse mashoko padandemutande reTwitter richiti rave kuzosimbisa nyaya yekudzidzisa veruzhinji pamusoro pechirwere ichi pachiteverwa zvisungo zvakatarwa neWorld Health Organisation. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzakawanda dzagara dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti iwedzere vanhu vari kuongororwa chirwere ichi pazuva, uye kuendesa dzidziso kumaruwa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanzwisise nekukasika zviri kuitika kuitira kuti vasazobatwa vakavarairwa. Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuAmerica inoti vanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni mapfumbamwe nezana rezviuru (9.1 million), America iri iyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nemazana matatu ezviuru (2.3 million) ichiteverwa neBrazil, iyo yadarikawo miriyoni nezana rezviuru (1.1 million). Mumatunhu akawanda eAmerica chirwere ichi chinonzi chave kukwira zvakare zvichitevera kunyevenutswa kwemutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano, Doctor Simbiso Ranga, avo vari muNorth Carolina muno muAmerica, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi huri kukwira, kwete muZimbabwe chete, asi pasi rose, izvo anoti zvinofanirwa kutorerwa matanho nekukasika. Panyaya yekukwira kwehuwandu munyika, Doctor Ranga vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuendesa hurongwa hwekuongorora vanhu akaita sekukurudzira vanhu kupfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko, uyewo kuchengetedza vanenge vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi kwavo voga. No media source currently available

column2: Vamwe Vanhu Vashanu Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 muNyika
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakwira kusvika pagumi nevasere kana kuti 18 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vashanu vashaya. Vanhu vatatu vakafa vari munharaunda dzakasiyana siyana vamwe vaviri vakafa vari munzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vaabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vanosvika mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nevashanu kana kuti 985. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu vatatu nechirwere ichi nezuro. Pavanhu ava, vaviri vakabva kuSouth Africa uye mumwe akachitapurirwa munyika. Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemasere kana kuti 288 ichiteverwa neBulawayo ine vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevatatu 183, Mashonaland Central ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanova gumi nemumwe. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vanosvika mazana matatu nemakumi maviri kana kuti 320. Vanhu vavhenekwa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru makumi masere nezvisere kana kuti 88 000. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nekufa kwechirwere checoronavirus huri kuramba huchiwedzera, vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vave nemazuva makumi maviri nematanhatu vachiramwa mabasa nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari dzavari kutambiriswa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehutano VaAmon Murwira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakaudza dare resenate kuti hurumende yakazvipira kuita hurukuro nevashandi vayo vari kuramwa kuita mabasa. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti vari kusangana Muvhuro uno neveHealth Services Board vanoona nezvemari dzinotamburiswa vashandi vemuzvipatara. No media source currently available

column2: Osimudzira mureza weZim. . . Chiwenga akapihwa mubairo weFootball BlackList 2019 Award
column3: NYANZVI yechidzimai inomiririra vatambi venhabvu vazhinji vanotambira kuEurope, Ellen Chiwenga, akasimudzira mureza wenyika nguva pfupi yadarika apo akahwina mubairo weFootball Blacklist 2019 Award kuEngland.   Chiwenga — uyo ane rezinesi rekushanda achimiririra vatambi venhabvu raakapihwa nesangano reFederation International de Football Association (Fifa) — akawanikwa ariye ega mudzimai wekutanga kubva muAfrica kupiwa mubairo weFootball BlackList 2019 Award pamhemberero dzakaitirwa kuLondon nguva pfupi yadarika.   Mudzimai uyu zvakare ane marezinesi akasiyana ekushanda munhabvu anosanganisira Football Association of England License (FA), Association of Football Agents (AFA) neWoman in Football (WIF).   Mubairo weFootball Blacklist Award — uyo unokotsverwa nesangano reFootball Blacklist Organisation — unopihwa kuzvizvarwa zvemuAfrica nezvekuCaribbean Islands avo vanenge vachiita basa guru mukushandura nhabvu munyika yeEngland.   Chiwenga akapihwa mubairo weCommercial Section uyo unove muboka rekushambadza nhabvu pamwe nekuisimudzira.   Achitaura neKwayedza ari kuLondon uko anogara, Chiwenga anoti vanhukadzi vanogona kushanda mubasa rekumirira vatambi venhabvu sezvinoitwa nevanhurume vane mukurumbira vakadai saJorge Mendes naMino Raiola avo vanomirira vatambi venhabvu vakuru pasi rese vanosanganisira Cristiano Ronaldo, David de Gea, Zlatan Ibrahimovic naPaul Pogba.   Mibairo yeFootball Blacklist yakatangwa mugore ra2009 uye Chiwenga ndiye mudzimai wekutanga kubva kuSouthern Africa kuhwina mubairo uyu.   Vamwe vakambohwina mubairo uyu vanosanganisira Yaya Toure wekuCote d’Ivoire, Rio Ferdinand wekuEngland kozoti Rachey Yankey uyo aimbotambira chikwata cheEngland chemadzimai.   “Ndinonzwa kufara nekuremekedzwa kwandaita, zvichibva kune mudzimai wekutanga kuva nerezinesi zviri pamutemo reFifa mune zvemuitambo kuUnited Kindom, Rachel Anderson.   Zvinhu zvinotisimudzirawo nekutipa shungu kuti sevanhukadzi tiite mabasa ayo anonzi ndeevanhurume bedzi,” anodaro Chiwenga.   “Mubairo uyu hauna kusimudzira ini bedzi asi mureza wenyika yeZimbabwe, dunhu reAfrica, vanhukadzi pamwe nevanhukadzi vari mune zvenhabvu munyika dzakasiyana-siyana,” anodaro.   Kushanda kukuru kwaari kuita munhabvu zvakamuona achiremekedzwa kunyika dzakasiyana uye achigadzwa zvigaro zvinosanganisira kuve Global Goodwill Ambassador of Bring Hope Humanitarian Foundation (BHHF) naAmbassador weKarachi FC kunyika yePakistan.   “Shuwiro yangu ndeyekusimudzira nhabvu muAfrica, zvakare ndine chido chekuti dai ndawana mukana wekusimudzira matarenda kunyangwe kwandinobva zvakaita sekuvakwa kwenhandare dzenhabvu, kusimudzira matarenda evana muzvikoro,” anodaro Chiwenga.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Vechidiki vanoda kusimudzirwa, vamwe nekushaya mikana yekuratidza matarenda avo vave kuita zvekunwa nekuputa zvinodhaka.   Isu tiripo pakuvapa mikana yekusimudzira matarenda aya vararame hupenyu hunoyevedza nekuda kwekuti ndivo vatungamiri vemangwana.”

column2: Emery oda vamwe vatambi
column3: anovimba kuti Arsenal ichamutsigira muna Ndira uno nekumutengera vamwe vatambi, asi akaramba kutaura kuti Denis Suarez achange ari mumwe wacho here.Mutambi weBarcelona uyu ari kunzi ari kudiwa chaizvo nechikwata chekuEmirates ichi uko achasanganiswa zvakare naEmery uyo waakashanda naye kuSevilla.   Chikwata chake chichangobva kukunda Blackpool 3-0 mumutambo weFA Cup third-round.   Emery anoti,” Ndinofunga kuti chikwata chiri kushanda kutsvaga vatambi vanogona kutibatsira mumwedzi mina inotevera. Ndinofunga kuti nguva ino tinogona kubatsirika tikatsvaga mutambi wekumashure. Asi hazvisi nyore nekuti tina Konstantinos Mavropanos uyo ari kudzoka mushure mekumbokuvara. Tinodazve mutambi wekumberi, mumwe chete anokwanisa kutamba kumberi munzvimbo dzakasiyana.”   Paakabvunzwa kuti anoona Suarez achitamba sewinger, murairidzi wemaGunners uyu akawedzera kuti, “Ndipo paaitamba kwese, ndichimurairidza aitamba kurudyi kana kuruboshwe panzvimbo iyoyi.”

column2: Vadzidzisi VekuMaruwa Vanoti vaveKushungurudzwa neVasori VeCIO
column3: Sangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, rinoti raudza magweta aro kuti vafambise nyaya yekutyisidzirwa kwavari kuitwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori veCIO. Mukuru weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti pane varume vatatu vanozivikanwa varikutyisidzira nhengo dze sangano ravo uye vachitaura pachena kuti vari kuzoparadza sangano iri. “Chekutanga vanoti kuendesa kwatakaita Zanu-PF kumatare edzimhosva kuti iregere kushandisa vana, maticha nezvinhu zvezvikoro." Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Chepiri vanochema nesu kuti makaendeserei ZEC kumatare edzimhosva uye, chechitatu, vanoti takaenderei kuConstitutional Court nenyaya yevadzidzisi,” VaMasaraure vakaudza Studio 7. Zvichakadaro, ARTUZ yaburitsawo gwaro ichiti inomira pamwe chete nevarairidzi veku Swaziland avo vari kunetsana nehurumende yavo pamusoro pemari yemuhoro. No media source currently available

column2: Sikandar odzoka kuzc
column3: MUTAMBI wecricket, Sikandar Raza, akasarudzwa kuti agove muchikwata cheZimbabwe Cricket icho chichaenda kunokwikwidza neBangladesh mumitambo mitatu yeone day international uye nemiviri yetest match.   Asi achange asiri muchikwata chemaChevrons icho chiri kuSouth Africa kunokwikwidza mumitambo yakasiyana iri kutanga svondo rino musi weSvondo.   Shasha iyi yange isina kusarudzwa kuti iende kunomirira maChevrons zvichitevera nyaya dzake dzekondirakiti dzainetsa, asi zvakazogadziriswa apo pakaitwa hurukuro pakati pake neZimbabwe Cricket contracts committee svondo rino.   Raza akatsanangura mamiriro aive akaita nyaya yake uye akakumbira ruregerero ndokuzvipira kumirira Zimbabwe mumitambo inotevera.   Apo maChevrons akasimuka kuenda kuSouth Africa kare kunokwikwidza mumitambo mitatu yeODI iyo ichange ichitambirwa kuKimberley uye neyeTwenty20, vanosarudza chikwata ichi vakaronga kuti vamusiye asi vachizomusarudza pakuenda kuBangladesh.    “Ndine mufaro mukuru nezvakaitika izvi uye ndinopa kutenda kuZC iyo yakwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya dzangu.   “Ndinoda kusiyana nenyaya iyi ndotanga kuita zvekuti nditambe cricket yangu kwete kufunga zvakawanda,” anodaro Raza.   Akafanobata chigaro chamanaging director weZC –  Givemore Makoni – anoti anotambira nemaoko maviri kudzoka kwaRaza muchikwata ichi.   “Tine mufaro mukuru kuti takakwanisa kuwirirana naSikandar uyo anove mumwe wevatambi vedu vepamusoro. Tinomutambira nemaoko maviri kudzoka muchikwata chedu uye tinovimba kuti patichaenda naye kuBangladesh nemimwe mitambo achatibatsira zvikuru,” anodaro.   Masvondo adarika, Raza akabuda pachena kuti akange asiri kuzotambira maChevrons kumitambo yeSouth Africa neBangladesh zvichitevera kusapihwa kondirakiti itsva neZC izvo akatumira pandemutande rake retwitter.

column2: Dare reConCourt Rinorasa Chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe
column3: Dare repamusoro-soro reConstitutional Court rarasa chikumbiro chesangano reMisa Zimbabwe chekuti vatori venhau vapihwe mukana wekutora mifananidzo yemavhidhiyo pachange pachinzwikwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa. VaChamisa vari kuda kuti zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa musi wa30 Chikunguru zvisendekwe parutivi, vachiti ivo ndivi vakakunda musarudzo iyi, kwete zvakataurwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, zvekuti mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndivo vakakunda. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro ichi mudare, gweta reMisa Zimbabwe, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vati vatori venhau vanobva kumakambani akasiyana-siyana vanofanirwa kubvumidzwa kutora mifanananidzo yemavhidhiyo mudare vagoibuditsa pamadandemutande nepazvivhitivhiti panguva imwecheteyo inenge ichiitika zvinhu kwete kuti komisheni inoona nezvematare yeJudical Services Commission ibvumidze kambani yeZBC yoga kuita izvi. Amai Mtetwa vatiwo kambani yeZBC haifanirwe kuva iyo yoga inobvumidzwa kutora mifananidzo mudare mangwana sezvo mamwe makambani enhau akazvimrira akangofananawo neZBC ane marezenesi ekutepfenyura. Vati zvakaitwa neJudicial Services Commission zvekupa ZBC chete mvumo yekutepfenyura zvichange zvichiitika mudare zvinoita sekuti kambani yeZBC yakakosha kupfuura mamwe makambani enhau uye vati zvichadhurira mamwe makambani enhau ari kuda kutepfenyura kunzwikwa kwenyaya ichange iri mudare mangwana sezvo kambani yeZBC yati ichange ichibhadharisa mari inoita zviuru gumi nezvitatu zvemadhora pazuva kumakambani achada kushandisa mifananidzo ichange ichitorwa nekambani iyi mudare mangwana. Amai Mtetwa vaenderera mberi vachiti ZBC haibatike kune dzimwe nzvimbo munyika uye ruzhinji rwevanhu rwave kukwanisa kuona zvinenge zvichiitika munyika kubudikidza nekutepfenyurwa kunoitwa nevanoshandisa mbozhanhare vachiisa pamadandemutande panguva inenge ichiitika zvinhu. Vatiwo zvakanaka kuti mamwe makambani akazvimirira abvumidzwe kutepfenyura ari padare riri kunzwikwa nyaya iyi mangwana sezvo achitepfenyurira vanhu vari muZimbabwe pamwe nevari kunze kwenyika vari kuda kuziva zvichange zvichiitika panyaya iyi mangwana. Asi gweta ranga rakamirira VaMnangagwa, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vati Misa Zimbabwe haina nhepfenyuro yainotepfenyura zvingapa kuti inzwikwe. Gweta ranga rakamirira Judicial Services Commission, VaAddington Chinake, vatiwo mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Busani Bafana, uyo anga achigitsigira chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe ichi achiti anodawo kutora mifananidzo mudare, haana rezenesi rekutepfenyura nokudaro nyaya yake haina kusimba. Magweta anga akamirira ZBC panyaya iyi atiwo ZBC inokwanisa kupa makambani ose mifananidzo yaanoda nemhando yaanenge achida zvisinei nekuti ndeemuno kana kuti ndeekunze sezvo achiti ZBC yave nemichina yechimanjemanje inokwanisa kuita izvi. Mukuru wevatongi munyika, VaLuke Malaba, avo vanzwa nyaya iyi, varasa chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe vachiti Misa Zimbabwe naBafana havana marezenesi ekutepfenyura saka nokudaro havana chavangarwira panyaya iyi. VaChinyoka, vati vafara nemutongo waturwa nedare. VaChinyoka vati zvasvitswa kudare neMisa Zimbabwe hazvina musoro. Zvichakadai, kambani yeZBC yaswera ichiita gadziriro dzekuti igotepfenyura zvinenge zvichiitika mudare mangwana pachanzwikwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare naVaChamisa yekuti zvakabuda musarudzo zvisendekwe parutivi sezvo vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusoro-soro naVaMnangagwa nebato ravo reZanu PF. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira VaMnangagwa panyaya iyi, VaPaul Mangwana, vati vagadzirira zvizere kunzwikwa kwenyaya iyi vachiti vane tarisiro yekukunda panyaya iyi. VaJacob Mafume, vanove gweta riri kumirira mumwe wevakakwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaNoah Manyika, avo vari kutsigira chikumbiro chaVaChamisa chekuti zvakabuda musarudzo zvisendekwe parutivi, vaudzawo Studio7 kuti nyaya yavo iri pachena semhanza zvekuti dare harifanire kutora nguva richinzwa nyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, munyori muJudicial Services Commission, VaWalter Chikwanha, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vatongi vedare reConstitutional Court vachanzwa nyaya iyi neChitatu vachaita basa ravo nemazvo vasina divi ravakarerekera. Magweta aVaChamisa neaVaMnangagwa achange achisvitsa nyaya dzavo zviri pamutemo, ukuwo vatongi vedare iri vachivabvunzurudza. Dare iri rinofanirwa kupa mutongo waro mukati memazuva gumi nemana kubva musi waziviswa nyika nezvesarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

column2: ZC yorongera Pakistan
column3: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) chemaChevrons svondo rino chakatanga gadziriro dzekuenda kunokwikwidza nePakistan mumitambo mitanhatu yeOne Day International nemitatu zvekare yeTwenty20 International.   Uyu uchave mutambo wekutanga wechikwata ichi chichienda kunze kwenyika kubva kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yakasiyana pasi rose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mwedzi wadarika, ZC yaifanira kusangana neAfghanistan asi mutambo uyu wakazomiswa zvakare nekuda kwedenda iri. Zvisinei, vatambi vechikwata chenyika ichi vakaramba vachiita gadziriro dzavo vari kudzimba. Mukushi wemashoko weZC, Darlington Majonga anoti mutambo uyu uchaona ZC ichitamba mitambo yekutanga yeICC Cricket World Cup Super League.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichatatsurana mumitambo mitatu yeODI ichatanga musi wa30 Gumiguru uye mimwe miviri ichizotambwa musi wa1 na3 Nyamavhuvhu.   Kana mitambo iyi yapera, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichatatsurana zvakare musi wa7, 8 na10 Nyamavhuvhu mumitambo yeT20 International Series.   “Gadziriro dzedu dziri kufamba zvakanaka uye tine tarisiro yekuti tichaenda kuPakistan kunotamba mitambo mitanhatu iyi pasina chikoneso.   “Gore rino, takatadza kutamba mitambo mizhinji asi haticheme hedu nekuti chakakosha kuchengetedza hupenyu hweveruzhinji. Saka pari zvino zvinenge zvave kuendeka nekudaro tinotarisira kunosangana nePakistan,” anodaro Majonga.   Mwedzi yadarika, ZC yaifanira kutamba nezvikwata zvinosanganisira Afghanistan, Ireland neAustralia asi mitambo iyi yose yakamiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.

column2: Vamwe Voyaura Zvichitevera Kupera kweMabasa nePamusana peCovid-19
column3: Vanhu vakawanda vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo munguva ino yeCovid-19 vanoti vari kutambura zvikuru sezvo vasina chekubata. Mumwe wevanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa, Va Luck Moyo, vanoti ivo nemhuri yavo vave kudya kamwe chete pazuva kubva pavakasiya basa kukambani yavaishandira. VaMoyo vanoti basa ravo rinokwanisa kuraramisa mhuri yavo asi ikozvino havakwanisi kuenda kunoita basa iri sezvo vasina tsamba inovapa mvumo yokuenda kunzvimbo yavanenge vadaidzwa. Mumwe akatarisana nedambudziko iri, Muzvare Melissa Jairosi, avo vane dhigiri reEngineering, vanoti vakapererwa nebasa muna Nyamavhuvhu gore rapera pakambani inoita zvokuvaka. Vanoti nekushaya chekuita, vakafunga kuita basa rekutengesa hembe dzemumabhero nemuriwo wavanotenga kuMbare, sezvo vari kushaya basa ravakadzidzira kuEngland. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Mary Makuyana, vanoti vakamiswa basa vachangotanga kupfuya huku kumba kwavo zvokuti ndizvo zvave kuvararamisa. Asi vanoti bhizimisi radzikira nokuti vanhu vavaitengesera huku idzi kum hofisi emuguta vakamiswawo mabasa uye mahofisi makuru akavharwa kubva gore rakapera. Muzvare Dadiso Mudziwepasi vanoti vakadzingwa basa muchitoro chinotengesa zvokudya nembatya zvokuti vave kushanda mumba memumwe mudzimai ane tuckshop pamba pake, asi vanoti mari yavanotambira haisi kuvakwanira nemhuri yavo. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Gift Mutasa, vanoti panofanirwa kuitwa hurukuro nehurumende kuti pawanikwe nzira dzokubatsira vanhu vane mabhizimisi akaparara uye nekubatsira vanhu vakadzingwa mabasa nenyaya yeCovid 19 iyo yakavharisa nyika. VaMutasa vanoti huwori ndihwo hwasvitsa nyika pairi nhasi nokuti zviri pachena kuti mabhizimisi ari kubudirira ane chekuita nevanhu vari kutonga nyika ino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva huwandu hwevanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo nekuda kweCovid-19. Gurukota revashandi nemagariro evanhu akanaka, Professor Paul Mavhima, vakaudza Studio7 nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubatsira vanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo munguva ino yeCovid-19. Asi masangano anomirira vagari pamwe neevashandi munyika anoti hapana ruyamuro rwuri kupihwa vanhu nehurumende kuti vabatsirikane munguva ino. No media source currently available

column2: Makanzura Akadzingwa Basa kuGweru Oronga Kuendesa VaKasukuwere kuMatare
column3: Sangano re Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, rakamirira makanzura maviri emuGweru, ranyorera tsamba gurukota rezvematunhu richipikisa kudzingwa kwakaitwa makanzura aya. Gweta re Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum riri kumirira makanzura maviri aya, VaTafadzwa Christmas, vanoti VaMoses Marecha naVaAlbert Chirau vakadzingwa basa zvisiri pamutemo, izvo vanoti zvinotyora kodzero dzavo dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaChristmas vanoti kunyange hazvo mutemo we Urban Councils Act uchipa simba gurukota rezvematunhu kudzinga makanzura, masimba aya akabviswa mubumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika. VaChristmas vanoti mutemo uripo unosungira kuti paumbwe komiti inoferefeta kukanganisa kunenge kwaitwa nakanzura, kana meya. VaChristmas vanoti kana komiti iyi yawana kanzura kana meya aine mhosva, ndipo panopinda gurukota rezvematunhu richidzinga anenge achipomerwa mhosva, kwete zvakaitwa naVaKasukuwere. VaChristmas vanoti VaKasukuwere vakasatevedzera zviri mutsamba yavanyora, vachaendesa nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro soro vachipikisa kutyorwa kwekodzero dzemakanzura maviri aya. Asi VaKasukuwere vanoti havasi kuzodzosa makanzura aya pabasa uyezve havasi kuzopindura tsamba yakabva kumagweta emakanzura aya. VaKasukuwere vanotiwo vanoda kuvaendesa kumatare vakasununguka kuita izvi. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Rita Makarau, vati havasati vawana tsamba yakanyorwa naVaChristmas. Amai Makarau vanoti kudzamara vawana tsamba inovazivisa zviri pamutemo nezve kudzingwa kwemakanzura aya, komisheni yavo icharamba ichiita basa rayo semazuva ose. Makanzura maviri aya ndiwo akatanga kudzingwa basa vachipomerwa mhosva yeuori naVaKasukuwere, avo, svondo rapera, vakambomisa basa makanzura ese kusanganisira meya weguta reGweru, vachivapomera mhosva yehuori pamwe nekushandisa mari yekanzuru zvisiri mugwara. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Lawyers For Human Rights Inoudza Dare ReSenate Kuti Kodzero dzeVanhu Dziri Kutyorwa muNyika.
column3: Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kana kuti ZLHR nemusi weChitatu rakaudza dare reSenate kuti kutyorwa kwedzoro dzevanhu kuri kuwedzera zvakanyanya nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi uye mapazi ehurumende ndiwo ari pamberi pekutyora kodzero idzi. Vakuru vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZLHR VaDzimbabwe Chimbga namuzvare Roselyn Hanzi vakaudza komiti yeSenate inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu kuti kodzero dzevanhu dziri kunyanyotyorwa munyaya dzine chekuita nedzidzo, pekugara, hutano pamwe nechikafu. Vaviri ava vati sangano ravo riri kushushikana kuti kunyange hazvo bumbiro remutemo richiti hurumende inosungirwa kuwanisa vanhu pekugara, zvekudya, dzidzo pamwe nehutano, vanhu vakawanda vari kuputsirwa dzimba dzavo mumaguta. Vatiwo vana vari kudzingwa muzvikoro uye madzimai anotadza kubhadhara mari kuzvipatara vari kuvhariwa muzvipatara mushure mekusununguka vachinzi vanofanira kutanga vabhadhara mari. Vatiwo apo nyika yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa, vamwe vanhu vari kunyimwa chikafu nekuda kwekuti havasi nhengo dzebato riri kutonga reZanu-PF. VaChimbga vati zviri pachena kuti bumbiro nekodzero dzevanhu zvirikutyora zviri pachena uye mapazi ehurumende ndomamwe ari kuita izvi. Vatiwo imwe nyaya inovasuwisa inyaya yekunyangarika kwemurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu VaItai Dzamara pamwe nekuti hurumende inenge isiri kutora matanho ekuvatsvaga. Asi Senator Judith Mawire vanomiririra Mutare Central vari nhengo yeZanu-PF vati vanoshamisika kuti sei pari kungotaurwa nyaya yaVaDzamara ipo paine vamwe vakatsakatika munyika vakawanda. Asi muzvare Hanzi vati sangano ravo rinobatsira munhu wese munyika risingatarise kuti wabuda mumba maani. VaChimbga vatsinhirawo mashoko amuzvare Hanzi vachiti vese vane nyaya dzavo vakasununguka kudzitaura kusangano ravo uye vanobatsira kana vachikwanisa. Ishe Daster Chisunga vekuMbire, vanove nhengo yekomiti iyi, vati kubva kuhumbowo hwapihwa nemagweta eZLHR zviri pachena kuti kodzero dzevanhu dziri kutyorwa munyika uye komiti yavo inofananira kuongorora kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nechinangwa chekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa. VaChimbga vati vanofara nechido charatidzwa nekomiti iyi vakatiwo hurumende inofanira kutora matanho ekutevedzera bumbiro remutemo iro rinopa vanhu kodzero dzavo dzose.

column2: Vanorarama neKukumbira Rubatsiro Vovhiringwa neCovid-19 muZimbabwe
column3: Vamwe vasingaoni vanorarama nekukumbira mari mumabhazi nemumigwagwa kwaRusape vanoti vari panguva yakaoma sezvo hurumende yakambomisa kufamba kwemabhazi aya senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaTymon Rukuni vekwaRusape, vanoti kubva nemusi weSvondo apo vakapedzisira kupemha mubhazi, ndiwo musi wavakapedzisira kudya rinopisa nevana vavo vatanhatu, sezvo vasingawani kwekupemhera nekuti muguta hamuchina vanhu ukuwo kumabhazi havachadiwiko nekuda kwechirwere che-COVID-19. "Tine mhuri nine dzinorarama nekupemha asi nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus hapachina kana chichabuda nekuti mumabhazi hakuchina, chikafu hatichina nekuti kumabhazi hatichadiwi kuti tifambe ikoko. Toita seyiwo nhai," vanodaro VaRukuni. Amai Rejoice Chinembiri vekwaRusape vanoti nekusafamba kwemabhazi panguva ino, hakuna kumwe kwavanotarisira kuwana mari kunze kwekufamba nemabhazi iwaya vachikumbira rubatsiro. 'Tinosipinda mumabhazi tikukumbira, towana tumari totenga tuhupfu tuTsunami nemuriwo todya nevana kumba. Zvino izvezvi mabhazi akamiswa hatina kana pekutangira. Tamboenda kwaMP wedu kuti tibatsirwe tikazoenda kuSocial Welfare asi tangonyorwa mazita hatina kupihwa kana chipunu chehupfu chaicho," Amai Chinembiri vanotsanangura. VaNhamo Makusha vanoti sevanhu vanorara nechavawana musi iwoyo, hapana zvazvichareva kana vachirambidzwa kupemha munzvimbo dzemuguta kana mumadutavanhu sezviri kuitika panguva ino yeLockdown. "PaLockdown apa patidhisiadhivhandeja nekuti sevanhu vanotsvaga mumabhazi, nekuti hatina chatinacho, zvichireva kuti takapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo pakaguma kufamba mabhazi acho uye pari zvino hatichabvumirwi kukwira mabhazi acho, takapedzisira kudya musi iwoyo weSunday," vadaro VaMakusha Mumiriri weMakoni Central mudare reparemende, VaDavid Tekeshe, vanoti vari kuedza nepavanogona napo kuti mhuri dzevasingaoni idzi dziwane rubatsiro asi zviri kutora nguva refu. "Ndatouya nemuriwo izvezvi kwavari ndichiti pamwe vangabatsirikana sezvo vange vakanzi vanokwanisa kubatsirwa kumapurisa asi hapana chabuda ikoko vakanzi vaende kuWelfare asi vangonyorwa mazita chete pasina chabuda. Vanhu ava vanoti vakapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo vakakwanisa kutenga katsaona kekudya musi wacho. Vanhu ava vari pa desperate havana chekudya vanotoda rubatsiro," vanodaro VaTekeshe. Dambudziko rakatarisana nevanhu ava idambudziko rakatarisanawo nevanhu vakawanda munyika yose vanga vachipona nekukumbira rubatsiro mumigwagwa nemumabhazi. Zimbabwe ine vanhu vangangosvika zviuru mazana mashanu vasingaoni, vazhinji vavo vachipona nekukumbira rubatsiro sezvo munyika musina mabasa akawanda nepamusana pekuparara kwaita hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

column2: MaChevrons osangana neIreland
column3: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chichatanga goredzva ra2023 nekusangana neIreland mumitambo mitanhatu inoti mitatu yeOne Day International (ODI) nemimwe mitatu zvakare yeTwenty20 International Games (T20).   Zvichitevera kudzoka kwakaita maChevrons kubva kuAustralia nguva yadarika kuWorld Cup uko akadadisa nekusvika kuSuper 12, uyu ndiwo uchaita mutambo wavo wekutanga gore rinotevera.   Zimbabwe Cricket yakazivisa kuti mitambo yemaChevrons neIreland yese yeODI neT20 ichatambirwa kunhandare yeHarare Sports Club.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichitanga kubandana mumitambo yeT20 mazuva anoti 12, 14 na15 Ndira. Mitambo yeT20 painongopera, yeODI inobva yatanga uye ichatambwa nemusi wa18, 20 na23 Ndira.   Chikwata chaDave Houghton ichi chiri kutarisira kutanga goredzva nekuhwina mutambo uyu sezvo kubva pakadzoka murairidzi uyu, chakatanga kutamba cricket inonwisa mvura.

column2: ZIBAWU Inoti Standard Bank Haina Chido cheKusimudzira Nyika
column3: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vemumabhanga, re Zimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, rinoti Standard Bank iri kuvhara mabhanga ayo mumaguta madiki akaita se Hwange, Chiredzi, Chinhoyi nemamwe, nekuti bhanga iri haridi kubatsira Zimbabwe kuti ibudirire. Mashoko aya anotevera mashoko ebhanga iri ekuti riri kuvhara mabhanga aro mumaguta madiki nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vashandi vavo vakawanda vari kurasikirwa nemabasa nepamusoro pemaitiro ebhanga iri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reStandard Bank. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe neGermany Dzoronga Kuumba Komisheni Inoona nezveKusimbaradza Hukama
column3: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakasangana neChipiri negurukota rekuGermany rinoona nezvekudyidzana munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nebudiriro, VaGerd Muller, vakabvumirana kuumba komisheni ichaone nezvekusimbaradza hukama nekudyidzana pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure memusangano wavo, VaChinamasa vakati vafara kushanyirwa naVaMuller. Vakati vatura nyaya dzakawanda dzinosanganisira kudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi, chikwereti cheZimbabwe kuGermany, zvirango zvehupfumi pamwe nekuti Zimbabwe itange zvekare kuwana rutsigiro rwemari nehunyanzvi kubva kuGermany. Vakatiwo vakazeya zvimwe zvingaitwe neZimbabwe kuti ikwanise kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kune dzimwe nyika nemasangano epasi rose pamwe nekuti igadziridze hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rose. VaChinaamasa vakati vakabvumiranawo kushanda pamwe chete panyaya yekudzidzisa vanhu zvidzidzo zvemabasa emaoko kana kuti vocational training nechinangwa chekuti vanhu vakwanise kuzvishandira pamwe nekupinza vamwe mabasa. Zimbabwe yakatarirwa zvirango zvehupfumi nenyika dzekumavirira dzakaita seAmerica, Australia nenyika dzekuEurope nekuda kwehutongi hwehudzvanyiriri, kutyora kodzeo dzevanhu pamwe nekuita sarudzo dzisina kujeka. VaMuller vakati vakafara kuuya kuZimbabwe mushure mekunge Zimbabwe yagadza mutungamiriri mutsva zvichitevera sarudzo dzemwedzi wapfuura idzo dzakazosimbiswawo nedare repamusororo munyika. Vakati zvakakosha kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaite zvakavimbisa kuita zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu kusanganisira mapato anopikisa pamwe nekuremekedza nekutevedza mitongo yematare edzimhosva. VaMuller vakati Germany nedunhu rese reEurope vanoda runyaro muZimbabwe ndosaka vachida kuti VaMnangagwa vaite zvavakavimbisa. Vakatiwo Germany inoda kuona hupenyu nehupfumi hwevanhu vekumaruwa huchisimudzirwa ndosaka iri kuda kushanda neZimbabwe mukusimudzira ruzivo rwevanhu pamabasa emaoko. Vakatiwo Joint Commission yavachaumba neZimbabwe ichazeya zvese zvingaitwe uye kuti Germany ingabatsirei sei vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti vabudirire. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti kunyange hazvo makurukota aVaMnangagwa ari kuramba achiita basa rawo, ari kuita izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo sezvo mutemo uchiti zvigaro zvavo zvinopera panogadzwa mutungamiri wenyika mushure mesarudzopapera. Izvi zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika pasi paSection 108 (1) (c). VaMnangagwa vakagadzwa kuve mutungamiriri wenyika nesvondo uye havasati vadoma dare remakurukota avo. No media source currently available

column2: ZVICHANGOITIKA . . . Pitso aenda kuSaudi Arabia
column3: wenhabvu wekuSouth Africa ane mukurumbira, Pitso Mosimane, aziviswa kuti ndiye ava kuzorairidza chikwata chikuru chekuSaudi Arabia, cheAl Ahli Saudi kutanga izvozvi.

column2: Zimbabwe Yobatana neWHO neMamwe Masangano Kurwisa Chirwere cheBharaziya
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Muzvinafundo Francisca Mutapi vanoshanda nesangano reTracking Infections To Benefit Africa vari kuScotland vanoti sangano ravo riri kuita ongororo rakabatana nebazi rezvehutano nesangano guru reWorld Health Organisation yekuona kuti chirwere chebharazira chadzoka here munyika uye kuti chingarapwe seyi pachena. Vanoti chirwere ichi chinoratidza nekuita weti kana tsvina ine ropa uye vanenge vaoona izvi vanofanirwa kuenda kunavana chiremba sezvo chirwere ichi chichirapika. Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vanonzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi chinokonzerwa nehutachiwona hunogara mumvura ine tsvina. Muzvinafundo Mutapi vanoti pakambenge pane zvirongwa zvekurapa chirwere chebharazia pachena munyika munguva yapfura chakange chakanangana nevana vadiki vemuzvikoro asi chakambomiswa uye chinotarisirwa kutanga gore rinouya. "Kurudziro yedu ndeyekuti pachadaidzirwa nebazi rezvehutano kuti vanhu vauye kuzorapwa denda rebilharzia munguva inotevera vanhu vachabuda nehuwandu hwavo sezvo chirwere ichi chichirapika uye chichange chichi rapwa pachena," Muzvinafundo Mutapi vaudza Studio7. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata mukuru wezvehutano muguta reHarare VaProsper Chonzi kana mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa . No media source currently available

column2: Reina opembedza Sarri
column3: anoti aimbove murairidzi wake, Maurizio Sarri, anogona kurairidza zvikwata zvikuru zvichitevera mashoko ari kutenderera ekuti angangotsiva Zinedine Zidane kuReal Madrid. Zidane akaramwa basa rekurairidza Real Madrid svondo radarika mazuva mashanu achangosimudza mukombe weChampions League uyo waakahwina katatu kakatevedzana.   Mutungamiriri weMadrid, Florentino Perez, ave kufanirwa kutsvaga mumwe murairidzi anotsiva chizvarwa chekuFrance ichi uye Sarri zita rake riri kutaurwa nezvaro kunzi anogona kuenda kuzvikwata zvikuru zvakawanda muEurope zvinosanganisira Madrid neChelsea.   Achitaura nebepanhau reAS rekuSpain, Reina anoti, “Tiri vanhu vamwe. Tine hukama hwababa nemwana, ndinomuda zvikuru uye ndichagara nekutenda nezvose zvaakandiitira.   “Ndiye akaita kuti zvose zvaiitika kuNapoli makore matatu adarika zvibudirire, uye anoda nhabvu inonwisa mvura inoyevedza. “Ini ndingatokurudzira zvikwata zvakasiyana kuti zvimutore nekuti ane njere dzenhabvu uye ane ruzivo rwakanyanya rwemutambo uyu.” – Sportsmail Football

column2: Hurumende IYosimbaradza Kuti ZUPCO Ndiyo Yega Ine Mvumo Yekutakura Vanhu
column3: Mutevedzeri wegurukota Amai Marian Chombo vanoti kambani yemabhazi, yeZimbabwe United Passenger Company (ZUPCO) ndiyo yega yakapihwa mvumo yekutakura vanhu mumaguta. Izvi zvinotevera kunyunyuta kwevanhu vakawanda munyika nerimwe sangano rinomirira vanotakura vanhu nezvinhu, reZimbabwe Union of Drivers and Conductors (ZUDCO) kuti kambani yeZUPCO yaremerwa nemutoro. Mutungamiri weZUDCO, VaFredrick Maguramhinga, vanoti hurumende haisi kuda kunzwa zvichemo zvevanhu vari kunetseka nekushaya zvinovatakura kuenda nekudzoka kumabasa. VaMaguramhinga vanoti sangano ravo ririkuramba richikumbira hurumende kuti iite musangano nevanotakura vanhu kuti zvinonetsa mativi ose zvikurukurwe uye kuti hurumende ikwanise kubatsira mukugadziriswa kwedambudziko iri sezvainofanirwa kuita. Vachipindura chikumbiro cheZUDCO ichi , Amai MaChombo, vanoti kana hurumende yatura gwara nemutemo hazvigoni kungozvisendeka parutivi.  No media source currently available

column2: VaChamisa Vanoti Kutadza Kutungamira Kwapa Kuti Africa Isarire Shure
column3: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa vanoti nyaya yekutadza kutungamirwa kwenyika yapa kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzitadze kuzadzikisa tarisiro yemagamba akaita savanamuchakabvu, Kwame Nkrumah, Julius Nyerere nevamwe vakatungamira mukurwisa hutongi hwevasveta simba. VaChamisa vataura mashoko ayo kuStudio 7 pazuva rekupemberera kuumbwa kwesangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dzemuAfrica weOrganization of African Unity rave kuzivikanwa nekuti African Union. Vati kuti Africa ikwanise kubudirira, inofanira kuve nehutongo hwejekerere ichiremekedza kodzero dzevanhu kwete kuti mauto apote achitungamira nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. VaChamisa vatiwo zvakakosha kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzigare pasi dzione kuti dzingagadzirise sei matambudziko aunza hurombo mudunhu rine zviwanikwa nezvimwe zvinokwanisa kusimudzira magariro evanhu kana vachitaura nezwi rimwe chete. No media source currently available

column2: Rimwe Sangano reVarimi Rotsigira Hurongwa hweKubhadhara Vachena Vakatorerwa Minda
column3: Rimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Farmers Union (ZFU), rinoti rinotambira nemufaro hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti varimi vatema vari mumapurazi akatorerwa vachena vabhadhare mitero ichashandiswa mukuripa vachena ava budiriro dzavakanga vaita pamapurazi avo. Mukuru weZFU, VaPaul Zakariya vanoti kubhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro zvakasiya zvaitwa nevachena ava kunopa varimi vechitema ava chiremera chekuti vakabhadhara zvavari kushandisa, kwete kuti vakaita zvekubvuta. “Handiona sekuti chingave chinhu chingaremera vanhu kuti vave ne ownership yakadzika pamusoro peminda yavanenge vachishandisa. Idanho rinokwanisa kuti ritipe chiremera munharaunda yatinogara uyewo nepasi rose kuti vakanga varipo paminda iyoyo vakabhadharwa,” VaZakariya vanodaro. VaZakariya vanoti kubhadhara kwavari kuita mari idzi kuburikidza nemitero iri kubhadhariswa varimi vakagariswa patsva ava hakusi kuti vari kutenga ivhu ravari kurima kwete. “Varimiri vanenge vachibhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro dzakaitwa nevachena ava, kwete kuti tiri kutenga ivhu redu, kwete.” Mukutanga kwemwedzi uno gurukota rezveupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vakazivisa kuti hurumende yakanga yave kutanga kuita ongororo mumapurazi kuti ione kukosha kwakaita budiriro dzakasiiwa nevachena vakatorerwa mapurazi ava. Vakati izvi ndizvo zvinozovapa ruzivo rwekuti murimi oga oga obhadhara marii, uye murimi wechichena akabviswa papurazi apa anozopiwawo marii. Kutanga muna 2000, vachena vanodarika zviuru zvina vanonzi vakabviswa zvine chisimba pamapurazi avo achipiwa kune vatema, asi minda mizhinji yakararira nekuda kwekushaiwa zvikwanisiro kwevarimi vatsva ava. No media source currently available

column2: Kushomeka kweMari kuMabhanga Kotadzisa Varairidzi Kutora Mari Dzavanoda
column3: Dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari kumabhanga rinonzi ratadzisa varairidzi kuwana mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno. Dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari kumabhanga rinonzi ratadzisa varairidzi kuwana mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno. Mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti varairidzi vakawanda vaenda kumahofisi avo vachi nyunyuta kuti vari kutadza kutora mari dzavanoda kumabhanga. Vanoti varairidzi ava vanga vachiti mabhanga mazhinji anga achingovapa mari inoita madhora makumi mashanu chete pamunhu, inove shoma kune zvavanenge vachida. “Varairidzi vanenge vakatarisira kuti mari idzi ndidzo dzavachashandisa kutenga zvavanoda uyewo kubhadharira vana vavo school fees sezvo zvikoro zvave kuvhurwa. Asi zvose izvi zvapinda musango,” VaZhou vanodaro. Mumwe anoshanda kune rimwe bhanga asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau audza Studio7 kuti mabhanga haasi kukwanisa kuwana mari yaanoda kubva kubhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, izvo zvave kuita kuti mabhanga amirire kuwana mari kubva kune vanenge vachida kuchengetesa mari dzavo. Mukutanga kwemwedzi uno gavhuna veRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vakaudza paramende kuti mabhanga emunyika akapinza mari inodarika mazana maviri emamiriyoni emadhora kubva kutanga kwegore rino kusvika mwedzi uno, asi mari iyi ichiri kutadza kugutsa misika. VaMangudya vakati bhanga ravo riri kutora matanho akawanda anosanganisira kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vashandise makadhi ekumabhanga pakutenga nekubhadhara zvinhu. Vakatendawo kuti vanhu vakawanda havachada kuchengetera mari dzavo kumabhanga nekuda kwemitero yakakwira yekumabhanga pamwe nekuderera kwemari dzinoberekwa. Asi VaZhou vanoti vakuru vehurumende vanofanirwa kumbosendeka kusawirirana kwavo nevemamwe mapato vogara pasi kuti vagadzirise zvinhu munyika. “Inini ndinoona sekuti vakuru venyika, eeh, VaRobert Mugabe nevamwe, nevakuru vema opposition ngavambogara pasi vataurirane vachitaurirana chokwadi kuti nyika ingafamba ichienda mberi sei,” VaZhou vanowedzera. Panya yemabhonasi evarairidzi, vanoti hurumende yakavazivisa varairidzi kuti vachawana mari idzi musi wa 30 Kubvumbi. Asi vanoti kukundikana kwehurumende kubhadhara varairidzi mabhonasi avo, ayo vatarisira kwenguva ndefu, kucharevawo kuti zvikoro zvichangovhurwa zvakavharwa, zvichireva kuti varairidzi havasi kuzoenda kubasa pachavhurwa zvikoro musi wa 3 Chivabvu. No media source currently available

column2: Kusasununguka kweUpfumi Kwodzikisa Chimiro cheZimbabwe
column3: Kusamira zvakanaka kwenyaya dzeupfumi munyika kunonzi kwaita kuti Zimbabwe ive imwe yenyika nhatu dziri pasi dzinonzi hadzina rusununguko munyaya dzezveupfumi. Izvi zvakaburitswa netsvakurudzo yakaitwa nemakambani maviri avana chipangamazano anoti Heritage Foundation ne Wall Street Journal akabatana pamwechete. Tsvakurudzo iyi, iyo inonzi 2015 Index of Economic Freedom, inoratidza kuti Ziri pachinzvimbo chezana nemakumi manomwe neshanu, kubva munyika zana nemakumi manomwe nesere, iine zvibodzwa makumi matatu nezvinomwe. Masangano makuru maviri aya aitarisa zvinhu zvinobata rusununguko rweupfumi zvakaita semitemo yenyika, mitemo yezvemabhizimusi, kuvhurika kwemisika nezvimwe zvakadaro. Nyika nhatu dziri kumashure kweZimbabwe dzinoti Venezuela, Cuba neNorth Korea. Nyika gumi dziri pamusoro dzinoti Hong Kong, Singapore, New Zealand Austria, Canada, Switzerland, Chile, Ireland, Estonia neMauritius. Gore rapera Zimbabwe yaive pachinhambo chezana nemakumi manomwe nenhanhatu, zvichireva kuti gore rino yakakwira nechinzvimbo chimwe chete chete. Kutseketuka kweZimbabwe uku kunonzi kwakakonzerwa nekubatwa zvakanaka kwenyaya dzinosanganisira kushandiswa kwemari nehurumende. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamsa, kuti tinzwewo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi nyanzvi mune zveupfumi uye vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti Zimbabwe inokwanisa zvikuru kukwira kubva pachinhambo chinonyadzisa chayagara iri ichi kana chete ikabvuma kushandura mitemo yayo inobata zvemabhizimusi. No media source currently available

column2: VaMugabe Vanoita VaJonathan Moyo Gurukota reDzidzo yePamusoro
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, neMuvhuro vakavandudza zvishoma dare ravo remakurukota vachibvisa VaJonathan Moyo kubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, vachivaita gurukota rinoona nezvedzidzo yepamusoro. Vanga vari gurukota redzidzo yepamusoro, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, vava gurukota rezvemvura nezviwanikwa. Vatora basa ranga richiitwa naVaSaviour Kasukuwere, avo vava gurukota idzva rezvematunhu, vachitora basa ranga richiitwa naVaIgnatius Chombo. VaChombo vava gurukota rezvemukati menyika, vachitora basa ranga richiitwa naVaKembo Mohadi, avo vatora basa raiitwa nevakadzingwa mubato, VaDidymus Mutasa, avo vanga vari gurukota rezvevasori. Brigadier General Ambrose Mutinhiri vave kutora chigaro chaVa Joel Biggie Matiza chekuva gurukota rezvedunhu reMashonaland East. VaMatiza havana rimwe basa idzva ravapihwa. Amai Nyasha Chikwinya ndivo vava gurukota rezvemadzimai. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, ndivo vari kufanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko zvichitevera kubviswa kwaVaMoyo. Amai Mupfumira vanoti vachabata chigaro ichi kusvika VaMugabe vatoresa gurukota idzva mhiko. No media source currently available Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muMDC, VaObert Gutu, vanoti zvaiitwa naVaMugabe kungopedzera hoko padehwe retsindi sezvo dare ravo remakurukota risina njere dzekunyukura nyika mumadhaka mairi. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaPedzisayi Ruhanya, vanotiwo VaMoyo kwavaenda kuchavapa mukana wekuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzedzidzo, vachitiwo hapana zvavanotarisira zvitsva kuhurongwa hwaitwa naVaMugabe. VaRuhanya vanoti munhu anofanirwa kuvandudzwa ndivo VaMugabe pachavo, kwete zvavari kuita pamakurukota avo.. No media source currently available

column2: MDC Yopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Maviri Yaumbwa
column3: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti iri kuenderera mberi neMugovera nehurongwa hwavo hwekupemberera kusvitswa kaitwa makore makumi maviri kubva parakaumbwa muna Gunyana 1999.
