Bato iri rinoburitsa mashoko aya zvichitevera mashoko ari kutumirwa pa social media achiti hurongwa hweMugovera hwakanzurwa. Murongi wemisangano mubato iri, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti hapana chachinja pahurongwa hwavo. VaChibaya vanoti kune vanhu vari kuda kuti musangano wavo usabudirira izvo zviri kupa kuti vanhu ava vati VaChamisa vachange vari kurufu kwaVaMugabe neMugovera. VaChibaya vanoti VaChamisa ndivo vachange vari munyarikani mukuru pahurongwa hwavo, uye vari kutarisira madzisahwira achibva kunze kwenyika kunge ari muRufaro Stadium. Vaimbi vane mukurumbira munyika vachange vachivaraidza vanhu nemumhanzi. MDC yakamisa hurongwa hwayo uhwu musi wa Gunyana 14 ichipa mukana wekuti nyika icheme VaMugabe, avo vakashaya kuSingapore musi waGunyana 6. No media source currently available

column2: Sangano reVarimi reIntegrated Commercial Farmers Union Rokurudzira Kuti Mitengo yeZvirimwa Itarwe neMari yeKunze
column3: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varimi, reIntegrated Commercial Farmers’ Union, rinoti mitengo mitsva yezvirimwa yemwaka uno yakaziviswa nehurumende svondo rino yakanaka chose asi dambudziko rinozosangana nemurimi nderekuti vezvitoro vanobva vakwidzawo zvakanyanya mitengo yezvinodiwa nemurimi mumwaka unotevera. Hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti mwaka uno Grain Marketing Board ichange ichitenga chibage nemadhora zviuru gumu nezviviri nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe, kuchitiwo mbeu diki dzchitengwa nemadhora zviuru gumi nezviviri nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nemashanupatani. Soya bhinzi dzinonzi dzinenge dzchitengwa nemadhora zviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana maviri negumi nerimwe patani. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weIntegratedCommercial Farmers’ Union, Amai Maiwepi Jiti, vanoti pari zvino mari iyi inoonekwa seyakawanda zvikuru asi panozosvika nguva yekugadzirira mwaka unouya inenge isisakwanire varimi kuti vakwanise kutenga zvavanoda. "Hongu mitengo yema inputs inokwira panotaurwa mitengo yembesa. Ndinokurudzira kuti dai hurumende yataura mutengo vachishandisa mari yekunze, sokuti chibage chonzi US$260.00. Then panguva ayekuti murimi ave kubhadharwa opiwa zvake maRTGs vachishandisa rate inenge iripo musi iwoyo," vanodaro Amai Jiti. Vanoti izvi zvinobatsirawo murimi kumudzivirira kubva kumitengo yezvikwanisiro zvekuti kana mitengo yakanzi yakwidzwazve haufe haanetseke kudzokera mumunda mwaka unotevera. Amai Jiti vanokurudzira hurumende kuti ipindirewo nekuona kuti mitengo yezvikwanisiro zvinodiwa nemurimi haizokwidzwi pasina mvumo inobva kwairi. No media source currently available

column2: ‘TSIGIRAI LOGA’
column3: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vanoti hapana chinokonesa Zimbabwe kuenda kumakwikwi e2022 Qatar World Cup zvichitevera kugadzwa kwemurairidzi mutsva wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors, Zdravko Logarusic.   Loga, sezita remadunhurirwa raLogarusic iro raakapihwa nevatsigiri venhabvu, akagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi neZifa achitsiva Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa uyo akasiya basa gore rapera.   Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas ndiye ange akafanobata chigaro ichi zvichitevera kubva kwaMhofu.   Chizvarwa chekuCroatia ichi, Loga, akaparurwa zviri pamutemo svondo radarika nesangano reZifa.   Mutungamiri weZifa, Felton Kamambo, akabva azivisa Loga kuti maWarriors anofanirwa kuenda kumakwikwi ese enhabvu anoti African Nations Cup (CHAN), Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) 2021 neFifa World Cup 2022.   Muhurukuro nevatsigiri venhabvu vakasiyana vanoti remangwana remaWarriors rakajeka zvikuru zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa Loga.   Mutungamiri wesangano reFriends of Warriors, Edward Chimedza, anoti kuuya kwaLoga kwaunza chiedza chakanaka uye pane tarisiro huru yekuti achabata basa sebasa.   “Loga auya, tinofanirwa kumupa nguva anyatsobika chikwata chake uye Zifa ngaimutsigire nekumupa zvese zvaanoda kuti agoita basa rake nemazvo. Tine mukana wekuita zvikuru munhabvu naLoga uye tiri kumutemba kuti achabata basa, 2022 ndaona tichienda kuWorld Cup naye. Asi anofanirwa kutanga atidzosera kuAfcon zvekare,” anodaro Chimedza.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa neshasha inozivikanwa pakutsigira nhabvu, Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa achiti Loga anofanirwa kuwana rutsigiro ruzere kubva kuZifa, mapoka akasiyana anoona nezvenhabvu pamwechete nevatsigiri.   “Murairidzi wedu mutsva tinaye uye tiri kufamba naye, toda kumuona achibudirira. Anofanirwa kupihwa rutsigiro rwese rwaanoda kuti agobudirira mubasa rake. Kana akataura kuti ane vatambi vaanoda, ngavauye nenguva kuitira kuti ashande navo agozivana navo.   “Tine mitambo mikuru iri kuuya saka tinoziva kuti tikamutsigira zvakasimba tinobudirira chete, kunyanya mumutambo weCHAN uri kuuya munaKubvumbi. Asi mikuru yeAfcon neWorld Cup yatiri kuda ndine chivimbo chekuti ari kuzotiendesa,” anodaro.   Munyori mukuru weFriends of the Warriors, Zivanai Muwashu anoti kuve nemurairidzi wekunze kunobatsira zvikuru mune zvakasiyana.   “Uku ndiko kubudirira kwatave kuita munhabvu yedu, tave kufamba mugwara chairo naLoga. Tine varairidzi vemuno hapana kwataienda nekuti vamwe vaisarudza vatambi vekuzvikwata zvavo kuti vagouya kumaWarriors, manje naLoga achanyatsoongorora vese osarudza vatambi vaanoda avo vaanoona kuti ndivo vanokodzera kutambira maWarriors.   “ Mumaonero angu, izvi zvichatibatsira kuti vatambi vanogona vachashevedzwa uye vachatamba nhabvu votisvitsa kure,” anodaro Muwashu. Mutambo wekutanga waLoga achirairidza maWarriors uriko musi wa23 Kurume apo achasangana neAlgeria, kuAlgeria mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuAfcon 2021.   Svondo rinotevera racho, maWarriors achange ari pamusha apo achasangana neAlgeria mumutambo weAfcon zvakare.   MunaKubvumbi, Loga ane basa guru rekubata sezvo achatungamirira maWarriors kumakwikwi eCHAN achaitirwa kuCameroon.   MaWarriors akaiswa muboka reGroup A rine zvikwata zvinoti Cameroon, Burkina Faso neMali.

column2: IMF Yotumira Nhumwa kuZimbabwe asi Imwe Nyanzvi Inoti Hurumende Haisi Kuzokwereteswa Imwe Mari
column3: Chimwe chikwata kubva kubhanga reInternational Monetary Fund chiri kutarisirwa kupinda munyika muna Kurume kuti chizeye nevakuru muhurumende kuti hupfumi hungagadziriswe sei. Uhu hurongwa hunozivikanwa nekuti Article IV Consultations. Vamwe vakuru vehurumende vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vanoti vanoda kuti IMF ivabatsire nemari imwe yechikwereti. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Dr Godfrey Kanyenze vanoti kana hurumende isina kubhadhara mari dzemitero kana kuti ma arrears pane zvimwe zvikwereti zvinodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete nemazana matanhatu kumabhanga akaita seWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. No media source currently available

column2: Muchatiguta muPSL: Balakasi
column3: MUTAMBI weSimba Bhora – Tinashe Balakasi – oyambira zvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League kuti zvichavaguta mwaka unotevera zvichitevera kupinda kwavakaita muPSL.   Balakasi, mwaka uchangopera weRuyamuro Northern Region Division One, akanwisa ka29 ndokunyora nhoroondo yekunwisa kanodarika ka20 mumwaka mumwe chete.   MuCastle Premiership, pave nemwaka yakawanda pachishaya mutambi anokwanisa kunwisa kanodarika ka20 mwaka mumwe chete izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa naNorman Maroto mugore ra2010 apo aitambira Gunners FC.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Balakasi anotsidza kuti mwaka wa2023, uyo uchange uri wekutanga weSimba Bhora muPSL, zvikwata zvizhinji zvichamuguta sezvo achange achipisa sezvaaiita muNorthern Region.   “Gore rinotevera, ndichange ndichitokwikwidza nevamwe vatambi ndichivarakidza kuti ndinotonwisa sezvavanotoita uye ndinogona kutovadarika.   “Ndinoda kuvarakidza kuti ndiri mutambi wepamusoro saivo,” anodaro.   Mutambi uyu asati aenda kuSimba Bhora, akambotambira muPSL kuzvikwata zvinoti Harare City neCAPS United.   Panguva iyi, akangokwanisa kunwisa kana chete paaitambira zvikwata izvi.   Anoti haana kutamba zvinonwisa mvura apo akambotambira muPSL nekuti aisanyatsowana mikana yekutamba kuzvikwata izvi.   “Pandakambotambira muPSL ndaisanyatsowana mikana yakakwana saka handina kunyatsotamba zvinonwisa mvura. Asi, iye zvino ndadzoka nechikwata chinovimba neni nekudaro ndicharakidza zvikwata zvese chipo changu uye ndinoda kunyora imwe nhoroondo,” anodaro.   Balakasi anoti mumakore maviri anotevera, anoshuvira kunge ave kutambira nhabvu yake kunze kwenyika. Anoti mwaka unotevera achashanda nesimba kuitira kuti azoshevedzwa kuzotambira chikwata chenyika asi hunge kana zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFIFA zvabviswa.   “Mutambi wese wenhabvu shuviro yake kutambira kunze kwenyika uye kutambira nyika yake. Saka iniwo ndinotarisira kuti mumakore maviri anotevera, ndinge ndave kutambirawo kunze kwenyika. Ndinoda kutanga kutambira kuSouth Africa uye ndinovimba ndikashanda nesimba zvinoitawo kuti ndigoshevedzwa kuzotambira nyika yangu.   “Izvezvi nekuda kwezvirango zviripo ndinoziva kuti nyika yedu haisi kutamba nhabvu nezvikwata zvekunze. Asi kushanda nesimba kwakanaka nekuti kunoita kuti ndigare ndichitariswa nevarairidzi venyika kuitira panozobviswa zvirango ndinogona kuwanawo mukana,” anodaro Balakasi.   Zvakadaro, Simba Bhora iri mushishi kuita gadziriro yekusangana neGolden Eagles mufainari yeAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament ichatambwa musi wa22 Gumiguru kuRufaro Stadium.   Vaimbi vanoti Sulumani Chimbetu naBaba Harare vanotarisirwa kuzoridza pamutambo uyu vachivaraidza vatsigiri venhabvu.

column2: Musangano weNyika Dzine Nzou Unopetwa kuHwange Nyika Dzine Nzou Dzichikurudzira CITES Kuti Isapindira Muzvirongwa Zvadzo
column3: Musangano wemazuva matatu wekutsvaga nzira dzekuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzine nzou dzitaure nezwi rimwechete kumusangano weCOP uchaitwa mukupera kwegore rino, uyo wakanga uchiitirwa kuHwange wkapetwa nemusi weChina, makurukota ezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa akapinda mumusangano uyu achiti sangano reConvention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora kana kuti CITES haifanirwe kupindira mukutengeswa kwenyanga dzenzou nenyika dzakazvimirira. Makurkota emunyika dzemuAfrica aya akati nyika dzakazvimirira dzine kodzero dzadzo dzekushandisa zviwanikwa zvadzo sezviri mumitemo yadzo. Musangano uyu wakabuda nechibvumirano cheHwange Declaration, icho chine zvisungo gumi nezvina, zvinosanganisira chekuti sangano re CITES rinofanirwa kuongorora zvakare zvisungo zvaro panyaya yekutengeswa kwenyanga dzenzou. Nyika dzine nzou idzi dzakakurudzirwa kuti dzitambirewo chibvumirano cheHwange Declaration ichi. Zimbabwe iri kuda kuti ibvumidzwe kutengesa nyanga dzayo dzenzou dzainoti dzakawandisa. Hurumende yakambotiwo inogona kubuda mugungano reCITES kana zvido zvayo zvakasatevedzerwa. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu musangano uyu wavive musangano wakakosha zvikuru asi donzvo riri kurwirwa nemakurukota akapinda mumusangano kusanganisira weZimbabwe rakanangana nekuuraya nzou, izvo zviri kurambwa nesangano reCITES. No media source currently available

column2: Magweta aChin'ono naVaNgarivhume Odzokera Zvakare kuMatare
column3: Magweta ari kumirira mutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, pamwe nemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, anoti ari kudzokera zvakare kumatare nemusi weChitatu. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti richakumbira matare nemusi weChitatu kuti ape vaviri ava mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba. Vaviri ava vakanyimwa nedare repamusoro mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso svondo rino. Asi mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti magweta ari kudzokera kumatare sezvo pane zvinhu zvashanduka kubva pakasungwa vaviri ava. VaMafunda vanoti nyaya yekukurudzira kuratidzira musi wa 31 Chukunguru haichave ingarambe vaviri ava vari muhusungwa nokuti zuva iri rakapfuura, uye hapana mhirizhonga yakaitika. No media source currently available

column2: VaMnangagwa Vanoshanyira Glen View Yanetseka neKorera
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vashanyira musha weGlen View uko kwapararira chirwere chekorera panguya iyo hurumende ichiti iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora achashandiswa mukurwisa nechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vatambirwa nemufaro mukuru nevatsigiri veZanu PF vanga vaungana pachipatara pamwe nevana vechikoro vanga vachibva kuchikoro pavaenda kunoona vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera mumusha unogara veruzhinji muGlen View. Vachitaura pazvitoro zveTichagarika zviri mumusha weGlen View mushure mekushanyira chipatara cheGlen View Polyclinic uko kuri kurapwa vanhu vakati kuti vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo ichabatsira kanzuru yeHarare mukutakurwa kwemarara, kugadzirwa kwepombi dzinotakura tsvina pamwe nekuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena kuitira kuti chirwere chekorera chipere muHarare uye chisarambe chichipararira kune dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kunze kweHarare. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo kuti veruzhinji vagare vakashambidzika pose pavari kuti vasatapurirane chirwere ichi. Meya weguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, avo vanga varipowo pashanywa naVaMnangagwa, vati sekanzuru vari kuedza pose pavanogona napo kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira. VaGomba vati pane zvibhorani zviviri zvavatovhrara zviri muGlen View zvange zvave kukonzera kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mugari wekuGlen View, Amai Mascelyn Chibweya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru kuti kanzuru iri kugadzira pombi idzo dzanga dzave kusanganisa mvura yekunwa pamwe netsvina kana kuti masuweji. Mumwe mugari wemuGlen View, VaJoe Kadzviti, vati zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvingadai zvakafa dai pasina kumhanyidzana kuri kuitwa nevemasangano akazvimirira, vemabhizimusi, kanzuru pamwe nehurumende mukurwisana nechirwere ichi icho chapfunya chisero muHarare. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vaparura homwe yavari kukumbira kuti izadzwe nemari neveruzhinji yakanangana nekurrwisa chirwere chekorera. VaNcube vati hurumende iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhati emadhora ichashandiswa mukurwisa chirwere chekorera. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vanoti pane vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri vafa nechirwere chekorera kusvika pari nhasi uye huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hwave kudzikira. Chirwere chekorera chakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina muna 2008. No media source currently available

column2: Paramende Yodaidza VaChinamasa Kuti Vajekese Kwakabva Mari yeKubhadhara Chikwereti kuWorld Bank
column3: Vanoona nezvehupfumi mubato reMDC, VaTapiwa Mashakada, uye vari nhengo yekomiti yedare reparamende inoona nezvehupfumi, vanoti komiti yavo ine hurongwa hwekudaidza kudare iri gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kuti vataure nezvekubhadhara chikwereti chenyika. VaMashakada vanoti vanoda kuti VaChinamasa vazotsanangure nyaya yemari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yavanoti vakawana kubhadhara mari yakawedzerwa pazvikwereti zveZimbabwe kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. VaChinamasa havana kutaura kuti mari iyi yainge yabva kupi. Asi bepanhau reZimbabwe Independent rakabva raburitsa nyaya yekuti mari iyi yainge yabva kukambani yekuSingapore inonzi Trafigura. Asi mutauriri wekambani iyi, Amai Zohra McDoolley-Aimone, varamba mashoko ekuti kambani yavo yakapa Zimbabwe mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yekuti ibhadhare chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. Vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kuStudio7, Amai McDoolley-Aimone vati vainge vanzwa mashoko kubva kumapepanhau ekuti Trafigura yainge yapa Zimbabwe mari asi vakati aya manyepo. Vatiwo vane mabhizimisi muZimbabwe uye makambani avo akazvipira kuramba achifambisa basa achishanda nehurumende asi panyaya yekukweretesa Zimbabwe, asi kambani yavo iri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya.. Kambani yeTrafigura Group yakapinda muZimbabwe muna 2013 kuburikidza nekuisa hupfumi mukambani yePuma Energy iyo yakaisa zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana mukambani yeRedan Petroleum. Redan ine nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa mafuta edzimotokari makumi manomwe nepfumbamwe, uye inopa mafuta endege panhandare ina. VaMashakada vanoti zvinonetsa kuti pawane mabhanga kana makambani angakweretese Zimbabwe mari kana asinawo kusviba. No media source currently available

column2: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri KuBritain Zvoronga Kuratidzira Kwakasimba
column3: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuBritain zvine hurongwa hwekuungana zvichiratidzira mukupera kwesvondo pasi pehurongwa huri kutungamirwa nesangano rinorwira hutongo hwejekerere, reFree Zimbabwe Advocacy Group. Sachigaro wesangano iri, VaJoshua Chigwangwa vanoti vatora danho iri senzira yekupa mukana kuvana veZimbabwe wekuti vazivise pasi rose nezve mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nemamiriro azvehupfumi. Hurongwa uhwu, uhwo hwuri kuitwa pasi pezita rekuti #zimbabweriseupuktour2016, hwakaonawo sangano iri richikoka varwiri vekodzero vanoti Vasten Zvorwadza, Doctor Patson Dzamara, Muzvare Linda Masarira pamwe nePastor Evan Mawarire ve#thisflag. VaqChigwangwa vanoti hurongwa hwavo hwaifanirwa kutanga neMuvhuro wesvondo rino, asi vakasangana nematambudziko akaita kuti hunonoke, akaita sekunonoka kugadziriswa kwemagwaro ekufambisa aPastor Mawarire pamwe neDoctor Dzamara, asi iye zvino zvinhu zvave kufamba zvakanaka. Vanoti pane hurongwa hwekuti Pastor Mawarire vanotaurawo pamisangano yavakakokwa nemasangano anosanganisira Chatham House pamwe neparamende yeBritain. No media source currently available
